112a7(rgyud 'grel): a rili ho hr-i tri tri/ de nas tshogs su gshegs nas/ 'khor thams cad la spyan bgrad nas/ gzigs shing 'dzum pa'i brdas ha ha sang sang sgra phyung ste/ 'khor thams cad kyis kyang / mgrin gcig tu dbyangs 'di 
112a8(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo la bstod do// e ma'o tshes/ e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod pas gtso bo mnyes nas// 
112b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor thams cad la gzigs shing / dam gsal ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// khag l+yA/ sha ta ba ka/ a la la ho// ma ha pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ kha ra ma yo gi ni/ kha raM ta ki ni/ a la la ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha Sha 
112b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams rnga brdung zhing dbyangs len/ rgyud gsum gyi glu tshig/ ta ke ma ta ke ma ta ke ma/ ga te ma ge te ma/ ta ke ma ta ke ma/ k+She ma k+She ma k+She ma// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma 'phreng las/ rigs sngags 
112b3(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // da ni rdo rje srin po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces gsungs pa ni/ rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i phyir/ rdo rje
112b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la bos so// hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'du 'phro'i klong dkyil nas// khro ba chen po rnams bzhugs pa// brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa ste/ zhes gsungs te/ bdud dang 
112b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs la stsogs pa/ spa skor zhing brlag par gdul ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pa dpung chen po 'bar zhing / tug tsem gyi sgra nang du/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro zhing 'khyil pa'i dbus na/ khro bo'i
112b6(rgyud 'grel): 'og nas 'byung ba rnams/ zhabs brkyang bskum gyi tshul du khro gnyer sdang smig tu gzigs shing bzhugs pa'i don to// gzhan du na rtag chad kyi mtha' dang / mtshan ma'i spyod yul dang / lta ba'i gnas drug cu rtsa
112b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni/ yang dag pa'i dbyings nyid la 'jug pa'i bar du gcod pas/ bgegs su 'gyur la/ spyir mi rtogs par gyur pas bdud de dag 'joms shing / skrag pa'i shes rab kyi me la bya/ ye shes lnga'i/ 
112b8(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sna lnga las/ thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / dbyings nyid la 'khyil te gnyis su med po'i ting nge 'dzin du thim nas/ mtha' las 'das te sku mi dmigs pa dkyil lo// don gong ma ltar go ba
113a1(rgyud 'grel): ni sgra ste/ kun tu khyab pa'i phyir sgra chen po zhes bya'o// ye shes lnga tha dad par rig cing go ba ni sgra sna tshogs pa yin ces gcig la spros pa'i tan tra las 'byung ste/ brkyang ba ni shes rab ste/ 
113a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings la dmigs pa'i don to// bskam pa ni thabs te/ dbyings nyid la mi dmigs par chud pa'i don to// dbus kyi khrag 'thang chen po ni// dbu dgu phyag rgya bco brgyad de// gsheg pa rdo rje 
113a3(rgyud 'grel): gtams pas rdengs// zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par bstan/ zhes gsungs te/ khro bo 'og nas 'byung ba'i dbus na he ru ka gtso bor bzhags te/ dbu dang po dbus dkar/ g.yas dmar 
113a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon ljang gu/ bar ma dbus ser/ g.yas sde/ g.yon dmar skya/ tha ma dbus nag po/ g.yas dmar smug/ g.yon ljang nag go// dbu skra ral pa kha ma nag gyen du 'khyil ba/ thod pa skam po'i 'phreng 
113a5(rgyud 'grel): bas brgyan pa'o// sku mdog nag po zhes kyang 'byung ste/ sku yang ni mdog dang sku cing yang 'gyur ces 'chad pa mang ngo // thod pa rlon pa'i 'greng ba se re la khar thogs pa/ phyag bco brgyad la/ g.yas 
113a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dang po gnyis ni/ rdo rje dang dung chen khrag gis bkang ba dkrug cing gsol ba/ de'i 'og ma gnyis na/ stir zhing chen po rlon pa'i glo snying 'byin cing gsol ba/ de'i 'og ma gnyis na/ stir chen po'i// 
113a7(rgyud 'grel): nang zhags pa bsdogs te/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can thams cad la 'debs te/ dbyings la sbyor zhing lta na byed/ de'i 'og ma gnyis na/ ster chung ngun chad par bcangs te/ ril med mdzad pa/ de'i 'og 
113a8(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis na/ nyi ma zla ba thugs kar 'dzin/ de'i 'og ma gnyis na cir yang 'gyur ba'i mtshon cha/ de'i 'og ma gnyis na/ 'phra men mgyogs ma zhes bya ba dang / gsod ma zhes bya ba khyung dang 'ug pa 
113b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bur sprul pa'i khra thogs nas/ dam las 'gal ba gtong zhes pa'o// de'i 'og ma gnyis na/ rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa ste/ 'jig rten thams cad mthong zhing sreg go/ de'i 'og ma 
113b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni/ chu'i dkyil 'khor dang re thogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnon cing g.yeng bar mdzad do// de'i 'og ma gnyis na/ rin po che'i mdzod dang yid bzhin gyi za ma tog ste/ rnal 'byor pa rnams 
113b3(rgyud 'grel): la ces kyang mi tshugs pa'i gro cha la sogs pa dang / dngos grub rnam gsum yang thob par mdzad do// gzhan du na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/ chos nyid dang tha mi dad la/ rims 
113b4(rgyud 'grel): yang snang ba'o// stong pa bco brgyad du rig pa de nyid/ ye shes brgyad kyis phyi nang gi dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir/ phyag bco brgyad dang sbyar te/ de ni thabs yin no// spyan dgu ni chos nyid las gzhan du ma 
113b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs so// spyan bco brgyad ni/ stong pa bco brgyad la dmigs pas shes rab bo// de ltar thabs dang shes rab 'brel pas/ spyan dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / ljags dang / sku gsung thugs kyang stong 
113b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bco brgyad du gzigs pas/ bco brgyad phrag drag ste/ khro bo brgya rtsa brgyad do// khro bos gzigs pa'i yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / stong pa bco brgyad phrag drug ste/ de ni 
113b7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa'i yul yin pas khro bo brgya rtsa brgyad do// de lta bu sha stag ste/ chos thams cad khro bo dang khro mo yin par mkhas pas/ rigs te grangs med do// zhes gcig las spros pa'i tan+da las 'byung ngo // 
113b8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i tshul du rdo rje gshog pas gdengs pa'o// phyag mang po gdengs pa la yang bya zhes kyang bshad/ gshog pa ni rdo rje snyams pa ste/ 'jig rten gdengs pa tsam du gdengs pa'o// gzhan 
114a1(rgyud 'grel): dun chos kyi dbyings las/ ye shes 'phro ba dang thams cad du khyab pas phyin pa'i don te/ zhabs brgyad kyis g.yas g.yon gnyis ni/ ma hA kal pho mo gnyis brdzis pa'o// de'i 'og ma 
114a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni/ tshogs kyi bdag po pho mo gnyis brdzis pa'o// de'i 'og ma gnyis ni/ byi na ya ka pho mo gnyis brdzis pa'o// gzhan dra na rnam par thar pa brgyad la zhon pa'i tha tshig ste/ bsam gtan bzhi 
114a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom zhing chos nyid ma rtogs pa na/ 'jig rten lha'i bsam gtan no// chos nyid rtogs pa ni rnam par thar pa brgyad du 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi lha brgyad zhabs kyis brdzis pa 
114a4(rgyud 'grel): zhezhi 'jig rten gyi lha'i bsam gtan chos nyid du mkhyen to// chos rtags pas rnam par thar pa brgyad la zhon zhes bya ba'i don to// de'i dkyil 'khor khro bo ni// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug 
114a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje brag ste ngas na// 'jig rten skyor bas 'dud tshul lo/ zhes gsungs te/ shrI he ru ka'i 'khor gyi khro bo re re la yang yan lag nyi shu rtsa bdun/ phyag rgya lnga bcu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par bstan no// shar phyogs su khro 
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bo rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar ba dbu dbus dkar ba/ g.yas sngo g.yon ljang ser/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje deng dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba dkrug cing gsol ba/ de'i 'og ma 
114a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na/ tri shul dang 'khor lo bsnams/ tha ma gnyis na/ ste ra'i dbyug pa dang pha bang bsnams pa'o// gshog pa ni gong du bshad pa dang mthun no// rdo rje brag gtams pa la brten te/ 'jig rten skyong 
114a8(rgyud 'grel): pa brgya byin zhabs kyis brdzis te bzhugs so// gzhan dbu gsum ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang sbyar ro// phyag drug ni ye shes drug dang sbyar ro// zhabs drug ni ye shes drug/ yul drugs mi 
114b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'gyur bar bstan te/ bstan pa'i phyir rdo rje brag ces smos sa// 'jig rten skyong ba ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis grub pa la/ de la bcings pa ni/ dge ba bcu las 'das pa'i 
114b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ mnyam pa nyid la spyod pa'i don to// de bzhin du khro bo khro mo 'og nas 'byung ba'i phyag mtshan rnams kyang tshul de ltar sbyar ro// shar lho mtshams su be con sngon po/ sku mdog sngo skya/ dbu gsum 
114b3(rgyud 'grel): la dbus sngo/ g.yas kar/ g.yon dmar phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang nas bkrug tsong gsol ba/ bar ma gnyis na dbyug pa rin po che dang me sbal bsnams// 
114b4(rgyud 'grel): m+b+ha 'a gyu ba skams pa/ zhabs rnags rdzas pakA/ na ga dA / byugs gan na rgyu ga rdzugasus sa 
114b5(rgyud 'grel): po/ g.yas sngo s+ya/ g.yon ldang gnag/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang nas dkrug cing gsol ba/ bar gnyis na dbyug pa mi mgo can dang dgra stabasnrums 
114b6(rgyud 'grel): tha ma gnyis ni sti ra'i dbyug pa dang bya rog bsnams/ zhabs drug gshin rje la brdzis te bzhugs/ lho nub mtshams su mi g.yo mgon po sku mdog ljang sngan/ dbu gsum la dbus ldang sngon 
114b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas sngon po/ g.yon smug nag/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang nas bkrug cing gsol ba/ bar ma gnyis na ral gri dang dar zhags bsnams/ tha ma gnyis na sti 
114b8(rgyud 'grel): ri'i dbyug pa dang 'ug pa bsnams/ zhabs drug bden bral ba rdzis pa'o/ nub phyogs su ha ya grI ba/ sku mdog dmar po/ dbu gsum la dbus dmar g.yas dkar/ g.yon sngon po/ phyag dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje dung chen 
115a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis bkang nas dkrug cing gsol ba/ ba ra ma gnyis na zhags pa dang spu gri bsnams pa/ tha ma gnyis na sti ra'i dbyug pa dang / nam mkha' lding bsdams pa/ zhabs drug klu la 
115a2(rgyud 'grel): brdzis pa'o// nub byang gi mtshams na gzhan gyis mi thub pa sku mdog dmar skya/ g.yas ser po/ g.yon ljang gu/ phyag dang po gnyis na rdo rje dung chen bkang ba dkrug cing gsol ba/ bar ma gnyis 
115a3(rgyud 'grel): na ban d+ha dang rdul yab bsnams pa/ tha ma gnyis na sti ri'i dbyug pa dang skrag snams pa/ zhabs drug be ra mal rdzis pa'o// byang phyogs su ba dang rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog ljang nag/ dbu gsum la
115a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus ldang / g.yas ser po/ g.yon du da ka/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang ba bkrug cing gsol ba/ bar ma gnyis na dbyug to dang rgya gram bsnams pa/ tha ma 
115a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni sti ra'i dbyug pa dang pra shud bsnams/ zhabs drug gnod sbyin brdzis pa'o// byang shar mtshams su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog ser po/ dbu gsum la dbus ser po// g.yas 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar/ g.yon ljang gu/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na/ rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang ba dkrug cing gsol ba/ bar ma gnyis na gzhu dang mda' bsnams/ tha ma gnyis na sti ra'i dbyug pa
115a7(rgyud 'grel): dang srin bya bsnams/ zhabs drug dbang ldan pa rdzis pa'o// 'og gi phyogs su stobs po che sku mdog du dka/ dbu gsum la dbus du da ka/ g.yas nag po/ g.yon dmar po/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon 
115a8(rgyud 'grel): dang po gnyis ni/ rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang ba dkrug cing gsol ba/ bar ma gnyis tho ba dang zhags pa bsdams pa/ tha ma gnyis gshol dang gdun shing bsnams/ zhabs drug pag brdzis 
115b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// steng gi phyogs su hUM kang sku mdog sngo hA/ dbu gsum la dbus sngo sku/ g.yas ser po/ g.yon dmar po/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis na rdo rje dung chen khrag gis bkang ba dkrug cing gsol 
115b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bar ma gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams/ tha ma gnyis na thob dang chu gre bsdams pa/ zhabs drag nyi zla gza' skang brdzes pa'o// de dag thams cad thod skam gyi dbu rgyan byas pa/ zong rlon gyi 'phreng 
115b3(rgyud 'grel): pab sha stag go/ de'i pho nya bka' nyan ni// rdo rje 'phra men gtum bag can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste// de dag cing yang 'grub par byed/ ces gsungs te/ 'phro men ma sdug gi mgo can 
115b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / gzig gi mgo can dang / bye la'i mgo can dang / spyang ki'i mgo can dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / dred kyi mgo can dang / phag gi mgo can rnams te/ 
115b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag g.yas pa ni snga ri thogs nas za zhing rgyug/ g.yon pa ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i tshon cha thogs nas/ khro bo'i bka' bzhin las byed pa'o// gzhan du ni rdo rje 'phra men ma ste/ sems dang sems las 
115b6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i chos lta bu ste/ ye shes dang ye shes kyi byin rlab sa las byung ngo // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// // da nin khro 
115b7(rgyud 'grel): bo'i dkyil 'khor bshad de/ rdo rje srin mo chen mo ni// 'jigs byed chen mor snang ba ste// phyag kyang srin po chen po ltar// mthun te zhabs kyang de dang 'dra/ zhes gsungs pa'o// khro mo rnams kyi sku 
115b8(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag dang zhabs khro ba dang 'dra/ mi mthun pa phyag g.yas par dril bu thogs/ gzhan du na dril bu shes rab/ rdo rje thabs so// de zung du 'brel pa las/ ngur mo rdo las me byung nas/ brtsal bsreg 
116a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul du/ pho nya pho dang pho nya mo byung nas/ ci yang brlag par byed ces bya'i don to// de la khro mo ni gtso mo ral gcig ma/ shar phyogs su rdo rje snyems ma/ de bzhin du rdo rje sder mo// rdo rje dur 
116a2(rgyud 'grel): khrod bdag mo// rdo rje gtun khung ma dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje gsod pa dang / rdo rje skul byed ma dang / rdo rje rlung 'byin ma dang / rdo rje brjod byed ma dang 
116a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor byed ma dang / rdo rje 'phrog ma rnams so// nang gi pho nya bcu gnyis ni rdo rje rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog ma dang / rdo rje khrag 'jib ma dang / rdo rje che 
116a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms ma dang / rdo rje rmugs byed ma dang / rdo rje srin mo snying za ma dang / rdo rje skul byed ma dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma dpal bdag ma dang / rdo rje rkang 'jib ma dang / rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma dang 
116a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje che sgrub ma dang / tshe 'dzin ma rnams so// 'di rnams kun kyang rin po che dang / rdo rje rgyu las byung ba'i gshog pa gdengs pa/ dbu dang skul sogs pa/ thod rlon sbrul nag dang / zhing chen dang / chu srin 
116a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi stong g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs dang / za byed kyi kha 'bar bas zhags pa kun gyi phyag na/ spod gtong rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang / khro dang 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / byin lag dang / kang ka'i lus la 
116a7(rgyud 'grel): chu srin gyi mgo can/ gshog sbub dang spu gseb thams cad nas/ lcags kyi rgyun btabs pa 'dra ba 'byung ba/ sder mod thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu/ mchu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i bzod dang / rdo rje sogr-i 
116a8(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje kha gdengs dang / rdo rje kar ma bud ka/ rdo rje 'ching bar byed pa'i mchu dang / 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can/ 'di lta bu phyag na bsnams so// gzhan du na rnam par grol ba yi/ skye mched 
116b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis kyis yul gzhig ste/ chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa la bya zhes/ rtse cig bsdus pa las 'byung ngo // po nya 'phra men ma rnams te/ bya rgod mgo can dang / thug pa'i mgo can dang / khwa'i 
116b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can dang / khri'i mgo can dang / pha bang gi mgo can dang / sre mong gi mgo can dang / bya'i mgo can dang / smigs bu'i mgo can rnams so// gzhan du na chos kyi 
116b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi byin rlabs las 'byung zhes 'chad/ de'i dkyil 'khor du/ rin chen me tog bor nas su// gang la bab pa'i lha de ni// nye bar 'grub pa the tshom med ces gsungs pa yin no// gong ma lta bu'i 
116b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du/ rin po che'i me tog bor te/ gsang ba'i lha de bsgrubs na/ 'grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to// gzhan du na/ chos kyi dbyings khro bo dang / khro mo'i tshul du snang ba la gnyis su med pa'i ye
116b5(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi rig pa ni/ ye shes rig pa'i me tog bor ro zhes bya ste/ khro bo khro mo thams cad bdag tu tha mi dad pas/ bsgrub pa yin no zhes rtse gcig bsdus pa las 'byung ngo // de nas slob ma'i dam 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig bstan te/ dge dang mi dge'i chos rnams la// lhag par bstan par mi bya ste// mnyam nyid rig pa'i klong zhugs nas// ci la yang thogs pa med par spyod do// zhes bsgo bo zhes gsungs te/ lhag par 
116b7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba la gtsor spyod pa ni/ nyan thos pa yin/ mi dge ba la gtsor spyod pa ni/ sems can phal pa yin no// theg pa chen po'i chos thams cad kun rdzob tu khro bo khro mor mnyam la/ don dam par skye 'gag 
116b8(rgyud 'grel): med par mnyam pas/ ci la yang thogs pa med par 'jug pa'i don to// de nas 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba ni/ de yi pho nya bka' nyan na/ rdo rje 'phra men gtum bag can// rdo rje dpyugs pa blangs 
117a1(rgyud 'grel): nas su// g.yab mo lngas kyang g.yab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bzhugs par brtag/ mchod pa chen po dpral bar bya zhes gsungs te/ de la bdag gis lus la sngun gtso bo shI 
117a2(rgyud 'grel): ru ka lus la khyab par bsdu'o// hUM kar klad pa'i rgyas su bsdu'o// rnam par rgyal ba na bral bar bsdu'o// ha ya grI ba ni kha nas thong ka'i bar du bsdu'o// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni lag pa g.yas 
117a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la bsdu'o// be tshon sngon po ni g.yon pa la bsdu'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa snying gar bsdu'o// ya man+ta ka ni lte bar bsdu'o// gzhan gyis mi thub pa rkang pa g.yas pa la bsdu'o// mi g.yo mgon po ni rkang
117a4(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pa la ba sdu'o// stobs po che gsang ba la bsdu'o// de ltar bsdus la/ dbus kyi gtso bo he ru ka'am/ gang bsgom pa'i lhar bsgom mo// pho nya thams cad ba spu'i bu ga thams cad la bsdu'o// srin 
117a5(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyang tshul de ltar bsdu'o// gzhan tu na sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gnas gyur pa la bya ste/ ye shes kyi byin rlabs las byung ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings nyid de la/ dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ 
117a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing mi dmigs par snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ sems dpa' gnas gyur pas ni/ reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang / 'dun pa dang / mos pa dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 'byed 
117a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dad pa dang / gnyid gnas gyur pa'i bar du slong zhing skul bar byed pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes las byung nas/ slar dbyings su 'dzud pas sems dpa' gnas 'gyur ba ni/ 'phra men
117a8(rgyud 'grel): bskul ma zhes bya ste/ gzhan reg pa la stsogs pa snyoms par gyur pa'i gnas/ gzhan gyis bsad pa'i god la 'brang ba'i phyir/ bya rgod kyi mgo can zhes bya'o// ri bo rtsegs pa las ni mgyogs pa'i 
117b1(rgyud 'grel): byed/ bya rgod mgocan ces smos pa'i phyir ro// 'dun par gyur pa ni dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid du 'dod pas/ 'bru men zla byed ces bya'o// b+ha rog ge mgocan no// ying la byed pa gnas byung ba/ 
117b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid du shes pas/ 'phra men nam 'grangs ma zhes bya ba ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni nyal zhing ye shes kyi phyir mi 'brang bas/ mtshan mo langs la nyin mo nyal bas/ 'ug pa'i 
117b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo can no// mos par gyur pan dbyings dang ye shes mnyam par gyur pa 'dzin pas/ 'phra men ma 'dzin ces bya ste/ khwa'i mgo can no dran par gyur pa ni mnyam par gyur pa nyid ma brjed pas/ 'phra 
117b4(rgyud 'grel): men ma bsgrin ma zhes bya ste/ pa wang gi mgo can no// 'byed par gyur pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du rdul rtsa ma yang log par rtog pa mi gnas te/ dper na mar khol ba'i nang du chu mi gnas pa dang 'dra bar 
117b5(rgyud 'grel): sel cing skems pa'i phyir/ 'phra men ma bsod ma zhes bya ste/ sre mong gi mgo can no// ting 'dzin gnas gyur pa ni/ mnyam pa nyid las gzhan du mi g.yo bas/ 'phra men ma spad ma zhes bya ste/ khwa'i mgo/ 
117b6(rgyud 'grel): can no// dad pa gyur pa ni mnyam pa nyid du 'gro bas/ 'phra men ma mgyogs ma zhes bya ste/ pu shud kyi mgo can no// gzhid gyur pa ni mnyam pa nyid gsal te/ mnyam pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnams myos par
117b7(rgyud 'grel): byed pas/ 'phra men ma myos byed ma zhes bya ste/ spyang ki'i mgo can no// de rnams kyi las kyi skabs kyi bye brag la ni/ 'phra men ma 'bros ma zhes bya ste/ bya'i mgo can no// ci'i phyir 'phra men ma bya 
117b8(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ dbyings dang ye shes kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni de kun la byams/ ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni dngos po kun za ba'i phyir ro// de rnams
118a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi lus su grub pa dkyus nas smos pa nyid do// dbyings dang ye shes ni lus dang yan lag go/ de las 'phro zhing 'byung ba ni/ baspu'i bug nas 'byung ste 'phra men no// gzhan yang 
118a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phra men ma/ kha spu can dang / dal gri'i spu can no// lcags kyi spu can dang / zangs kyi kha spu can dang / zangs kyi pags pa can la sogs pa/ bye ba'i bum phrag dang brgya rtsa brgyad cig 'byung ba yang 'di 
118a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams las 'phros so// zhes gcig las 'phros pa'i tan trai las 'byung / se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang // mgyogs mas phyogs bcu gar yang phyin// de la zhon nas 'gro byed pa/ 
118a4(rgyud 'grel): rog mgo can la sogs yin pa kun/ zhes gsungs te/ gang la bya ba'i skabs kyis mgyogs ma dang zab mo la sogs pa zhon te 'gro na 'grub pa'i don to// gzhan du na mgyogs ma nyid chos kyi 
118a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs las/ dbyings kyis kun la khyab pas/ 'gro ba med par phyin pa'o zhes/ dpal 'phreng dkar po las bshad de/ sbed byed mas ni sbas pa na/ mthu chen lha srin gang
118a6(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang // de la mthong bar mi nus na// gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la nus// gzhan du na spod byed ma ni/ chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs pa'i byin rlabs yin pas/ dmigs su med de/ so so'i
118a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su spyan drangs te/ dmar chen arga gsol nas kyang // mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya// rdo rje dbyangs kyis bstod byas te/ de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya zhes gsungs te/ sha
118a8(rgyud 'grel): chen dang ba zhal sogs pa sman sna lnga dang sbyar te/ zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// khros pas yud las rlag mdzad de// rlag par ma gyur gang yang med// 
118b1(rgyud 'grel): ces bstod do// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ las kyi le'u ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// // da ni drag po'i las rnams bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje 'phra men sbyor ba yi// yud
118b2(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// stod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/ des gsungs te/ 'phra men ma stag gi mgo can la sogs pa/ mgyogs ma rnams
118b3(rgyud 'grel): mngags te/ gang la bya ba yud tsam gyis/ snying la bzung nas/ khro bo dang khro mo'i zhal du bstab ste/ bstod pa'i tshul du gsol bar bsgoms nas/ lam brgyud drug gi sems can gang yang rung ste/ 
118b4(rgyud 'grel): mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lnga'i byin brlabs/ rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig gis/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can dngos por lta ba ni/ stong 
118b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid dam tshig las 'gal bas/ de dag rang bzhin gyis za bar 'gyur zhes tan tra karma ma re las bshad to// 'ug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa'i// 'phra men rnams spad de/ mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ de 
118b6(rgyud 'grel): bas mchog bsgoms nyams par 'gyur zhes gsungs te/ khyung dang khwa la sogs bya rgod mgo can la sogs pa khrag 'thung btang ste/ gang la bya ba'i dbang po 'byin par bsgoms na/ de'i dbang po nyams nas/ 
118b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i mig long ba dang / rna ba 'on pa dang / sna zhom pa dang / lce lkugs pa dang / sems myos te glen par 'gyur// gzhan du na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes drag gi byin rlabs kyis/ ril por lta ba'i dngos po rnams
118b8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa nyid las 'gal ba'i phyir/ rang bzhin gyis mnyam par byed ces tan tra karma ma le las 'byung ngo // 'phra men rnams ni spang bya ste/ de'i bsgrub pa rab gcad cing / gsang ste 'khrugs par 
119a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms byas na// bsgrubs pa nyams shing 'byed par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ 'phra men ma rnams kyis/ gang la bya ba'i las thams cad mi 'grub pa dgegs byed pa dang 
119a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sde thams cad 'byed pa'i dkrugs mi byed pa sgoms na/ don du gnyer ba mi 'grub cing gsang sde gcig gcig shar gnyer te 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi byin 
119a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyis/ dngos po la gtso bor bsgrubs pa byed pa dang / tshig gi sgra la gtsor byas te/ phyogs gcig tu byed pa ni/ stong pa nyid las 'gal ba'i phyir/ don du bsgrub pa mi 'grub cing / gsang sde yang 
119a4(rgyud 'grel): byed par 'gyur ro zhes kar ma ma le las 'byung ngo // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // da ni drag po'i hom gyi las bshad de/ hom khung 
119a5(rgyud 'grel): zur gsum gdengs pa la// rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te// thod pa dag gis rnam par brgyan// spyan drang bsregs na lha yang 'chi/ zhes gsungs te/ thab khung zung gsum du byas la/ gA mda' gzhu rnam 
119a6(rgyud 'grel): par bkang nas/ khro bos 'phen par bsgom/ tha ma phur pa nag po gsum btab la/ lcags thag gam thag pa nag pos bskor te/ khro bo dang khro mo dang 'phro men ma rnams spyan drangs te/ tsher mi'i shing 
119a7(rgyud 'grel): las me spang nas// tsha ba'i mar dang lan tshwa dang // dug dang mi khrag ra'i khrag/ skye tshe ldong ros lcags phya las// khro bo khro mo 'phra men gyi// gsang sngags rnams ni bzlas nas su// gang la bya ba'i gzugs/ 
119a8(rgyud 'grel): dag ni// ming rus bsregs na 'grub par 'gyur// 'phra men mngags te bkug nas ni// thab khung bsregs na mod la 'chi// gsung dang bsregs pa'i sha rnams kyis/ lha rnams thams cad/ 
119b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya// rdo rje'i glu ni blangs nas su// 'byung po'i sha ni shin tu zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni shin tu zhim// 'byung po'i rus bzhim pa ste// gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod// a la la'o// 
119b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// gzhan du sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi mes/ sku gsung thugs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad bsreg pa dang / ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mda'
119b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phangs pa ltar/ 'phro bas phog phog ste/ sku gsung thugs dang mthun par gyur pa ni/ khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin gyis mnyes pa yin zhing / de ltar go bi ni glu dbyangs blangs shing ri bo brtsegs pa'i 
119b4(rgyud 'grel): tan tra las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ drag po'i hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // da ni drag po'i phur pa'i las bshad de/ lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo 
119b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mdung rtse zur gsum// khro bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te// btab ste lha yang rlag par 'gyur/ ces gsungs te/ lcags sam shing nag po kha dog can la phur pa/ rgya mdu rtse zur gsum du gzhogs te// 
119b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyam dud kyi steng du hU~M kar dang / ral pa gcig ma dngos su go rims bzhin du/ khro bo dang khro mo rnams bsgoms te/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs dang ming rus la btab na/ lho yang gzer thabs dang rims
119b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis btab ste/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro// ri rab dang gling bzhi'i ngos la sogs pa la bris te btab na/ phur ba gcig gis phyogs bcur btab par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes stong pa 
119b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis byin brlabs/ khro bo dang khro mo yin la/ des ma khyab pa med de/ sems kyi phur pa gcig btab pas/ phyogs bcur btab par 'gyur zhes gu h+ya ti laM ka dang / ki la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+t+ra las 
120a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ drag po'i phur pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// // drag po'i gtor ma bshad do// lcags dag dang ni rdo rje dag/ khrag las sbrus te bsreg 
120a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // mu dga' can dang / sbyar ba dag/ sbyar bas gtor na de rlag 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ lcags phye dang rdo rje dug rnams/ me 'am khyi'am ri'i khrag la sbrus te/ sran mud dga' 'am/ 'bru nag po can
120a3(rgyud 'grel): dan dang sbyar te/ gang la bya ba bkug ste byin na/ mthong bas khrag tu skyugs rul nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir/ de nyid bsgoms pas rang bzhin 
120a4(rgyud 'grel): shing rul bar 'gyur ro/ zhes sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ drag po'i gtor mi'i le'u ste/ nyi shu gcig pa'o// // da ni drag po'i sbyor ba'i las bshad de/ 
120a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor gtun chen du// khro bo'i thobs brdungs pa yi// rdo rje'i gtun phrugs bsgoms byas nas// lha yang rung ste rlag par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ 
120a6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo rnams kyis brdung bar bsgoms na/ gang yang rung te brdungs par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na khro mo lta bu chos kyi dbyings nyid ni/ 'jig rten thams cad khyab pa'i gtan no// khro bo lta bu'i dbyings nyid rig 
120a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ 'jig rten thams cad la brdung ba'i tho ba zhes/ thabs kyi 'phreng ba'i tan tra las byung ngo // gzhan gyis drag po'i sbyor ba zhig byas na yang / las 'di rnams kyis byed pa nyid la slar ldog par 'gyur 
120a8(rgyud 'grel): ro// drag po'i las byed pa'i tshe/ ches gos nag po rnam pa lnga dang ldan par bya'o// drag po'i las rnams bshad zin no// thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i 'phreng las/ drag po'i las kyi le'u ste/ nyi shu 
120b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o// // di na gnas btab pa'i cho ga bya ste/ drag po'i las kyis sgrol pa'i rnams// 'khor ba lam lnga'i sgo bcad nas// rnam shes hUM gis bsdu rdungs nas// 'og min gnas mchog blan 
120b2(rgyud 'grel): med// gtso bo lnga 'am gtso mo lnga// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang / zhes gsungs te/ drag po'i las kyis bsgral ba'i 
120b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ lam n+ta la/ sngags 'bru ltas ga cad par bskams nas/ rnam par shes pa thA gas bsdus nas/ bdag gi spyir brdungs nas/ 'og min gyi gnas na lha gong na smos pa'i rnal 'byor 
120b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mdzad pa'i lhums su/ phaT kyis 'phangs te btang na/ nges par 'grub ces tan tra du ma las 'byung ngo // tan tra snying rje rol pa las kyang 'byung ngo // gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa 
120b5(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba'i sgo gcad pa yin no// de bzhin du yang 'dod chags dang // gti mug la rang bzhin med par shes shing / de dag gi sems mi skye bas na/ yi dgas byol song gi sgo yang bcad pa yin no// / 
120b6(rgyud 'grel): lha dang ming skye ba'i rgyu ni/ dge ba bcu dang bsam gtan bzhi dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrubs pa yin no// de dag rang bzhin med par rig pa ni/ sems mi skye ba ni lha dang mi sgo gcod 
120b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no// bdag gi lho zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings te/ bla na med pa'i phyir 'og min gnas zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings nyid rig pa'i tshe/ lha dang lha mo'i tshul 'brel par rig pa ni/ de nyid byang 
121a1(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems yin pas/ rang gi rnam par shes pa der 'byo bar sgoms na nges par 'grub bo// dper na rgyal po ra ma Na sa bsad pa thams cad lhar skye bar 'gyur bar smon lam 
121a2(rgyud 'grel): btab pas/ de bzhin du sngar nas bsad pa lhar 'grub bo zhes drang srong mngon par shes pa can gyis bshad pa ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings la snyoms par sbyor ba lta ci smos te/ snying rje rol pa'i tan tu 
121a3(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ngo // gnas bstab pa'i cho ga bshad zin to// thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ gnas bstab pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu gsum pa'o// // da ni dbang gi las bshad de/ zla gam 
121a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// khro bo khro mor spyan drangs te// mchod pa'i glu la sogs pas mchod// de nas las rnams rtsam par bya/ zhes gsungs te/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor du/ 
121a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams go rim bzhin du spyan drangs te/ de nas glu gar dang arga la sogs pa/ yo byad dmar pos mchod pa bya'o// chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas pa// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams 
121a6(rgyud 'grel): kun// chags pas yud la dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med ces ston to// de nas chas gos rnam lnga yang ldan par bya'o// de yang gzhung las/ rdo rje 'phra men mngags nas su// 
121a7(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas khro bo chen po yis// chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus la// dpal dang gzi brjid bsdus nas 'grub/ ces gsungs te/ rdo rje 'phra min ma rnams mngag nas/ gang dbang du bya ba de 
121a8(rgyud 'grel): bkug pa ste/ de'i lus dang ngag dang sems dad dpal dang / gzi brjid bsdu zhing / ci yang nyan par bsgoms na/ dbang du 'gyur te/ bu la ma byams pa 'am/ lus la grib ma 'khor ba dang 
121b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar// bdag la 'khor zhing rigs mi mthun pa zhig na yang / lus ston cing ci bsgo ba bran bzhin byed de/ ci sems pa yang smran/ gzhan lta ci smos te 'grub pa'o// gzhan du na stong pa 
121b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi chos kyi dbyings kyis/ phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad la khyab pas tha mi dad pa chags pa yin/ de ltar chags pa'i rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ phyogs bcu'i snod bcud kyi 'jig rten tha mas 
121b3(rgyud 'grel): cad/ bdag dang tha dad par rig pas/ rang bzhin gyis byams shing 'khor ba yin te/ bran bzhin byed pa yang bdag dang tha mi dad pas/ thams cad bdag yin pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid chen po 
121b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes kyang de'i phyir bya/ rnam gcig tu thams cad bdag gis sprul pa yin zhes bya/ dbang chen sdus pa'i tan tra las 'byung ngo // 'phra men ma rnams ni mngags so// de'i mig rna ba sna dang lce// 
121b5(rgyud 'grel): lus dang sems bsgyur rnams bsgoms nas// kun la mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje 'phra min ma rnams mngags te/ de'i mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang 
121b6(rgyud 'grel): sems/ bdag gis nyes pa byas na yang / mdzes pa dang / dbang pos bsgyur bsgoms na/ de bzhin du 'grub ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/ gzhan du na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis kun la khyab pas
121b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang tha ma dad par rig pa nyid kyis/ dbang po la khyab par 'gyur ba yin te/ dper na bla bcol mkhan gyis mi rigs pa zhig byas na yang / kun dga' bar gyur te rgod pa lta bu'o// zhes ri bo
121b8(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // da ni dbang gi hom bshad par bya ste/ hom khung zla ga ma gdanges pa las// 
122a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya// de nas lnga rnams spyan drangs te// mi 'pham rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub/ ces gsungs te/ ho ma khung zla gam la/ rdo rje zhags pas brgyan te/ kha dog 
122a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bud pa btab ste/ mtha' thag pa dmar pos bskor te/ shing dri ma mnam pa la me sbar nas/ zangs bye dang bai ram dang / yungs kar dmar po dang / gang la bya ba'i snying po rgya skyugs kyis bris 
122a3(rgyud 'grel): bsreg cing rdo rje 'bra min mas bdag la maM phan zhing / me mdza' ba'i sems pa'i rtog pa bsregs par bsgoms na/ ci bsgo ba rtan cing phan par sems par 'gyur ro// gzhan du nA nam 
122a4(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa ni bdag tu lta ba las 'byung ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mes/ bdag tu lta ba dang / de las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsregs nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag nyid chen 
122a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang / ro gcig pa ni 'jar ba zhes bya/ bdag tu lta ba'i dngos por zhen nas rnam par rtog pa ni 'khor ba'i rgyu chen po yin pas/ mi phan pa zhes bya ste/ bdag med pa'i ye shes rig nas 
122a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dang bral bas sems zhes bya ste/ de ltar rig nas bdag dang gzhan du thi ma dad pas/ gzhan yang rang bzhin gyis 'jar zhing sems par 'gyur ro// zhes glang po che las bshad do// 
122a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma 'phreng las/ dbang gi dom gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu lnga pa'o// // da ni dbang gi bung pa'i las bshad de/ zangs sa mkha dog dmar po yi// shing la rgya mdud rtse zla gam/ 
122a8(rgyud 'grel): mgo la rgya mdud rtse zla gam// mgal khro bo khro mor bsgoms te/ btab ni nges par 'grub bo// zhes gsungs te/ zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing la/ bur pa mgo brgya mdud la rtse zla gam du 
122b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhogs pa/ rgya mdud kyi steng dang ngos su khro ba khro mo rnams bsgoms te/ gang dbang du bya ba'i de'i gzugs sam/ ming rus bris pa la btab ste/ bka' bzhin du byed par bsgoms na/ 
122b2(rgyud 'grel): nges par dbang du 'gyur ro// ri rab gling bzhi la sogs pa bris te btab na// phur pa gcig btab na/ phyogs bcur btab par 'gyur te/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i 
122b3(rgyud 'grel): don to// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings kyis/ phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab la/ de ltar rig pa'i ye shes ni phur pa yin te/ thams cad du btab par 'gyur zhing / bdag dang tha mi
122b4(rgyud 'grel): dad par las thams cad rang bzhin gyis dbang du 'gyur ba yin no// zhes bur pa ban gnyis kyi rgyud phyi ma las 'byung ngo // dbang gi phur pa bshad zin to// thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 
122b5(rgyud 'grel): 'breng lam/ dbang gi phur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu drug pa'o// // da ni dbang gi gtor ma bshad de/ zangs bye dang ni bu ra ma dang // dmar po'i 'bras chan la sogs pa// 
122b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyang bas gtang ma gtang bar bya// mthong bas nges par dbang du 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ zangs bya dang 'bras dmar ba'i chan la sogs pa/ 'bral dog dmed po'i chan dang / bu ram 
122b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul sogs pa la sbyar te/ rdo rje 'phra men gyis/ gang du bya ba bkug ste byon nas mthong bas de dbang du 'gyur te/ zos pa lnga ci smos/ ci bsgo ba yang nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan du na 
122b8(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid med pas thams cad du khyab ste/ bdag nyid chen po dang tha dad pas rang bzhin gyis dbang du 'gyur te/ de ltar rig pa'i ye shes ni/ gtor ma btang ba yin no zhes/ 
123a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi zhags pa'i rgyud phyi ma gnyis las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ dbang gi gtor ma'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bdun pa'o// // da ni sbyor ba'i las bshad 
123a2(rgyud 'grel): de/ khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sgoms byas na// lha yang rung ste dbang du 'gyur// di na bde ba chen po yin/ zhes gsungs te/ khro mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ 
123a3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba'i las kyis/ lha man chad gang yang rung ste/ thams cad dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur bar bsgoms nas// de bzhin du 'byor 'byor ro// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings mtshan 
123a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid med pas kun la khyab pa/ de ltar rig pa'i ye shes kyis ni/ gnyis su med par 'byor te/ de ltar 'byor cig pa nyid ma nor bar rig pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste/ de ni bde ba chen 
123a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbang ngo // kun tu khyab par rig pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis dbang du 'gyur ro zhes/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+ta las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i 'phreng las/ dbang 'byor pa'i 
123a6(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste/ nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // da ni rgyas pa'i las bshad de/ gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod// 
123a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ zhes gsungs te/ rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du lta 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ yo byad ser por byas la/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pa// 'jig rten khams 
123a8(rgyud 'grel): 'di rab 'byams kun// dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas mdzad de/ zhes bstod do// de nas chas gos rnam pa lnga dang ldan par bya'o// khro ba khro mo 'khor bcas 
123b1(rgyud 'grel): yang // rdo rje 'phra men 'khor bcas pas// dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel sgoms na// bdag nyid chen por der 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs te/ lha rnams kyis bdag gi dpal dang gzi brjid 
123b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phel bar sgoms na/ nges par de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i don to// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings nyid med pas/ phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad la khyab ste/ de ltar rig 
123b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes kyis/ snong dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdag tu tha mi dad pas/ phyogs bcu thams cad nas/ bsod nams dang sprod pa thams cad la sogs pas/ bdag 
123b4(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'ang / bdag gi yin par bsgoms nas/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bar snang la shar ba ni/ nyi mo'i rang bzhin dro ba yin pas/ gzhan du gro ba yang nyi ma yin pa 'am/ yang na nyi ma'i 
123b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od yin pas/ nyi ma yin pa dang 'dra bas thams cad bdag gam/ bdag gi yin par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir bdag nyid chen po yin ces dpal 'phreng dkar po las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi
123b6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las rgyas pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu dgu pa'o// // da ni rgyas pa'i hom bshad do// hom khung gru bzhi gdengs pa la// rdo rje 'khor lo brgyan par bya// de nas lha rnams
123b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te// bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel sgom/ zhes gsungs te/ ho ma khung gru bzhi la rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bris te/ phur pa kha dog ser po bzhi btab la/ mtha' 
123b8(rgyud 'grel): thag pa ser pos bskor te/ de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te/ rin po che sna lnga dang / 'bra sna lnga dang / 'bras chan dang / mar khu la sogs pas bsregs shing mchod na/ bdag gi dpal la 
124a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa 'phel bar sgoms na/ de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i don to// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings la/ me khong lta bu'i ye shes dmigs pa'i dus gcig 
124a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga'i sku lta bur byung / sems dpa' bcu drug dang sems ma bcu drug ni/ mtshan lta bur byung la/ de'i dbu rgyan lnga lnga ni dpe byad du byung ste/ sprid ye shes kyi dngos po 
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bsregs shing / rang bzhin gyis brgyan par 'gyur la/ nyan thos los khyad par che ba'i phyir ro// dpal 'phel zhes bya thabs kyi zhags pa las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ 
124a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste/ sum cu pa'o// // da ni rgyas pa'i phur pa'i lam bshad de/ gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo brgya mdud rtsi zur bzhi// lha rnams bsgoms te gdab par 
124a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'di ni rgyas po'i las la shis/ zhes gsungs te/ gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/ mgo brgya mdud zung bzhi par bzhogs te/ rgya mdud la lha rnams bkod de/ gdab na gang la bya ba 
124a6(rgyud 'grel): de la btab na 'grub cing / dpal dang gzi brjid rgyas par 'gyur ro// gzhan dra na chos kyi dbyings la longs spyod rdzogs pa 'byung / longs spyod rdzogs par 'byung ba nyid/ ting nge 'dzin phur pa
124a7(rgyud 'grel): yin pas/ rang bzhin gyi dpal dang gzi brjid rgyas pa yin no// zhes tan du du ma las 'byung ngo // thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma 'phreng las/ rgyas pa'i phyang pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu gcig pa'o// / 
124a8(rgyud 'grel): da ni rgyas pa'i gtor ma bshad de/ gser bye 'bras chan ser po rnams// 'o ma sbrang rtsi gtor ma ni// rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste// gtan na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs 
124b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ gser phye dang 'bras ser po'i chan la sogs pa/ 'o ma dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te/ btang na dpal dang gzi brjid rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid med pa
124b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la khyab ste/ bdag nyid chen po dang tha mi dad pa dang bzhon gyis thams cad rgyas par 'gyur te/ de ltar rig pa'i ye shes ni/ byin cing gtong ba yin ces/ sgyu 'bral dra ba las 'byung ngo // / 
124b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i 'phreng las/ rgyas pa'i gtor mi'i le'u ste/ sum cu gnyis pa'o// // da ni rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i las bshad de/ lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha'i 
124b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems ni spro bsgoms na// de mas rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo/ zhes gsungs te/ lha mo rnams dang lha sbyor ba chen po mdzad cing / bde ba chen
124b5(rgyud 'grel): pos rol cing longs spyod rgyas par bsgoms nas/ de bzhin du 'grub bo// gzhan du na ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ lha dang lha mo'i tshul du sbyor la/ de ltar rig pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems
124b6(rgyud 'grel): spros pas/ longs spyod chen po rgyas pa yin zhes/ re ba brtsegs po las 'byung ngo // rgyas pa'i las bshad zin to// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ rgyas po'i sbyor ba'i 
124b7(rgyud 'grel): li'u ste/ sum cu gsum pa'o// // da ni zhi ba'i las bshad de/ zlum po'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// dkar po'i yon gyis mchod par 
124b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ zhes gsungs te/ dkyil 'ikhor zlum por byas te/ lha rnams spyan drangs te/ yo byad dkar po dang dbyangs la sogs pas/ mchod par byas 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ zhi ba'i las brtsam zhes bya ba'i don to// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// yud tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de/ zhi bar 
125a2(rgyud 'grel): grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bstod de/ chas gos rnam pa gsum dang ldan par byas de las bya'o// lha rnams 'khor bcas thams cad kyis// 'khrug pa thams cad zhi mdzad par// 
125a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis// zhi bar gyur te the tshom med/ ces gsungs te/ lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pa 'khrug pa la sogs te/ gnod sdig thams cad zhi bar bsgoms na/ 
125a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du 'gyur ro// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi ye shes zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ thams cad du khyab pas thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan las kyi 'phreng ba las
125a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ngo // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i 'phreng ba las/ zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste/ sum na bzhi pa'o// // da ni zhi ba'i hom bshad de/ hom khung zlum po gdengs pa las/ rdo rje
125a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rgyas par bya'o// phur pa dkar po drug btab ste// spyan drangs dngul phye la sogs mchod/ ces gsungs te/ hom khung zlum po gdengs pa las/ lha gong ma 'khor dang bcas pa spun 
125a7(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ yo byad dkar pos bsreg cing mchod de/ 'khrug pa la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar bsgoms na/ gzhan du na chos nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis/ rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa/ 
125a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing / lha rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro zhes/ tan tra glang po chur zhugs pa las 'byung ngo // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ zhi 
125b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i hom gyi le'u ste/ sum cu lnga pa'o// // da ni zhi ba'i phur pa'i las bshad de/ mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po// lha rnams bsgoms te gtab par bya// 'di ni zhi ba'i phas la shis/ zhes
125b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ rdul lam shing mdog dkar po las/ phur pa rgya mdud zlum por gzhogs la/ rgya mdud la lha rnams bkod de/ zhi bar bsgoms te btab na/ lha gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 
125b3(rgyud 'grel): du na chos nyid ma nor bar rig pa nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pa yin te/ thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar 'gyur zhes rtse gcig bsdus pa las 'byung ngo // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa
125b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo'i 'phreng ba las/ zhi ba'i phur pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu drug pa'o// // da ni zhi ba'i gtor ma bshad de/ dngul lam 'bras chan dkar po rnams// 'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor min// 
125b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste// mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms zhing gtor/ ces gsungs te/ dngul dang 'bru dkar po'i chan la sogs pa/ 'o ma dang sbyar te/ gtor na lha man 
125b6(rgyud 'grel): chad 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi zhi ba yin pas/ de ltar rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ dngos po thams cad la khyab pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhes sgyu 'phrul dra ba 
125b7(rgyud 'grel): las bshad do// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste/ sum cu bdun pa'o// // da ni zhi ba'i sbyor ba'i las bshad de/ lha mo rnams kyi 
125b8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du// lha'i grub pa bsgom par bya// byin rlabs thams cad zhi sgoms nas// lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ lha dang lha mo grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 
126a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ thams cad zhi bar bsgoms na/ lha nyid kyang zhi ba yin na/ gzhan lta ci smos/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du na chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes lha mo'i rang bzhin lta bu 
126a2(rgyud 'grel): yang / yongs kyis zhi ba yin la/ de ltar rig pa'i ye shes lha'i rang bzhin lta bu yang rang bzhin gyis zhi ba yin te/ de'i byin brlabs kyis thams cad du khyab pa yang / rang bzhin gyis zhe 
126a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin pas/ thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhes rdo rje bkod pa'i nyan tra las 'byung ngo // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i 'breng las/ zhi ba sbyor ba'i le'u ste/ sum nu 
126a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa'o// / da ni las bsdu ba bshad de/ mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas 
126a5(rgyud 'grel): pas ci dga' sgyur na 'grub/ ces gsungs te/ gang du bshad pa thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya ste/ chos kyi sku la dngos por snang ba dang / mtshan mar bsgoms pa thams 
126a6(rgyud 'grel): cad 'byung bas/ chos kyi skur 'dus te/ chos kyi sku ma nor par rig na/ rnal 'byor pas sgoms pa dang / phyag rgya dang mtshan ma thams cad ji ltar bde ba dang / ci rigs su sbyar
126a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing / las rnam bzhi brtsams na/ mi 'grub pa med do zhes/ bai ro tsa na nyid kyis bshad do// tan tha thabs kyi zhags pa dang / dpal 'phreng dkar po dang / sgyu 'phrul dra ba lo/ 
126a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs te/ tan tra du ma swe lnga las bshad do// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i 'phreng ba las/ las brkus pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu dgu pa'o// // da ni las drag po'i phan 
126b1(rgyud 'grel): yon bshad de/ drag pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur// dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub// rgyas pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel// zhi bas bde ba'i mchog kyang
126b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ ces bshad do// drag po spyad pas ni 'di dang gzhan du lnga dang bdud la sogs pa thams cad thul bar 'gyur ro// dbang gi las byas pas ni 'di dang gzhan du longs 
126b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod mchog dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i las byas pas ni 'di dang gzhan du dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las spyad 
126b4(rgyud 'grel): pas ni/ 'di dang gzhan du bde ba'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yin te/ mtshan nyid med pa las mi gnas par rig pa ni/ 
126b5(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi tshogs chen po yin pas/ phyag rgya chen po'i don rig par byas la/ las rnam bzhi rgyun du brtsam par bya'o// zhes ma ha yo ga'i tan tra du ma las bshad do// gong nas 
126b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i zhwa cig la bsgrub na yang / dngos grub grangs med pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zhes kyang du maM las bshad do// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng ba las/ las bsgrub 
126b7(rgyud 'grel): pa pan yon gyi le'u ste/ bzhi bcu pa'o// // dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan nyid ni/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te// de la dkyil 'khor gzhi zlum po bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings 
126b8(rgyud 'grel): spros pa med pa'i don to// 'khor lo'i rtsibs zur can dbye zhing / gzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lha dang lha mo dang 
127a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dang khro mo dang / pho nya la sogs pa dang nyid kyis 'phro ba'i don to// rnam gcig tu na chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci/ 
127a2(rgyud 'grel): yang mkhyen pa lhun gyis grub pa la bya ba'i don to// mtha' gru bzhir bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/ bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don to// 
127a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil nas lha mo kha phyir lta ba ni/ lha mo ni dbyings nyid nye ba'i byin rlabs te/ sems dpa' dbyings nyid dang nye ba'i mthong ba'i don to// sems dpa' lnga nang du lta ba ni/ chos nyid nye ba la lta 
127a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don to// sems dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni/ chos nyid thams cad du/ sa rdo lta bur bems po ni ma yin gyi/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing / sems dpa' nyid kyang dbyings las
127a5(rgyud 'grel): mi zhan pa'i tha tshig go/ sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi/ dbyings nyid dang ldan zhing / dbyings nyid 
127a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i ye shes las mi zhan pa'i tha tshig go/ rnam cig tu na sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni/ snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du sbyar ba'i don to// sems ma nang du lta 
127a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don to// sems dpa' dang sems ma phyi nang du gcig la gcig gzigs pa ni/ mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig go/ 
127a8(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dang khro mo ril phyir lta ba ni// phyi'i dngos po dang rgol ba la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba'i don to// de la dbyings ni dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o// mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni 
127b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i 'od snang gsal ba lta bu'o// de'i byin brlabs ni dro zhing tsha ba lta bu'o// phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni/ rtsi shing skyes shing 'tshig pa lta bu'o// lha mo dang
127b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ni/ chos kyi dbyings nyid rig pa'i don dbyings la snang ba'o// lha dang sems dpa' ni/ dbyings la snang ba'i don mthong ba'o// dbyings nyid la snang ba dang mthong ba'i 
127b3(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs ni/ rang bzhin gyi dngos po dang / rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhan gyis 'joms shing / dbyings su sbyor bar 'dul ba ni/ khro bo dang khro mo las rnam bzhi rang bzhin lhun gyis mdzad 
127b4(rgyud 'grel): cing / thugs rjes 'jig rten skyes pa'i don to// 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa ni/ byin rlabs pho nya lta bu gnas pa yin/ rnam gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lha mthu bo che dang mthu mo che 'khor du// 
127b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i rtags so// bkra shis brgyad na thams cad la dbang skur zhing 'khor ba la longs spyod kyang / nyon mongs pas 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la spyod kyang / 
127b6(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos zhi ba phyogs gcig par mi 'gyur te/ gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pas bkra shis so// de la dpal gyi be'u ni/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas bkra shis so// 'khor lo ni// 
127b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs la dbang skur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bkra shis so// rin po che ni/ zad mi shes pa'i gter dang ldan pas bkra shis so// pad+ma ni/ 'khor bas ma zin pa'i bkra 
127b8(rgyud 'grel): shis so// gdugs ni/ nyon mongs pas mi gdugs pas bkra shis so// bum pa ni/ ro mchog dang ldan pas bkra shis so// dung ni/ rgol ba thams cad skong bas sgra sgrogs pa'i 
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis so// nya ni/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can dang / ngan song kun las sbrel ba'i thugs rjes thabs mkhas pa'i bkra shis so// gling bzhi ni rigs lnga'i byin
128a2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs yin pa'am/ lam lnga'i sems can la/ de bzhin gshegs par rang bzhin yod par bstan pa'am/ thugs rje de dag gi don mdzad pa'i tha tshig go/ rnam pa gcig tu thams 
128a3(rgyud 'grel): cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don to// de la gtso bo dang gtso mo 'khor lnga lnga dang bcas pa ni/ ci yang mi mdzad do// sems dpa' dang sems ma nyi shi na/ kun la bu gcig bzhin no// de 
128a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar byams pa'i shugs kyis/ khro bo dang khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ phyi nang thams cad kyi dngos po la/ rngon pa sa ri dwags mthong ba bzhin dri na/ de ltar zhe sdang gi shugs kyis 
128a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dbyings nyid la sbyor ro// 'byor na 'khor ba'i chos la spyad kyang / longs spyod chen po ste/ nyon mongs pas 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas/ de ltar grub pa ni 'dod chags so// 
128a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings ngang gis gsang bas phrag dog go/ chos nyid spros pa med pas gti mug go// chos nyid de lta bus khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo// de la gtso bo'i 'khor lnga'i byin 
128a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs ni/ thams cad khyab mod kyi/ nye ba ni dbus nas 'dun dang / thod ka yan chad rgyab mjug do yan chad do// mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ phyag g.yas dang
128a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs logs g.yas so// rin chen 'byung gnas kyi 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ phyag g.yon dang rtsi bas logs g.yon no// 'od dpag med kyi 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ zhabs
128b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon nas rked pa man chad do// don yod grub pa'i byin rlabs ni zhabs g.yas pa nas/ rked pa g.yas man chad do// khro bo dang khro mo thams cad ni/ rigs so so'i byin 
128b2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs bzhin no// de ltar 'khor lnga po gcig la yang lngar lngar 'gyur te/ sra ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ rdo rje'i rigs so// dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ rin po che'i 
128b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs so// gsher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ pad+ma'i rigs so// bskyod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ las kyi rigs so// de rnams mnyam pa las/ dngos su gzhag pa
128b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so// thams cad bdag nyid ma'i/ 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ dbus su 'gyur ba thams cad de/ sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ yangs pa'i spyan/ 'khor 
128b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i byin brlabs so// dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ ma ma ki/ 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// gsher ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ ges dkar mo 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// bskyod 
128b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ sgrol ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// don du bya ba byed nus pa ni sems dpa'o// de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ni/ sems ma'o// de ltar rig pa'i 
128b7(rgyud 'grel): ni khro bo dang khro mo'o// de la bsdu zhing spro ba yang thams cad de ltar bya'o// phyi nang gi tshes thams cad kyang de ltar brtag go/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las/ dbang chen 
128b8(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de skad ces dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i sde 'bum phrag du ma yi rang ste/ 'di skad 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): ces bstod do// hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'dra 'phro'i klong dkyil na// khro ba khro ma rnams bzhugs pa// rgu ni cir yang ma nges 'gyur ba'i gzugs// 
129a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM dbu skra lam nag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil pas srid rtser 'bar// mi mnyam khri gnyer sdang dmigs ni// log par lta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan// hUM mche bzang lag gtsigs pas ni/ 
129a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi shi rtsed nas gcod pa'i tshul// su gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs ni// phyag cha sna tshogs cing yang snang // hUM thugs rje'i byin brlabs sbyin skar gtib sa// byams pa'i 'od zeng klog pa nin 
129a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rngam pa'i sgra sad 'brug ltar sngags// sprul pa'i thog chen char bzhin 'bebs// b+h+rUM sngon gyi zug mo dem chen po ni// klan ka chen po bdud la tshol// rgyal ka chen po bgegs la 
129a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod// bdud dpung ma lus 'dul ba deng // bgags rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad cing // dmachog can la dngos grub stsol// hUM thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bdag la 
129a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs mdzad cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// b+h+rUM 'khyil cing brgyan yang 'khyil ba la// sems kyi chos la sku mi mnga'// 
129a7(rgyud 'grel): skyems 'das pa'i snang ba de// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags/ srang gsum 'jams pa'i ma la phyag 'tsham sa// man nyid dang gis kyal phyag 'tshal lo// thobs 'das spyad mang de 'byag 'amam/ 
129a8(rgyud 'grel): ba da thag la sa / sa zugs sa rdzo/ sas sus byu // byas tha ga ga pa sa/ 
129b1(rgyud 'grel): deg brjod pa'i// / bzlas r+b+ba t+tAn d+hunas par// dag ba bru ba gnas pa btu// bgan pa bdag 'ducan pa sa// rdon 'phang la bsong ba// / sngags kyi dbang po sa 
129b2(rgyud 'grel): pas gsungs// de las brten te bgon po mas// sdug sung dazugs kyi gas bu rnams// rnal 'byung bsgrub pa rtogs bya byeng // mnor tsam du bshad pa yin// dngas grub mchog 
129b3(rgyud 'grel): brnyes pa mtshan chen po yis// 'jig rte ma 'gyur bad+ma'i rgyal po las// de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag gisang chen rnams// klong nas bkrol mdzad de la phyaga'atshal lo// 'phags pa 
129b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi zhags pa bad+mo 'bring ba las/ rtog pa'i rgyal ba don bsdus pa'i le'u sa/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / 'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad+mo'i 'bring gi 'brel pa rdzog so// 
129b5(rgyud 'grel): bags// rtag skad du/ man+d+ha d+hA d+ha na Sh+T+rI rnamag tun ma N+Dag/ bdi skad d+ha/ rgyud kyi rgyal pa can pa dpa lagasang pa'i srid pa' 'grel ba'is b+hA ba/ dpal 
129b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa'as phyug 'tshal la// dus gsus nga // dgas pa pa gag dag pa// rgyun pa da mdul 'ang phyag tsha mo// ldan pa ga 
129b7(rgyud 'grel): byas nag/ dngas gams sa da na // sa zung sa gsum banas pacan rgyad/ mtha sam me na pa byub bya// ngas sbyang bas rdzags ma pa 
129b8(rgyud 'grel): rlung gsum gyi byabs pa shad / thugs rgya grags pa las/ bzhin pa ga shegs gdus byal// yang ba gsum gyur bal// rgyud kyi byab rnam par bzhag// gcikyi la gsas 
130a1(rgyud 'grel): bo yang // 'khrul pa'i snang bas gsum du 'gyur// des na snang ba bzhi dag tu// lung rigs kun las gsal bar bshad// ces 'byung bas/ rang rig pa thams cad rtsal 
130a2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'gags pa ni rang bzhin gyi snang ba ste/ thams cad du 'brel cing thams cad tshang ba'i phyir/ rang bzhin gyi rgyud du gsungs la/ de nges par ston pa yang / blo'i rim pa bye brag tu snang ba 
130a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ gdul bya'i snang ba ste/ rjes su mthun cing thams cad 'gro ba'i phyir lam gyi rgyad do// des mthar thug pa ni bral ba dang thob pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis grub pas thams 
130a4(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba ste/ rjes su snyegs pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i rgyud de/ de dge ngo bo gcig pa la/ rim par snang ba ni kun tu brtags pa sna tshogs kyis 
130a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs pa dang / sangs pa dang bye ba gang yin pa ni/ 'khrul pa'i snang bar gsungs pa'i phyir/ zhor la bshad pa bzhir phye bar 'gyur ro// de la rang bzhin gyi snang ba ni gzhung nyid las/ kun gzhi 
130a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa nyid/ dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste zhes 'byung bas/ rang rig pa'i lugs kyis/ cir snang ba de bdag nyid rang rig pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan tshang zhing gnyis kyang skabs 
130a7(rgyud 'grel): las 'brel pa rgyud de/ zhor la bshad pa'i nyes pa lnga yis bsgribs pas/ gnyis la rag lus par snang ngo // lnga gang yin snyam pa la/ rgyu rkyen byed po ngo bo dang // de'i nyes pa rgyal bas 
130a8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ zhes 'byung ba ste/ gzhung las/ ma rig rtog pi'i gzung 'dzin gyis zhes pa dang / rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul ces pa dang // ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma byas
130b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang med ces pa dang / sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang / gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/ bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// de yang bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams 
130b2(rgyud 'grel): ni// log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las// 'phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin/ ces 'byung ngo // nyes pa yang / chos rnams ye nas dag 'gyur kyang // phyin ci log gi blo log nas// log 
130b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog gnas dang longs spyod dang // ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog pa sgribs byas nas// 
130b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga'i don ma mthong / zhes gsungs so// de'i phyir lam gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid mngon du byas pa la/ 'bras bur 'dogs kyang / ngo bo nyid gcig ste/ rang bzhin ni thams cad kyi gdags 
130b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhir gyur pa'i phyir/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhi phab pa'i don yin te// dag pa rnam gsum tshul gnas shing // 'bru lngar 
130b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i thabs chen de// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/ zhes gsungs so// gnyis pa ni gzhi dang lam gyi nyes pa gnyis zad pa gang yin pa ste/ des snang ba'i phyir 'bras bu 
130b7(rgyud 'grel): zhe'o// de yang rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis 'brel pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi dgos pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir rgyud do// de la gnyis su 'grel te/ de la ngo bo ni mtshan nyid 'di 'drar brjod par 
130b8(rgyud 'grel): dka' na yang / rmongs pa rnams kyi don du/ nyi shu rtsa lngar bsdu ba mdzad de// de thob pa'i tshul ni lam gyi gtan tshigs dang rtsol bas nyes pa gnyis zad pa'i dus na rang snang ba la 'dogs 
131a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ gzhung las/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du byung zhes pa 
131a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / yang / rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas// 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor/ ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so// gsum pa ni de dag
131a3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang / grub par byed pa'i las btags te/ de yang blo'i bye brag gis tha dad par snang ba kho na'o// de la don drug ste/ ngo bo nges tshig dgos ched dang / 'byung tshul gnyer
131a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad thabs kyis dbye/ zhes pa'o// ngo bo la gsum ste/ phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud/ de kho na nyid thub pa la sogs pa thub pa'i rgyud dang / thabs 
131a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi theg pa'i rgyud do// de la yang gsum ste/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa thabs kyi rgyud dang / dpal bde mchog la sogs pa shes rab kyi rgyud dang / dpal 'bru ta 'byung 
131a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa ma ning gi rgyud do// de la dpal gsang ba'i snying po 'di ni thams cad kyi don dang rgya 'bras tshang zhing 'brel pa'i phyir/ rgyud thams cad kyi spyi yin par gsungs so//

131b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// 'byung tshul ni/ drug pa'i ston pa lhun gyis grub pa'i thabs dang / smon lam gyis go phye nas/ le'u dang por rgyu snang bar mdzad/ gnyis par rkyen sbyar/ gsum par than
131b2(rgyud 'grel): myong bcas bzho'i ston pa drug snang bar mdzad de/ dus mtshungs par tha dad pa'i rgyud rnams 'byung ba'o// gnyer ni yongs su grub pa gnyis dang / tha mal pa'i blo brod pa bskyed pa'i 
131b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'bras bu'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'o// // rgyud kyi bshad pa'i thabs ni/ gdul bya dang dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i don du don gsum mo// de la rab kyi don du 
131b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan bshad pa yang 'dir gsum ste/ rgyud dang dkyil 'khor skyes bu'i mtshan thun mong du btags pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o// che ba las btags lung gi spyi'o//

131b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis gsang ba ni/ gzhung nyid las/ e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang // gzhan du min las shin tu gsang// / 
131b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'byung ste/ ye nas gsang ba ni/ gnyis su med pa rang 'byung gi ye shes yon tan ri la lhun gyis grub pa de/ rang chas su yod kyang ma shes pa kho na la bya'o// rang bzhin gyis gas 
131b8(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ de nyid rang snang ba'i dngos po ril mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor long rang rgyud du gnas pa/ brtags pas bsgribs pa'o/ ngo bo gsang ba ni/ rang bzhin gyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid/ yul
132a1(rgyud 'grel): sems rgyu 'bras dang / bden pa gnyis po las grol ba de/ rang snang ba'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid yul du ma dmigs pa kho na'o// shin tu gsang ba ni/ 'bras bu'i rgyud bsgrub/ 
132a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ste/ gud na med kyang / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya dang / lta ba'i sgrib pas/ gzhan du tshol yang / rang rig pa las snang ba kho na'o// sbas pa'i gsang ba ni/ spyod pa'i khyad par /

132a4(rgyud 'grel): pachi bas/ brdar sbas nas gtan dgos pa ste/ gzhung las kyang / kha cig lta bas mnyam gnas kyang zhes pa la sogs pa dang mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs par ces pa la sogs pa'i don gyis/ gsang 
132a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir gdam ngag sna tshogs gsungs/ zhes pa 'byung ba'o// / gab pa'i gsang ba ni/ rgyud kyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang / rang bzhin gyi don rnams 'khrul pa dang / rachod pa rnams la gab pa de dang 
132a6(rgyud 'grel): de/ tshad ma gnyis kyi bdag pos 'byin pa'o// snying po zhes bya ba la gsum ste/ de la theg pa thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po ni/ byin gyis rlabs kyis bstan pa ste/ gdul bya las tha ma'i don 
132a7(rgyud 'grel): du rgyud 'di bstan pa'i mdzad pas go phye nas/ thams cad kyang 'byung ba ste/ gzhung las 'dul ba mdo sde tshes mngon dang / zhes pa nas/ 'bebs pa mthar thug go// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu'i

132b1(rgyud 'grel): nga mas ga mas 'ad sa sa tha thams pa ma bar ma ma par tha ma pa sa samamam da ma sa rgya mas yang nga grangs tha sa yang ma mams 
132b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa la sogs pas ston pa ni chos thams cad kyi don gyi snying po yin pas/ gtan tshigs kyi sgo gang nas rmal kyang / mthar gtugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni/ rtog tshegs su 
132b3(rgyud 'grel): btags pa ril/ sku dang ye shes bzhi bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas pas 'khor ba dkar dag pa ste/ gzhung las/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam 
132b4(rgyud 'grel): dag lam min te// rang blos bsam pa 'khrul pa yin ces pa dang / yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'/ zhes pa gsungs so// de kho na nyid ces 
132b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la gsum ste/ rgyuchu 'bras gnyis su med pa la/ de nyid nge ba skabs kyis gsum/ zhes pas/ rtogs tshogs ril rang rig pa las mi gzhan pa'i phyir/ snang sdong gnyis dang bral ba'i ye 
132b6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ blo ma bcos par gzhag pa ni/ ma bcos pa'i de kho na nyid de/ skabs kyis rgyu zhes btags so// de nyid ye shes kyi phyag rgya mang por snang bar mngon sum du byung ba 
132b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ ma nor ba'i de kho na nyid de/ spros pa la zhen pa rnams la 'bras bu zhes btags so// de dag kyang mngon par zhen pa dag gi skabs las gzhan ma yin pa ni/ gzhan ma yin pa'i de 
132b8(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid de/ dbye ba ma grub pas rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid do zhes bya'o// nges pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ gzhi dang lam dang ngo ba yis// nges pa rnam pa gsum du bshad/ ces pas 
132b9(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi gzhi ni/ rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po ste/ rang bzhin gyis nges pa'o// de 'dir nges par ston pa'i phyir/ gzhang las/ sgo dang skur ba zhi ba'i gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid de nges 
133a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyings nas byung zhes gsungs pa'o// 'di'i lugs kyis 'bras bu nyid nges pa'i lam du byed pa'i phyir/ yang / 'di ni gsang chen nges pa'i 'bras bu lam du gyur pa 
133a2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ ces gsungs so// 'di rang gi ngo bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgos pa mngon du ston pa'i phyir/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med ces gsungs

133a5(rgyud 'grel): mong gi gleng gzhi la gnyis te/ khyad par dang / bstan pa spyi'i gleng gzhi'o// khyad par gleng gizhil drug go/ de la ston pa la ngo bo dang / rang bzhind/ shad pa'i skyes bu'o// gnas la rang bzhin dang 
133a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gdan dang rgyan du bcas pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'khor la rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i 'khor dang / rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor dang / tshad dang / mdog go/ dus dang /

133a8(rgyud 'grel): bai'i rkyen gleng bslang ba la gnyis te/ thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng ba slang ba/ 'khor la dbang gnyis kyi skabs phye ba dang / thun mong du gleng bslang ba bstan pa mtha' dag bshad par zhus pa 
133b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / gnang ba'o// rgyad rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po la bdun gyis dbye ste/ lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang / 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i lam rim gyis// gsang 
133b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyad kyi dbye ba bya/ zhes pas ston te/ de la lta ba la gtan tshigs dang / ngo bo'o// spyod pa la/ shes rab dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang / thabs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang /

133b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la zhi khro gnyis so// dkyil 'khor gyi nges tshig ni rgyas pa nas gsal lo// dam tshig la rang bzhin dang / che ba dang / grangs dang / skyon dang / yon tan no// dbang la ngo bo dang // 
133b8(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i rim pa dang / bskur thabs dang / skyon dang / yon tan no// 'phrin las la/ lhag pa hom gyi las dang / lhag pa rdzas kyi la so dang / lu gu rgyad kyi la sa dang / yon tan no// 
134a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrub pa'i thabs lamagyi rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin ldi'i sgo nas rim par 'jug pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa chos thams cad dag pa 
134a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang mnyam pa rnam pa lnga'i dang du sangs rgyas pa de rtogs pa'i bzhi'i lam gyis yid ches te/ de la mtshan nyid gsum dang dgos 'brel gyis la me mtshon nas/ bsnyen bsgrub bzhis// 
134a3(rgyud 'grel): don mthar phyung ste/ bdud bzhi yang gdul bas/ 'bras bu lhun gyis grub par 'jug go/ dgos 'brel ni/ thun mong dang thun mong min pa'i tshul gyi sa gnyis te/ de yang / brjod 
134a4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel dgos dang yang dgos pa'i// rgyud kyi yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur// ces pas/ thun mong lam gyi rgyud ni brjod par byed pa'o// rgyud gnyis ni brjod bya'o// gleng gzhi tshogs 
134a5(rgyud 'grel): nas gleng bslang ba ni thabs de las rgyud 'di snang ba ni nges par 'byung ba'o// lam gnyis ni rgyu/ mi zad po rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni 'bras bu'o// rgyud kyi dngos po bdun ni dgos pa'o// 
134a6(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o// thun mong ma yin par na/ thig le chen po thabs dang bcas pa ni brjod par byed pa'o// theg le bcu drug gi bde ba na 
134a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o// byed pa sdom pa rlung dang bcas pa ni thabs so// des rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po myong ba ni thabs las byung ba'o// thig le bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni rgyu'o// ye shes/ 
134a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis mngon du shad pa ni 'bras bu'o// sems lnga rgyun tu bskyed pa ni dgos pa'o// bcu drug cha la rdzogs pa'i ye shes chen po ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o// rgud 
134b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gtad pa ni gnyis te/ de la gdams pa ni rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po la/ stsol ba ril bral bar gdams pa'o// gtad pa la gnyis te/ sdud pa po la zung la spros shig pa dang /
