394a7(rgyud 'grel): du'ang 'di shes bya// bden gnyis byang chub dbyer med pas// dngos po ming gis rdzogs par 'gyur// de dag nges pa'i ming bstan pa// snying po thams cad dus gsum gyis// 
394a8(rgyud 'grel): gang yang yan lag 'khor du 'gyur// rtswa 'bras rnam par spang bar bya// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul// 'das pa dag tu dkyil yin te// 
394b1(rgyud 'grel): ba nga bab tha nga dra mas sa ga ga las pa rang kha rang dang tha ma mabs pa mas tha' bams sa pas yang ma mamamatshams mtshams sumasas mas sas sa sa mas sa sa ya ma masas cad pa' la ma nga ma mas nga sams 
394b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du gsungs// ting 'dzin rang bzhin don shes bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de// rigs bzhi lnga dang lha mo dang // khro bo khro mo 'khor yin te// lhag pa gnyis sogs don 
394b3(rgyud 'grel): dugasungs// bco brgyad khams gsum snying po nyid// de dag 'khor de bde ba'i khams// ye shes de bzhin lha de bzhin// byung sems rnam gnyis mthar thug phyir// nges tshig las dang ngo bo 
394b4(rgyud 'grel): yin// dngos po gnyis pa mchog yin te// sku rkyen nga po 'bras bu dang // las rim ston yon brgyad shes bya// ngo bo snod kyi mtshan nyid kyis// dbye ba rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// bdag gzhan nus 
394b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis kyi las// nying lag lnga phrag gnyis dang cig/ de dag phyi rol don shes bya// bde sogs spyod pa gsang bar 'gyur// rang gnas rang rig ye shes gsal// bcu dag bum pa'i rnam 
394b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// dbang po mchog ni la mtshan 'jur// ma lus sems phyir longs spyod de// khyab pa'i mkhal grwa srung bar byed// thabs dang shes rab bde ba'i lam// yan lag yan lag bcas 
394b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bcings// kun tu 'phyo bcod pan mchog/ dbu'am 'dud pa bcud ldan 'phreng // rdo rje phung sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa lnga 'byung ba'i dngos// 'phra rags thabs dang shes rab 
394b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshan// rnam pa sum cu de bzhin te// phyogs mtshams srung bar byed pa'o// phung po 'byung bcas dkyil 'khor cig/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub de nyid// sngon byas sku 'bras dbyer med la// 
394b9(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs pa'i bde chen po// rdo rje su phyir bstan pa yin// sku gnyis rang bzhin mtshungs pa ni// ngo bo bzhin du grangs 'jug ste// sgra'i 'khor lo gdugs su gsal// reg sogs 
395a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi yum du 'gyur// phyag rgya grangs kyi rab 'bring rnams// rang bzhin na las rkyen slong dang // ting 'dzin byed pas dbang bskur 'gyur// kun la rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// 
395a2(rgyud 'grel): sa na can na// sngags 'dzin yin gas// ma ya sa u dang pa ga dgas 
395a3(rgyud 'grel): so// phung sogs rtsa dang khams rnams kun// rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i tha snyad du// sna tshogs sngar la gnas pa med// rang bzhin ye nas zlum pa ni// las dang ngo bo dbang du 
395a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'chad sogs las kyi mtshan nyid lnga// yan lag dbang po'i dkyil 'khor lngas// las thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing // rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga// snying 
395a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs gnas pa la sna dkyil 'byor// sna dbyangs gsung gi gsal byed dang // me shegs theg par dge lha// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag ni yin// 'di dag las sku byud byed kyang // rang bzhin 
395a6(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes sems kyi phyir// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// chags med tshul du rang bzhin gnas// gsum pa'i rang bzhin bshad bya ba// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig mas// de 
395a7(rgyud 'grel): yis ma byas gang yang med// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// rigs pa nyid du thams cad 'dus// sems dang chos su dbyer med par// mtha' bzhi yongs bral bde chen po// 
395a8(rgyud 'grel): so sor zhes pas de nyid snang // dngos po ming gis 'thad pa nyid// snang byed rgyu yang de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bde ba gnas pa'i lam// brgyud pas bde ba myong bar byed// rang bzhin
395b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i don du bstan// byin rlabs thabs kyis spang ba'i phyir// thams cad spyad cing blang bar bya// ma lus sems phyir gnyis med pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral te// mtha' 
395b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ci la'ang mi gnas pas// rang rig 'od gsal thams cad mkhyen// rang rig snang ba ma skyed phyir// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// ngang nyid lhun gyis grub pa ni// rga 'bras snga phyi// 
395b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pas// rgyu'i dus nyid 'bras bu'i mchog/ de bzhin nyid du shes pa yang // sna tshogs zhe na las grol bar zad// yang dag nyid la ye rdzogs phyir// dngos po ming gnyis 'thad par 
395b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de phyir dus gsum 'gyur med pas// bstan pa zhes su gsungs pa yin// 'bras bu rgyu la mi gnas na// phyogs gcig rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// kun nas slong bar rigs ma yin// 
395b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ching bu nor bur dbang skur yang // de la rin chen mngon rtags med// chos dbang sems la yod pa ru// / kun bzangs rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// dbang mchog rangal med 'gyur na// bskur 
395b6(rgyud 'grel): bas thob par mi 'gyur ro// dang po la sogs sems rims lnga// gong nas gong du rgyun ldan pa// phyogs gcig rgyu ru spyir bshad de// rkyen dang thun mong 'brel zhes bya// rkyen bzhi snod kyi mtshan/ 
395b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnyis// chags nyid rang phyogs chang dang ni// yi dgas gti mug rtsod pa dang // nyes pa du ma'i rgyud shes bya// dregs srur phrag dgal la yis// nyams sgrib dngos grub mo 'byung dang / 
395b8(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu kun kyang yal bar 'gyur// zhe sdang snying rje las ring ba// theg pa chen po rigs ma yin// khe drags longs spyod kyis phyogs pa// bsam bya ring du spong bar 'gyur// sgra'i nga rgyal nyams pa'i gzhi// 
396a1(rgyud 'grel): don ni nges pa ldan par gsungs// nan tan dam tshig mi byed pa// thar pa'i lam las ring bar 'gyur// de dag thun mongs spang ba'i rigs// rang bzhin gnyis kyis/ 
396a2(rgyud 'grel): skal med dang // bus pa rnam gnyis ma ning sogs// thar lam gnyis las ring bar 'gyur// rtse ba nan tan ldan pa dang // skyon zlo ga yon tan nyid du 'gyur// ci la 'ang yid rings 
396a3(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa med// skye gnas sems la rkyen thub pa// rmad par gyur pa'ang blang bar bya// dad pa'i tshul gyi snang ba ni// phyogs gcig rkyen du nges par bshad// ting 'dzin sngags dang
396a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dag/ dkyil 'khor rdzas dus la sogs pa// nus mthu mang po snang bar 'gyur// shes rab ting 'dzin nogs dang ldan// log spangs yang dag dug dang ldan// man ngag 
396a5(rgyud 'grel): nadag // na na pa// 
396a6(rgyud 'grel): skabs kyi tshul dag gis// ltos nas su 'bras go 'byed pa// de ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid do// ting 'dzin la sogs rim bshad pa// mchog sogs phyag rgya gang yin las// rang gi/ 
396a7(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas cung zad mchod// rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa dang // snang byed la sogs dbang sgyur byed// rtog tshogs sems phyir ma skyes pa// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin lam// 
396a8(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas// las rnams byed par dbang bskur ba'o// rnam shes nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// sems phyir mtshan ma ma skyes pa// mi bskyod yab yum rang
396b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin las// ting 'dzin thugs su dbang skur nas// dngos grub las rnams mngon dbye shog/ trAM badz+ra g+hi ga/ mr-i dra du shwar sto/ a bi shin tsa hUM/ mig gzugs sems phyir ma 
396b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa// sa skad yab yum rang bzhin las// ting 'dzin sems dpas dbang sgyur nas// spyod yul yongs su dag byed shog/ krI hi rA dzA ya/ hUM la se sa ma ya snyom/ a bi shin tsa hUM/ 
396b3(rgyud 'grel): rog shes rtug pa ma skyes sems// gshin rje yab yum rang bzhin las// ting 'dzin 'jom pas dbang snar nas// gdul bya ma lus thar byed shog/ ya mAn+ta krid trUM// badz+ra dar ma nAk+Sha 
396b4(rgyud 'grel): shwa ri dz+wa la ne d+hU phaT/ yid chos dang rig ma skyes pa'i// kun bzang yab yum rang bzhin la// ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dbang sgyur nas// ma lus kun gyi byed par shog/ gsang sngags ldan 
396b5(rgyud 'grel): par byin byasel// gnas snyim rang gi phyag rgya gsal// shin tu rdzogs par dbang bskur bya// mgo lce stong g.yas zung yi// zla ba oM sogs 'bra lnga dgod// sku gsung yon tan la sa byin 
396b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdu// sra sogs phyag rgyar gsal bar bya// oM bde gshegs spyi'i ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rgyal po'i gtso// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis// rdo rje'i sku'i ngo bor shog/ oM sarba// 
396b7(rgyud 'grel): tAb+h+r-i ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra sa b+hA ba ad mako ha~M/ i bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings// sngags dang phyag tu ldan pa yis// rdo rje gsung gi do bor shog/ 
396b8(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga te ma hA ba ka badz+ra swa b+hA wa ad ma ko he// bde gshegs thugs kyi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje thugs kyi thugs// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis// rdo rje'i thugs kyi gtso bor
397a1(rgyud 'grel): shog/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsat+ta badz+ra sa b+ha ba ad mako haM/ sa mi 'gyur ba'i zhing khams las// ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu shar// ma bsags pa'i 'bras bu 'byung/ 
397a2(rgyud 'grel): cir yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyis// rang dbang thabs kyis bskur bar shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pu tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako haM// ha thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'dod chags// 
397a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i ting 'dzin las// las sngon kun tu grub snang bas// ma lus mnyam par sbyor ba re shog/ na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ma tA a nu ra ga dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba ang mgo hI// rin chen rab gnas las

397a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chen pa ltas// gas gsus bas rnam pa dang// rdzas kyi dbyings gas sa// skye mang tshas ya dbang tha // many+dzu na ny-i byangs sa med pag 
397a6(rgyud 'grel): dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te// skyon med sems nyid rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma thA a ta ri sha na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako ta/ 
397a7(rgyud 'grel): sa khams gsum re gong rgyal po ste// yon tan rin chen gter gyi mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'gro ba'i re skong rgyal por shog/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mgo/

397b1(rgyud 'grel): sab+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ ha dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing // grub pa las kyi bye brag las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ oM ma thA kri ta a nu tan

399b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal thams cad mkhyen dbang du// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs// gang shig cung zad malon pas// rjes su mthun pa'i yul nyid la// khyad par cung zad nyid ldan ma// 
399b8(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya// gang gis de dag nyams len pa// lha mdzes rin chen mtshig tu gsungs// rdo rje nyi ma thabs kyi rgya// de zla bsal byed shes rab dngos// gnyis 
400a1(rgyud 'grel): med bde ba mtha' bral la// gdags pa yod phyir zung 'jug sku// ri dgas nor 'dzin spyi gzugs ni// ji ltar ltas pa der snang ste// rang gi ngo bo bstan du 
400a2(rgyud 'grel): med// yod la rtsal na sgro brtags 'gyur// med la rtsal na skur btab ste// yod med gnyis la sa rtsal byas no// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rkyen bral rang dbang ye shes ni// 
400a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lhan grub rang dbang 'gyur// gar yang ma chags pad+ma bzhin// phung sogs ye shes phyag rgya dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab bsam bral bas// rang rig nyid du rang gsal 
400a4(rgyud 'grel): bas// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis bral// gdul byi'i bsam pa rdzogs byed kyang // gdul bya ba dag phyir dmigs su med// de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs// tshogs 
400a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nges rdzogs sa mchog ni// gdod nas dus gsum 'gyur med de// gang zhig rkyen gyis ma bskyed phyir// bstan 'gyur dbang gis mchog tu gsungs// dgos pa rang bzhin 
400a6(rgyud 'grel): don min te// rgya rkyen sgribs g.yog dbang du gsungs// shes rab thabs kyi ye shes tshogs// thig le bsam yas ye shes che// bdud rtsi ba sil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// rtswa gnas 
400a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khord du// gong thabs rigs pa rlung mthu yis// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// 'od gsal 'pho bas kun la khyab// bde ba nyams pas kun tu thim// bzhi btu 
400a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sogs phyag rgya che// gzugs mdzes skyed pas phyogs bcur g.yo// snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyar bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyel mchod pa 'bul// / 
400b1(rgyud 'grel): zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// 
400b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu dus bzhi sngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang bskur mchog nyid dam pa yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas 
400b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs rje dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // 
400b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi dang spyod yul de bzhin te// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la bstan pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du byung // shes rab dbyings kyi 
400b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyu / shes la ni ye shes ros// shes rol pa nyid kyang gso// rgyal bsngon b+hung sgrub pa dang // b+hin+da nub sa stan pa de bzhin te// b+hU byed 
400b6(rgyud 'grel): nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog/ ther zug rgyun las rab grol ba// ngo bo nyid rtag rdo rje'i sku// dmigs pa kun las rab grol te// rdo rje de bzhin nyid du son// 
400b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas yang dag rdzogs pa yi// yon tan ma lus bdag tu gsal// sa sogs lta ngan las grol ba'i// rang sems ye shes mtha' dbus med// yon tan ba sem yas dngos grub kyang // / 
400b8(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bo bstan par dka'// 'du 'bral med gzungs bde ba che// rjes su 'das dang ma 'das rol// phyogs bcu sku gsung yon tan ni// du ma cig bral tshul snang la// dus 
401a1(rgyud 'grel): gsumacas kun ba dag ga gyid// mngon mthun byud ka'i dmyigs su lathos// da la sogs pa mtha' yas mam// thabs chen thabs pa byung ba'i bya// don/ 
401a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rje'i mchog/ snod bcud rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sems skyed las kyis dang rnams la// gnyis kyi nang du phan gdags bya// bdag gzhan don byed brtson 'grus ldan// 
401a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang gsum du phye ba yis// las kun dngos grub thogs pa med// brtul zhags rnam pa gnas ldan pas// gzhan gyi longasu spyod thams cad bya// 'bras bu rgyun la ming 
401a4(rgyud 'grel): brtags pas// rigs dang mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi// las thabs rnams dang ldan pa la// 'od gsal ye shes thams cad mkhyen// bdag nyid kyis kyang gtang bar bya// 
401a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de nyid nyams thob pas// sems mtha' 'gro 'od la gnas te// sa rnams skyed la zlog pa ni// 'khor pa nyid dang spad du med// dbyer med kun bzangs sal 'god// das 
401a6(rgyud 'grel): grub zhir gyur dbang phyug ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de// 'bad pas mnyes par mi byed pa// bskal par sbrebs dang mun nag sogs// bde bas rab tu brel 'gyur

406a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rang rig gsal bas khyab gnas pa'o// lnga pa bde chen brtan po nyid// rang rig rkyen med rang gsal ba// sku dang ye shes ngo bo nyid// ngang nyid lhun gyis grub pa ni// rgyu 'bras rim pa'i dus/ 
406a3(rgyud 'grel): bral ba// rgyu'i dus nyid 'bras rdzogs pa'o// thob bya rgyu la mi gnas na// phyogs dus rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// kun nas slong thob rigs med de// pra sran 'bras su dbang skur yang // de la 'bras 
406a4(rgyud 'grel): bu snang ba med// dbang mchog rang la gnas par ni// dus gsum rgyal ba'i lung las gsungs// dbang rnams rang la med 'gyur na// bskur bas thob par mi 'gyur te// gdod nas ldan phyir 
406a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa ste// gzhi'i phyir thog mar bkod pa yin// lus gzhan par ma'i mtshan nyid ni// ngo bo dbang lnga thun mong du// lus ni bcu dang drug gis rdzogs// snod dang dkyil 'khor skur ba'i dus// 
406a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bo nges tshig dang // bskur rdzas thabs dang rgyu dang rkyen// gnas dang sgrib spong thob pa'i tshad// chos dang dgos ched skyon yon gyis// mdor bsdus lus kyi mtshan nyid bzhag/ phan pa rgyas pa'i
406a7(rgyud 'grel): don bstan pa// pan dbang bcul mos dang na// de nyid sbyin pa'i snod du bstan// rgyas 'bring dkyil 'khor ri mo ru// las kyi gzhung rdzogs pan dbang bskur// dang po sems bskyed 'jug dus su// 
406a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyi dbang bcu rdzogs par sbyin// ngo bo'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// mtshon bya dbang dang mtshon byed de// mtshan bya ba dag la rdzogs pa ste// mtshon byed rab gnas ldan pa'i rdzas// thob bya gang yin/ 
406b1(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo ste// rgyu rkyen 'joms pas bskur ba yis// bdag la nus pa skyes rnol dang brtags bzhin// bdag la phan phyir ming du brjod// rdzas ni rnam bcu'i ngo bo nyid// las kyi rim pa rgyas pa yis// 
406b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur pa'i thabs kun gsungs pa yin// mtshungs ldan ldan cig d+hA yin te// brdungs pa rang bzhin gnas pa nyid// lhan cig byed pa rdzas bdu nges// phyag tu rang gi mtshan nyid dang // gdugs pa 
406b3(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod rab gnas te// bum pa rang gi byang chub sems// dbu brgyan rang bzhin snying po 'bras// 'phreng ba cod pan rin chen pad// go cha rgyal mtshan rdo rje sems// bza' btung snang mdzad rab gnas 
406b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan// dngos su las sbyor lhan cig rgyu// rkyen ni rgyu dang bdag po dang // de ma thag pa dmigs pa bzhi// slob ma'i yon tan bcu drug nyid// chags gnyis rang phyogs chang dang chung // dregs bskur 
406b5(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog le lo med// snying rje ldan zhing kheng sems med// longs spyod mi chags nan tan ldan// yid ring ldog med rkyen thub cing // dang ba'i sems ldan thob pa'i rgyu// dkyil 'khor bskur rdzas 
406b6(rgyud 'grel): dus nyid dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya yis// nus mthu mang po snang ba nyid// bdag po'i rkyen du brjod pa yin// dngos bcu skad kyi chu la dag gis// snga phyi ltos nas go 'byed pa// rgyu 
406b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras tshu la de de ma thag/ lta ba ting 'dzin nongs ldan zhing // log pa'i lta 'bras byin brlabs can// las dang man ngag rgyu ldan pa// dngos rdzas rdzogs pa'i slob dpon ni// rim pa nod pa'i yul du 
406b8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// gnas ni spyi dang khyad par te// gnas ni phyi dang nang gnyis te// phyi rol ri dang yul phyi dang // sgrub khangs nas lo rgyus can// blang bye de bzlog nas// de bzhin nangal snyims gnyis// 
407a1(rgyud 'grel): spyi dbang lus la bskur ba ste// brgyad par snying po dbu rgyan bum// gdugs dang con pan 'phreng ba gos// go cha lus te rgyal mtshan lag/ bza' btung dag gi lam la'o// phyag rgya si 
407a2(rgyud 'grel): bo 'am snying ga ste// gzhag pa'i gnas dang bstim pa'i gnas// de bzhin khong du chud pa gces// sgrib pa spong lugs spyi khyad par// las dang rnam smin phyogs cha re// skye gnas brgyad spong spyi'i 
407a3(rgyud 'grel): ste// khyad par bkur gnas spyi dang sbyar// dbang thob ces pa'i tha snyad ni// spyad rgyu mngon sum thob pa yang // go mi 'gog cing rig la snang // tha mar sangs rgyas thob byed cing // nus pa 
407a4(rgyud 'grel): gang skyes thob pa'i tshad// chos dang chos ni nyan bshad de// phyi rol drang don mnyan bshad rung // dkyil 'khor la sogs mtshan nyid bshad// brod dang g.yangs shes phyir ro// dgos ched / 
407a5(rgyud 'grel): dang khyad par ro// nus sgo 'byed dang sa bgrod phyir// skabs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// khyad par rang gi don du'o// skyon ma mgo 'gas chos mi zos// yon tan tshe ring bde ba thob// 'di dang phyi// 
407a6(rgyud 'grel): mar thob pa'o// nus pa'i snod ni bdag dang gzhan// gnyis ka'i don byed brtson ldan pa// khyad par snod ces bstan pa ste// bcu drug mtshan ldan spyi yi snod// phan bzhin ri mo 'i dkyil 'khor dang // 
407a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag lnga sogs dkyil 'khor te// slob ma'i dus su nus dbang bskur// phan pa thob pa'i dus nyid du// ngo bo mnyam bya bsgom bya sogs// dbang po yan lag gnas gsal ba'o// bdag gzhan 
407a8(rgyud 'grel): don la nus gsal ba// rdzas ni glegs pa ma rgya gram dang // 'khor lo phreng ba rdo rje dril// 'byung ldan don yod snang mtha' yas// yi dam rigs lnga'i rab gnas ldan// thabs ni dbang sogs gnas lnga/ 
407b1(rgyud 'grel): ru// so so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed// rgyu ni rnam grangs bshad bzhin te// bdag gnas mtshungs rgya la sogs pa// lhan cig rgyu ru bshad pa yin// nus la dad ldan rgyu yi rkyen// bdag po yan lag 
407b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshogs pa'i mthu// de ma thag pa nus rim lnga// bltos nas 'bras go 'byed pa'o// dmigs pa mtshan ldan man ngag can// byin rlabs ldan pa pha nyid do// gnas ni rna ba snying lag dang // lce 
407b3(rgyud 'grel): dang yan lag rnam lnga'o// mgrin pa phan dang nus ming ste// khyad par phan dang nyon mongs dang // tha mar rtog pa 'jil bar byed// thob pa'i tshad ni nus pa lnga// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka'i don// 
407b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod sgom 'gags thob pa chad// chos ni nges grol nges bshad rnams// stang byed man chad nyan du rung // dag pa gsang ba'i sgo 'byed dang // bsgom dang dbugs phyung rjes su sbyar// don gnyis 
407b5(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin bya phyir ro// skyon ni dbang med las brtson dang // de nyid glags pa'i rgyu ru 'gyur// yon tan don mthar phyin byed pa'i// thams cad la ni thogs med pa'o// gsong ba'i dbang zhes 
407b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i snod// spyod pa'i brtul shugs ldan pa yis// dam rdzas rnams la mdzem med pa'o// dkyil 'khor sor bzhi mdzub gang ste// phyi rol nang gi tshul du dbye'o// dus ni nus tho ba rdzogs slob 
407b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mtshan nyid bar mar 'jug pa yi// ngo bo rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// khub ye shes ro ldan pas// mi rtog myong ba'i dus ldan pa'o// thob bya rang gi ngo bo yi// thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ 
407b8(rgyud 'grel): med drug/ bla ma'i nyi zla ro ldan pa// ma thob rab tu snang med gsang // de nyid byin pas snang med pa// bde dang mtshan ma skyes pa ni// dbang zhes tha snyad brjod pa yin// rdzas ni dngos dang nus/ 
408a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// dngos ni nyi zla byang chub sems// ba skur thabs chen mchog gsal ba la// nus pa skyed phyir thob pa shun// las kyi rim pa thabs brjod de// sor bzhi pa nas che mchog 
408a2(rgyud 'grel): bar// mtshungs rgyu lhur bshad gnas lugs de// lhan cig byed rgyu ro ldan sems// rkyen ni brtul zhugs dang sems rgyu// yan lag tshang zhi'i nus pa dag/ sbyor mnyam ldan pa'i slob ma'i yul// 
408a3(rgyud 'grel): skad cig las rimag 'byed pa// de zag pa'i mtshan nyid do// gnas ni gzhan dang snyim gnyis so// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu// khyod kyi lce la phab pa ni// snying gi dkyil du gzung 
408a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa'o// thob tshad khu bas bsku ba'i dus// 'od gsal phyogs bde mtshan mthong ba'o// bde dang mtshan ma bu'i rtags// dpe don mtshon bya byed par shes// chos ni rdzogs rims
408a5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus dang // gdams ngag dpog pa man tshed nyan// 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs gnas brgyad bshad// yon tan sdug bsngal las grol bstan// 'chad par gyur pa de bzhin no// gsum 
408a6(rgyud 'grel): padabang gi rgyu phyir dang // tshe'i dngos grub thob phyir ro// skyon ni chos rnams mi thos dang // rim pa gong du bgrod pa 'gag/ khyad par bzhi pa'i dbang sgo 'gags// tshe ring 'gyur ba'i nus ming 
408a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// yon tan rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur nas// sreg mo yum sogs byin rlob 'gyur// zab mo rnams kyi thun mong ste// khyad par man ngag stod du 'gyur// bzhi pa'i dbang gi snod bstan pa/ 
408b1(rgyud 'grel): ri pa'i brtul rnags ldan pa'o// sems kyi daH/ 'khyer legs bstan pa// rab gnas sngur bzhin byas par bya// dkyil 'khor nang gi gnas dang // pad+d+ha'i dkyil 'khor bstan par / 
408b2(rgyud 'grel): thun mong 'jug par gsang bar gcig/ bzhi lam ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // rdzogs rims ting 'dzin las rlung dgag/ stong du gyur pa'i dus nyid du// thig le mtshan ldan lag tu gtad// 
408b3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo shes rab ye shes ni// mtshon bya mtshon byed rnam pa gnyis// dpe dang don gyi bde ba yang // rgyu 'bras 'byung zlog skyabs su shes// brag gdung gnyis phrad 'od gsal ba de// bzlas 
408b4(rgyud 'grel): bas stan cig dag za' du// rgyas pa'i gcig dgagasal ba yis// gsal ba mi tig nyams rnying pa'o// sh-i smos thab shes rab rnyed// su 'gags ma rtog gas pa pa/ 
408b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi gsal bya dbang du brjod// rdzas kyi skabs kyi phyag rgya'o// zla ba ldan pa gtad pa'o// thabs ni bden pa'i tshig bzhin te// zab mo'i theg par grol byed pa'i// mi slu thabs 
408b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi man ngag sbyin// don nyid mngon byed bden tshig go/ rgyu ni bshad bzhin rnam pa gnyis// rang rigags la rig mtshungs pa'i klu// bden tshig sbyin pa lhan cig byed// bcu drug phyag 
408b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya zla ldan pa'o// las dang dgrag sogs slab goms pas// zla ba'i thig le gnyis bstan pa'o// rig pa'i shugs dang ldan sems bus// thob bya thob phyir rgyu yi rkyen// byed pa'i sdom pa la sogs dang / 
408b8(rgyud 'grel): cha dang bsod nams ting 'dzin byin// phyag rgya'i yon tan 'joms pa'i mthus// bde ba skyed phyir bdag po'i rkyen// shes rab ye shes nyams lon pa'o// bul snang ba'i byin brlabs can// de lta'i 
409a1(rgyud 'grel): pha ni dmigs pa'i rkyen// shes rab ye shes 'pho ba'i chas// rgyu 'bras go 'byed de ma thag/ bden tshig sbyin zhing bde snang ba'i// gnas ni rig pa'i pho brang ngo // thams cad rdos pa'i dngos bral
409a2(rgyud 'grel): bas// rang rig gsal phyir shes bya'i phyogs// nyon mongs sgrib pa dka' nas sbyangs// sa bcu sems la gnas par sbyong // shes rab ye shes thob pa ni// brag gdung lta bur phyed myong 'phrad// de la 
409a3(rgyud 'grel): brten nas rig gsal ba// gsal la rtog med nyams myong ba// rgyu 'bras byung tshul rten can no// de nyid thabs lon rten med de// gzhi phyir phyag rgya 'bras mi nyam// rjes su 'jug par bshad pa// 
409a4(rgyud 'grel): yin// bzlog skabs nyi zla nang 'dres dus// lhan cig dga' bral gnas su zin// de'i bde ba rtog med gsal// rten dang rten 'jug bshad bzhin no// gsang bshad khyad par thabs kyi mchog/ 'od 
409a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal bde dang thabs rnams mnyam// bstan pa'i dbang la sbyang phyir dang // sangs rgyas mthar thug pu phyir nod// shes shes pa shes ma rnyed na// rdo rje bskal pa mtha' glags par// 'od gsal 
409a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bde ba med par ni// na mkha'i chu skyes bzhin de skyon// skyon bzlog yon tan nyid du 'gyur// grangs kyi lnga pa'i ngo bo bstan// mthar thug bde ba chen po'i dbang // snod ni mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs 
409a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan// dkyil 'khor lnga bzhi thun mong ste// dus ni phyi dang nang gi ste// phyi rolas bcu mthar phyin dang // shes rab ye shes thob pa'o// nang gis rlung rgyu ba'i dus// ngo bo bden gnyis dbyer med 
409a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ye shes chen po thob bya de'o// nges tshig rnam grangs lnga par brjod// don dang ngo bo bstan bde chen// gnyis med bde ba mtha' bral ba// grub dang bde ba gcig par bde// ngo bo 'gyur 
409b1(rgyud 'grel): med patan par brjod// de nyid rten dang brten can dang // mtshon bya mtshan byed dpe dang don// dngos dang rdzas 'jug ma dang zlog/ de ltar grangs don shes bya'o// rten can pa ni nyi ma dag/ zla bar 'dres pa 
409b2(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyar zlog/ sa lu yu srubs chu 'dren bzhin// goms pas ri mos drangs pa'i rgyus// chu mar bzhin 'dres bden pa de ni// rgyu las skyed phyir rten can te// ngo bo mtshon phyir dpe ru brjod// phyag rgya bral 
409b3(rgyud 'grel): yang nyams med pa'i// gnyis med ye shes gsal ba ni// rten las 'byung ba'i rten med de// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor brda' zhes brjod// sa bon gnyis 'dres skyes pa ni// rgyu 'bras rim pa'i 
409b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang du brjod// thig le bsgyur bas mthar phyin dus// skyes pa brjod pa'i dbang du brjod// rdzas ni phyag rgya nyi ldan pa'o// bskur thabs bzlog pa'i man ngag dang // bde ba rin chen tshim sbyin pa'o// 
409b5(rgyud 'grel): bden gnyis dbyer med bdag gi sems// ye nas gnas pa mtshungs zhes bshad// nyi zla ldan dus smin pa'i las// rim pa lhan cig byed pa'o// mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs rab ldan zhing // brtan 
409b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpal ldan dad pa'i bu// rgyu'i rkyen du brjod pa yin// bzlog pa'i ral rims man ngag tshogs// bde ba'i gan phyir bdag por brjod// brtan dbang nyams dang tshor ldan pas// bul snang bus 
409b7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid yul// rim gyis bzlog pa bcu gsum po// thig le 'phos pas go 'byed pa// chu 'bras tshul de de ma thag/ gnas ni khyad par thun mong ngo // sa bcu mthar phyin byang chub sems// 
409b8(rgyud 'grel): rigs la gnas pa'i shes rig 'phra// 'phra ba'i 'phra dang shes sgrib gnon// mun dang snang bzhin ma gsal dag/ tshad ni skabs kyi sa gnyis 'gyur te// skad cig ma dang rgyun dbang du// 
410a1(rgyud 'grel): zur 'jug bde ba gsal ba ste// dpe don cha gnyis dbye ba shes// chos ni 'bras bu pad+ma spyad// mthar thug ma lus mnyam du rung // thig le nyi zla dbyer med pa'i// bdag gzhan bde
410a2(rgyud 'grel): ba spong ba ni// bskal pa'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa'i// mthar phyin mi thob skyon zhes bya// yon tan ma lus lhun grub pa'i// mgo lus kha lce byed pas kyang // dus tshigs mi mthun mang brjod kyang // 
410a3(rgyud 'grel): zad byed phyir rdzogs mi 'gyur ro// tha ma'i don gyi mtshan nyid ni// lam gyis bsgrubs pas 'bras bu ste// lam du rgyu dang 'bras bu ste// bdag yul gnyis kar shes par bya// phyag rgya ma la cig/ 
410a4(rgyud 'grel): car te// pa la rim pa'i dbang du brjod// rim pa'i las 'bras skad cig ma// bcu drug dag bzhi mchog la bzhi// gang bral rtsa lnga tshogs sbyor lam// gnyis pa'i gnyis sogs tha mar ba/ 
410a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu 'og gsal bcu gcig ste// pha rol phyin dang sa mtshan nyid// mtshungs phyir dpe don bde bar sbyor// 'pho ba yod phyir lam gyi 'bras// bzlog pa'i skabs su yang de bzhin shes// 
410a6(rgyud 'grel): skabs kyi 'bras bu'ang 'di bzhin te// phan pa'i dbang bskur dus 'di nas// rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur lha yi ming // 'khor lo sgyur sogs longs spyod ldan// dam pa'i gsang sngags spyod bskal 
410a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan// brgyud nas kun bzang nyid du 'gyur// de yang spyod dang khyad par ro// nus pas lha mi nor 'grub ste// bdag gzhan las rnams mthar phyung bas// bsod nams tshogs rnams mngon 
410a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs te// bgrod nas sku gsum tha mar 'grub// gsang ba dbang thob 'bras bu nyid// 'od gsal phyogs kyi bde ldan pas// khams gsum kun da'i zhing khams mthong // de phyir bde dang 
410b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rtag/ bzhi pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu ni// sa rims kun tu 'od thob nyid// rten pa'i rgyu ni brag gdung ste// sangs rgyas dang po de 'bras bu// yang na nyi zla 'dres zlog bde// skad// 
410b2(rgyud 'grel): cig rgyun gyis dpe don thob// lnga pa'i 'bras bu mthar thugs// nyi ma zla ba 'phrad pa'i rgyud// gsum pa'i bde ba'i ye shes ni// myong la mi 'dzin pad+ma spyan// rtser gnas ltar gsal 
410b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo yis// lhar gsal mi 'dzin shes rab thabs// 'gro don ldan 'char thabs kyis// rang 'byung chen po ye shes sa// lam 'dres mi phye de kun bzangs// dngos po nyid du
410b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa'i dpe// skad cig rgyun dus bshad bzhin no// skabs su'i phros pa dbang gi don// de dag tha ma'i spyod yul te// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor las kyi yum// dngos su rten 
410b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sa dman don te// 'bras bu'ang mtshon pa'i bde ba skye// dus kyang skad cig dbang tsam ste// slob ma bshad pa'i snod ldan pa// bla ma rim pa'i drod thob pas// kun nu byin brlabs skye bar 
410b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// blo 'bring ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du// slob dpon ting 'dzin gral non pas// drod thob slob ma dbang bskur ba// drod thobs la sbyar phyir sbyid// rig pa'i lha mo dag dang sbyor// 
410b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dngos su rigs 'dzin thob// blo rab rigs 'dzin sa thob pa// bla ma bde bar gshegs nyid de// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas nyid sbyar phyir// 
410b8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes phyag rgya mo sa dang sbyar// 'bras bu yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rin chen rgya mtsho rdo rje sems// sgyu 'phrul pa'i rgyud nyid las// byed pa yab yum sbyor ba yis// dbang 
411a1(rgyud 'grel): bsur chos bshad 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud rtogs sngon byung shes par bya// dkyil 'khor tha mar phyin pa'o// // sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i dngos lnga nyon mongs pa// rig pa'i kyi gnas
411a2(rgyud 'grel): bsungs te bsdus pa yi// man ngag thabs mchog 'de thob don rtogs nas// lam gnyis rnal 'byor ma lus mthar phyin no// de ltar thabs la don phye nas// kun gyi theg chen don mthong ste/ 
411a3(rgyud 'grel): dug gi nad sel bde rnyed ltar// nyon mongs nyid kyis grol bar shog/ dbang gi don rab tu 'gyed pa rdzogs so// // slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'o// / 
411a4(rgyud 'grel): gas kyi thegs pa zhes kyang 'azhugs/ @#// rgya kar skad du/ tsi ta bi du rA ma/ bod skad du/ thugs kyi thigs pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// ma byas lhun rdzogs khyab gsal 
411a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs med kun ma spangs// mi phyed gcig snad ma lus rang rig nyid du sgrol// swa ti ka bzhin dngos lngas mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku// zhar byung lnga gnyis bco lnga'i bdag nyid che la 'dud// gsum gnyis
411a6(rgyud 'grel): ko lo mchod byas nas// bcu par lnga gnyis gcig gsal bas// 'dir moni lnga'i rig pa nyid// 'bras bcas pa tra shas bshad bya// bcu pa'i bcu drag nyams rnyed pas// sku bzhi'i dkyil 'khor khams 
411a7(rgyud 'grel): thig le// ji bzhin shes pa de nyid las// chos lo gyen du rim pa bzhin// spros bcas med dang ldan pa sgoms pas// khyad par thabs kyis rims bskul nas// rim par skye ba'i ye shes ro// lha 
411a8(rgyud 'grel): mig dag pas shes par bya// yi ge lnga dang gsum gnas su// mi dmigs ye shes rtags yul can// skar zla'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// gnyis med thabs kyis rten shes na// gnyis 
411b1(rgyud 'grel): med sems kyi snang ba'o// brtags bral shes rab 'od gsal ba'i// phyi nang kun gsal rang rig dngos// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// me long lta bu'i rgya tshogs snang // thun mong sdig las grol 
411b2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// de nyid stobs 'gyur rnal 'byor che// dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i thig le nyid// phan tshun rgyu 'bras tshul shes pas// tshes khams g.yas g.yon tshul rigs lnga// rnam shes bdag pa 
411b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'dus rnams// g.yas g.yon rims bzlog brgyad gnyis shes// dpung gsang lte khro de bzhin te// bya byed hUM phaT gsal bar bya// rang mtshungs lha nyid drangs mchod bzlas// bcu gsum drug
411b4(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor gnyis// shes rab thabs la rnam par brtag/ thabs lam rol mo'i mes bzhu ba'i// dkyil 'khor las byung gsang thig le// byA byed gnas su lhag pa'i ro// gsal bas kun 
411b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang ye shes blta'o// 'od zer snying po nyi ma dang // ye shes thig le mnyam sbyor bas// shes rab snyeng rje gnyis med pa'o// bde ba chen por ldan gyis grub// gur gum bzung bslabs goms los/ 
411b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// bde chen yig gsum gnas bzhugs na// gsang sngags ngo bor rang gsal ba// dgyes pa chen por stobs par bshad// yungs kar lhung med bde ba yis// ye shes skad cig rim skye
411b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ rang bzhin rang snang chos kyi sku// sprul pa sna tshogs ro ldan pa// bdag gsal 'dzin bral pad+ma can// gsang thig rang gnas rang rig pa// me la shing bsnan ji bzhin du// 'khor lo kun gyi
411b8(rgyud 'grel): gzhir gyur las// dkyil 'khor ma lus dngos yin phyir// lam gnas kun tu spros thim pas// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis nyi shu lnga// ma lus snang bas/ zhi khro 'dres mas thabs shes sogs// 
412a1(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya bsam bzhin dbang sgyur ba// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor mtha' yas rdzogs phyir ro// sangs rgyas snying po kha sbyor las// dkyil 'khor lnga sogs bsal med snang // rga tshul 'thun pas 
412a2(rgyud 'grel): don byas kyang // bya byed gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur// rang bzhin mnyam rdzogs thig le pa// shes rab gsum mthar lam rim gyis// dus gsum kun mnyam ldan gyis grub// gcig dang du ma'i 
412a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' bral bas// thams cad tshu la nyid 'di 'dra shes// lam 'dir gnas la sras bcas ril// thugs rjes ring nas byin rlob mdzad// bsal mang bsal bas 'di thob ste// rgyal ba ma lus mdzad// 
412a4(rgyud 'grel): dgongs phyir// gang yang 'da' 'gyur rigs ma yin// de nas thams cad phyag rgya 'dis// blo ldan chags bral dang du mkhyen// 'dod chol bsam mang thabs shom dang // da ma nyams g.yo rgyus tshod// 
412a5(rgyud 'grel): len zhing // bka' gcig la spel bka' rkus pas// srog chad dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thob// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang sdang // lhar bcas rnal 'byor smos ci dgos// de bas rab tu snod brtag 
412a6(rgyud 'grel): bya// sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi thigs pa/ rdzogs so// // gang ba'i rigs pa'i man gzugs sa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ g+hu yA b+hI dra u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i thigs pa'i man ngag/ dpal 
412a7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la yod pa rnam pa brgyad du shes// gang la ci 'dra de nyid bsres ba yin// rnam bzhi bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil na// don dam snying po de la phyag 'tshal lo// 
412a8(rgyud 'grel): gang la snyoms 'jug de la yod pa la// de la yod de de la blta bar bya// gang las byung ba de las byung ba yin// de las de byung de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba'i shes rab thig le dbyings// bcu drug gnyis kyi 
412b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil na bzhugs// shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug la// kun tu rgyas btab dkyil 'khor yin// bdag nyid chen po lnga blta zhing // thur du 'phro zhing gyen du 'bar// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// 
412b2(rgyud 'grel): gong gi snying po bskur bar byed// de 'od thig le mnyam sbyor bas// lnga gnyis drug gi dkyil na'o// bde ba chen po'i ro yis ni// dgyes pa chen por rtogs par bya// shes bya 'byung zad bsod nams
412b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// de nyid sgyu mar rang snang ba// gzigs mo'i bde ba mtha' yas kyis// bde ba chen po'i 'ben la phog/ bcu gsum gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor lo// de'i thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings// kun gyi// 
412b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos yin kun gyi gtso// bcu dang bzhi ni mngon rdzogs pa// gsum dang gnyis su yang dag gnas// kun gyis dngos por bdag gyur pa// de la dbang sgyur dam pa yin// nyid la gnas pa gnas 
412b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la// de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grub// thams cad de yi rgyan du che// gnyis rdzogs thig le mnyam sbyor bas// snying rje chen po yongs kyis 'char// bcu bzhi'i sems can 'dul ba la// sgyu mi 
412b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can sgrol ba yi// rnal 'byor chen po 'od ldan spyod// 'di la rtag tu gang 'dug pa// sangs rgyas sras dang 'khor bcas kyis// thugs rje nyi ma shugs las 'byung // de la bde byed bde ba 
412b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// bskal pa rdul snyed grangs med du// thos bsam sgoms pa rab mtha' las// 'byung ba bde ba chen po yin// slob dpon rten byed kye 'di lta// gang la gang med gang la'ang // de la de med de la'ang // 
412b8(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar bsreg dang sdug bsngal che// de bas gzhan du bstan mi bya// gsang ba'i man ngag thig le 'di// thig le chen po 'di snang bas// sems can kun gyi rang bzhin la// bde ba chen po snang bar 
413a1(rgyud 'grel): shog/ gsang ba'i thigs pa'i man ngag/ slob dpon bi ma la mi tra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rnapa 'byod chen po shes rang lhan byed kyi mnad/ ces bya bags so/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yo ga 
413a2(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA pra be sha tsak+Sha u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po shes rab spyan 'byed kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor gtso bo skyes bu'i mchog
413a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa lha phyir phyag 'tshal nas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud don mchog/ rang bzhin rkyen gyis mngon bya'i phyir// rgyud gsum snang ba rnal 'byor gsum// bya byed tshul gnyis bdag nyid dang // tshi ga 
413a4(rgyud 'grel): don dang ni de nyid can// rgyu 'bras thabs tshul 'brel phyir gsum// shes thob byed pa bar tshul la// ngo bo rkyen bshad thabs dang dbye// rim par mi brjod 'dir brjod pa// dang po bar mas mthar byed 
413a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// lam gnyis thun mong rgyu dang mchog/ mchog la phyi dang nang la'ang // thabs dang shes rab la ma gnyis kyis// nges byed sngon la steng 'og thabs// gcig shos gtsor byed spyi blugs rim// / 
413a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bral lngas dbul las bzlog pa yis// rnal 'byor che la mos rnams kyi// shi shi'i don phyir mdo tsam brjod// phun sum tshogs pa lhun grub rnams// gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin byed pa'o// sngon 
413a7(rgyud 'grel): byas thabs mchog chags mchog don// sangs rgyas zhabs kyis gsungs par shes// thos bsam bsgoms pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang 'byung kun dam lhun grub phyir// gsum gyis grol byed lam 
413a8(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa// mtshan nyid gsum la gcig gzhi gsum// gtso mchog mtshan nyid dang po bshad// lam kun gzungs su bya phyir ro// de la brtag bya thabs ngo bos// nges tshig rtags rkyang dang // khyad/ 
413b1(rgyud 'grel): par gol sa yon tan skyon// spyan mchog lus su rnam par bsgrags// 'ching grol byed pa ldan rdzogs kyang // dbang spyan mchog dang bral ba yis// srid rgyu 'bras bu ming tsam snang // dang po chu bo bzhi rgal 
413b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar// snang ba gcig la gnyis tshul snang // ngan shos bdag gzhan stod phur snang // de de rim par grub ma grub// mtha'i don rnams cir 'gyur ba rtag/ mthong byed thabs kyang rgyud pa dang // rtags kyis 
413b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cing gtan la 'bebs// dman la rgya gsum goms pa yis// brtan nas brtags spyad klung zhugs mthong // bsgom pa lam du bstan par bya// rim par skye la the tshom med// shes bya dam pa 
413b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags mtshon pa'ang // rang bzhin rtags dang 'bras bu'i rtags// dang po rang gi rigs pa yis// cho 'phrul snang ba'i 'byung ba dang // phyogs dang kha dog la sogs kyis// mtshon nas ji bzhin nyid rtogs 
413b5(rgyud 'grel): byed// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog pa sgribs byas te// ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong // ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid 
413b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan// 'di yis lhun grub rtogs par ces// cig shos mthar phyin ye shes kyi// dkyig rdo kho rten dang brten can ltar// 
413b7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i gnas brgyan gdan sogs dang // rten cing rgya bzhi rgyan sogs mtshungs// gtan tshig rgyas par lus bzhag na// tshan ma bka' gzhung gtan tshigs dang // sgra mthun don spags gtan tshigs kyis// gzhal
413b8(rgyud 'grel): bya bdag nyid tshe sogs blta// tshad ma bka' la dag mnyam grangs// rtogs pa bzhi dang bden gsum dag/ skabs kyis bya thabs mthar 'gyur yang // byed la gtsor brjod dag pa yis// snang ba mi spong/ 
414a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur byed// mnyam pas mnyam byed bdag nyid che// rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis// mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lor byed// bden pa gnyis med zung du 'jug/ ldem dgongs ma na/ 
414a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag gtan tshigs kyis// skabs kyis don nyid mthong bar byed// dngos po lo rgyus gtan tshigs kyis// bdag nyid chen po smras ci dgos// rang bzhin gtan tshigs ldan grub 'jug/ 'on tang tha dad do/ na/ 
414a3(rgyud 'grel): la med// sgra mthun don spags rang dang spyi// mtshan nyid gzhal mtha' bral ba'i// chos kun rang dang spyir btags pas// ma skyes thams cad mkhyem pa'i don// rnam pa kun ldan stong par snang // 
414a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir sku gsung thugs su snang // dngos kun gcig dang du mar bral// mtha' gsum dang ni bzhi bral lugs// khyad par can gyis de nyid mthong // de yang ma spangs bral bar brjod// rnam par dbye dang 
414a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa'i dpe// de bzhin nyid du the tshom med// shes rab spyan gyis ngo bo nyid// gnyis kyi ngo bo skabs 'jug kyang // rgyu 'bras phyir na cig shos la// yul med rang rig mngon sum pa'o// bye brag 'dod 
414a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung gtan tshigs kyis// zhor brjod bcu gsum rnam grangs tsam// mthong byed nges tshig mthong lta gnyis// sgros bral skur med don chen po// sa lu phub khrod snang med bzhin// yul med rang gsal 
414a7(rgyud 'grel): nyams rnyed la// mthong zhes tha snyad brjod par zad// de phyir blta dang blta med pas// chos kun rang rig nyid snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// mi rtog gsal bas nges tshig 'grub// de ltar
414a8(rgyud 'grel): skyes mchog su ldan pa// dam la rub cing snying rjer ldan// phal drin skye man ngag 'tshe'o// mi skyo don brtson chags bral 'byung // spyod zhib nyam ngag yangs med// de yod dmigs dang ldan pa'i rtags// 
414b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor che la phyir rgyu dang // mu stegs zhor 'byung rig byed dang // ngo bo rgyur smra phyogs lung rten// bdun sde mnyam 'jog la sogs kyis// reg min de la sa gzhi nas spags// lta spyod mi mthun smos ci 
414b2(rgyud 'grel): dgos// bskal par sbyangs pas don mthong ba// phyin chad mi ldog sa la gnas// spyod sogs las kun pha rol phyin// gzungs kyi dam par rgyal bas gsungs// shes rab spyan dang ma ldan na// 
414b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar phyogs lha mi stegs tsam las// spyad kyang mi thob 'chi bar 'gyur// nag po'i las spyod smos ci dgos// tshig tsam ltal rten byed cing // dam med spyod cing sgo dgu yi// nyed pa byed de// 
414b4(rgyud 'grel): zar par dka'// stegs dbang tsam gyis rnyed dka' bas// sgra 'dul bdud bzlog brtson par 'bod// de med nam yang thar mi srid// spyod dang skyon bcos mi bzod cing // lci dang gdung med 'dod thob 
414b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// mi khur spongs byed rigs ma nges// ltung byed de dang ma phred cig/ de bzlog snod ldan dpal du shog/ des kyang de bzhin 'tsho bar shog/ rab rib sel byed zur 'dra 'od// dman phyir brtson 
414b6(rgyud 'grel): byas gzhung 'gal skyon// rgyal ba rigs 'dzin mchog gsum la// bzod gsol gnyis med dang du bshags// ngal ba'i dge rtses 'gro ba rnams// mi ldog spyan ldan sangs rgyas shog/ 
414b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa// shes rab spyan 'byed ces bya ba/ bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// // lta ba dang theg pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bsdus pa'i bskus 
414b8(rgyud 'grel): byang // bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang // rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can phyin ci log gi lta ba grangs med pa'i mdo rnam pa bzhir 'dus te/ 
415a1(rgyud 'grel): phyal ba dang / rgyang phan dang / mur thug pa dang / mu stegs pa'o// de la phyal ba ni chos thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu yod med du ma gtogs te/ kun tu rmongs pa'o// rgyang phan pa 
415a2(rgyud 'grel): che snga phyi yod med du ma gtogs shing / tshe gcig la btsan phyug dang / mthu stobs bsgrub pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi gsang tshig la brten pa'o// mur thug pa ni chos thams cad ni rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa
415a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ tshe gcig la skyes pa'i chos thams cad kyang glo bur du skyes la/ mtha' chad par lta'o// mu stegs pa ni/ chos thams cad la kun tu btags pa'i bdag rtag pa zhig yod par lta ba ste/ de yang rgyu 
415a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa la 'bras bu yod par blta ba dang / rgyu 'bras log par lta ba dang / rgyu yod pa la 'bras bu med par lta ba'o// 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i lta ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la yang rnam 
415a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis te/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang / rdo rje'i theg pa'o// mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 
415a6(rgyud 'grel): theg pa'o// de la nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i lta ba rnams ni/ chos thams cad la mu stegs la sogs pa yis sgro dang bkur bar btab pa'i ye med par blta ba dang / rtag pa la sogs pa 
415a7(rgyud 'grel): yod par lta ba ni/ zag pa la sbrul du mthong ba med/ phung po dang / skyes mched dang / khams la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i/ rdul phra rab dang / rnam par shes pa ni don dam par yod
415a8(rgyud 'grel): par lta ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgoms pa'i rims kyis/ 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi grub pa yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ chos thams cad la mu stegs 
415b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas/ sgo dang bkur bar kun tu rtags pa'i bdag rtag pa la sogs pa med par lta ba ni nyan thos dang mthun/ de la khyad par du gzugs kyi phung po chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig la 
415b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med par rtogs shing / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i dus na yang / nyan thos ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi ltos par/ sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung/ 
415b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas/ chos nyid zab mo rtogs nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu 'grub pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 
415b4(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par byung ba'i chos thams cad don dam par ni rang bzhin med pa yin la/ kun rdzob kun sgyum tsam du mtshan nyid ma 'dres par yod de/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu sdud pa'i 'bras bus 
415b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu rims kyis bgrod pa'i mtha'/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'grub par 'dod pa yin no// // rdo rje theg pa la yang gsum ste/ bya ba rgyud kyi theg pa dang / gnyis ka rgyud kyi theg pa dang / rnal 'byor 
415b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi theg pa'o// de la bya ba rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa las/ kun rdzob tu lha'i gzugs kyi skur bsgom zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan dang / thugs 
415b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang / bzlas brjod dang / gtsang sbra dang / dus tshigs dang / gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa/ gtsor yo byad dang rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthus 'grub pa'o// gnyis ka rgyud kyi theg pa 
415b8(rgyud 'grel): la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa las/ kun rdzob tu lha'i sku nyid rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yo byad dang rgyu rkyen la sogs pa gnyis 
416a1(rgyud 'grel): ka la yang brten nas 'grub pa'o// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ rnam pa gnyis te/ rnal 'byor gyi pa thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa dang / rnal 'byor nang pa 
416a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa'o// de la rnal 'byor phyi la thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ phyi'i yo byad la gtso bor mi 'dzin par/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / 
416a3(rgyud 'grel): de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bsgob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gtser byas pas 'grub po// rnal 'byor nang pa thabs kyi 
416a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ rnam pa gsum ste/ bskyed pa'i tshul dang / rdzogs pa'i tshul dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo// de la bskyed pa'i tshul ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnam pa 
416a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum rims bzhin du bskyed cing / dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkod nas/ bsgoms pas 'grub po// rdzogs pa'i chu la ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo'i rnam par mi rtog/ dbu ma 
416a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g.yos la/ kun rdzob tu gzugs kyi sku yang gsal bar bsgom zhing / mnyam pa ma 'dres par bsgoms pas 'grub bo// rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten dang 
416a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med par sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ye nas yin par rtogs nas bsgom pa ste/ de yang rgyud las/ rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/ 
416a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ sa bcu spyan dang mA ma kI/ ma rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ nam mkha' 
416b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag/ ces 'byung ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ye nas ma skyes la/ bya byed nas pa'i sku ma/ bde bar gshegs pa 
416b2(rgyud 'grel): yab yum bcu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ye nas yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chen po lnga ni yum lnga'i rang bzhin yin/ phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
416b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ rnam par shes pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin/ yul bzhi ni mdzes pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ dbang po bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin/ dus bzhi ni mchod
416b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ lus kyi dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yul dang / de las 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni byang chub 
416b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems kyi rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin/ yul chos 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ni kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin te/ de dag kyang ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin gyis// 
416b6(rgyud 'grel): da lam gyis bsgrub pa ni ma yin no// de ltar phyogs bcu dang dus gsum dang / khams gsum la sogs pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad rang gi sems las gud na med na/ 
416b7(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do// 'jig rten gsum po de nyid de/ 'byung ba che rnams de nyid do// zhes 'byung ngo // ji skad du/ chos thams cad ni/ 
416b8(rgyud 'grel): sems la gnas so// sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ni ci yang mi gnas so// zhes 'byung ba dang / chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni gzod ma
417a1(rgyud 'grel): nas rnam par dag pa'o// chos thams cad ni yongs kyis 'od gsal ba'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o// chos thams cad ni ye nas mngon par 
417a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs so// // 'di rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo// rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni// rtogs pa rnams bzhi lam gyis yid ches pa ste/ de la rdzogs pa chen 
417a3(rgyud 'grel): po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tsho gas rdzogs pas/ 'bras bu chos lhun gyis grub pa'i don no// tshul ni don la 'jug pa'o// rtogs pa rnam bzhi ni/ rgyu gcig par rtogs pa dang / yig 'bru'i
417a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis rtogs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa dang / mngon sum par rtogs pa'o// de la rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pas/ so so ma yin/ 
417a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyis so so ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa nyid chu zla ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs su snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa dang / sgyu ma nyid ngo bo med de/ ma skyes pas kun rdzo ba dang / 
417a6(rgyud 'grel): don dam par dbyer med pas rgya gcig par rtogs pa'o// yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa ni a ste gsung gi rang bzhin la/ ma skyes pa nyid sgyu mar snang zhing bya ba
417a7(rgyud 'grel): byed nus pa ni oM ste sku'i rang bzhin/ de ltar rtogs pa'i rig pa ye shes sgyu ma mtha' dang dbus med pa ni hUM ste thugs kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o// byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa ni/ dper na
417a8(rgyud 'grel): ras dkar po la dmar pos byin gyis brlab pa'i mthu rtsod la yod pa bzhin du/ tshes thams cad sangs rgya bar byin gyis brlob pa'i mthu yang rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gyis mthus byin 
417b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs par rtogs pa'o// mngon sum par rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par gnas pa de yang lung dang man ngag dang 'gal ba yang ma yin la/ lung dang man ngag gi tshig tsam
417b2(rgyud 'grel): la rten pa yang ma yin la/ rang gi rig pas blo'i gting du yid ches par mngon sum du rtogs pa'o// lam gyi yid ches pa ni/ rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i don rig pa de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i yin te/ de 
417b3(rgyud 'grel): yang rgyu bsgrub pas 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus la ltos pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi/ rang gi rig pas mngon sum du rtogs shing yid ches pa'o// de la mtshan nyid gsum gyis don mthar phyin par 'gyur te// 
417b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i tshul rig pa ni/ shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// yang nas yang du goms par byed pa ni/ 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do// goms pa'i mthus mngon du gyur pa ni/ 'bras bu'i mtshan 
417b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid do// mtshan nyid gsum gyi 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o// de la 'brel pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// rnam par byang ba'i chos su brtags pa thams cad ye nas 
417b6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid/ rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa'i dbyings dang / byin gyis brlabs yin pa'i don rtogs pa ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bla na med par sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu 
417b7(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o// dgos pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rnam par byang ba dang chos dang / sman lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs par btags pa thams cad/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa 
417b8(rgyud 'grel): chen po la blang dor med med par spyod pa ni 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do// de ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o// dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 
418a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos dang / sman lnga dang / bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i khyad par du brtags pa thams cad/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du/ blang dor 
418a2(rgyud 'grel): med par srid pa'i 'khor ba nyid ye nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid lhun gyis grub pa yin pas/ 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de/ sku gsung thugs mi zad 
418a3(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyan gyi 'khor lo mngon du gyur pa ni/ dgos pa'i dgos pa'o// de la bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen pos/ don lhun gyis grub par gyur pas/ rnal 'byor 
418a4(rgyud 'grel): la brtson par bya'o// de la bsnyen pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems shes pa ste/ de yang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin dung lam gyis bsgrub cing gnyen pos bcos su med par rtogs 
418a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// nye ba'i bsten pa ni bdag nyid ltar shes pa ste/ de yang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du yin pas/ bdag nyid kyang ye nas lha'i rang bzhin yin par shes kyi/ de bsgrub pa ni ma 
418a6(rgyud 'grel): yin par rtogs pa'o// bsgrub pa 'di ni yum bskyed pa ste/ de yang yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings las/ nam mkha' nyid yum chen mo// sa chu me rlung bzhir snang / bya ba med pa'i yum ye nas// 
418a7(rgyud 'grel): yin par rtogs pa'o// bsgrub pa ni thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa ste/ de yang yum chen mo lnga'i shes rab dang / yum gyi nam mkha' stong pa nyid las/ phung po lnga'i sangs rgyas thabs kyis yab/ 
418a8(rgyud 'grel): smon pa med pa ye nas zung du 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa las/ byang chub kyi sems sprul pa tsam bral du gyur pa'i rang bzhin/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don sgyu ma la sgyu ma rol cing bde mchog sgyu ma'i rgyun la/ 
418b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i dus nyid na/ mtshan ma med pa'i don mi dmigs nam mkha' dang snyoms pa ni/ klong du gyur nas ldan gyis grub pa ste/ bdud rnam bzhi yang brtul bas/ mthar phyin pa'i don 'grub pa'o// 
418b2(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i yid bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang / rgya yongs su mchad 'khor lo// ye nas bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa yang / thabs kyi theg pa'i gsung
418b3(rgyud 'grel): thos pa ni mig phye ba'o// don rtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o// rtogs nas goms par byed pa ni/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o// zhugs nas mngon du gyur pa ni/ dngos grub chen po thob pa'o// 
418b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar tshul 'di ni rdzogs pa chen po'i mthar phyin pa'i don/ yi ge 'khor lo tshigs chen gyi sa la lhun gyis 'jug pa ste/ skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don la ye nas sangs/ 
418b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par rig pas gom pa drag dal du 'gro ba yin gyi/ phal gyis bya ba ni ma yin no// phal gyis thos te ji ltar bsams kyang / bden zhing bzang zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// yid ma 
418b6(rgyud 'grel): ches pa dang / phal gyi blol dka' zhing bden pa dang / bzang bar ma shes pa'i nyams dang sbyar nas/ kun kyang de dang 'dra snyam ste/ yo rdzun zhes skyes bu rab la yang bskur pa 'debs shing
418b7(rgyud 'grel): sun 'byin pa'i blo skyes par 'gyur bas/ rab tu gsang ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i thigs pa zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i de ni rtogs pa'i blo ma skyes 
418b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar du/ theg pa 'og ma 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ gdul bya mi za bas/ slob dpon gyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang / theg pa thams cad la mkhas par 
419a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin gyi/ phyogs 'ga' tsam shes pas slob dpon gyis gzung du mi rung bar yang rgya cher 'byung ngo // lta ba'i khyad par dka' thub pa dang / brtul zhugs kyang bye brag du 'gyur te/ 
419a2(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub med pa ni 'jig rten phyal ba dang / mur thug go/ dka' thub yod pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ rgyang phan pa dang / mu stegs pa ste/ 'jig rten po'i dka' thub dang / nyan thos kyi dka' thub dang / 
419a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub dang / bla na med pa'i dka' thub bo// de la phyal ba ni rgyu 'bras la rmongs pa'i phyir dka' thub med do// mur thag pa ni chad par lta ba'i phyir/ dka' thub med do// 
419a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyang phan pa ni tshe 'di'i khyad par dag bsgrub pa'i phyir/ gtsang sbra la sogs pa'i dka' thub can no// mu stegs pa ni/ bdag tu brta gcig yod pa de dag par bya ba'i phyir/ lus sun 'byin cing // 
419a5(rgyud 'grel): me lnga rten pa la sogs pa'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs log par spyod pa'o// nyan thos kyi dka' thub naM/ 'dul ba las sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste/ dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad// rang gi 
419a6(rgyud 'grel): sems ni yongs su gdul// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ ces 'byung ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis ka so sor yod par lta bas dge ba ni spyod// / 
419a7(rgyud 'grel): mi dge ba ni spong ba'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la/ skyen du 'tsham par tshar 
419a8(rgyud 'grel): mi gcod// rdzun 'phrul la sogs sdig mi byed// snying rje ldan zhing byams phyir dang // sems dge ba la nyes pa med ces 'byung ste/ snying rje chen pos zin na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos gang spyad 
419b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ga ma bas ba mas su sa zu sa ma ma cha sa tham mas ma ma ma rnam kya cwa 
419b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang / sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub ni/ snying rje gzhi bzung nas spyod pa'o// bla na med pa'i dka' thub ni// dam tshig chen po'i mdo las kyang // sangs
419b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas theg pa rab nges na// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang // pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// de la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs zhes 'byung ste/ chos thams cad ye nas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir// 
419b4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje ni rten du med la/ zhe sdang ni spang du med de/ de ltar ma rtogs pa la/ thugs rje mi 'byung ba yang ma yin te/ ji ltar lta bas ye nas/ ye nas rnam par rtog pa bzhin/ dka' thub dang brtul 
419b5(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyang de ltar rnam par spyod pa'o// lta ba 'phreng ba'i gsang rab 'di// dbu long rang phye mig med ltar// shes rab thabs kyi rtsa la 'chang ba'i// skyes mchog yod na phrad par shog 
419b6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag gi rgyal po lta ba'i 'phreng ba rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis bsdus ma lus sems nyid la// lta ba'i 
419b7(rgyud 'grel): bya byed gnyis med cing // rang gi ngo bo'ang ma grub pas// lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni/ lta ba'i dam pa kho nar 'dod// rmongs pa'i lta ba dngos dmigs pa/ ldongs pas nam mkha' bsgrags pa rnams// / 
419b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid mdor bsdus bshad par bya// rgyu rkyen las kyis ma byas pa'i// gser go las byas rdzas rnams kun// mong dbyibs dngos las tha dad kyang // ngo bo gser du gcig pa ltar/ 
419b9(rgyud 'grel): rang byung rang snang byang chub sems// spros bral rang rgyud min pa'i yul// med sgyu brtags chags bsgrubs 'grub snang // rig phyir phyi nang dngos kun tu// rang snang mtshan nyid so sor yang // / 
420a1(rgyud 'grel): sems phyir rtog med 'od gsal ba'i// sems nyid 'ba' zhig kho nas pas// cir yang snang la gzung du med// sna tshogs gnyis par mi phyed pa// bdag po zung 'jug rdo rje'i// 
420a2(rgyud 'grel): sku// cir snang ma spangs dngos mi dmigs// sprul rdzogs chos sku ma 'dres gsal// de sogs lhun grub byang chub sku// ma nor ma bcos kun 'byung ba// de la de bzhin dbyings zhes bya'o// 
420a3(rgyud 'grel): ces kyang ma bsgribs ye shes mchog/ thams cad ma 'dres ye shes gsal// dngos po thams cad de nyid de// rgyud dkyil rdzogs chen sangs rgyas sogs// rang bzhin ngo bor de brjod de// 
420a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dkar dag rin chen gling // mya ngan 'das zla brjod med pa// tha snyad ci yang min pa ste// ming grangs gdul bya'i ched du zad// de ltar rang rig rar snang bas// gang la cir snang dus nyid// 
420a5(rgyud 'grel): na// sna byal byed gnyis med pa// mthong ba med pa'i mthong yin yang // nges pa'i rkyen gyis ma nges dang // gau'i snar gnyis tegs gsum du// rang blo'i rgyun las grub pa'o// bshad pa bzhi/ 
420a6(rgyud 'grel): du rang snang la// ma rig pa dag lta brtags pa yis// zhor blos gud na 'dug pa dang // rdzas bems snang ba'i brtags pa gsum// goms pas nyams su skye ba nyid// log rtog rgyun la rtag gnas// 
420a7(rgyud 'grel): pas// nyon mongs las kyis cir snang ba'i// dngos kun log rtog tsam nyid las// 'phra dang zab pa yod min pas// 'khrul pa'i snang ba zhes su gsungs// rang bzhin shes spangs// / 
420a8(rgyud 'grel): zlog pa'i phyir// chos nyid bya byed rigs pa gnyis// rang bzhin las kyis tha dad do// snod bcud rims sbyar theg bas ma yas// dgongs gsung brlabs 'byung du ma las// rang bzhin 
420b1(rgyud 'grel): 'thun kol ba gnyis// bye brad du ma'ang gnyis 'dus te// ril lta byed po rtag pa gnyis// bdag dang dngos po rkyen las 'byung // 'jig mtha' stong pa'i chad lta'o// mos pa chung ngu pa dag
420b2(rgyud 'grel): ni// sems ni gzhir snang skad cig ma'i// rgyun la lta ba gnyis ma grub// so so'i ngo bo phra rab ni// bdag dang 'jig rten gzhir 'dod pa// chos tsam 'phags pa'i spyod yul la// yor 
420b3(rgyud 'grel): bor rnam par shes pa yis// mu rdzas lta bur lkog gyur pas// spang phyir rjes su 'gog byed pa'i'o// gzhan dag 'dzin pa cha ma dun yang // 'phra mo phyogs chas ma grub phyir// dngos 
420b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i ngo bo mtha' spyong yang // stong pa'i rgyun gyis stong pa'ang // so so'i cha yis 'tshong bar 'gyur// phyogs rtogs pa yi gzhung dag kyang // don ni rgyud bcas chos tsam min// rnam 
420b5(rgyud 'grel): rig skad cig ngo bo nyid// dngos nyid snang phyir sems tsam ste// rmi lam khang sogs ji lta bar// dngos po thams cad skad cig ma'o// gang yang de snang dus nyid la// snga phyi kun bsgribs da lta 
420b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid// cig phyir cha shas rnam pas stong / nyi shar chu shel bai DUr sogs// brtag par dka' ba'i ye shes nyid// de lta'i rgyun du rang gnas pa'o// rjes su 'jug par byed pa ni// mi rtog/ 
420b7(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin zhes bya'o// mi gnas theg chen gzhung gsum med do// gzhan gyi dam pa'i don de nyid// phyogs gcig la gnas yang dag min// rkyen snang sa gol cha yi phyir// gnyis bral smra/ 
420b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'ang rig pas 'gal// gang yang rang grub ma yin te// lag sor tshogs kyis dngos min bzhin// brgyad phyed gzhan dbang snang ba yang // mthun snang la sogs rigs pa bzhis// ngos 
421a1(rgyud 'grel): par yod par kun bsgrib 'dod// 'dus snang don byed rgyu tsam la// chos dang ldan pa zhes brjod kyang // ngo bo mthong ba ming tsam phyir// rang gi mtshan nyid brjod bya min// gzhan 
421a2(rgyud 'grel): snang rgyu dang grangs bral dang // bdag gzhan gnyis rgyus mi skye phyir// gang yang rang gi ngo bo stong // dus gsum du yang ma grub pa// rang bzhin ngo bos stong pa nyid// ma byas mi 'gyur ma reg cing // ra 
421a3(rgyud 'grel): bos brjod med rigs bzhis nges// shes bya ba de ni gnyis ngo bo nyid// mun snang bzhin du 'thad min la// lo ma mtshon bzhin gzhan las min// gang yang gnyis las 'da' med pa// mtha' 
421a4(rgyud 'grel): las 'das phyir dbu mar 'dod// theg pa mchog la bye brag ste// dmigs pa'i phra mo bya ba nyid// rang sems mtha' bzhi yongs bral la// rang rig ye shes gzhan las min// rkyen snang 
421a5(rgyud 'grel): glang ba'i ye shes kyis// mthong ba'i dngos po mthong 'jam rtsub// drug phyed rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mthong ba rnam dag ces bya'o// dag pas ltas na kun kyang gtsang // rtogs pas 
421a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams na ci yang 'grub// dngos kun rang rig mtshan nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis// lugs bskur bzhin du snang bar 'dod// ye shes byin brlabs snang ba nyid// 
421a7(rgyud 'grel): sdeng ma chud par rims lta zhing // snang stong rim gyis brtan par byed// cho ga las dang rdzas bsogs pa// rnal 'byor gnyis dbang smra gzhung ni// thams cad sems kyi brlabs snang phyir// 
421a8(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mtha' stong rig gsal bas// rgyu rkyen ma byas mtha' bral ba'i// rang bzhin chos kyi sku nyid do// kun gzhi sems btun tshul bzhin du// chos sku snang ba'i byin rlabs rol// rdor sogs// 
421b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor du/ sangs ma rgyas pa med pa ni// rang bzhin stug po bkod pa'o// rkyen lam rnal 'byor rnam gnyis kyis// mngon byas lhun grub rnal 'byor ni// byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam 
421b2(rgyud 'grel): yas kyang // rnal 'byor gsal ba mnyam par 'dod// rnal 'byor gsum po rims snang ba// gcig dang du mar smra ba na// rang rig nyi ma'i snying po nyid// dngos gnyis las sogs byed pa'i phyir// 
421b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'phrul gnyis las mi zhan pas// dbang sgyur thabs kyis rgyal bar 'dod// tshe 'phral yul sems tshul nyid kyang // thabs dang shes rab mtshan nyid de// phung sogs yab yum dkyil 'khor ni// rgyud 
421b4(rgyud 'grel): min rang bzhin snang bzhid// gnyis med byang sems dbo las// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid rang gis med// sman gyi rgyal po ma ki tas// gang la reg pa sman du 'gyur// dbang sgyur mnalag laganas pas 
421b5(rgyud 'grel): smra na na gyur// ma dag gas / sa/ gas pa rnam // dab nga 
421b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul las// chu 'bras rim pa med par 'dod// rjes la tho ba 'jug rnal 'byor gzhung // ma skyes rang rig ye shes ni// rtsal rdzogs rol pa rang snang bas// grangs mdog ma nges sku gsung 
421b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs// rang snang phyag rgya bas ma mi khyab// kun bzangs ril phyir blang dor med// gang yang sems la gzhan min pas// rang bzhin cir yang ma skyes phyir// rtogs pa'i smra bsam yul bral ba// 
421b8(rgyud 'grel): kun gzhi bzang mo'i mnga' klong las// cir yang snang ba yum gyi dbyings// rang snang rol pa bas pa yas kyang // b+ha ga'i klong las g.yos med de// 'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen po// sangs ma 
422a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa cig med pa'o// mang nyung grangs kyi lha rnams kyang // chu la nya ldang tshul snang bzhin// 'od kyis ting 'dzin shugs kyis 'gro/ gang zhig 'di las gnas gyur na// dam tshig spyod sogs 
422a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsor ma gsungs// rang bzhin nyid mthun rang bzhin rdzogs// de phyir lta sogs khyad par 'phags// rnal 'byor ming gsum gzhung nyid de// dngos po de nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin ma log mngon byed pa// 
422a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi min rang gi mtshan nyid du// rang rig mngon sum gsal dus na// rang snang mtha' bral rgyun las grol// ye shes nam mkha' dbus mtha' med// de bzhin nyid gshegs yang dag rdzogs// tha snyad gnyis kyi chos
422a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ril// mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i brgyan// las yon ldan grub byed dang bral// dngos de nyid kyang mdor bstan na// chos sems yenas gnyis su med// thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs 
422a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// cir snang ce yang ma yin te// ba tsam bzhi byas dngos lhar 'dod pa'i// dngos po rnam drug la sogs pa// gang yang min phyir nges tshig ldan// yul bral gnyis med rang mi dmigs// kun bzad/ 
422a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis bstan dka' la// byed po chos can skad cig dang // sku snang rtogs pa'i rigs snang dang // brlabs dang cho 'phrul rdul snang ba// 'di la gdod nas yod ma yin// rig pa bzhi snang brlabs / 
422a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// bltas pa tsam ste bye brag med// rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyeni de bzhin// des na skye med 'gag sogs stong // bdag las gzhan pa mi snang zhing // bdag kyang 'di 'dra mi dmigs pas// 
422a8(rgyud 'grel): snang med stong pa chen por gsungs// gnyis bsdus brjod snang thams cad kun// mi 'gog sems la gzhal med pas// 'dogs snang brtags par rung ma yin// rnam pa kun ldan stong chen po/ 
422b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas pas kyang sngar sangs rgyas// snang gsum grags pa'i chos rnams kun// 'di las brtags nas brtags snang phyir// thams cad kun snang gzhi rtsar bshad// gang la'ang gdod nas 
422b2(rgyud 'grel): yod min pas// brtags rnams khyi bu sa khyi tshul gsungs// dus gsum chos kun gcig khyad med// sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung // thams cad sems gsal de bzhin nyid// 
422b3(rgyud 'grel): ma byas rgyun min phyogs med gsal// ye shes ming bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid// mtha' bral bsam pa'i yul 'das pas// thig le chen po gcig tu nyid// zer zug rgyun las ye nas grol// 
422b4(rgyud 'grel): don dam nor bdun gzhan 'dod pa'ang // gdul bya'i ngo de 'dod pa min// gang yang dam par mi lta na// ci bsams skyon med bya lam dang // rgya shes slu ba med pa bzhin// 'di la go las/ 
422b5(rgyud 'grel): yod ma yin// mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i phyir// bden pa gnyis kyi snyad las 'das// bzhi gnyis spros bral chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin gyis stong de bzhin nyid// gdod nas 
422b6(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med pa'i ngang // rigs bzhis nges pa don dam dngos// bla med mi gnas nges par 'dod// de nyid rang rig kho na'i phyir// stong nyid ye shes ngo bo las// byin brlabs snang ba 
422b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhir gyur pas// yid bzhin nor ltar rims snang ba// rjes thob la sogs theg pa'i gzhung // bden gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings// dngos kun ma bcos sems gsal ba// 
422b8(rgyud 'grel): ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid// 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang // shes bya khyad 'gyur don dam gsum// de sogs bltos brtags brjod bral ba'o// ming bzhi sogs mtshon shes 
423a1(rgyud 'grel): bya nyid// ye nas yin zhes ye shes kyang // gnas 'gyur lam dang 'bras skabs su// rgyu yi sa gnyis dang bzhir 'dod pa// yul phyir chu 'thun skabs cig ma'o// 
423a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal sogs stong nyid ye shes dang // don shes skabs kyi ye shes bzhis// don drangs kyis kyang khyad par 'gyur// kun ye rang rig shes gsal ba// cis kyang ma bsgri tha ma nges pa'i tshig// 
423a3(rgyud 'grel): rang byung rang rig mi gnas// skabs ming bzhi phyir gcig med la// chos kun ma 'dres bdag gsal phyir// ye shes rnam grangs bsam mi khyab// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi'ang // 
423a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes yul med cang mi shes// ma lus bdag gsal rtog med pa// ye shes ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o// // gang gis don 'di mthong gyur na// de bzhin nyid gshegs kho na 
423a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// ji bzhin pa'i dngos de bzhin// rtogs gnyis grol ba'i ye shes sku// ngo bo nyid rtag brjod las 'das// brtags sogs zad ka'i chos kun yang // sems phyir yod min ma 
423a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pas// blang dor byed dang don gyis bral// 'du shes rang bzhin ye shes kyang // 'du shes thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur// rang 'byung ye shes mngon byas pa'i// nyi ma bye ba 'od 
423a7(rgyud 'grel): brdal yang // dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas par bya byed med pa yi// chos ni rdul tsam yod min pas// sangs rgyas med pa'i tshe rabs gsungs// bskal pa'i 
423a8(rgyud 'grel): grangs dang tshe rabs su// dman pa'i blang dor ci byas dang // 'bring gis dmigs pas grol thob kyang // don 'di nyams su ma myong na// brtags pa nyid las ma gtogs par// 
423b1(rgyud 'grel): ya sas ba a sa ya mas paT sa tha rba tra ma sa nas sa sa gra ku sa ba ma ba 'as Ta mas sa sa sa krag yang lus bra ma ya ba sa ya ca

423b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa yang dag rdzogs// de sogs tha snyad tsam du zad// dman 'bras sku dang ye shes mchog/ dngos nyid shin tu rnam dag dang // gnyen med don bzhini rnam par shes// 
423b4(rgyud 'grel): ming gsum ldan 'di mchog gi gzhung // tshogs brgyad la sogs chos kun dang // dngos cig gsal bas tha dad pa// dngos med ye shes sna tshogs can// dngos nyid chos kun ldan bral 
423b5(rgyud 'grel): min// don 'di rnal 'byor mngon sum no// // mchog gis rang rig mngon sum du// rang grol gsal thob gnyis las 'das// ngo bo bsam rdzogs ril dang bral// sangs rgyas kyis 
423b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang bstan dka' ba// dman don gzhung gis ga la rdzogs// de'i rjes 'jug tshad dag kyang // dngos de nyid la rnam med kyang // rang bzhin las kyi rtsal rim pas// bcos phyogs sbyangs chud pas
423b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsal gyis// mi bzlog rim pa sngon bya'i phyir// gtan tshigs bzhis sogs rims bkod pas// dngos de nyid shes kun pa yang // brtsal bral bya med don ma rig/ rjes sogs ltos las khon

424a1(rgyud 'grel): yid ches tshad mar gsungs// ma lus sems phyir snang ma 'dzin// ci yang min phyir cir mi gnas// thams cad bdag phyir thob spangs med// bdag gzhan dan bral ca 
424a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gog/ lha skom 'bras bcas gtan tshigs mod// rgyas par mad bzhi me long dang // nges bdun nges zin gtan tshigs drug/ tshul gyis nges pa bcu gnyis sogs// gzhung mdo tshad mar 
424a3(rgyud 'grel): lta bar bya'o// gzhung ngan grib ma lta ba'i long thug bzhin// mi lus ma 'dres gzhung nub rmongs don du// la shan me long 'di ltas bsod nams gang // 'gro kun dngos po'i de nyid mngon byed/

424a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rtog rnyog ri bos mnan// rang rgyud rkyen gyis log srung ba// skye bo ba dang mu stegs pa// drug dang rtag chad snang bar 'gyur// dmus long tshul du skye bo bas// mtho yor mi ltar brtags 
424a7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba// dmyal ba'i rang sems me sogs snang // yaM dgas sdig sems mi gtsang snang // byol song ma 'grogs gyen zur snang // maul mthong yul 'di nyid snang // de bzhin lha min ga
