428a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya cher gzhan de na rdzogs par byed// gzhan la dmigs pa'i mtshan mo'i tshul// spar ba lta bu'i bdag don 'byung // de la sngags kyi kri ya bas// brtsad pa khyod kyi bden pa gnyis// so sor lta ba bden med de// / 
428a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i ye shes gnyis med la// re mos snang ba'i rgyus mi 'grub// de phyir rgyu 'bras 'khrul te 'gal// gal te kun rdzob sgyu ma nyid// don dam bden dang tha dad na// don dam bden par cig mi rung // / 
428a8(rgyud 'grel): cig la snga phyi snang mi rigs// shes pa gnyis kyi yu 'gyur bas// snga phyi re mos 'gyur snang phyir// lhan cig mi snang skyon du 'gyur// gal te ngo bo cig min na// phan tshun spangs te 'gal 'gyur zhing // 
428b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams dang ni 'brel med de// des na sangs rgyas sku mi 'grub// thams cad don dam 'ba' zhig na// tha snyad chad par 'gyur ba ste// sgyu ma tsam du'ang snang mi rigs// 'bras bu nyid la'ang tshogs// 
428b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung // lam gyi chos su'ang mi rung ste// bdag gzhan don kyang 'gag par 'gyur// gal te bden gnyis dbyer med na// rang gi tshig rtsal mi 'gal sdang // kun rdzob bden par cig ce na/ 
428b3(rgyud 'grel): don dam mtshan mar snang mi rung // de min don dam dang bsgoms nas// rjes la sgyu ma snang zhe na// don dam mtshan ma'i sa bon tsam// rigs pa ma yin gzhan yin na// kun rdzob rang bzhin can// 
428b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na// sgyu ma tsam du'ang mi rung 'gyur// de bas dmigs pa'i shes pa'ang // cig la phyed phyed bden rdzun 'gyur// khyed kyang bya byed med 'dod ces// bsod nams ci nus spyod byed 'khrul// 
428b5(rgyud 'grel): des nad dung shed ma byed// byis pa gtso mchog khyed rnams kyis// gsang ba nga la reg mi nus// de phyir khro bo ye shes sku// don dam dang nyid snang bar 'dod// snang ba'i don dam dbyer med pa// 
428b6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas ma bsgoms chos nyid dag/ grub pa bya phyir rjes 'thun spyod// de la chu 'bras 'khrul mi 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bka' lung nud// yo ga phyi pa rim pa gsum// bya byed rgyud 
428b7(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam pa rnam pa gsum// gdul bya'i shes rab dbang pos phye// de dag lta spyod khyad par 'gyur// bya byed kri ya'i don dam du// kun kyang dag pa'i chos nyid la// mtha yi dri ma ye nas med// 
428b8(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob rang bzhin rigs gsum du/ kun kyang dag phyir dug gsum gsum// lha'i dkyil 'khor yin par 'dod// ma grub tshul nas 'jig rten mchos// mthun par bya phyir rje khol lha// dam 
429a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig tshogs rdzogs byas nas// bshags dang mchod stong drug ldan pa'i// bzlas pas sdig sgribs dag pa'i sems// chu dang lta bur grub shar ba// lha mchog rgyu phyir lhas/ 
429a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsal smra// khrus dang spyod pa'i gtsang sbra spang // 'di la yogs rtsad pa'i don// kun rdzob lha dang rje khol na// chos nyid dang la bzang ngan 'gyur// rang bzhin dag par ci mi 'gyur// kun rdzob 
429a3(rgyud 'grel): don dam tha dad na// lha yang ye shes sku min te// bsgoms pas 'bras bu snang mi rigs// don dam dag rtogs kun rdzob tu// khrus dang gtsang sbra ci zhig sbyang // gal te bden pa re mos na// 
429a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i don du'ang mi rung la// rgyu 'bras mi mthun 'gal ba 'byung // ma grub cha yis khrus byed ces// lta spyod ya cha bdud kyi las// gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod pa ni// spyod pa bya ba'i rjes 'thun 
429a5(rgyud 'grel): par// lta bas rnal 'byor rjes 'jug phyir// rigs dang lta bas khyad par 'gyur// 'di la yang yogs bcad pa'i tshig/ spyod pa gol bas lta ba gol// lta spyod ya cha bdud du 'gyur// de min 
429a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs la nges med pas// grub pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor phyi ma'i 'dod pa ni// rang rig dngos stong mtshan ma gnyis// dbyer med dbyings dang ye shes so// byin rlabs rdo rje 
429a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyis// shar lta grogs po'i tshul du mchod// ma grub tshul gnas 'jig rten dag/ grogs la brten nas nor 'tshol mtshungs// spyod pa ting 'dzin gtsor byed pa'o// 'di la nang pas skyon brjod / 
429a8(rgyud 'grel): pa// gnyis med rnam dag ye shes la// rgyu nas bskur snang bden zhe na// rgyu yi ye shes skad cig 'gyur// de men 'byung 'jug cha yis na// bden pa res 'jog skyon 'gyur bas// ye shes sku du mi 
429b1(rgyud 'grel): rung ste// lhan cig mi gnas 'gal bar 'gyur// grogs po'i tshul du lta byed pas// tha dang bdag tu tha dad de// 'brel pa med pas mi 'grub dang // des na don nyid la yang skyon// gnyis pa yod 
429b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur cig ce na// rang la grogs su ltar mi rigs// des na bdag nyid chen po'i don// rang gi shes pa mthong ba min// ting 'dzin rtsor spyod dngos po mtha'// ji snyed bral ba'i theg chen med// 
429b3(rgyud 'grel): de min rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// dam rdzas 'dod yon sman pa rnams// chu yi mtshon bzhin spyod mi nus// de phyir gnyis med don la skyon// yang na shes pa gnyis 'gyur bas// cig la rgyud gnyis ldang mi 
429b4(rgyud 'grel): srid// des na khyod kyi lta spyod rdzun// lhun grub bka' lung skyed rdzogs gsum// thog mar bstan pa'ang rnal 'byor che// lus kyi dngos po gnyis sdus rnams// rang rig nyid phyir snang ba kun// ye nas 
429b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes su gsal ba// dkyil 'khor gnyis drug la sogs shing // snang ba nyid nas rang bzhin med// des na mtha'i skyon dang bral// snang stong bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// ngang las rig pa'i lhar bskyed 
429b6(rgyud 'grel): pas// tha mal rtog tshogs ma spangs dag/ gser 'gyur mun snang ji bzhin pa'o// cir snang rang gi rig pa'i phyir// lha dang lta ba yongs kyis med// ting 'dzin ye shes bskur shar bas// sus kyang 
429b7(rgyud 'grel): ma byas byed med de// ngo bo gnan nas 'ongs pa'ang med// des na bdag nyid chen por lta// spyod pa bzang ngan gtsang sme sogs// gang la chags sdang blang dor med// bde myong mi 'gog mi 'dzin phyir// 
429b8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis rgyun tu tshogs par byed// de la'ang rjes su rnal 'byor pa// skyon brjod khyod kyi lta ba'i don// mnyam nyid snang stong dbyer med dag/ yin na rig pas bskyed mi dgos// ye shes sku yang 'dus 
430a1(rgyud 'grel): byas 'gyur// gal te bdag gis bskyed pas na// snga bar bdag nyid ma grub bam// de min thug pa med par 'gyur// yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid// tha dad ye nas 'brel 
430a2(rgyud 'grel): med pas// skyed du'ang mi btub 'grub mi 'gyur// spyod pa blang dor med ce na// de nyid gtsor spyod blang dor nyid// rnal 'byor mchog gi brjod pa ni// mnyam nyid bdag nyid chen po ni// rang la rang gi/ 
430a3(rgyud 'grel): sgom ci dgos// bdag gis bdag la'ang dmigs rung na// mdzub mo rang la reg par rigs// tha dad rang gi tshig gis 'gal// gal te mi skom bya med na// rnam gsum rim pas smos ci dgos/ 
430a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag la mi'i krus// gzer la gzer bzhin 'byung mi rigs// yul med don la gtsor len pa// de nyid dmigs lta rtsa ba'i don// khyod kyang gal te lhun grub na// spyod dang 'phrin las dang len 
430a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul// bya ba med pas spyod do zhes// de nyid ched spyod thabs rten 'khrul// snang stong ye nas dag 'dod na// bsgrib pa gnas 'gyur dri ma'i tshul// blang dor med pa'i spyod byed na// de nyis dang len snyoms// 
430a6(rgyud 'grel): sam ci// kun kyang rang rigs sems yin na// dbugs byin dkyil 'khor skyed ci dgos// las bzhin 'grod na rtsal ba yis// lhun grub mdzad pa gal mthong // gu 'jo'i spyod dang ma bral phyir// rtsol ba'i 
430a7(rgyud 'grel): chu bor byed pa yi// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor 'dod pa yi// snang srid bzang mo'i mkha' klong la// ma skyes dkyil 'khor kun bzang shar// shar ba nyid na shar ba med// yab yum sras bcas sa bde chen// 
430a8(rgyud 'grel): po// ldan rdzogs sa la skad cig gis// snying po dran brjod skur shar ba'o// 'di la rim pa'i rtsol ba med// rgya mtshor nyi zla shar ba 'dra// don gnyis ma rdul rdzogs par byed// spyod pa blang dor med 
430b1(rgyud 'grel): par spyod// de ltar ma nus nyams mi lta// de lta gong mas skyon brjod pa// thams cad bde ba chen po la// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs 'dod na// mtshan ma'i skye skyed snyoms sam ci// khye'u bzhi rtog 
430b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung mo 'gal lam// mtshan mas 'gro don rdzogs 'dod nor// yab yum 'byed dang kha dog grangs// rtsol ba bde chen don de 'gal// de phyir bya bral mthong ba med// gal te ma grub pas byed na// rgyu 'a 
430b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul te 'gal bar 'gyur// don gnyis ma brtsal rdzogs she na// skad cig dkyil 'khor bskyed ci bya// rang gi bcings pa'i spongs pa khyod// bya byed don la btang snyoms byed// de nyid rtsol ba ma yin nam/ 
430b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul bral la dmigs par byed// de nyid yul dang yul can mod// bsam med dang la gsal bar 'dod// de nyid bsam spyod gtogs pa'i gzhi// bsgrub med dang la don du zhe // de nyid re dogs rtsa 
430b5(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// de lta'i spyod yul bems po yin// klong chen dang la thigs mi 'gyur// de dag skabs kyis rang rang gi/ lha la zhen pas ldongs pa yin// ltung ba'i phyir na gol sa che// des na gol bsgrib thun 
430b6(rgyud 'grel): mong ste// lta ba dmigs kyis dbul ba dag/ ye shes nyid la bdag tu 'dzin// rang la rang nyid yul du byed// don la don nyid rjes su 'breng // ye shes nyid la gsal bar 'dod// bdag la bdag nyid 
430b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod mtha' 'tshol// zin pa'i don la bsgrub par byed// bya bral nyid kyi bya ba med// bskrod med lam la bskrod par byed// mi dmigs pa la dmigs par byed// kye ma'o thugs rje'i gnas su rung // deng sang // / 
430b8(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi gang zag rnams// ma rig snying tog ma sol bas// lta ba'i la shan ma phyed cing // lta ba'i mche ba ma mthong bas// rgyud lung man ngag goms pa yis// rmangs dang rje dang rgyal 'dra la// kun rdzob 
431a1(rgyud 'grel): mi mnyam don dam mnyam// de skad smra ba'i dmus long dag/ khrel 'bru ma thub sa gzhi che// ma mthong tshul dang mtshungs pa'o// mig lta brtan pa'i 'di dag gi/ bza' bral dang 
431a2(rgyud 'grel): las gnas mi 'gyur// de nas bskal ldan skyes mchog bu// ma bgrod sa la gnas bya'i phyir// rdzogs chen nga'i don la ltos// yod med stong pa'i mtha' la thud// kun gyi sku mchog ye shes zhal// 
431a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dongs pas rmongs 'khrul dug gsum gyi// snying khrag 'thung zhing kun gzhi nyid// gtan nas phung byed ngal thud// zad pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me 'bar ba// mi zad 'jigs gzugs mnga' bar la 'dud// 
431a4(rgyud 'grel): bskal ba'i chu chen rab tu 'khrugs pa 'bum// 'jigs byed des kyang ljags kyi mtha' ma snabs// khrag mtsho mtha' med bskams la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thor rlung drag pos 'jig rten kun g.yeng ba// des kyang 
431a5(rgyud 'grel): ra'i ba spu'i cha tsam bskyed mi nus// zil gnon sku tshad mnga' ba nga la thud// g.yo dang mi g.yo thams cad kun gsol ba'i// 'jigs byed nga lta bu la ji skad bya// sangs rgyas thams cad gsol bsang ma nos// 
431a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' gsol bas 'byugs tsam// da rung 'gro kun gsol byed sgribs shing skems pas ngal zud// 'on kyang ma spyod rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// lhag pa'i rnal 'byor lugs nyid kyis// 
431a7(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa med pa'i bslab pa nyid// bslab rnams 'jigs byed bslab pa'i mchog/ dngos po spyod cig mtha' mi tshol// don la mngon du 'dod pa med// gza' bral dang la gza' mi byed// bya med don la de 
431a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang // ched du len cing rtsol ba med// rang sems ci la'ang 'brang ba dang // 'dod pa'i sems dang ye nas bral// de nyid las ni 'gyur ba med// thig le chen po rgyal ba'i thugs// brtags na med la 
431b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams na snang // dngos med cha lugs kun la ston// rang bzhin cig tu ma nges pas// rdzas kyi rnam pa cig tu 'ang // log mthong drug dang yang dag dgu// cir yang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid// rang bzhin med/ 
431b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di 'dra rgyal bar brjod du med// gal te brjod kyang thebs mi 'gyur// sna tshogs snang ba nga'i sku// ji skad grags pa nga'i gsung // dran rtog rig shes nga'i thugs// sna tshogs snang la ngo bo 
431b3(rgyud 'grel): med// che ba lnga yis ye nas 'phags// thig le drug dang rang bzhin ldan// khams gsum bde sdug nga la rdzogs// de la bde sdug ngang gis bral// dus gsum rgyal bar nga nyid shar// de la byung shar gdod nas med/ 
431b4(rgyud 'grel): gza' ltas med pa'i rta mchog la// de nyid du yang lta ba med// gal te gdod nas dmigs lha mod// thams cad mkhyen pa sgom pa'i mchog/ ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// 
431b5(rgyud 'grel): mthul gnag na bsgoms pa yin// de la bzhag par bya ba'ang med// bya byed don la yid mi rtog/ de ltar gang shes ting 'dzin mchog/ dmigs pa'i skyon byung 'gog mi byed// don la gsal bas 'bad mi dgro// 
431b6(rgyud 'grel): drod rtags snang la re ba med// thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i phyir// snod bcud 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal// nyi zla 'od gsal byed 'dod pa'i// ji srid cir snang spyod pa kun// bdag nyid chen po'i mdzad 
431b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas// de nyid gsal bar spyod pa ste// de la spyod dang mi spyod med// 'gro don rgyun du ma byas rdzogs// yang dag sa la ma song phyin// tshogs gnyis ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs// ma bsgral stong 
431b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas su stobs// ma phul mchod pa kun la thim// ma blangs dngos grub rang la shar// ma bsrungs dam tshig nyams pa med// ma nor thams cad rang dbang sgyur// maltas lta ba kun tu gsal/ 
432a1(rgyud 'grel): mab sgoms nyid 'dzin yengs pa med// ma bcos rnam rtog lnga 'phrul bram// ma bsgrubs 'bras bu bdag nyid ce// ma sbyangs dus gsum 'du 'bral med// ma sbyangs bsgrib pa sa 
432a2(rgyud 'grel): nas med// ma bzung thugs rjes kun na bsgrubs// des na byas zin bya ba med// bya ba gang yang 'gog pa med// de sa sus rtogs bris pa'i mchog/ bye med brtson 'grus par chad pad// skyes mchog 
432a3(rgyud 'grel): ba zhi 'di ltar sa// thams cad snang ba 'i sam// thig pa mtho ldan ji blad pa// 'od// blang ngas dang // brnam pa dge rgyung rgyas byas cing // nga dang mthongs pazhin// des nAnang 
432a4(rgyud 'grel): can nam // mthong bzhin na // go ba'i yulan bde ban// de 'jig na dang ben med// desbyid na ba dag dzig da yin// bdag nyid can po dad nangs pa stan// jibani 
432a5(rgyud 'grel): rnying po la// bsgrub bya spyan rdzogs bla med pas// nga zhes mang du skad par zad// don dungs 'di 'dran sa// dang sa gzhi bstan par nus pa med// brtan nas dngas par 'dzin byed cing // drug ca 
432a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gar myong nan pa sa// ming pa din mgol bar gsungs// shin tun 'byor chen po nyid// dngos bzhin dang gad nas bral// 'jig rten pal pang spang sa med// rtag cad gnyis miganas 
432a7(rgyud 'grel): mAnan sa gnas pa dang// da dmas rnas // phyogs pa thams ma sgrubs// mazang ba nga mamang // brtan ma ldan phrul bzlag// sa med dan/ 
432a8(rgyud 'grel): car mi na// klur brgyad zad nam rtsam pas// mag sa nang sa sa snang// bra ma da thaba' rdzogs/ rnam pa dus gdu ba byed// de de sa bdag 'an// 
432b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rtog pa'o// snying rje med pa'i gang zag rnams// deng sang dus na'ang 'byung ba dag/ kun bzang tshig tsam smra byed cing // sted med don dang mi ldan par// de ltar lta ba'i 'dir rtog pa'o// rgyu 'bras 
432b2(rgyud 'grel): don la yid 'byung zhing // tshig tsam lta la rten pa dag/ sdeng med spyod cing 'chol ba'i sgras// bskab par bskal pa ci spyad kyang // snying po'i don dang 'phred mi 'gyur// des na zab mo'i spyod pa mnos/ 
432b3(rgyud 'grel): ci spyad kun bzang sprod par 'gyur// sdeng chen don dragang ldan pa// rnam par dkar spyad spang mi bya// bsam gtan ro mchog rlung gnas kyang // 'gro ba'i bla ma spyi bos bkur// stong gsum sangs rgyas sa nas 
432b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // snying rje'i den dang bral miH// t+ye shi med pa'i rdzid ldan yang // sems can thom 'dra'i srog mi gcod// 'du 'bral med pa'i don rnams kyang // 'jig rten 'phyog yem las mi bya// rang bzhin ma 
432b5(rgyud 'grel): nges don shar yang // don du mi 'gyur rdzun mi bya// bdag nyid thig le'i nga gnas kyang // pha rol rdzas la bsam mi bya// khro gtum dang zung 'khrug pa'i bdud// snang ba'i yul nas bya ba med// de nyid dngal 
432b6(rgyud 'grel): de med phyir// rjes 'jug de yang de bzhin no// de bzhin mi spyod de dag gang // rag sha yag sha'i rgyud 'dzin pas// theg chen rigs su gang chud pa// rnal 'byor chen po'i ming ci yod// sangs rgyas sa/ 
432b7(rgyud 'grel): ches spang thag yan// bye byed rnal 'byor mchog sdod pas// spang med shes nas dkar phyogs kyang // tshad du bya ba med cen// thaMg las mi bya smos ci dgos// ldan grub spyod dang bya bral spyod// thugs rje/ 
432b8(rgyud 'grel): chen pa'i mdzad spyod dang // nam yang bral bar ma byed cig/ de ltar rtogs dran spyod pa'o// gol sle balhung gnas g.yangs sa yang // spang du med de thig pa'i dbyings/ lhung dang ma srung bri skad bras/ 
433a1(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid don la ma bcos na// me dang dud ltar ltang sgrib 'byung // gang du 'du shes ma skyes pas// grol dang ma grol ming ci yod// kun du rgyu la 'jigs pa 'byung // phyin pa med na/ 
433a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs dang bral// des na gang la dogs mi bya// re ba'i sems spyod de bzhin te// re dogs med pa'i don chad bstan// gang dag dmigs pa dngos 'dres pa'i// lding thog bsal phyir thugs 'dra 
433a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis// rab rib nad bral rdzogs chen sku// mngon mthong kun gyis mchog thob shog/ pho dreg phyi la dang 'thung 'khrug/ bcos dka' gdung bral gdong 'das can/ dad med chags bcings spu brid
433a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhan// sems med yal 'jog rnal 'jog byed// lci ba'i sems bral rang gar spyod// byil ma nor chung mtshad rdzogs po// lce mkhan thabs 'bru zol pa la// snying sgor byung yang bstan mi bya// g.yu'i 
433a5(rgyud 'grel): tha mgras dgu rdzogs so// / bi ma las phan yul du gzha' la gtad do// I// / rtswa dru ba log/ 'i bcwabathapa bathugs so+o/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ ma ya dza lin ta a dar sha sA d+ha na/ bod 
433a6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba me long lta bu'i bsgrub thabs/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan gnyis med sgrib pa spangs pa yi// ye shes rang rig gsal ba'i mkha' dkyil nas// dkyil 'khor 
433a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang 'gro don sprul pa yi// ma lus thugs su chud la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gzhung lugs las// 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i phyir// ye shes skyed pa'i sgrub thabs 'di// rgyud bsdus bdag gis rtsam 
433a8(rgyud 'grel): par bya// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid mi rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsal ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra brtags ming tshegs la// 
433b1(rgyud 'grel): brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon nas// khong nas gab sras don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung // snod ldan dang 
433b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod stong la sbyin// slob dpon mnyes par byas pa dang // sgyu 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dam tshig rnams ni rdzogs pa yis// 'dod dang g.yeng ba kun spangs// 
433b3(rgyud 'grel): te// dka' thub spyod pas ma gdungs par// ting 'dzin mthun pa'i sa phyogs su// rab bde'i stan la 'dug nas ni// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms mang po rabasgoms nas// sems 
433b4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub bya zhes// bdag nyid bsam pa bstan byas te// rang nyid sa bon 'od zer las// sprul pa mchod pa'i tshogs spros nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor 
433b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams dang // bla ma phyi sogs rnams kyis mchod// de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang // skyabs 'gro la sogs byas nas ni// bgeg rnams ma lus gzhom pa'i phyir// sna tshogs rdo rje hUM las skyes// 
433b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sa gzhir bsam par bya// rnam rtog 'du shes kun spangs nas// bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod mi 'gyur// de bas rnam rtog bgegs yin par// yang dag rigs pa nyid kyis gsungs// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi 
433b7(rgyud 'grel): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// de ltar stong nyid rab gsal nas// snying rje yum// 
433b8(rgyud 'grel): kyigyis spangs nas ni// sa bon shin tu gsal bar 'gyur// rab tu brtan 'gyur a kar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur ba// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// 
434a1(rgyud 'grel): de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// bstan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// de nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i// 'og min/ 
434a2(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung bsam par bya// de nas yaM las byung ba yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de steng yi ger ma las ni// me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de yi steng du bam bsams te// de las chu'i 
434a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ro// chu'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// laM las ye shes sa gzhir brtag/ b+haM bi shA bi shud+d+ha// b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yas khang// ye shes rin po che rang bzhin// rgya rnams yongs su ma chad 
434a4(rgyud 'grel): pa// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rgyas pas// kun tu gru bzhir gnas par 'gyur// lhag pa'i ye shes blo'i bur mdzes// thams cad ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir// rtse mo kun tu 'dus pa yin// ye shes 
434a5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs las grub pa'i// rin chen la sogs bye brag gi/ bsam mi khyab pas smras par 'gyur// rnam par thar pa'i sgo khyud la// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs ldan// kun nas skor ba'i kha khyer la// rol mo// 
434a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sprin dpung bzhin// phyi dang nad med kun tu nang // 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// thu chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyabs dang // dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// dbus su mi 'jig/ 
434a7(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i khri// brgya byin gyi phyogs glang po'i gdan// rdzu 'phrul rta ni gshin rje'i phyogs// dbang gi rma bya chu lha ste// thogs med mkha' lding gnod sbyin phyogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal nyi zla dang / 
434a8(rgyud 'grel): chags med pad+ma so sor mdzes// gzhan yang nyi zla pad+ma dang // gdan ni sum brtsegs dag tu gnas// seng ge'i gdan gyi dbus su ni// dam pa'i yig sa bon bsam// de nas pad+mo rdo rje brtag/ 
434b1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i snying pos mtshan par bya// de la sangs rgyas sku ni spro// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnamasu// sems can don ni mdzad nas su// phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las// kun bzangs yum dang 
434b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ni// zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing sdang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis brgyan gyis mdzes// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbargyan can// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros pa las// sprul pas sems can don rnams 
434b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// kun tu bzang mo 'jo sreg tshul// in dra ni la'i kha dog 'dra// rgyan dang dab rgyan yab dang mthun// phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstan// g.yon pa dril 'dzin yum laM 'khril// dbu ni 'dzi zhing 
434b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dud pa'i tshul// de nas yongs su spyod nas ni// gnyis med chags pa sbyor ba'i sgras// de bzhin gshegs pas kun bsdus nas// yab la de bzhin gshegs rnams thim// rdo rje lam nas byung nas 
434b5(rgyud 'grel): ni// yum kyi pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'dulas// ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yi// de nas rjes su chags pa yi// sems can ma lus bsdus nas su// dkyil 'khor gyi 
434b6(rgyud 'grel): rol 'khod nas ni// de dag 'jug par gsol ba 'debs// gsol ba brjod pa'i tshigagasan nas// thams cad dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'od kyis reg ma thag/ thams cad dang nyid 
434b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shes// de ltar rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis// rang lus sangs rgyas shes nas ni// ngo mtshar tshig kyang brjod par byed// e ma rdo rje phung po yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// 
434b8(rgyud 'grel): skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki/ me rlung gos ni sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas 
435a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid la gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mnyes so// 
435a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ngo mtshar tshig brjod nas// de nas yid bstan bya ba'i phyir// gnyis med kun tu bzang po yis// ched du brjod pa 'di dag brjod// e ma phyogs bcu stong khams yo nas dben// srid pa 
435a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas tshes mi btsal// nyid la'ang gzhan 
435a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi mnyes so// de nas rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams// so so'i zhing du 'khod par byas// yongs sbyangs gsung gi yig 'bru ni// yab kyi thugs kar 
435a5(rgyud 'grel): thim gyur nas// yum gyi pad ma'i chags blan gyis// yab yum gnyis med dkyil 'khor thim// de ltar rgyal ba snyoms zhugs nas// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs mngon dran te// rgyu cig pa dang yig 
435a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu gtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal par nges// de ltar rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// rgyal ba'i sku ni mngon bskyed 
435a7(rgyud 'grel): pa// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// sku gsung thugs kyi dbus gsum ldan// ye shes drug gi phyag nyid la// rdo rje pad+ma ral gri ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// dril bu 'khor lo rin chen 
435a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// g.yon gyi ye shes phyag na bsnams// g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar bstan// g.yon pa dril bus yum 'khyud// thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ni// mnyam pa'i btul zhugs skyil 
435b1(rgyud 'grel): krung bzhugs// mdun dang rgyab med kun tu zhal// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis spras// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen las// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'phro// rgyal ba rigs lngas

435b4(rgyud 'grel): bkod de// lce la a ni rab tu gnas// snying galte ba chu sor na// hUM dang swA hA rim bzhin dgod// mig dang rna ba sna dang lcer// k+Shi traM hi dzaM rim bzhin bsam// me shrI hAM mr-i dang bzhi/

435b7(rgyud 'grel): du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ bdag gi sku gsung thugs la ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhugs par gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ 
435b8(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ga badz+ra sa b+hA ba ad mako haM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako haM// de ltar sku gsung thugs gsum du// nga rgyal dbang du skyed nas ni// yum gyi sku'i dkyil 
436a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dgod// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin muM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// spyi bo mgrin pa gnyis su ni// laM dang maM ni rim bzhin 
436a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// snying ga lte ba chu sor ni// muM dang pyaM dang taM rnams dgod// mig dang rna ba sA la// hAM tri hri a rim pa bzhin// mig rnasA lce'i phyi rol tu// dzaHhUM baM hoHrim bzhin bsgom// sku gsung 
436a3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs yab ji bzhin// de nas yum ni byin brlabs bya// oM AHhU~M swA hA lnga// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar yab yum sku rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam sprul phyir// gnyis/ 
436a4(rgyud 'grel): med chags pa'i sbyor don du// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// hU~M las rdo rje rab tu shis// oM las 'byung ba'i nor bu bsam// a las pad+ma skyed par bya// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad 
436a5(rgyud 'grel): mgo haM/ bskon pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// byang chub sems kyi byin brlabs las// tha sogs 
436a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge sprul par 'gyur// sa bon mtshan mas sku rnams rdzogs// sum cu drug gi dkyil 'khor du// de nas 'gro ba rmongs pa la// bstan phyir dkyil 'khor gdon par mdzad// badz+ra d+hi ga/ mu d+ha du shA 
436a7(rgyud 'grel): ri// mi bskyod yab yum ston nas ni// bdag nyid la ni thim par 'gyur// au dzi na dzi ka/ swa rad na d+h+rig/ aM a ro lig/ ha prad na d+hig la d+h+we sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ s+pho rA ga ra ti/ tau badz+re ra 
436a8(rgyud 'grel): ti/ krI hi ra tsa ya/ tri a ka ra pa ya/ hri pad ma da ma/ dzi ku ru pa na~M hi/ hU~M la se sa ma ya tAM/ tre ma le sa ma ya ho// tri gir ti ho haM/ a nir ti ra ga ya mi/ med ra ni swAhA/ th+liM swa pa ya swAhA/ 
436b1(rgyud 'grel): hAM sA ra tsa ya swAhA/ muM shri aM ra ga ya swAhA/ dza dra pa pra be sha ya/ hU~M pus pa a be sha ya/ baM di pa swa ki ni/ ho gan+de ni ta ho/ hU~M ya mAn+ta krid phaT/ hAM bi g+ha nA nu krid phaT/ hU~M pad+mAn+ta krid phaT/ hU~M pradz+nyAn+ta/ 
436b2(rgyud 'grel): kr-i da~M phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM rat+na d+ha ra mai hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma da ra ma hA kr-i ti shwa ri dz+wa la~M ni hU~M phaT/ oM karma d+hi ra ma hA kro ti Tha dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badz+re tsi ti 
436b3(rgyud 'grel): oM/ a a a badz+ra pa tra sa ya a/ so so'i sngags kyis ston nas ni// brgya byin la sogs phyogs su gnas// mthing ga dkar po ser leb rgan// ljang gu'i mdog tu tshor ba yi// gtso bo gdan la rdzogs pa'i 
436b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul// 'khor rnams sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs// so so'i sku mdog yab dang 'thun// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs 
436b5(rgyud 'grel): su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed myong byed snom byed rnams// btsun mo yin tshogs dang bcas// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyung

436b7(rgyud 'grel): sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mu sgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs/

437a1(rgyud 'grel): bkan// lam bsgreng rtse mo'i dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkran/

438b8(rgyud 'grel): cad ma lus thams cad sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho// de ltar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// skyed pa yongs su 
439a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byas te// slar yang bdag gi thugs kar bsdu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gtad sbyar gnyis sam yang na lnga/ 
439a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te dad pa ldan zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyis yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la 
439a3(rgyud 'grel): rab brtson na// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang skyar rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drag tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes 
439a4(rgyud 'grel): thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang bas// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// zhing khams rnam dag gzhal yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal
439a5(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // 'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar bsnyen pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang // 
439a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// gcig dang du ma bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtogs rtags rnam dag cing // ye shes 
439a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las mi zhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // de ltar rgyal mchog dpal ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang bsgrub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor 
439a8(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 
439b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul du rig pa rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po 
439b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas ltar shing // snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yi// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// 
439b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgyu ma dang snang ba// rim mo'i dasngal 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i dzin rjid kyi byangs// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs brgyangs bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yan 
439b4(rgyud 'grel): tan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan gyis grub// rgyun du dkyil 
439b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnam sbyor bas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu mo'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba'i phyir// 
439b6(rgyud 'grel): bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung sku lnga lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'da' bar 
439b7(rgyud 'grel): mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su 
439b8(rgyud 'grel): dgongs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes bsgom pa'i gnas// mkha' dkyil dang ba'i dbyings ni zla// ye shes rgyal po yab yum bsgom// gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam 
440a1(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgya rab bstan pa// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas su// spyod lam rnam pa 
440a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas kyang // snang ba'i dngos po so sor snang // lha'i dkyil 'khor nyid du lta// yang dag sbrum la sogs tshul// zas la sogs pa bza' ba ni// rgyal ba'i byin brlabs mngon bsdus 
440a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// bdud rtsi lngar ni byin brlabs te// lce'i dbang po rab sbyangs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs kar ni// rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams tshim par bya// dam tshig nyams pa tshul bzhin bshags/ 
440a4(rgyud 'grel): yang na rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// byin brlabs kyis ni rnam par spangs// sems can thams can mthong ba na// snying rje byams pa'i sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas nyid du bya'o zhes// smon 
440a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems ni khyad par can// blo can gyis ni rtag tu bya// de ltar dus bzhi'i nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor tshul la gnas pa yin// bdag gis mi shes rmongs pa gsal don tu// sgyu 'phrul gsang don 
440a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs 'di byas te// bdag blo chung bas nor dang 'khrul mchis pa// 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol/ 'di las bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa// 'gro ba blo zhan rnams kyis 
440a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kun ni// stong nyid sgyu ma lta bur rab rtogs nas// ye shes gnyis med sku gsum thob par shog// sgyu 'phrul dra ba me long lta bu'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon chen po dz+nyA na dza yas mdzad pa'o// 
440a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rje sems dpa' gyu drum dpa'i da kyi sa pazhes kyapa bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ satwa badz+ra ma ya dzA kra ma pra ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'od kyi rim 
440b1(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag gis// mthar byin lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskam thabs rim pa mdo tsam nagi// legs par btus te bstan 
440b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// martogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtags// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgras brtags mi tshogs 
440b3(rgyud 'grel): la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon la// khong nas kab sngas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs gnas phyir// mnyes pa'i thabs kyis zin par bya// thos pasam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ 
440b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung // snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gang la gsang chen 'di yod par// me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing // spr-i gri'i sa 
440b5(rgyud 'grel): dag gtams pa la// 'dzegs pa bu dag 'gro bar gyis// khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du// chags kyi sbom bu la bsdam mo// slob dpon nges par mnyes byas shing // sgyu 'phrul ri mo'i dkyil 'khor du// 
440b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang rnams thob par byas pa dang // ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// mnyams shes shing yo byad ldan// sngags dang tshi g.yan lag kun// chang 
440b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing lam la goms 'dod pas// khe grags 'dod g.yeng kun spangs te// dka' thub gdung bas mnyes par// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ldan tshogs par bsgrub// ri bo dben 
440b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas mchog ni// me tog shing dang bab shis bya// spen pa'i sgra ldan par chad med// chub chub nas shar 'bab cing // bar sdang mtshams sa ma dkri ni nyung // rnal 'byor srud li dgas med pa/ 
441a1(rgyud 'grel): yo byad btsal sla mchog yin te// yon tan bzlog pa spang bar bya// bsam spyod mthun pa'i sa phyogs der// sa'i bya ba rgyas byas la// stod byed mgon rnams tshim byas
441a2(rgyud 'grel): te// ji ltar 'dod pa bgo bar bya// bu mchog gzhug pa'i las rtsom pas// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga yi// tshad ldan stegs bu bcu gsum byug/ thig g.yog grogs mar ldan byas la// thig gdab 
441a3(rgyud 'grel): chog phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// phur bu sra dbu tshon phyer ldan// rab tu gnas byas byin ldan pas// 'og gi rtsibs bzhi pho brang lnga// cha chen cha bran gsal ldan b+ha/ 
441a4(rgyud 'grel): bco brgyad gnyis kyi pho brang du// dkar dmar thig le gdan byas pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// gshegs gsol byin ldan rin chen mtshon// nyi shu ru lnga'i mtshon ldan pas// lte ba'i cha byed tshul bzhin bri// bcos 
441a5(rgyud 'grel): bu ras ni sna tshogs dang // rgyan 'phreng btung ba'i bro ldan pas// dag par sbyangs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag gzhan don phyir 'byor pa 'bul// dbang phyug thog mar rigs pas 'jug/ dkyil 'khor gsol gdab gnang zhugs
441a6(rgyud 'grel): bar// bu mchog ser sna spangs pa nyid// gzhug skar langs bzhin rdzogs par bya// yang na dpag tshang rgyang grags te// ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor du'o// rnal 'byor 'dris goms 'dod pa yis// 
441a7(rgyud 'grel): tshad med thugs rjes 'gro sbal zhes// dam bcas bstan te 'phar bstan nas// khams bsangs lus kyi lugs bzhin 'dug/ rang gi snying gi sa bon zad// 'phros pas bde gshegs mdun grangs 
441a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bul// bla ma kun gyi yab phyir bsam// phyi bsogs nang gi lha mos mchod// phyag 'tshal mchod bstod bshags pa dang // yi rang skyabs gsol sems bskyed bsngo// mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod 
441b1(rgyud 'grel): zin nas// sems phyir bdag la bsdus par bsam// bar chad bgegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// stong chen gsal ba'i rig pa nyid// skad cig sa bon rang gi ltar// gsal bas hUM sbrul 'gro 
441b2(rgyud 'grel): 'du las// zhe sdang rdo rje gsal ba yi// thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer las// mtshon cha rim spros bar chad bskrad// slar 'dus rim bzhin steng 'og gur// dz+wa la raM gyi me dpung 'bar// ji tsam 
441b3(rgyud 'grel): lcogs par mtshams bcad bya// ma rdzes chu bdag sa bon gyi// 'phro 'du bzlas te bsal bar sbyang // nyams chag bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// sgrub po rdzas bsags bgegs la gtor// 
441b4(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// dam bcas snyan po shar phyir ro// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT// bi shud+d+ha a mr-i ta hUM phaT// dar ma 
441b5(rgyud 'grel): a mr-i ta hUM phaT// thams cad dag gyur bdud tsir gyur// srid pa phyi nang 'byung tshul gyis// snod bcud dkyil 'khor bskyed byas te// tshe 'pho yul bral bar ma'i lus// sgyu snang ming gzugs 'brel
441b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bzhin// ting 'dzin gsum yang rim bzhin skom// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pas// rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de phyir dngos po dngos 
441b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o// oM ma ha shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM// de nas snying rje chags pas bskul// lus dang ngag sems chos thams cad// gang na'ang ni mi dmigs pa// mig yor tshul du sbyor 
441b8(rgyud 'grel): ba yi// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// yi ge mchog ni 
442a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// a/ rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel grib med par 
442a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal bar 'gyur// smra zhing bsdu ba de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// ma dmigs stong chen gzugs brnyan a// yid 
442a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis nam mkhar gsal ba las// snying sgog lte ba 'gro mdo rlung // las bzhi lus bzhin e mthing las// 'phro 'dus chos kyi 'byung gnas bsam// de steng yaM las gzhu dbyibs rlung // dud ka baM dkar 
442a4(rgyud 'grel): tshwa dkyil bzlum// laM ser re rab ser rgyas dbyibs// de steng raM las ye shes me// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bruM du 'phro// mongs 'gyur ye shes gzhal yas khang // ye shes rin chen rgyu gas byung /

442a6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan brgyad rdzogs phyir// rta rkang chu skyes rin chen sgom// snam 'phyo bzhi las zer chags// rin chen sgril 'chang shar bu khyung // rims bzhin dbyibs mdog mdzes par ldan// tha snyad

442a8(rgyud 'grel): mas kun g.yogs par// ye shes rtsig ste se gol gtams// mi 'jigs kha nas mu ti ga ha ra// pha khu mdzes pa'i bad dang ldan// dra ba dra phyed 'gul 'khor bar// gzugs sogs lha mos 'khrigs/ 
442b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// sna tshogs mchod byed rol mo yis// bar snang khams su sprin dpung bzhin// sgo bzhi g.yas g.yon ljon shing dang // dpag bsam shing zung tsong tsong 'phel// dril bu g.yer gzeg

442b4(rgyud 'grel): se ge brgyad dang ldan// shar phyogs lte bar stobs glang che// lho rdzu 'phrul rna brgyad steng // nub kyi pha brang rma byad dbang // byang du 'phrin las shang shang brgyad// khri gang bar mdzes pad ldan pa// nyi ma zla ba lnga brtsegs ldan//

443a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par bskyed// tha snyad bdag phyir bdag las skyed// de gshegs rigs las shar ba'i phyir// rgyal ba bdag gi sras gyur te// sgyu'i 'khor

444a1(rgyud 'grel): baM rag rA ti/ oM badz+ra dar ma tri/ oM badz+ra gir ti hri/ oM badz+ra ti gas+t+ra traM/ oM badz+ra u lo ge hri/ oM badz+ra tsa tra hri/ oM badz+ra s+pho ta hri/ oM badz+ra pa sha hri/ oM badz+ra a lo d+hi/

444a3(rgyud 'grel): a gu sha dza dza/ oM badz+ra pa sha hUM/ oM badz+ra po ta paM/ oM badz+ra gan de ho/ oM hU~M hU~M hUM/ badz+ra tsi ta oM/ a a a badz+ra ba tra sa ma ya/ oM/ oM nun kring swA hA/ oM mun praM swA hA/ oM mu ne br-i swA hA/ 
444a4(rgyud 'grel): oM mu ne s+yA ma s+yAt+ma/ oM mU ne krA swAhA/ oM mun+de ya swAhA/ oM badz+ra kro ta d+hA ka rA/ hU~M phaT/ pro ti shwa rikA ya te hUM/ oM badz+ra kro ta bi hUM phaT/ kro ta sha ri la sa ga hUM/ oM badz+ra kro ta ni ladat+ta hUM phaT/ 
444a5(rgyud 'grel): k+Sho ti shwa ri pra ti dza hUM/ oM badz+ra kr-i ta ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri ta na baM ti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro Ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ kro ti shwa ri mu ha la hU~M/ oM badz+ra kr-i ta ta ya grI ba hU~M phaT/ kro ti sho ri tsan d+ha he ya 
444a6(rgyud 'grel): dz+haiM/ oM badz+ra kro ta a pa ra tsi ta hUM phaT/ kr-i ti sho ri sha ya bya ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ kro ti shwa ri ba ya ba ti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro ta tre log kya bidz+ra ya hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri ma ra nat+taM/ 
444a7(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri tsin ta mu ne hUM/ de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal ston pas// so so'i gnas su rgyas par 'god// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'joms dang 
444a8(rgyud 'grel): thub pas brkyang skum bzhings// 'khor lo'i dbus la rgyal po yum// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon phyogs bzhi ru// sems dpa' sems ma rigs bzhin gnas// bar byams la ni thub pa drag 
444b1(rgyud 'grel): rkyed drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// shar lho lha dang lho phyogs mi// lho nub byang nub yi dgas byol// byang dang byang shar lha min dmyal// mdun rgyab bya byed yab yum gtso// sgo khyud bsrung 
444b2(rgyud 'grel): pa khro mo ba ni// bskal pa'i me la khro zung bcu// phyogs mtshams srung ba'i tshul du gnas// de kun byin dbang nus ldan pas// 'gro don bya phyir tshul bzhin bsam// oM ma hA shu n+ya tA gzha' 
444b3(rgyud 'grel): na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma go haM/ oM ma ha a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko ta/ oM maha sa man+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA pra ta pra be sha dzA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ ma hA kri ta a nA ta na 
444b4(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ 
444b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbang skur thim par 'gyur// byin brlabs rab tu gsal bar 'gyur// rin chen smag po gnas cig tu// mtshon gang sems dpa' 'od ldan pa// thugs kyi sa bon brlabs pas 
444b6(rgyud 'grel): bsor// kun gyi bdag nyid dkyil du bsam// thub drug sprul pa rab byung phyir// byin brlabs dbu brgyan ma gsungs so// mthing kha dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu kha dog gsal 'tsher 
444b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// sems dpa' rnams ni rigs kyi tshul// ser dang dkar thid ser nag dang // dmar nag dud ka thub pa'i sku// sngo ser dmar ldang sgo bsrungs sku// khros pas bsrung byir rtsa gnag pa'o// 
444b8(rgyud 'grel): mthing ga hUM chen rnam rgyal dkar// dbyug pa sngo la gshed mthing gnag/ mi g.yo ljang sngo rta mgrin dmar// 'dod rgyal dud ka bdud rtsi ljang // khams gsum dkar ljang stobs chen dud// khro bo rnams ni 
445a1(rgyud 'grel): khro dang mthun// kun kyang dur khrod chas ldan par// me dpung 'phros 'dus ldan pa'o// sku'i mtshan nyid dgu ldan te// mnyen lcug 'khril lde ma gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher 
445a2(rgyud 'grel): lhan sdug gzi brjid ldan pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// gtso gzungs 'phel ba'i phyag rgya ni// sor rtser 'chang ba thugs kar bstan// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dri// rdo rje lcags 
445a3(rgyud 'grel): kyu mdo' gzha brgya// rin chen myu gu nyi ma dang // rgyal mtshan sor 'phreng 'dzin pa dang // pad+ma kha 'byed ral gri dang // 'khor lo 'dzin dang lce 'dzin pa// ral gri rdo rje 'phreng ba dang // mche ba khu tshur 
445a4(rgyud 'grel): bcangs pa'o// me long pog phor lcags kyu 'pheng // rin chen me tog zhags gsil yab// bi bang mar me lcags sgrog gdongs// gar 'dzin spos dril rma bya bum// bseg gshar bar pu pi bang dang / 
445a5(rgyud 'grel): go cha mdung thung po ti rtsegs// rin chen sgrom bu me dang chu// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo dkyil// yang na rdo rje dril bu nyid// lcags kyu zhabs pa po ta ho// 
445a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ni mgo rdo rje stir// zhugs gling dang ni drang srong zhid// zhing dbyug gshin rje kaM bzung ba// ral gri bde bral stir dbyug gshog/ ba dan lte sbrang brgyad be ra ma thogs// ri ni chen mgo bo gsum gyi dbyug/ 
445a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse gsum ni 'go dang // thong ba shol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs// yang na phyag drug mngon par rol// khro mo'i g.yas ni gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rag ta ston pa'o// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 
445a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ phyogs dus kun nas/ 
445b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ha hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ka ru ni ka tri sha ho// sa ma ya stau/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ oM a hU~M swA hA/ 
445b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ba ba ba badz+ra dzA dz+wa dz+ra dz+ra dzA sa sa sa sa sa ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM aM hUM swAhA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mazham sbyor ba'o/ 
445b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho// sgo bzhir byin bstim brtan byas la// gnyis med phyag 'tshal tshogs phyir mchod// mi skyod 
445b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// tshom bu dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms
445b5(rgyud 'grel): na// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar san// hUM sbeng rtse rmor rdo rje 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ 
445b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar skan// muM sgreng rtse mor dril gsel 'bar// zhi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// rigs bzhi kun kyang gtso bo bzhin// g.yas g.yon 
445b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo oM l-i la// 'khor lo dris bu 'bar bar bsam// the bong gnyis la sra maM ste// rin chen dril bu rab 'bar ba// srin lag g.yas g.yon oM baM ste// pad+ma dril bu rtse la 'bar// the chung ha ti 
445b8(rgyud 'grel): ral gyi dril// 'bru sras bkan dang bstan 'khril pa'o// yang na rtsa skyed sngags kyis so// g.yas g.yon sor rtse ra hU~M traM hri// a sogs zung bzhi nyi zla ste// rims bsams gung mo rtse sprad pa/ 
446a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rdo rje yab yum mo// mdzub mo rtse spyad rin chen no// srin lag rtse sprad chos rdo rje// the chung rtse sprad las rdo rje// the bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// the bo gung mo rgyal 
446a2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dzin// sin lag the bong chags pa che// the chung the bor legs pa mchog/ g.yas rol hUM dza ho dang swa// mdzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog/ gung mo gnyis sbyar rin chen don// srin lag 
446a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sbyar rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzhad pa the chung sprad// taM dang he du sta rims bzhin// mdzub mo steng 'og rdo rje chos// gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog/ srini lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ 
446a4(rgyud 'grel): the chung steng 'og rdo rje smra// hri baM traM dang hi bzhi bsam// mdzub mo rgya gram rdo rje las// gung mo n+ya gr-i rdo rje bsrung // sran lag rgya gr-i gnod sbyin mchog/ the chung rgya gr-i khu tshur ro// haM hU~M a ba~M sor rtser 
446a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam// dza dang ho la sogs pa'o// gar du sbyar bas rdo rje 'chang // phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor byed par snang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs/ 
446a6(rgyud 'grel): gla gnyis phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen po ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis po// dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin// yi ge so sor
446a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba yis// gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// gseg par pi bang go cha dang // po ti sgrom dang me chu rgya// ji ltar gnas bzhin bca' ba ste// lcags kyu zhags pa dril bu sgrog/ yi ge gsal/ 
446a8(rgyud 'grel): bas bzung ba'i tshul// khro bcu g.yas g.yon nyid hU~M gis// gar du sbyar zhing rim bzhin gsal// dpel dang zhal gsil gsol mchod bya// mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang 
446b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i tshigs la 'bul// lha yang rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni 
446b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thim// shes par rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen po rtogs pa yis// / 
446b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs su yang ni sba bar bya'o// 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya'o// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// dga' ba chen po khyab par 'gyur// 
446b4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga na swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// thig le 'dres pas phyi nang gi/ lha mo spros te bdag nyid mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pu tsa badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen 
446b5(rgyud 'grel): bo na// sems kyi yid bzhin smin tshogs kyis/ snod dang bcud kyis dngos po kun// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sems phyir dbul// 'bras bu don gyi dgyes bya'i phyir/ 
446b6(rgyud 'grel): glu'i mchod pa tshul bzhin mchod// 'phags bstod sems can grol bya'i phyir// dung dang zangs dang mud rtsar// pi bang gling bu ke ko ta// pheg rdob rdza lnga pi bang dang // dgu po rgyud mangs 
446b7(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs sbyar// rgyal po 'khor bcas dgongs gsol te// tshogs phyir mchod pa rgya mtsho 'bul// rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyams chags bshags// las la don phyir 'phen las bcol// grub pa'i 
446b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dod don gsol ba gdab// phyi dang nang gi phra mo yis// rnal 'byor bsgrub phyir bzlas par bya// phyi rol yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i// dam tshig ye shes yig gsal bas// rnam gsum ma 'khrul tshul 
447a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzlas// oM hUM badz+ra satwa hUM/ badz+ra pra ban hUM/ mAM badz+ra gdan/ hUM/ oM badz+ra tsa tra ma da la oM/ laM badz+ra ga nad pa sha laM/ swa rad na pra ba ni sraM/ maM badz+ra gan d+ha 
447a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sha maM/ oM pad ma pra pa na aM/ baM badz+ra gan d+ha pra pa na paM/ haM khang rtig sna br-i pa na haM/ taM badz+ra ga na da pra pa na ba sha taM/ yang na bskyed dang zlas thun mong // nang du yab yum zhal sprod de// dgra bcom 
447a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i zlas pa yis// dbus kyi rtsa nyid 'phro 'du'i lam// zhal nas zhal dang mkha' nas mkhar// skor bas drug log bde myong du// bsnyen pa grangs dus mtshan ma yis// thabs kyi mchog tu 
447a4(rgyud 'grel): de gsungs so// rim par goms dang zhams ldan pas// rdzu skye'i tshul du skad cig gis// yongs su rdzogs par skyed byas te// de goms grangs med bslob byed pas// bdag gzhan las kun 
447a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i phyir// skabs kyis dang por brjod pa yin// de goms rigs 'dzin tshel sbyor// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// lus dang phung por bcas pa 
447a6(rgyud 'grel): yin// tshe la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin 'grub// rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshe nyid kyis// bla med kun du bzang gyur pa// lhag ma bcas dang lhag med pa'i// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshal nyid kyis// 'di dang 
447a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mar sbyor ba ste// dper na khyung dang seng ge bzhin// rnam smin rgya mdung grol ma thag/ bar ma ye shes sgyu ma'i sra// mngon mtho rig pa'i sal gnas// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga ldan 
447a8(rgyud 'grel): gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig leg de nyid la// ye shes thig le zhing snang ba'i// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ mngon 'gyur chu dang zhi bla bzhin// de nas longs spyod bde ldan pas/ 
447b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir yo byad lngas// sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas mchod pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug longs spyod de// sems phyir hU~M gis longs spyod pa'am// ye shes rol pa'i tshul 'chang ba// 
447b2(rgyud 'grel): tha ma la 'dzin grol de la sbyor// de phyir 'byor pa nan tan bskyed// bdag nyid mkha' 'gro 'dul byed pa// dbang phyug rgyal ba rigs lnga yi// bsam dang ldan pas lhag ma nyid// gzhung bzhin 
447b3(rgyud 'grel): btsal te tshim byas la// rjes su 'thun pa'i las stsol te// rang rang gnas su las dgye'o// rtag chad mtha' las grol bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rims bzhin snying la bsdu// mi dmigs dang 
447b4(rgyud 'grel): las gtso bor bskyed// bskyed pa'i rdzogs par bstan pa'o// bar chod dz+nyAn las grol ba'i phyir// rgya gr-i go dang khro lus byung // de nyid 'gro don nus ldan phyir// dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod 
447b5(rgyud 'grel): pan ldan// bdag nyid spyod lam 'gro 'dug nyal// longs spyod dus bzhir mnyam langs tshe// rig phyir thams cad dkyil 'khor ltar// gsal byas tha snyad zhen las 'das// phyag rgya chen po nyid du 
447b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de phyir le lo gzhid sbyangs 'bad// de ltar ting 'dzin skyo ldang na// rdzogs pa'i bsam pa sbyor bya ste// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// 
447b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub 
447b8(rgyud 'grel): sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po'i yul dus rig pa'i rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta shing // snying po'i thig la mazham sbyor bas// 
448a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod pa dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes snu ma rung snang // rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas 
448a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ de la sogs pa'i gdams ngag ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// de goms 'khor lo'i rims bsdus te// ma ta'i sgra la dmigs te 'dug/ de'i ngang las nang par dus// skad cig lha kun 
448a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs bsams te// bstod mchod la sogs rgyas par bya// rdzogs pa zhid du sbyor ba yis// na ta'i sgra yang mi dmigs sbyar// stobs 'gyur thams cad ye shes sras// skad cing rig la gsal mthong / 
448a4(rgyud 'grel): pa// rdzogs pa'i rdzogs par bshad pa yin// bdag nyid nam zhig 'pho ba'i tshe// ye shes su zhing gsal bstan la// 'pho ba'i sems stobs drag po yis// bar ma ye shes gzugs sur stor// 
448a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar goms pas snga ma bzhin// tshe dang phyag rgya lhun grub rigs// nges thob rdzogs pa'i sar sbyor ba// ye shes lha mo rol spyod dang // gsang ba'i rdzogs su byin brlabs kyis// skad cig ldan grub sa la 
448a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro// log par rtogs brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi zhan byir// thugs rje chen po 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas snang ba yang // mtho dman kun gyi gzugs snong yang / 
448a7(rgyud 'grel): bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang // lhun grub sku las ma g.yos bzhin// so so ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// rtog pa rnams la 'khor 
448a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus// thar pa'i cha ston rgyal po dang // tshangs dang lha chen tha dad snang // thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom lus// rang rgyal rnams la ba se ru'i tshul// 
448b1(rgyud 'grel): mos spyod mdo sder shAkya'i tshul// byang chub sems la rdzogs longs spyod// lhan grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings// zhi kho 'dul ba'i tshogs chen la// so sor mthun byas kun tA snang // dper na me long 
448b2(rgyud 'grel): chu zla bzhin// 'gro bong med la kun tu gsal// so sor mthun byas kun tu snang // dper na me long chu zla bzhin// 'gro bong med las kun du gsal// gsal nyid snum pa mig yor tshul// tshul zhing 
448b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las g.yos pa med// thar pa skul zhing ngan song sbyong // zhi ba phyogs cig shes bya sbyor// sa bcu mnyam par sbyor byed cing // tshogs gnyis yang dge rdzogs byed pa'i// rgyal ba'i 
448b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba nyid kyi sku// kun tu rin chen lta bu'o// sna 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi rgya mtsho las// gsang bas 'o ma'i tshul bzhin 'od kyi skas// rim pa'i bsgrub thabs gsal byed yi ge 'di// shes chung 
448b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs shar ba dag gis legs par btus// 'di la nongs 'gal ra chod gyur pa dag/ mi dmigs sems kyi dag pa'i klong du gshegs// de lta'i dge rtsal ma gnas rnal 'byor kun// bskyed rims 
448b6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin yang dag zhen grol nas// kun gyi thar lam mngon gyur don rdzogs te// mtha' yas 'gro don tshul bzhin byed par shog// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i skyed pa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin// dkyil 
448b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lnga'i dbang du sbyar ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag/ slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i man ngag/ 'od kyi rim pa// rdzogs so// // rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas// rdo rje 
448b8(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi phyag rgya che// 'jug dang dmigs pa las 'das pa'i// bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bshad do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang bskur ba'i// rgyud dang bden pa'i dbang thob pa'i// sngags pabacwo ldan dben dga' bas// sngon du bya ba 
449a1(rgyud 'grel): kun byas te// bar chad rnam gsum med pa'i gnas// rnyed nas cig pur gnas par bya// rang gi gzugs brnyan mdun bzhag la// slob dpon rgyal po rdo rje chos// zla ba 
449a2(rgyud 'grel): dza yis spyan drangs thim// bdug sogs mchod de thal sbyar la// rdo rje slob dpal sangs rgyas dpal// dus gsum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// mngon sbyar yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i// dag 
449a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// dngos grub chu bo gcod pa'i bgegs// nyes byas ma lus bshags par bgyi// phyogs bcu'i 'khor gsum dag pa'i chos// ma chags spyod la rjes yi rang // 
449a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa mtha' bzhi dri ma med// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// mchog gsum rten pa'i zhing gyur la// gnyis med yid kyis skyabs su gsol// tshe rabs bsnyungs pa'i las rnams kun// 
449a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te byang chub mchog tu bsngo// sgrub rdzas pad+ma'i 'brus sbyangs la// zla 'bru'i steng du hri zin par// hri yis nam mkha'i bdud rtsi dbab// sngags zlas bdud rtsi dkyil bar bya// oM badz+ra/ 
449a6(rgyud 'grel): tsi ta sa ma hUM hri tha// dngos rnams nyid ni dngos med par// rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o// de bzhin nyid 
449a7(rgyud 'grel): du gsal brtan nas// skyed pa'i phyag rgya rig pa nyid// a ma sbyar te bstan pa dang // 'od 'phros don byas byin brlabs te// gang ba'i nyi zla pad mor bcas// bstan pas gzhal yas rang 
449a8(rgyud 'grel): gsapas// sngon pa cu 'dag pa 'ad so// dbying ba sa dbyings kyim thumasas te// bzug pa dang bral pas bdag ra / 'di kyi thugs dran thasapas rgyab// tha 'du 
449b1(rgyud 'grel): par grol// rnam lngas rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya yin// brtan nas khams gsum skus bkang ste// dril bu thabs dang shes rab sku// zhal gsum phyag drug yang na gnyis// shu dzA ta sogs brgyad 
449b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags// rdzogs pa'i tshul du rdzogs dbang skur// zla stengs sgo gsum gsal ba'i 'bru// bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rlung bsdus te// dngos po sgo gsum phyag rgya gsum// dkar dmar thing ga dkyil 
449b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge/ phyogs bcu khyab pa'i hUM 'od zer// sgras bskul thams cad rdo rje bzhengs// rtse mo ljags kyus spyan drangs la// e ha hi zhes dgug ste bstim// hUM dza s+pho ta ho yis bzhug/ mchod de 
449b4(rgyud 'grel): rdorje'i zlas pa bya// khams gsum dbang phyug mun gnas la// spro ba gsum gyis gsal gdab bskul// rdo rje gsum dongos 'dus pas stim// rdo rje chos kyi gzi 'drar 'gyur// zla drag de bzhin lo zla bzhi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs la 
449b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas te// brtson 'grus yu ba bcad pa bzhin// rdo rje nyid 'gyur the tshom med// dbang po rnam gnyis byin brlabs 'khyud// rdo rje'u bas mkha' bgang ste// thig le ba spu'i bu gnas// 'dod pa 
449b6(rgyud 'grel): drug dang tshim pa bzhin// spros nas ma lus bdag nyid mnyes// pu tsa badz+ra sngags kyis thob// de bzhin mnyam pa'i bsgrub rdzas dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis thim par dbul// dngos po 'bru gsum 
449b7(rgyud 'grel): blangs nas su// rdo rje lde gzhag dngos grub 'gyur// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thi le kun rdzogs 
449b8(rgyud 'grel): ho// oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho// oM su gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu 
450a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// ye shes lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho// oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// 
450a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho// oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sngal snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams gdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul bral bsam yas kyis/ 
450a3(rgyud 'grel): skad cig nyid la lhan gyis grub/ ho// oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che/ ho// hUM badz+ra 
450a4(rgyud 'grel): d+hig/ muM da du shA ri sti/ spyod la ma rnam pa gsum du yang // 'bad de yengs pa med sems shing // spyod yul mtshan nyid thams cad la// thig le'am yang ne lha me drug/ nyid du sbyor bas mthong thos 
450a5(rgyud 'grel): med// dmig rgyu la sogs mtshan ma lnga// bstan pas zhes pa'i rtsa ba med// 'dri mchog dkyil 'khor bri la sogs// skabs 'dir gags yin slang mi bya// de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des// / 
450a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rigs 'dzin sa la gdon mi za// rgyud las rmos pa'i yon tan rnams// tshe 'dis mngon du gyur pa yis// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// yi ge 'khor 
450a7(rgyud 'grel): lo tshogs chen mnyes// 'di ltar bsgrubs shing sgom byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma byung yang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur// theg pa sman par yod mi skye// 
450a8(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad yong mi 'byung // lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i sar// 'grub 'gyur the tshom med ces bshad// 
450b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya bsam gtan rdzogs so// // rgyal ba kun tu bzang po'i sgyu 'phrul las// ngang pas 'o ma blangs pa'i dpe bzhin du// rab 'bring kun gyis nyams su blang ba'i chos// gab sbas mngon 
450b2(rgyud 'grel): dri byung ba'i man ngag 'di// 'phangs med ser sna spangs las ma rtogs pa// dam med chags pa'i 'khor dang ma phrad cig/ slob dpon bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// / de bzhin gshegs 
450b3(rgyud 'grel): pakun gyi bdag/ ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// nor bu rin chen yon tan mdzod// rdo rje'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma'o bde gshegs snying 
450b4(rgyud 'grel): po las// rang gi rnam rtag las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// 
450b5(rgyud 'grel): bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral nas// byang chub mchog la dgod pa dang // ma 'ongs sangs 
450b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas blo ldan don// bla med ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po 'di// ma nor btus te bstan par bya// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse rnams dang // dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // tsan dan 
450b7(rgyud 'grel): nags tshal me tog tshal// yid 'od bkra shis sems dga' ba'i// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// der ni ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// ye nas 
450b8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yin mod kyi// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba las// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las 
451a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun rtsigasang // 'gag pa med pas thams cad dgas// bgag tsam nyid na gag pa med// e ma 'o ngo mtshar 
451a2(rgyud 'grel): smad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis 
451a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs panyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 
451a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od // 'gro 'ong zhi na 'gro 'ong med// bsgrub pa'i gtsor ni ting 'dzin pas// ting 'dzin 'di'i sa byed par 'gyur// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// rtog 
451a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang 'gyur ting 'dzin yin// de ltar ting 'dzin rim bzhin sgom// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pas// rtog pa'i smra bas ma yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de phyir 
451a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po dngos med do// de bzhin nyid de spros med kyang // rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings// sems cad rnams la snying rje'i phyir// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// dngos po med las dngos po 
451a7(rgyud 'grel): sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyis rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge rang bzhin de// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// yi ge'i 
451a8(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni sgom par bya// a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas// byang chub sems su byin brlabs te// bsdus kyang 'phel 
451b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gri ba med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// de las rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bsten/ 
451b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsgom// e yaM baM su laM raM bruM bi shud+d+he// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur can// 
451b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang // kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol 
451b4(rgyud 'grel): mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen ta dang byung // nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// zhi zla pad+ma rin po che// a ka khag byung / tsa tsha dza dz+nye nya/ taH 
451b5(rgyud 'grel): dad+ha na/ Ta rba Ta D+ha Na/ pa pa ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la shaShA/ sa hak+Sha/ i I u U e ai/ o au// A nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra'i ming gis 
451b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// de las spro dang bsdus pa yis// so so'i phyag mtshan gsal bar 'gyur// de las phyogs bcur rab spros pas// rgyal ba rnams 
451b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi thugs dam bskul// de dag slar ni 'dus pa dang // hU~M badz+ri drig/ oM dzi na dzig/ swa rat+na drig/ oM a ro lig/ ha bradz+nyA drag/ muM d+ha ru Sha ri/ laM d+hi shar ti/ me mo ha ra ti/ bai ra ga 
451b8(rgyud 'grel): ra ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi hi ra tsa ya/ traM a gar ba ya/ hri ta pad+ma ba d+ha ma/ dzi ku ru pa na hri/ hU~M la se sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM ma le sa ma ya ho// d+hi gir ti ra ho ya haM/ a nir ti ra ga ya mi/ me d+ha ra ni 
452a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ TI ni swa raM pa ya swAt+ma/ d+h+waM swa ra tsa ya swA hA/ muM shri aM rag ya s+yAh+ma/ dza du pa pra b+he sha/ hUM bus pa a be sha/ baM dI pa su ki ni tog na de tsita ho// hUM ya mAn+ta krid paT+Ta 
452a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM prad dzAM ta krid phaT/ hU~M pad+mAn+ta kride phaT/ hUM big+ha nan ta kri phaT/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma ha rat+na da ra ma ha ko ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma ha pad+mo da ra ma ha gro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni 
452a3(rgyud 'grel): hU~M phaT/ oM ma hAkaraM mad ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ hUM hU~M trAM badz+ra tsi ta ma~M/ a a a badz+ra ba tras ma ya oM/ oM mr-i na sing swAhA/ oM mune d+h+r-i hU~M swAhA/ oM mu ne sru~M swAhA/ oM mu ne thaM swaH/ 
452a4(rgyud 'grel): i mu nek+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshigs su bcas/ 
452a5(rgyud 'grel): gru chud la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed myong byed snom byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub pa drug/ mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas 
452a6(rgyud 'grel): par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// ud pa la glu shing la sogs mtshan// rin chen mya 
452a7(rgyud 'grel): gu ral gyi 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen 'phreng ba dang // pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog 'phreng ba spos mchog dang /

452b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni// mi mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen pos gnod pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags skya zhags pa po ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma 
452b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan// sreg par dang ni bi bang dang // go tsha po ti rin chen sbom// me dang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi

452b6(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa mAn+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko ti/ oM ma hA prad ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako he/ oM ma hA kr-i ta 
452b7(rgyud 'grel): e nurtan dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ki ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma bA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko ha~M/ 
452b8(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rag badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko he/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pu a dz+ra swab+hA ba ad mako haM// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen dbu rgyan 'phreng ba dang // dpung rgyan se modo la

454a7(rgyud 'grel): swa rtser 'bar ba rin po che// zla btul 'bru sras dril bsil zhing // 'brel ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// maM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'akyis 
454a8(rgyud 'grel): btud de 'dzum pa'i mdad kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM ni rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla ba tul 'bru sras dril bsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs 
454b1(rgyud 'grel): kar bkan// paM bsgreng rtse mor dril ba sil zhing // nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdad kyis lta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// haM bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla btul 
454b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru sras dril bsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs ka ra bkan// taM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i 
454b3(rgyud 'grel): mdangs kyis lta// de ni rgyal ba thams cad kun// dgyes pa chen po bskyed pa'i phyir// phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po yis// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs bsgoms sbal// 
454b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan sems can sId re rje// gnyis su med par bskal bar bya// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phan rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du 
454b5(rgyud 'grel): byed bsgom// hUM du gyur par rnams par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgya gsal// sAr bAr 'od zer 'phro bar brjod// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gror thar pa'i lam// shes 
454b6(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog de byin rlobs nas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// pad mo la ni rdo rje zhugs// 'grib pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid mnyes pa kun la mchod// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid 
454b7(rgyud 'grel): sgra mar snang ba'i mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul b+ha tsam yang byas pa med// maram pa'i tA brdzas chen po bdag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza' dang bcas dang 
454b8(rgyud 'grel): btung dang bsgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// b+hU 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'gro 'dra yis// 
455a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra'i phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// 
455a2(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid sbyin sku dang bdud rtser 'gyur// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa yis// 'bras bu 
455a3(rgyud 'grel): smin phyed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan na yod pa ma yin na// 
455a4(rgyud 'grel): lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pas na// dkyil 'khor chen po rab 'bar 'gyur// rang snang 
455a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig mtsho// cho ga ldan 
455a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byas nas// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// mnyams 'jug pa rab brtson na// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gnas// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// 
455a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur rigs kyi rim par 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyi// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ste// ye shes thig le de nyid las ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog 
455a8(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i zhing // zhing khams rnam dag bsam yis dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i brgyan du rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ 
455b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis 
455b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes snang mad snang // dbang mchog dam pa ma thob par// bsgrub kyang cung zad 'grub mi 'gyur// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 
455b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi spyad pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa las bsogs rtsom pa rnams// 
455b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan 'phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bzang btung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phyin cad 
455b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // tshe reng bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'grub pa'i gzhi// rdo rje dam tshig chen po ste// 
455b6(rgyud 'grel): bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// de ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bslab dang bslu ba'i dam tshig mchog 
455b7(rgyud 'grel): gti mug chags dang zhe sdang che// nga rgyal phrag dog mi spong ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod chu mi 'dor ro// yan lag bcu'i dam tshig ste// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// 
455b8(rgyud 'grel): gsung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi thar mi 'dor lnga nyid ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' ka ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// 
456a1(rgyud 'grel): yanya ma rdzogs chen po thob 'byung bas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtswa ba nyams pa rgyal bdug/ gsol nye bar mi brtsonan// gad cig lud tsam sgra ma byed// nyams 
456a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // bya ba'i dam tshig nyams pas na// bsgrub pa thams cad phog par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dra// yan lag dam tshig 
456a3(rgyud 'grel): khams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song srung // dam tshig 'dzini rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdug da min// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'byor kyis// dkyil 'kho sa ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 
456a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'along mcho// gsang ba'i thig le ga dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen go rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems 
456a5(rgyud 'grel): nirdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rigs pa'i rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'bor sa// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes ldalnga zhing // snying po thig le mnyab sbyor bas// bde 
456a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes rol me yis// ye shes dgyes pa mchod par 'bral// zag pa med pa'i bsod napas kyis// ye shes smra ba dang snang ba// rol po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i dkyil 
456a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jo rjid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs nas kun gyi ngos// yang dgadun gyi ning po 'di// brgal pashing gi rdul rnyed du// shin tu sbyangs la ba gnas shing // dkyil 'jomams pa rnyes pa'is// 'bras 
456a8(rgyud 'grel): gsang chen 'di yin te// shes rab mig lngar rnams kyis zung // rgod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstar/ lus dang ming sa sbed gang sa sbyin// gan du rnapas kyang sbyi mibya// rmongs la byer ba dgas te byin/ 
456b1(rgyud 'grel): dus med par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang slebs la yun ring gnas// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid la bsdu// hU~M hUM zhes ni rab brjod pas// chos kyi dbyings su
456b2(rgyud 'grel): thim par 'gyur// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// phyag rgya chen po dgas la 'gyur nas// go sgo mtshams bcad lus bsrungs te// de nas rnab 'byor chen po ste// 'gro sdod 'dra ga zhal bzhi por ni// srog 
456b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir yang mi ba~Mta shing // spyod la kun tu mnyams par// bdag nyid chen por rtag par bsgom// rgyud kyi don las bzlas pa yi// rin chen drab mngon rdzogs pa'i// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor thams cad dang // 
456b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// bstan pas bsgrib pa kun byang nas// bla med byang chub thob par shog/ na mo/ rin chen dra ba mngon rdzogs zhes bya ba mthar phyin pa'o// rdzogs so// 
456b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdag/ ye shes rgya mtshor ba zab thugs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// rdo rje yid la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po pas// rang gi rnam rtog
