457a1(rgyud 'grel): rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rtogs pa sangs rgyas pas// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshol cig/ gang gis glang chen byos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas brtul nas su// 
457a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyar rab brtan nas// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// dgon pa dben pa'i sa phyogs su// tsan dan nags dang me tog tshal// yid 'ong bkra shis sems dga' ba'i// rar dbang 
457a3(rgyud 'grel): bar chad med pa'i gnas// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor bas na// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// e ma'o ngo mtshar 
457a4(rgyud 'grel): rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid dbye ba med// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gags// 'gag tsam nyid na 'gag pa med/ 
457a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// dmigs pa med pa thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid la dmigs pa med// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid 
457a6(rgyud 'grel): na 'gro 'ong med// bslab pa'i gtso ni ting 'dzin pas// ting 'dzin 'di yid byed par 'gyur// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin// rtog pa'i dbang 'gyur ting 'dzin yin// de phyir ting 'dzin rim bzhin sgom

457b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rin chen sprin// yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// a/ rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par 
457b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal bar snad // spro zhing snga ba de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// e yaM khaM suM laM raM 'bru bi sha bi shud de// ye shes phyogs dbus 
457b3(rgyud 'grel): blos brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam byas lhan grub ni// rdzogs shing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// lhag pa'i ye shes glo

458a8(rgyud 'grel): ba a da ma ko haM// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// gzhal yas thig gtab snying po dgod// de las spro dang bsdu ba yis// thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis/ 
458b1(rgyud 'grel): de las 'phra mo'i spros bsdus pas// so so'i sngags kyis bskyed cing gdon// hU~M badz+ra drig/ muM da du shwa ri/ oM dzi na dzig/ laM d+he shar ti/ sA rad na drig/ maM mo ha ra ti/ a a ro lig/ paM ra ka ra ti/ 
458b2(rgyud 'grel): ha prad nya drig/ te badz+ra ra hi/ k+Sha hi ra tsa ya/ hUM la se sa ya ste/ traM a ga ra ba ya/ traM ma le sa ma ya staM/ hri ha hUM pad ma b+ha d+ha ma/ hri gi rti ra ho hai/ dz+nyi kur pa na tri/ a nir ti ra ga ya mi/ me da ra ya swAh+na/ 
458b3(rgyud 'grel): dza du pa ma be shad+d+hi swa ra mA ya sAH// hUM bus pa a be sha ya/ hU~M su ra \u0f7f sA ma ya/ bi dI pa su ki ni/ mu~M pra oM ra ga ya sad+d+ha/ ho gan d+h+ye tsi ta ho/ hU~M ya man ta hrid phaT/ oM badz+ra da ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa li nai hUM pha 
458b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM prad wa ta krid phaT/ oM rang nadar ma kro ta/ shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ b+h+rUM pad+ma mAn ta krid paT/ oM pad mad d+ha ma hAk+Sho ti sha ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M big+h+nAn na krid paH/ oM kar ma dar ma hA kro ti shwa ri thA la ni hU~M phaT/

458b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun pa tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed snom byed myed byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshigs dang ldan par

459a7(rgyud 'grel): mgo haM/ oM ma hA b+ha ra sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA pra ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ki haM/ oM ma hA kri ta a nu tan dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad 
459a8(rgyud 'grel): mgo haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ga badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsi ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ 
459b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang byin brlabs kun bsdus thim// dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na/ 
459b2(rgyud 'grel): spos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal skyed la// dbang skur byin brlabs rdzogs byas la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs 
459b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid tshe// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid 
459b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshi ga mchog/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru ni ka tri shra ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ 
459b5(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhU~M bi ti/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya~M oM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya maM/ hUM badz+ra sa ma ma hU~M/ swa badz+ra sa ma yas/ ha badz+ra sa ma ya ha/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya trUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho/ dzaHhU~M 
459b6(rgyud 'grel): ho/ me tog dor la dngos grub gsol// gnyis med thim bzhugs brnyes par bya// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dbang po yul du gang gyur pa// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na/

459b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i di nyid nges pa las// snying po'i phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yige/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lngaganyis zung du spros pa las// skyer ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang muM

464b1(rgyud 'grel): yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+ho hU~M/ e h+ye he a na ya badz+ra/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHha~M daM/ oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya hUM/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ 
464b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la gsol// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya s+ho// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phaT// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya ho// a mra 
464b3(rgyud 'grel): u li ta la ta pa te/ traM sto kho gon/ rau ti kha raraM yo gi ni kha hi hUM ha hi phaT// smug nag sngonag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos/ 
464b4(rgyud 'grel): nisna tshogs gon// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par bsgrogs// sbrul dang bod rlon nyi zlar bcas// stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra stag shol la sogs 
464b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang // btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi'i phyag rgya rab mdzes shing // sras dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis 
464b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// rang gi bstan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'bar ba'i 
464b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche bzang yag za byed che ho// hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong stir 
464b8(rgyud 'grel): shug chen ri rab 'bum snyil skad// a a ha la'i gad brkyangs che// dpyugs pa'i thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hUM/ khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye 
465a1(rgyud 'grel): shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le ho// hU~M khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i rgyal po char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i 
465a2(rgyud 'grel): gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho// hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jig par byed// 'jigs byed chen po'i 
465a3(rgyud 'grel): thig pa cho// rje zag cenas pa'o// rje chu bo bdud chen po// rdo rje ma ste kun bar che// rdo rje rlung chen thod drung che ho// yan lag mnyams yo byad ldan// chog rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 
465a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po// pho nya phyag zhan bka' nyan tshogs// dri bgyi las sogs tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams 
465a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byed// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// rang gi snying gar bsdu ba ni// hUM hUM zhes ni rab brjod nas// 'dus pa de nyid ci bder spyod// de ltar dkyil 'khor bsdus nas kyang // 
465a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis// spyod lam kun tu mnyams shing // lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// phung po lnga nyid khro rgyal gtso// chen po lnga nyid dbang phyug yum// skye mched khams rnams ma lus 
465a7(rgyud 'grel): kun// thugs rje rngam pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnams bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs 
465a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po che ho// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sbur mchog nyid dam pa yan// bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di 
465b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa yis// bsod nams bdag gis gang thob pa// dpal chen kun bzang sku gsung thugs// sems can kun gyis thob par shog/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa brgyan rdzogs so// 
465b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi dpal gsum nyid ldan rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes 'dus ma byas// ma btsal lnga rdzogs sbyin bral mi shigs dbyangs nyid ye shes 'du 'bral med// lnga yis grub nyid gnyis med dang gsal mi g.yo mi 
465b3(rgyud 'grel): sems sems chen po// 'phrin las bzhi bcom dpa' bo rang nyid lha'i lha la gnyis med mos// gsang ba'i bdag po mngon gshegs gnas// lha kla gnod sbyin srin po dang // mi las skal ldan 'dus 
465b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la// dbang pos ji ltar lung bstan dus// rgyal bu rigs can ltas shar ba// 'brel pa snang la mngon brtags pas// thugs kyi sgrub pa mngon rtogs te// de nyid sgo nas de nyid grub// bstan 
465b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub de nas thob// don dam bcud kyis de nas rgyas// 'dod pa'i bsam pa de ru 'grub// smon pa'i lha dang de ru mjal// de nas rdo rje gdan stengs kyi// 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams 
465b6(rgyud 'grel): su// pho brang dam pa rin chen nang // bkra shis dam pa'i khang pa ru// ku ku ra tsa in tra bo ti dang // sing nga u pa ra tsa dang // sras mo 'go ma sa la sogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas/ 
465b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bsgrubs te// rdo rje 'chang sar mngon du gshegs// de phyir sangs rgyas mtshan thob ngas// dam pa'i rigs can dra ma dang // de rjes mi 'ongs skal ldan phyir// stong phrag 
465b8(rgyud 'grel): brgya'i rgyud dag las// gshegs shul lam mchog 'dir bsdus te// snyigs ma'i rgyud drag dus kyi tshe// dus kyi 'dul phyir bstan par bya'o// spyan bzangs 'gro mthu med pa yi// dmigs bu bral 
466a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyams stong pas// bgrod cing phyin par mi nus bzhin// rtsing po rmu dgod rang nyams kyis// gsang ba'i snying por mi 'gyur te// bud shing me tog 'bras bzhin 'gyur// 
466a2(rgyud 'grel): de bas bla ma lung bzhin bskur// brtag spro zhegacod bzod bya ste// mthong ba'i gdung ba khrur mi lta// de kun yum gyi don du bzod// dka' bas bsten na rdo rje rgyal// nyams snang mthong zer thob 'gyur te// 
466a3(rgyud 'grel): de tshe rgyud chen gzhung gi yon// phul na thugs kyi nying khu ster// de yis bzhon pa bzang 'gro bzhin// gsang ba'i rdzu 'phral stobs zhon pas// mthong 'jug mthar phyin bzhi bskrod nas// ye shes 
466a4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i gnas su phyin// de bas rdo rje gnyer ldan pas// rgyang drung sems spra mkha' 'gro yi// gsang sngags ltas ston spro ba yis// ci nas brtags te bzang ldan na// mi ldog brtan byas rtas pa 
466a5(rgyud 'grel): yi// shi sha gang yin lag tu gtad// ngan pa'i ltas mthong mngon shes pas// 'dod pa 'phra mo'i rgyur byed dang // khe dang grags pa che ba'i rgyu// byed cing bcud chen 'dzag dang 'gro/ ma chags
466a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rungs byed pa dang // zang zing mtha' gtong dbus 'ching dang // g.yon can ngo dga' lhag spang skur// lkog na rang dgar byed pa dang // ngag la rigs nges bsam mi nges// bud med 'dod pas 
466a7(rgyud 'grel): phyal ba dang // mun lkog phrad par 'dod spyod sgeg/ pho mo gtad trar ma sngags la// skal par dri bzhin 'khor 'gyur yang // thugs kyi bde ba spro mi b+ha// 'tsham par skur bstan gcan 'phran bzhin// 
466a8(rgyud 'grel): de men po sbrel ga yang 'gyur bzhin// 'dod zhes 'bogs shing bcas 'phyar bas// ma gtogs spos na dur khrod gling // brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro bzhin 'dus nas// sha za srog la 
466b1(rgyud 'grel): 'babs shing lhung // de ltar brtags pa'i skal ldan phyir// rang bzhin ye shes rang gnas dang // der mthong der 'jug rnal 'byor bzhi// bar chad med bsgrub rnam par smin// sbas sbyar 
466b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lhun grub la ma// mngon byas rim pa brjod par bya// de la dang po nyid spros pas// de nyid de yis shes b+ha ba// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ 
466b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba sems phyir bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// de ltar rigs dang rgyud med par// byang chub 
466b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi ngo bo la// sa sa'i rang bzhin nges shes na// yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// yang dag gshegs dang log rtog gnyis// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// 
466b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ching bu rin chen banin mi rigs// de bas de lta 'di bzhin pas// ma rig lo gartags zhags pa'i rgyus// las dang nyon mongs rgya rkyen gyis// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gnas su myur// rten dang 'dod pa/ 
466b6(rgyud 'grel): tha dad pa'i// bde sdug gdung pas nyam thag bral// rtsom med bzhin dus kun du nyams// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// de lta'ang rgyal po phru gur 'khyams// de bzhin rigs la 'gyur med pas 
466b7(rgyud 'grel): shul don rang las gzhan med phyir// 'phrul dga'i tshul gzhan tha dad zer du min// de'ang rnams gsum gnas tshul gzhag/ 'bru lnga gnas pa'i thabs chen po// 'gro ba kun la rang gnas te// dkyil 
466b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhi dang srog shing gsum// gnas na ka la sgra dbyangs ldan// e bi ma ya mkha' ldan dang // snying po rlung sgom gnas na yod// de yis tan tra 'byin par byed// de don de na chos nyid dang / 
467a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes yon tan las nyid dngos// rnal 'byor lam rim rang bzhin ldan// snod kyi 'od dbyibs 'phrin las bzhi// thika le bsnyen bsgrub rang bzhin ldan// bzhi brgyad kI ra mdal/ 
467a2(rgyud 'grel): ra ya g.yas g.yon sbyin sreg ldan// gnas bzhi 'byung ba las bzhi ste// gsang ba'i mkha' la rang bzhin ldan// gnas rten rtswa dang thig le la// bcu dbang lnga gsum dbang rnams ldan// gsang ba nang gi 'dod 
467a3(rgyud 'grel): yon dang // dam rdzas lnga ldan mchod pa ste// de dag rang gnas mi 'du ba// rang bzhin gsang ba'i sa ma ya// rang bzhin phyi nang gsang ba yi// 'du byed sprod pa ngang gi gnas// chags pas 'khams 
467a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub cig shes kyi// rang bzhin ye shes 'grub byed pa'o// rdo rje phung po yan lag kun// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngar grags sogs// dngos kun chags dang ngang tshul gyis// las dang ngo bo 'bras/ 
467a5(rgyud 'grel): bur gnas// chu zla sgyu ma sprul pa bzhin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// bzhi rdzogs phyag rgya ma 'dres gsal// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// bar ma lam dang 'bras bu rnams// gang 
467a6(rgyud 'grel): yang rigs rgyud rtag med pas// sems phyir kun kyang de de dang gzugs gnyis mtshan gsum yod dang med// gnas ris sde cha yod min sogs// gnyis yul bral bzhin de ldan pa'i// don mchog lnga 'bras 
467a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dbyings// bdun dang gsum phyir don dmal// dpag bsam shing dang rin chen ltar// de kun ngo bo nyid rgyur gnas// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku 
467a8(rgyud 'grel): chen po yin// rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar gnas// de las gzhan pa'i thob bya med// kun kyang smin zin bgrod pa med// de nyid lam gyi'ang ngo bo ste// 'jugs gnas 'byin pas che ba 
467b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la// rang 'byung chen pos kun tu khyab// rang 'byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin phyir// de lta bu'i ngang du nges// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes 
467b2(rgyud 'grel): te// thabs kyi phyag tu kun gyi rgyu// ming grangs med pa'i rgyu nyid dang // yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang brjod// gsum pa dngos por zhen pa'i// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos// ye nas rigs
467b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyad rtag min pas// so so'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg/ chos kye bye brag tha snyad kun// 'ja' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres shig/ 'dus ma byas pas 'dus byas snang // 'dus byas snang ba rdo rje nyid// rgyal 
467b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gros ma mdzad ma bcos pas// rang bzhin rang gis dbyer med pa'ang // de min zhen pas sgrol phyir pas// tha snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'das// yul dang shes par snang ba yang // rang 'byung ye 
467b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rang snang zad// rgyu 'bras snang yang gnyis pa med// phyi nang gsal ba'ang nang nyid dang // de ltar ye shes rang snang ba// lam dang 'bras bu kun dngos pas// 'brel pa bdag phyir thabs chen pos// 
467b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon byed rang las 'byung bar zad// ye shes rab la gnas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// lhan grub dang la phyag btsal nas// dang por lam mchog bshad par bya// gang dag rang gnas mthong 'dod dgos// 
467b7(rgyud 'grel): dus snod rgyu skyen thabs grangs dngos// spyod yon drod rtags tshad dang skyon// yan lag spos pa'i rtsa bar gzhag/ bsam gyis mi khyab ma mthong bar// bsam med dkyil 'khor 'jug byed pa// blun po 
467b8(rgyud 'grel): mun sprul blo can de// long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro// de bas ma rig gi ling thog dmig/ ldongs pa rdo rje thur ma mkhan// mashes tho ba sngon byas gzhung thos pas// spyan byed dkyil 'khor mthong bya dgos/ 
468a1(rgyud 'grel): de yang rang bzhin sbyangs pa yis// snod du gyur pa'i nye ring phyir// rims dang cig car bzhi cha yis// phye bas rnal 'byor chen por 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// 
468a2(rgyud 'grel): shin du sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// shes rab mi ldan 'dir 'jug phyir// ring ba'ang rims dang cig cad pa'o// snga ma'ang tan tra gzhung nyid las// sa rnams khyad par bskor ba yang // gsang ba'i 
468a3(rgyud 'grel): snying por 'gro ba'i lam// theg pa bzhi'i nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// lam stegs sngon du rdzogs par sbyor// de phyir ma nges rigs mchog nas// mun pa'i shes pa pa ste 
468a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyer// rang bzhin sgyu yis spang bar gnas// phal ba'i sems brgyad mthar gnas che// snying po rang bzhin mtshungs pa dang // gshes gnyen mgon la lung gnyis thos// yon tan mthong dang 
468a5(rgyud 'grel): skyon mthong dang // kyiso zer de yis skyon rmongs brod dang ba// gnyis pa'i sku ru gsungs pa yin// de bdag gsang tshogs dmigs pa ste// skad cig 'phel ba de ma thag/ drug las rtso me bzhin ga

468b1(rgyud 'grel): car ba// bskal pa rdul steng sngon song nas// thun mong de rnyed sbyangs pa'i mtha'// sna 'phrul dra ba'i don zhugs pa'ang // sngon byas 'di che nges 'byung ba// rims kyis sbyangs la cig car drod// la la dbang /

468b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// ma nges 'jug dang 'di nyid do// de de'ang rang sems brtan pa'i dngos// pa shes pa'i na rnams dang ngo bos 'brel// de ltar ba byed snang bcung du// chen po'i lung dang 'brel ba dang // mgon dang / 
468b4(rgyud 'grel): bya byed thugs rjes 'brel// de phyir mchog lang rdo rje rnams// dang 'byal byed par nA chen drag/ ldan pas ma nges 'jug pa ni// dbang po ji bzhin mos rkyen gyis// chu 'am bya ba 'am gnyis ka'o// rnam 
468b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor thag par sbyor bar byed// de nas de bzhin 'dir 'jug pa'ang // sngon bzhin ni ma ldan 'jug sems sbyar// gnas pas mthar phyin byed pas ni// ltos pa ri nga ba'i dus nyid do// ma nges sanas 
468b6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel na rkyen// ldan pas rnal 'byor pa chog sbyor ba// mun pa'i ther tshul phra me bzhin// nam sngon 'jug pa ldan bzhin te// bdud ldan pa'ang tan tra yin// gzhung gi ngang tshul rang bzhin sogs/ 
468b7(rgyud 'grel): snang yon ldan pa bslab pa/ nas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// 'jug pa bzhi'i yan lag mchog/ dang po ched du gcer bar byed// gang de thos pas tshol ba'i tshe// rgya gnyis rkyen gyis bzod thob 
468b8(rgyud 'grel): pas// rang bzhin rang gis bzod thod pa// des sngon sems kyis nar rtson sngor// gang dag panyan bsam shes rab tshe// nyan cing thos 'dzin bsam pa dang // bsame pa'i tshen stag spyod pa/ 
469a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis po 'di dag shes pa'i rgyu// mkhan po lung dang man ngag bcas// lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du 'dod// rang bzhin bdud dang mtshungs ldan pa// cig shes rgyu ru nges pa yin// 
469a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ldan pas spyan tshol tshe// gtan tshigs rnams kyis sbal byas te// nor pa'i shes rab dmigs gsal nas// ma nor dmigs nas brang bar bya// gzhi dang gtan tshigs grub pa'i don// rnam gsum 
469a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa'i bzhi ru gzhag/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa// sku lnga 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams la// gsung lngas bstan pa de kho na// gtan pa phebs shing gzhan byed pa'o// de nyid dngos lnga tshul dang tshig/ 
469a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa lngas mtshon byung ba bzhi// de la gtan tshigs dngos lnga yis// brda' sprod rjes su 'jug pa bstan pa'ang // bsregs bcas brdar ba'i gser bzhin du// dngos lngas legs par btags te dbab// 
469a5(rgyud 'grel): de yang yongs su brtags bzhi'i// dbang po yul dang snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gni rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang bas// 'khor dang 'das dngos zhe sdang brtag/ 
469a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa'i// ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa yi// log rtog so so rang spyi'i mtshan// ji ltar gnas par spyad par bya// dngos gnyis zhen dngos dus gsum chos// skad cig gcig la kun rdzog 
469a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir// de dngos mthong ba yang dag par// rigs bzhi kun kyang de ltar shes// kun brtags shes pa bar mar 'gyur// spyi'i yul lus med grib ma bzhin// med pas mi btub rang nyid la// mi btub 
469a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo bzhin dogs pa// gnyen po med pa dag min zhing // bar ma'i yul phyir nges tshig 'grub// de ltar lnga yis de de la// de de'i rang bzhin rtag bya ba'ang // rtog dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la// dngos po sra 
469b1(rgyud 'grel): chags sems gas sngags// des sung yin kyar sa myur ston// brjod dang 'dra bar brda smras pas// ra tha nan gyis bshad pa 'byung// ma'angs dan du gtan chags ngas// yang nas gnas bldan pa// 
469b2(rgyud 'grel): rang ban gag kyis gyi med do// ma bcwal dang shes par byed pa// brjid med nyid brjod da 'dra// gang dag gzugs dang rnal 'byor gyis// mthong bris la sogs rang bzhin brda'// dpa' bo ba 
469b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dgengs pa dang // rang gi tid 'dzin gyis bad 'byed// dper nas 'ogagasar drang sa dang // mthong zhe ma'i rang bzhin du// na kyang rig ljin dang rjod// rang bzhin dang gis brjod 'drar snang // 
469b4(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang zag cu'i sgra bzhin hU~Mr// zag stod dbyer med rdo rjegasung // rnazas nyid kyis de nyid du// sa sa ma brtags 'jal bar byed// seMsa'i mad du brda' skrod ltar// gsung sa myed pa'i 
469b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu// mos sgyid grol bzhin brjod pa yis// brda sprod yongs su grol bar byed// dang po rgyud la tha dad phyir// gang mos grol ba yod mod kyang // thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing / 
469b6(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung can dam sgrib byed phyir// mi dmigs dang las dmigs pa'i// tshe 'phrul tshig gis mtshon par bya// gsung lnga thos pa lnga tshul yang / rjes su tso gagis mtshon par bya// ngo bo snang tsog rang snang tshig 
469b7(rgyud 'grel): ldem dgang mcho ga dang bgadung rgyu// 'dod rten rtog dang rje tshe/ rang rig mngon gsal tshig gis mtshan// thams cad gas sngags raba'i byed// mtha' dbus med pa de bzhin cad// 
469b8(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i dan kyi byo// phyogs dang sus suganas par// sa pad byu ba // mig c-ig dang thasasangs // bdud 
470a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag/ thams cad thugs su gyur pa sa ra// sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min// 'das dang ma

475b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu'i rim par ldan// tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar rtogs pa// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas// ye shes lnga ru gsal ba nyid// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi// 
475b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyan rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// yang na dam tshig 'di lta bu// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom mi 'da'// byed spyod tshogs chen
475b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang // mnyams de'i dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gi rtag tu spyad// dbyings nyid la ni mi spyod phyir// dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la
475b8(rgyud 'grel): spyod// de nyi mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rtogs pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad la'ang me long bzhin// ltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo // shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes 
476a1(rgyud 'grel): shing // bya byed 'phags kyis 'dug byed pa// gang zhig slong la spyod pa byang chub thob// rnam par dag pa'i yung drang sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam par rnam dag 
476a2(rgyud 'grel): cing // mi rtogs leg nas la rtog par mdzad// bstan du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter// ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i// rnam 
476a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam gsum snang ba rang bzhin stong nyid pas// rnam rtog mi skyo ri shes brjod du med// thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med// ma bcos lhun gnas 
476a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes byang chub cing // thob rgyu med pas ye nas bde gshegs yin// nam mkhar bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na// sprin dag 'byung zhing khebs 
476a5(rgyud 'grel): pas mas pazhin// bam pa'i sems cad den+ta ba gyi/ ma sas spyan mas ma ji bzhin de banag dang // rgyu gres A thA pa'i lal byung// de bzhin pa nas / 
476a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rta gdub de gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byed kun dang ldan// srid pa'i rims par smin tshul gyis// 'jug pa'i yan lag lnga ru bzhag/ gang dag dngos kun// 
476a7(rgyud 'grel): rang rig phyiraro// shi ba den dam bden pa ste// skye ba bar ma kun rdzob yin// skye ba'i rim gsum gnyis med do// dang po lam la rten byed pas// de bzhin nyid du goms par bya// sngon dgos thabs 
476a8(rgyud 'grel): dang ngo bo dang // mi mthun bcos nyams spyod dam tshig/ drod rtags mtshan yon 'da' ka ma// rang gi 'bras bu rdzogs par 'gyur// skyes bu seng ge bzhin rgyu bas// sngon du ri mo rimi par rdzogs// 
476b1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig ting 'dzin shes rab dang // byang chub sems dang snying rje lnga// lhag pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs bya// de nas ma'i sems ldan pas// gnas drug thar 
476b2(rgyud 'grel): par dgod dam bca'// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon song bas// yid 'od skyon mengs rtsal bslang // ran byas byi dor ldan byas bsrung // pi bar stan dang ldan par bya// bar chad gsal zhing lam rdzogs
476b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir// tshogs dang sbyin sreg dpung tshogs 'bad// phyi nang 'brel chags thams cad kur// gzhan phyir dus rgyun sems kyis der// khams dang ting 'dzin rkyen bsdus la// bar chad bsrung ba mngon
476b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas// longs spyod rig ma'ang ldan par bya// 'tshe ba bzlog pa'ang nyer rdzogs nas// thun mong spyi'i mngon rdzogs nas// mchod rten nye ba'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs// yan lag brgyad pa'i 
476b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzung la// yongs 'gyur thim byas rjes la 'jug/ dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// de phyir mthong rjes de bzhin 
476b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid// snying rje 'byung ba'i bzhi ru gzhag/ go rims 'byung ba 'ang de bzhin des// gang zag skal ldan cung sman pas// gzhan sel phyir dang don nyer phyir// 'jug pa'ang snga ma gnyis don du// ma rig 
476b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su// ye shes sgron ma'i 'da' pangs nas// gti mug mun pa rnams gsal te// rang bzhin 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog/ mdor na sgrib tshogs mun snang tshul// chos 
476b8(rgyud 'grel): dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la// shes rab myur du don 'gro ba'ang // 'gro med 'od med mi gnas pa// byang chub sems mchog a rab bde// mun snang bdud rtsi tshul bzhin du// rtog pa'i 
477a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// don du gnyer ba gang dag kun// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor 'di min na// rgya mtsho gting gi pha bong ltar// 
477a2(rgyud 'grel): skal par lam la btsal byas kyang // don med snying po skams pa yin// de phyir lhag ma cha bskams pa'i// bde ldan zad pas chos bdon tshul// ldan byas rje btsun snang tshul bzhin// 'dzin rtsol 
477a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems kyi 'dug/ de'ang gdams ngag shes rab kyis// stobs kyis bzhag pas goms par byed// sngon brjod bu des dben pa'i sa ro// rin chen lhab lhub longs spyod kyis// mnyes 
477a4(rgyud 'grel): byas slob bu'ang 'phang du bzhag/ bgegs skad dbubs chu bung gtim// dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na// shin nu mi dmigs dbyings bsgoms pas// phyi ma'ang spyi lugs mthong rjes gzhag 
477a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su sgom// rang rig nyidadi la gnas pa'i// sras kyang mabyas rang 'byung ste// thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyar// gnyis med dbyings 
477a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi nga du sbyod// rang 'byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// malus de bzhin nyid du sdud// sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ka med// yang dag 'an nyid du'o// bskum bya sgom byed mi skyes na// chos nyid rnam 
477a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'ang med// don dam sgom par byung med pas// gang la'ang mi 'jug zhu gas pa'i mchog/ baM sam bya bsam par mi bya ste// mi bsam par yang mi bsam na// gang la rnam par mi sems pa// 
477a8(rgyud 'grel): de ni rang rig mnyam yin no// byang chub sems kyi de bzhin nyid// shin tu mi dmigs partag dka' ba// yang sa la rgya che gnyid zab pas// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang nas ma 'ongs 
477b1(rgyud 'grel): gar mi 'gro// 'gro dang 'ong bar bya ba mir// shin tu rtag dka' mi dmigs pas// mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo // 
477b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam du zad// gang zhig dmigs nas 'jug pa ni// de srid 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa// 'jug med sangs rgyas yin par ni// dbang po nyid dang
477b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis gsungs// nges par bsam zhing dmigs yod na// phra rab 'then thag 'dzud lta bus// de bzhin nyin 'di mi mthong ste// then thag 'jugs mkha' bzhin no// rnal 'byor mnyam pa de bzhin 
477b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// ngo bo bzhin du drangs 'jug cing // nges tshig rnam pa 'byung ba yin// de bas sun la 'byor par gyis// chen po sman pas mtha' gsal ba'i// ma skyes de bzhin nyid stod pa// snod stong stong pa'i tha
477b5(rgyud 'grel): skad bral// spros pa brgyad bral 'dod ma yin// gang gis rang sems mtha' dri ma// med pa de bzhin dag pa nyid// rnal 'byor mtshan med de bzhin nyid// gnyis med lhun mnyam de bzhin nyid// grangs / 
477b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rim pa tha ma nyid// byin brlabs yon tan ngo bos brlab// bla ma'ang skabs mi mnyam nyid dang // lhan grub mtha' bral tha snyad med// stong chen ma skyes chos dbyings sogs// yon tan// 
477b7(rgyud 'grel): cherare brjod par zad// re re'i 'ang skabs kyi ngo bo dang // ming don nges tshig brjod pa dang / gtan tshigs yan lag du ldan pa// rnam gsum 'phrugs par 'byung ba yin// lhag pa'i don mchog 
477b8(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa// dngos rnams nidan dngos med pas// rtog pa'i sbubs ma yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de nyid rang gisal mi g.yo ba// zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 
478a1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// de yang so
478a2(rgyud 'grel): sor rtog sgom dang // mi dmigs shin tu mi dmigs dang // rjes su mi dmigs rim pa yis// mi gnas mi rtog rlom sems med// rang bzhi na ngang gis bdag med pas// bya byed gnyis 
478a3(rgyud 'grel): ka mi dmigs phyir// mkha' ltar 'du byed kun bral ba// bsam med 'dug la snom zhes brjod// 'du shes gang du'ang ma zhugs na// 'dod chags med par 'du 'bral med// de ltar 
478a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mnyam 'jog tshe// gnas dang spyod lam sgrib pa rnams// nor par zin na mi phrog par// bya phyir mdo tsam brjod par bya// dmigs pa rjed dang bying rgod drug/ rtsol dang mi rtsol byed pa// 
478a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // dogs pa log pa bcu gcig dang // thun mong bdun de bco brgyad do// de bzhin g.yeng ba rnam drug ste// ngo bos g.yeng ba rnam shes lnga// phyi rol yul lngar 'pho bas g.yeng // 
478a6(rgyud 'grel): byed rgod ro myong nang yin te// gzhan phyir dge sbyong mtshan ma'o// sems 'jug gzhan na ma theg pa gzhan// de'i lugs la sems 'phro yin// nga'o snyam pas sems 'jug pa// gnas ngan 
478a7(rgyud 'grel): len par the tshom med// dran 'byung rjes su 'brang ba dang // 'gog dang ther zug byal ba dang // ched du gsum 'chos yod la byed// myong dang 'du shes gnas dmigs dang // sdud dang mngon byed re/ 
478a8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // sgrib pa lnga bcu rtsa yan lag/ 'jig rten dang po bsam gtan bzhi// snyoms 'jug bzhir go las dgu ste// ther zug chad pa'i phyin ci log/ bya ba mngal 'byung sbyin zhing // dang thung 
478b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug dang du bshad thos// 'khor zhing kha dog mthong ba dang // khams las gyur pa'i cha yang shes// de yis 'gro nyal 'dug sdod dang // longs spyod tshe na'ang rnal 'byor bral// 'u tshe dur kun nya
478b2(rgyud 'grel): slang gnyid// skam chags tshod sems sme spyod rkyen// de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// skyong ba'i 'du byed brgyad ston pa'am// so sor cung zad pa lta bya 'am// yang na rang 'byung rang zhir bya// 
478b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar byis pa shed ma phye// bya byed mang por g.yeng bar gnas// bya byed mang pos bdag med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sbyar nas// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// dgag 
478b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bsgrub pa gal yin// cung zad khams kyi cha nyams pa// mi gsal mthong dang mi 'jug rdzogs// zin nas spyod lam dga' rten dang // mthun pa'i tshogs gso bar bya// spyod la ma rnal du ma 
478b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyong bas// so mthas tshad na dor byan // dran pa'i thag pas bsdam bya ste// rnam pa kun tu mi nyams bya'o// de ltar nor rtsen yun ring bar// gnas pa'i gdon mthar 'phel ba'am// g.yo thob goms paston mthar phyin pa// 
478b6(rgyud 'grel): masas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gang zag gzang po'i dru gnas tshe// kun rtags sems pa'i rdza ma ldad ces// mi snod 'gro bas skyob byed// de tshe mgol me 'bar bzhin// cung zad yang 
478b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag nyung // de tshed la bus 'byung 'jug sring // dgoms ched du byed sogs dang // btang snyoms dang po spang bar bya// ngo bo lnga bur mi skul par// thun kyang nus na sun mi bya// ro myong dor bas de mthar phyin// shugs snang mthong / 
478b8(rgyud 'grel): la dga' brod med// gnyis pa bar 'ga' 'tsher thob la// khams dang tshor ba rgyu rtags dor// shin tu yun rings brtson pa yis// gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan phyir bya ba 
479a1(rgyud 'grel): kun// slob g.yo nas bzung lnga'i bar// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// spyod dgu dor ba'i cig cha yang // mi dmigs mthun pas 
479a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod ces bya// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// longs spyod med las thams cad spyod// 
479a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa nyid na spyod pa med// nyams pa med spyod chags mi bya// mi 'gog mi zin tshogs gnyis ldan// bdag phyir kun la mi dmigs pa// rnal 'byor myur thob the tsho mod med// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod 
479a4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod che// de ltar spyod pas chos nyid du// byin brlabs sgrol ba cig shos te// gang yang gzhan phyir sems la rdzogs// gzhung las grags pa'i spyod pa rnams// skye bo kun gyis spyad gsungs 
479a5(rgyud 'grel): pas// mos slob ci rmos rkyen mthong na// de dag shes goms bzhi las spyod// shes 'jug kun kyang gzhan don du// las bzhi spyod cing bsgrub dbang che// lam kun skad cig chas sgomaso nas// 
479a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i 'khor lo mos sgom zhing // rang bzhin phab rdzogs mched mnyen nas// nus pa'i byin ldan rdzogs par byed// de tshe sdom pa thams cad kun// mos slob mi stong srung mod kyang // khyad par ting// 
479a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dam tshig ldan// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// logs na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi rta pe dam tshig yin// mi gtong phyir na dam zhes bya// sngar ldan de'ang 'dir goms byed// de bas rang sems// 
479a8(rgyud 'grel): rtogs byas te// le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs la// nga dang bdag med mnyam par srung // de bzhin nyid las 'da' mi byed// de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa de// de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur// snga ma 
479b1(rgyud 'grel): snga mar rdzogs byas pa// gong mgong ma rgyud ldan pas// yongs su 'phar gyi sngon spyod min// 'phar bas spyod kun mngon du sgra// de bas so so'i lci bzhi las// spyod sogs nam mkha'i yul 'dra'o// / 
479b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing khams dbang po sa khams bzhin// stobs ni stobs ldan rtsal bskyed 'dra'o// de ltar bya byed med srings no// lus ngag sems la drod 'byung ste// bzod pa'i phra mo thob pa dang // 'gyu ba'i 
479b3(rgyud 'grel): dbugs la dbang thob dang // don la snal du phebs pa ni// des par drod gsum thob pa'o// gzhan du rdul phran phyi rol dang // zla tshes la sogs mtshan ma mthong // reg pa rlungs su 'bab pa
479b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'dod pa'i yul la mi 'gro zhing // 'phro 'gyur dag la mi ngab// phyi nang chags yul zhen pa chung// snga bas spags pa nyams su 'byung // gzhan yul thugs sems phrogs pa dang / 
479b5(rgyud 'grel): chos brgyad mnyam rdzogs phal cher 'byung // de yang dbye thob snyan rims kyis// kun tu 'khor bar 'byung ba yin// gul ljong min pa'i rigs de la// pha mas khyim thab ltas bstan nas// brod pas/ 
479b6(rgyud 'grel): bsu zhing zang zing dag/ don du gnyer la brtson par byed// de bzhin rnal 'byor sde tshol ba// drod rtags mthong ba'i brod tshul gyi// shin tu lam la brtson byed 'gyur// de phyir 'di dag rjes su bstan// 
479b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma 'ang lam gyi stobs cha las// rtags sngon rdzu 'phrul snang bar 'gyur// de la snga ma phyi nang ste// phyi rol zad par skye mchog sngos// mthong dang pad mo 'od sogs mthong // nang du bzod thob bye brag/ 
479b8(rgyud 'grel): da // chu lnga rgyun las bags kyis bcad// me phogs mye grag dga' brod med// shugs snang brgyad po mthong ba 'byung // bcwo brgyad bdud yul cha yang 'byung // mngon par shes pa rnam pa drug 
480a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi zag pa yod med pa// sngon la dmigs pa'i mngon shes dang // yongs su rdzogs pa'i mngon shes dang // bar chad med pa'i mngon shes so// dmigs pa
480a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag dang 'phel ba dang // nyi shu lnga sogs yul khas sa mthong // gling grangs mthong thos rim pas bye// phyi ma stong gsum brgya yul dang // stong gsum spyong sogs yul 'gyur sogs// stong 
480a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum stong phrag bcu rdul snyed// grangs med brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul// de snyed yul 'gyur rgyal ba dang // mnyam pas phye bsal ma rdzogs yin// de bas rgyu'i sems dpa' dang // skal mnyam 
480a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir na brjod pa'i tshul// shes pa'i khyad par dgongs pa yi// bzhi yis phye bas rgyu 'bras nges// 'di tshe rdzu 'phrul rjes brtan dang // ches snang kun brjod cig car la// rdzogs kyi 'di tshe 'byung ba'i

480b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes chags med rnam par dag/ thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin// sems nyid dang bas a rab bde// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// gtsang dang rme ba'i blo ma 'dzin// thams cad chos

480b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal te// snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor bshad// rjes su mthun pa'i lus nyid kyis// yan lag sgo nas shes par gyis// sngon du stong goms rnal 'byor pas// khams gsum thugs 
480b8(rgyud 'grel): rjes bzung ba'i phyir// yan lag brgyad sngon bzhin byas nas// ye shes sgyu ma'i snying rje sgoms// bdag nyid dri ma gsal ba dang // stong pa'i mdud pa gshig pa dang // gdul byas la dgod pa dang // 
481a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya cig pa'i sbyar bya zhing // rnal 'byor 'di nyid gnyer ba dang // bden pa gnyis su mi stong phyir// rnal 'byor 'di la gnas byas te// 'jug pa'i thun mtshams dus kyis

481a3(rgyud 'grel): po yod pa ma yin te// sgyu ma mig g.yor sprul pa dang // mig tu 'ja' tshon chu zla bzhin// bdag dang 'gro ba ngo bo gcig/ gsal dang rtags pas tha dad phyir// cig dang tha dad gnyis med 
481a4(rgyud 'grel): pas// bya med bya ba 'gog med par// mthong ba ma shor tsam du bya// rjes sam rtog spyod sngon 'gro bya// de bas gnyis goms rgyu goms pas// dran pa'i spyi blugs ye shes gsal// sngon du 
481a5(rgyud 'grel): btang ba gang yang med// nam mkha' nam mkha' ji bzhin du// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa// mig g.yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la 
481a6(rgyud 'grel): ninam mkha' sgom// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs chen thabs las byung ba'i// des ni byang chub rdo rje'i mchog/ thams cad du ni ye shes 
481a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal// ye shes de ni ma yin pa// chos 'ga' tsam yang yod min pas// gdung 'dra mo sbal dus cig bsgral// bsod chen snying rje'i rang bzhin te// mi 'dod phan 'dod byams chen po// mi 
481a8(rgyud 'grel): 'byod dga' mchog bral med snyoms// tshangs pa'i chu bzhi dus gcig rdzogs// mngon par gdung ba de la med// de phyir rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dang // dus dang rang bzhin 'khrul pa dang // tshul gyis rnams 
481b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ngo bo dang // btson ra lta bu brgyad la dmigs// de yis cig shes bzhi 'byung bas// pha rol phyin dang mtshungs ma yin// de dag ngo bo nyid snyan pa'ang // rnam grangs bzhin du 'dug pa ste// 
481b2(rgyud 'grel): don dam rnal 'byor ngo bo yis// phye bas zung 'gyur nges tshig 'byung // de la log rtog sgyu ma ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo yod la sogs rtags pas// rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung
481b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba// skye dang mi bden slu bas 'grub// rten cing 'brel pa'ang shing rta bzhin// 'jig rten rnam rtog gzugs brnyan phyir// sgyu ma lta bur rkyen pas skyes// 'phral snang bya ba kun kyang byed// / 
481b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog can rnams la mthun par snang // gzugs brnyan 'dra phyir brtags pas dben// de phyir thams cad rdzun pa tsam// ming las dngos med 'dod pa min// yang dag nyid du grags so cog 
481b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis snang nyid na gang min pas// sems phyir ci yang rgyu med shar// snang la ngo bo nges med cing // ji ltar bltas par snang ba ltar// snang bzhin ther zug chad dang bral// rgyal ba'i sku'ang ma skyed 
481b6(rgyud 'grel): bar// rig pa'i ye shes sgyu mar shes// khams gsum pa'ang de bzhin pa// thabs chen sgyu ma kun ngo bo// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon 'byung 
481b7(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// rgyu rkyen rags pa med pa'i phyir// sgyu ma rdo rje brtsan po mchog/ 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang // 'dus byas sna tshogs rdo rje nyid// 
481b8(rgyud 'grel): yin phyir ngo bos tha dad min// dman pa rnal du goms byed tsam// 'grol skad cig gnyis mi 'chad// rgyud cig ma 'gags ma skyes pas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// ye shes sku 
482a1(rgyud 'grel): mar mi g.yogs la// chu dang zla ba ji bzhin du// mtshungs par gsal bar ngo bor brjod// sems las ma rtogs chos med kyir// ye shes sgyu ma gzhan na med// sgyu ma// 
482a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi chags bral ba// tha snyad tsam du sgom zhes bya// mi mthun sgrib pa'i dmigs gzung ba// nA dang ngo bo nyes pa ni// ma goms pa dang 'grus byed pas// med de du ba'i tshul bzhin du/ 
482a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag du 'dzin pa rnam gnyis kyi// ting 'dzin bsgrib pa 'byung bar byed// sngon du ji bzhin nyid bskur med// mtshams sbyor snying rje g.yung min pas// brjod kun 'bring dang nyung bar 'byung // skye 
482a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs goms pas tha mal dkon// 'on kyang 'di nyid 'phro sdu dang // ma nges saM phyogs mkhar bcas mthong // zad par mthong nam nges mdog/ me chu rlung sa'i cha 'khrul pas// migs la 
482a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog mthong khams 'khrul ltar// sa g.yos mthong ba'ang cha dbye'o// sprin dang ling thog mun pa bzhin// gang de gzhung las grags pa'i skyon// pra rarjes cha yis sgyu ma'i don// migs la 
482a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bul bar byed// sngon bzhin rtog pa'i nad bcos pa// shes bzhin sa mtha' tshod par b+ha// de ltar gyur na kun mo'i tshul// ma gas la rang bzhin dang bar 'gyur// rnam rtog mtshan mA/ 
482a7(rgyud 'grel): ci skyes kyang // ye shes sna ma rang sdang phyir// chags sdang re dogs mi 'byung ste// ye shes snum gzhan du min// de ltar ma ldan gang dag gis// tshar nas la rgyud bcad pas ni// yang na rtog pa'i 
482a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas yul blta// de mthong mun pa rnam dag spangs// 'dod min khadog mthong ba ni// 'byung ba bzhi'i gnyen pos gzhol// sngon bzhin sngar 'brangs phyis sngon byed// de ltar rang bzhin rkyen gyis 
482b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes// tshor na thog ma'i nyes bsams te// skyo ba skyed pa dor dran bcing // brod pas 'jug cing gzengs bstod bya// de lta de ltar brtson 'gyur ba'i// skabs su ye shes rnal 'byor nyid// 'phel ba/ 
482b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong g.yo thob goms pa dang // bstan mthar 'gro ba ngo bo la// med kyang rab rim dag chas brjod// 'bo dgye ba thim pas ru drag chu// cung zad thun gyi sum char yod// bzhi cha lnga char de med thob
482b3(rgyud 'grel): thun kyang nus shing gsal ldan na// chu klung dal 'bab tshul bzhin no// ske rten rdzas lngar rtog rlang gis// mi skul bzhi la gnas pa'o// dbang po mngon sum kar byas pa// bskyed du bya med phyir
482b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha'o// snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// srid gsum g+hu ma 'dra bar ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas shes// 'gro ba'i ched du go bsgos te// 'gro ba de ltar snga nas shes// log par 
482b5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan cing // thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // rjes su 'jug pa'ang de bzhin shes// de bzhin nyid 
482b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings sna tshogs mang po thabs su snang // thabs nyid rgyum mig yor chu ba gzugs brlar bzhir// de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa mchog gi gnas 
482b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas// ji ltar dpyad kyang zad med gnyis grub sgrib mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin// byang chub sems su rgyu gcig pas// rtsa ba'i snying rje chen po 'byung // sangs rgyas 
482b8(rgyud 'grel): sems can cig rtogs na// snying rje chen po skye zhes bya// brdal chen po ni kun tu snang // thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams// thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gdung // sems can ma lus 
483a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la// snying rje thag pa ma chad par// nyon mongs lam las sgrol byed cing // byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la// snying rje 
483a2(rgyud 'grel): chags pa cher bskyangs nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skyo ba med// de bzhin skye bo phal pa rnams// las kyi sgrib pas ma gos shing // thams cad mngon par 
483a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la 'gyod ma byed// sems can nga dang bdag med so// thugs rje gnyis rtogs mi 'byed de// bu gcig 'dre bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad dri ma med par bya// / 
483a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon rdzogs rkyen bral sngon bzhin te// rnal 'byor nyid la gzhan don rdzogs// dmigs pa bdun gnyis gdul bya dang // ngo ba las dang phan yon gyis// phyogs btad med de thun mong gi/ chen po/ 
483a5(rgyud 'grel): dge las slar 'gyur yin// bdag phyir spyod yul thams cad kun// ye shes sgyu ma rang sdang phyir// phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang // ye shes blo bstan shin tu bde// longs spyodalnga 
483a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan thams cad pa// gtsang ba ba'i blo ma 'dzin// thams cad ye shes gcig pas// gnyis su med pas shin tu bde// de bas spyad dang mi spang len// 'dod yon la sogs mi 
483a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rol// thub chen ston pa'i spyod yul ni// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med// ye shes snom cir yang 'grub// zag med zag pas rtog/ 
483a8(rgyud 'grel): pan// dag par mthung gang yang med// ye shes ma bcos kun tu gsol// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o// de phyir spyod lam thams cad kun// b+h+ra ma ye shes 'da' mi bya// rtsab 
483b1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag thams cad kun// snga ma bzhin te nus pa 'phel// de ltar snga ma thob goms pas// 'khor ba'i chos la tshad med pa'i// byang chub sems kyis 'phrogs par 'gyur// ma 'khrul 'khrul 
483b2(rgyud 'grel): la ya mtshan skye// don med 'dug la de bzhin te// rnam gsum lnga la sa 'phel bar snang // nyams rims 'phel ba'i mtha' rtags ni// shing bal lta bur yang ba dang // lus kyi bzod pa 'phra 
483b3(rgyud 'grel): thob ring // khams bde mi bai de snyoms pa dang // phal cher yod cing chos brgyad snyoms// de bas mang dang 'bring la sbram// kun kyang lnga las grangs 'phel zhing // ngo bo gsal la yun ring po'o// 
483b4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig drug 'dug phyi rol gyi// mngon shes 'phel dang cung zad bstan// gzhan pa'ang shes pa cung zad 'byung // de bas rnal 'byor bstan par bya// 'di tshe spyod yul thams cad kun// 
483b5(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam du'ang sgyu mar mthong // snying rje gang yang mthong ba dang // byin rlob dbang bskur mang mthong dang // bdud kyi spyod yul mtshan mar mthong // de sogs snang yang chags mi bya// snying rje chen po 
483b6(rgyud 'grel): goms byas nas// rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar sgrom// yon tan namakha'i mtha' dang mnyam// spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid dang cig/ rgyu spyod bsod nams 
483b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs chen ldan// de ming ma chags ye shes che// rnal 'byor phyi ma btsal ba med// nyi 'od sa bon dkyus dgra bzhin// 'pho ba med bzhin 'gyur snang tshe// sgyu ma bstan byas las rgyun spyod// 'phel 
483b8(rgyud 'grel): bas lam dang sol mi 'gyur// phyi ma 'ang lan grangs gzhan dag la// mi ldog dbang sbur rigs su nges// lam 'dir cha skyen rdzogs bsgrub na// mtshan dang dipe byad kun ldan pa'i// dbang phyug chen pos 
484a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas nyid du// mngon du 'byung bar the tshom med// ma rtogs le lo snyoms las byas// don ma grub par ngan song 'gro// snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste/ 
484a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o// // gnyis med dang la phyag 'tshal nas// phyag rgya cig pa'i rnal 'byor bshad// gang dag rdo rje gsum rtsom pa'ang // snga par 'das pa'i lus kyis shes// spyi'i sa las sngon rdzogs pa 
484a3(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'di nyid sgyu mthar mngon bya zhing // lugs sogs mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gzhag/ de la yan lag brgyad sngon bzhin/ 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs bya zhing // spras pa'i rgyu yis thob bya dang // rgyu stong 
484a4(rgyud 'grel): rtog zhen dbang du bya// rtog pa'i phung sogs gnas bskur zhing // gzhan dag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor shin tu gces// de la 'jug thabs rnam gnyis te// sems sbyang ba dang lhar
484a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'o// snga ma gdams ngag shes rab kyis// 'jug pa'i gzhi'i 'di nyid de// a/ rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu 'phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas// 
484a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de la'am yang na thugs yig ste// de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// yan lag rnam shes ye shes phyir// yi ge hUM la shin 
484a7(rgyud 'grel): tu baisdu// ni'i dmig gis bltar yod par// 'dris nas bdag gzhan don phyir spro// mchod don rdzogs nas slar bsdus te// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su gsal// goms par bya ba shin tu gces/ 
484a8(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma tshangs pa srin po'i tshul// rdzogs par bya ba zung du 'gyur// tshangs pa'i cha lugs rdzogs bya ba'ang // gang bsgru ba yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgoms kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 
484b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus// 'di ltar de nyid goms bya ba// sngon du mi dmigs dang 'idangs// a dkar gsung gi phyag rkyang 'bar// shin tu 'tshor bar gsal snyoms pa// thams cad ang ni gyur par skom// de bzhin 
484b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du 'dris byur nas// a las ma'i dkyil 'khor spro// a ma ka sal bar 'byor bung nas// hrigs la pad+ma chags med tsam// rin chen 'bar ba'i gnar yas bsgom// nyi bla gdan dang gzhal yas 'ang / 
484b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsdus shing gsal bar thob// de dkyil yig hU~M gnas par// mthing kha 'tsher la gsal ba yi// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par brtsam// 'od 'phres dbyings su babrar bsdus nas// shin tu rdo rje 
484b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phra bar sgom// rdo rje 'od 'bros gsal 'bar nas// dbyings su yang ni bsgrib par bya// de nyid sems dpa'i sngar gyur pas// shin tu 'phra ting 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur

484b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab che chung gis// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// chu las nya ldang rnga bzhin du// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// zhal gsum phyag drug dag tu sgom// gzhal yas gdan sogs snga ma bzhin// yar 
484b8(rgyud 'grel): lag lha dgu'ang de bzhin no// de la shin tu goms par bya// rag sha cha lugs 'dzin pa'ang // rims dang gcig car mngon bzhin te// rdo rje chog kha dog dang // gzhapa yas la sogs bskur te bsgom// 
485a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rigs gzhan mos pa 'dra// 'bru bzhi sbyangs te gdan gnas gci// rdo rje rnam gsum rigs su sbyar// sku dang yan lag de bzhin no// rim pa thob pa'am cig car ba/

486b8(rgyud 'grel): chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor bas su// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 
487a1(rgyud 'grel): kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub// yi dam lha yi mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung rdo rje bdag po'i phyir// 
487a2(rgyud 'grel): lha spongs dge sbyod don med 'gyur// dam tshig bsrung dang sngags zlas dang // phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa gzhi'o// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan par bzung // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung 'gyur na// 
487a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'grub nyen yang med par gsungs// ji lta ral gri'i som nan tan du// legs pa ma bzung lag pa chod par 'gyur// de bzhinanan tan med pa'i gsang sngags la// phung pa 'am yang na 'bras bu/ 
487a4(rgyud 'grel): med par 'gyur// de bas bar chad brtson med na// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu med par dang // mi khom 'khor bar brgyud par 'gyur/ 
487a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig zhal mthong mos pa yis// bsnyen bskur mchod pa'i bsod nams kyis// mi dge mtshams med bco lnga sogs// las ngan sbyangs te rigs la sbyor/ grang gis mi rtag mthong na'ang / 
487a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ma nyams gsal bzung ste// las kyi ma 'khol gang 'dod du// a yaM stobs kyis bskul bar bya// rnam smin rigs la the tshom med// 'on te 'amini rim pa yis// de nyid bar gyi ra lan grangs 
487a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan// che'am phyi ma 'am gzhan thob des// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa na// dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub par 'gyur// 
487a8(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bsgom zhing 'grub byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma byung yang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// lha mi mtshan rdzogs sdug bsngal sel// bde gshegs 'byung dang mi rgol zhing // theg po sman 
487b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug mi 'gyur// byang chub bzungs la zhugs pa yin// de bas lam 'di 'bral mi bya'o// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// // rang gi lha la phyag 'tshal te// spros 
487b2(rgyud 'grel): pi'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya// spros pa bzhi po de lta bur// gzhan pa 'grol phyir rgyas par bshad// rnal 'byor rnam gsum mngon rdzogs nas// sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas// ri mo rgyu 'am 
487b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bur lugs sam// 'jim pa las byas dkyil 'khor ni// lhag pa gzugs brnyan khung bu dngos// ye shes byin ldan rten par bya// ma hA ba laM a mri ta// dmar chen phyi nang mchad pa bkra ma// 
487b4(rgyud 'grel): rol mo mchod sogs cha rkyen rnams// ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du bya// phyogs bcing brgyad kyi rim rdzogs nas// las kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab par bya// bdud rtsi chus 
487b5(rgyud 'grel): bsang bgegs bskrad 'dug/ bsod nams yongs su rdzogs bya zhing // spyod yul byin gyis brlab pa dang // 'khor lo sa mthar dbyung ba dang // tshogs la dus kyi bsgrub phyir skom// dgug 
487b6(rgyud 'grel): gtang ba cing sgrol gso dang gsad// 'pham rgyal ting 'dzin 'dis byed phyir// gang dag gdul bya ji snyed pa// spros pa'i las kyis gdon phyir ro// ci gnas spros pa'ang rnam gnyis te// rjes su 
487b7(rgyud 'grel): mthun par zhi dang khro// de re re'ang tshul gnyis kyis// blo dang ldan par mtshan ston yin// snga ma rim dang cig car ba// che bas phyi ma bzhin 'jug pa// nyi zla gza' skar dus cig tu// chu dkyil 
487b8(rgyud 'grel): dang bar gsal ba bzhin// sku gsal skad cig 'od du 'bar// snying po brjod pas 'khor lo shar// de sngon bstan pa bzhir 'jug pa// mthong dang snga ma'i rnal 'byor stobs// thob pas shes bya 
488a1(rgyud 'grel): bslab tshul dang // du ma gcig gi sa gsal byed pa'ang // ma bsgyur rnal ma'i dkyil 'khor la// 'khor lo tshom bu grangs zhal phyag/ dang po bco brgyad bzhi bcu gnyis/ 
488a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par bslab// gnyis pa'ang bdag cag yab yum gnyis// gnas pa'i 'khor lo gsal bya ste// gdan ldan dbus na bdag po gnas// de la sems dpa' khro bos 
488a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor// bstan nas mdun rgyab sku gsung thugs// 'khor lo rdzogs pa 'bru gsum brda'// me'i dbang du tshom bu gsum// shin tu goms par bya ba yin// bstan nas g.yas dang g.yon 
488a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid du// yon tan 'phrin las dkyil 'khor gzhag/ rnal 'byor dbang du tshom bu lnga// shin tu 'dris nas dus tshogs sbyar // gsum pa rtsa ba sku nyid du// bstan nas su gsum gtso bor 
488a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal// gsum tshor med na yon tan gsal// lnga rdzogs yab yum zung bstan nas// lnga po'i don spos bzhi bcu gnyis// ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa las// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 
488a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgom// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// stangs dbyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya dang // sangs rgyas stong / 
488a7(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor yang // ri ra ba til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du// dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam spras pa'o// de ltar gtso mchog ldan byas nas// bya byed rigs bzhi'ang stong sgom bya// bcu gnyis drug 
488a8(rgyud 'grel): ges 'od 'phro 'bar// nyi khri bzhi stong dus gcig gsal// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang // nyi zla gza' skar rkyen dang gdan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus sgom// bsam yis 
488b1(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub nyid la slob// bzhi pa cig zhal gsum phyag drug/ bstan na gsum la'ang de bzhin te// lnga pa rjes su mthun goms nas// spros pa'i zhal phyag rdzogs gsal ba'o// bsgyur ba'i// 
488b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'ang de bzhin te// dang po lnga bcu brgyad goms nas// drug cu rtsa brgyad de bzhin te// dbus kyi he ru bzhi po la// sku gsung khro bo mdun rgyab gsal// de bstan 'khor dang bcas par
488b3(rgyud 'grel): sgom// sku gsung thugs la bstan byas nas// g.yas g.yon pa 'phrin las khro ba// yab yu ma gas lanas 'khang lo lha// rdzogs par sgom pa'i rims bzhin du// gang byas ma sun gyen du 
488b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phang // rjes su mthun pas 'jigs byed cang // gcig dang gnyis dang gsum bzhilnga// yab sum mapar ldan 'khong lo 'chis// lnga bcu'i tshem bra gnas yul dang // sgom skad hUM chen 
488b5(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad// yan lag bkod pa lnga bcu brgyad// chas lnga'i grangs ni nyis brkyang dang // dgu bcu'i lha rnams yan lag ldan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsum drug dang // dgu dang bco brgyad kun ldan 
488b6(rgyud 'grel): dad // nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// dgu brgya stong brgyad brgya zhabs dang // grangs med par du slob byed pa// rims thabs brjod kyi spyod yul ni// nyi shu gcig dang dgu brgya dang // 
488b7(rgyud 'grel): grangs med mthar lam rim par ldan// de ltar ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// zhugs slob mthar phyin par skabs su// rang bzhin yul nas da bab bya ste// bzhugs shing bstan sogs ldan byas// 
488b8(rgyud 'grel): te// rdzas dang ting 'dzin rims bzhin mchod// bstod smod ldan nas bsnyen pa bya// bar skabs lhag ma'i gnas skabs nas// dam bsgrags bcol zhing las la dgye// 'khor lo bsdu srung 
489a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam kun// khro zhi man dgazhung bzhin bya// phung sogs dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba// rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan ji bzhin du// kun rdos rang rig lhar gsal ba/ 
489a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// gsal la yul ni mi g.yo ba// rnal 'byor ngo bor rgyal bas gsungs// rang bzhin spros pas rnal 'byor spros// de yang gdug 'dul khro zhi spos// 'khor lo// 
489a3(rgyud 'grel): spos dang phyag tu spros// tshom bu spros dang zhal phyag spros// kun nas spros phyir 'bras bu'ang spros// spros pas nyams gsal rnal 'byor sba'o// 'di tshe le le rnam gnyis dang // mtshan mtha' wa/ 
489a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos mthong 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor bdud kyi yul mthong ba// sprul pa grangs med dgye ba mthong // dam par mdun mthong dam pa smra// rgyal bas gsungs kun gsal mthong dang // dus 
489a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsal shes mthong ba dang // rgyud drug lam gnas kun mthong ni// de la snying rje'i shugs 'byung dang // kun kyang gsal bar mthong ba dang // ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang // mkha' 
489a6(rgyud 'grel): las gzhi 'dra 'dug dang // rgyal bas phyag brkyang lung ston dang // kun gyi skad du chos smra dang // snod bcud sti gnas mthong ba dang // stong gsum mnyam par bkod pa dang // de nyid rang bzhin 
489a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal snang dang // las su rung bas thogs med dang // dam pa'i don la sgom pa dang // 'jig rten gtso bos mchod 'byung rnams// rang bzhin rtogs na dam pa'i rtags// mi shes dga' bred 
489a8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa bdud// khe dang grags pas phrogs pa dang // sngags pa thob pas mtshan ma g.yengs// re dang dogs pa cung zad yod// nga'am nga zhes che bas rgyal// tha mal pa'ang nyung la pra/ 
489b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba'i gzung 'dzin bye brag shes// shes 'jug 'byor pas 'gro thob cing // zung du 'brel pas bskyed mthar phyin// 'bras bu lam shes bstan pa yis// bya ba med pa'i brtson 'grus blang // 
489b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rang rig cho 'phrul pa// sems phyir mthong la re dogs med// dper na nam mkha' rang bzhin la// nyi zla gza' skar glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshon sprin mnga' 'khrul 'gyur yang // nam mkha'i// 
489b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings la 'gyur nyams med// chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung rmad 'byung ngo mtshar dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs snang 'gyur yang // de bzhin nyid la nyams 'gyur med// rnal 'byor 
489b4(rgyud 'grel): stobs yon rdzogs 'gyur yang // bdag gnyis med shes nga rgyal med// spyod yul mtshan ma gang mthong yang // ye shes rang snang nyid du sbyar// snang byed spros pa 'ang 'phel ba'i rims// bslab 
489b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa ji bzhin te// sngon brtan mod kyang 'di slob pa// ma goms dbang ni rnam lnga'o// gsum lnga lha gsal cung zad g.yo// bar chad 'byung ba'ang dang po'o// de gsal thun gyi bzhi cha gsum/ 
489b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba mi g.yo gnyis pa ste// thun kyang nub pa gsum pa'o// de nyid rkyen dbang mi 'gro ba// bzhi pa'o phyad par gnas pa yin// shin tu mi 'phrogs lnga pa ste// grangs la sbyang ngan mthar thal// 
489b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de bas nyams tshod zin pa zhes// rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni// ji ltar spyad kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen lding ba bzhin// tshul rgyal chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' la rlung 
489b8(rgyud 'grel): chen 'phyo ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar lta// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong 'gyur te// de la su zhig chags par byed/ 
490a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde ba mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu'i ngang la spyod// 'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen yin// lta spyod ya char ma gyur bar// 
490a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'chang rnams kyi rtag tu dpyad// lnga bzhi'i spang bya rmad spyod kun// bdag dang gzhan phyir 'jol zhog ste// gang yang byas lam mthong zhing // tshogs 'gyur 'dam skyes bzhin spyod thabs// yan 
490a3(rgyud 'grel): lag dbad po rnam shes kun// rnam smin o du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du sgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor sgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin muM du
490a4(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du sgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom// spyod yul lha dang lha mor rol// 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang // sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// 
490a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtag/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// thogs pa med par spyad bya ste// bsod 
490a6(rgyud 'grel): nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang rtag/ gzhan yang stong khams thams cad na// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad dpyad// dang du 
490a7(rgyud 'grel): blang dang mi blang ba// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu dpyad// chags pa med pa gyur pa dang // dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung // spyod yul mthong thos thams cad kun// / 
490a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba na// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pas// ma nyams pa'i dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gis brtag tu dpyad// yang na dam tshig 'di lta bu// ji ltar spyad 
490b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang sdom mi 'da'// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrub cing srung bar bya ba med// dge dang mi dge gnyis kha med// de la bsrung du rdul tsam med// gzhan phyir dregs pa'i srung bya kun// gang 
490b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'tsham par gda' mi byed// rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du ma srungs ni// yag sha khro bo me dpal gyis// snying las drangs te khrag 
490b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de'i sdug bsngal bzod glags med// de'i phyir lam bzhir ldog zag yod// shing bal lta bur shin du yang // dbugs kyi rgyu ba yun rings/ 
490b4(rgyud 'grel): bral// rnal 'byor mkha' la gza' skar bzhin// gsal la mi g.yo spyod yul med// zhor las byung bas rdzogs pa'i phyir// 'di zhes grangs kyi cha las 'das// las su rung ba'i rtags rnams 
490b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // sngon byung stobs su 'phel ba dang // khams snyoms rang lus bde bas rgyas// 'du ba bzhi bral bzod thob tshe// mngon shes drug dang rtsa lnga rdzogs// rab 'bring cha yis yul 
490b6(rgyud 'grel): khams gling // tshun chad gsal zhing 'dul bar byed// tshogs drug dag pa'i stobs las gyur// rdzu 'phrul nyi shu cha g.yo thob// thams cad skad mthun chos ston rjes// sa g.yos tshes snang byed 
490b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // yi ge spar byed kun brjod pa'o// 'di dag mthong dang bco brgyad dang // shugs snang brgyad mthong re dogs gzhag/ rmi lam gcig dang chos mthun par// 'byung ba gsal dang snyan pas 
490b8(rgyud 'grel): dbye// 'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum// bzang po ltas su lung bstan kun// lam 'di rdzogs par 'byung ba yin// bsgrub pa'i rigs 'dzin lam 'di nyid// mthar phyin rigs kyi rgyu yin phyir/ 
491a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma 'byung ba'i sa yin te// bar chad med tshogs skabs su'ang 'di'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnam shes byang chub sems// yul dus bya ba 
491a2(rgyud 'grel): chub chen mo yin// bdag rtogs rnam bzhi khro bo yin// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o// de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs ldan grub pa'i// de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga/ 
491a3(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor sgom// rtog gnyis bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lha gsal dngos po med sgoms nas// mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul// rang rig ye shes gsal skems 
491a4(rgyud 'grel): na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// rkyen gyis 'gyur ba'i dus byung na// spros pa gang yin gzung ba yis// las ngan lam zhes rgyun bcad nas// bar ma'am phyi mar gnyis sbyor 'dzin// 
491a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig nus gzhan skabs med pa'o// 'phen pa'i 'brel pas sa bon gyis// che rabs kun tu bde thob nas// gsum dang mi skol spyod pas thob// nyoms las med par brtson byas na// lam du 
491a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'dzin thob pa yang // chos nyid dam tshig smon mthu dang // yan lag rdzogs par rigs 'dzin 'gyur// spros pa'i rnal 'byor rgyan chags pa'i// bsod nams ye shes longs spyod kyi// mun snang 
491a7(rgyud 'grel): dug 'gyur ji bzhin du// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog bsres// spros pa'i rnal 'byor la slob pa'i le'u ste/ drag pa'o// // dkyil 'khor gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas// bar chad med par sbyor ba 
491a8(rgyud 'grel): yi// bsgrub pa dus kyi tshogs bshad bya// bar chad med pa'i lam bsgrub pa'ang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos// rdzogs par skabs 'dir shes par bya// 
491b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di yang lam bsgrub spyod pa yi// cha'i dang po bsnyen pa 'di// byang chub sems rtogs 'grus pa dang // bsnyen pa'i dam pa yin pa'i phyir// sems chas snying rje man chad do// phyag rgya gsal 
491b2(rgyud 'grel): ba nye bsnyen pa// de phyir gcig dang spros pa'o// bsgrub pa nyid ni bar chad med// dus kyi tshogs mtha' bsgrub chen len// ma thar lam gang thob grub pa po// gsum pa mchod pa'i skabs su shes// / 
491b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa gtso bo 'dir bstan pa// bzhi dang gzhung gis rdzogs par 'gyur// phun sum tshogs pa lnga bzhi la// bsnyen pa sgrub bzhi yis gzhung ba srangs pa'o// gang dag mos pa ji bzhin du/ 
491b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi dang khro bos bsgrub par bya// de la snga ma gnas dang dus// yo byad ston 'khor bsgrub pa po// bsgrub thabs phun sum tshogs pa yis// bzhi dang sbyor bas gzhung rdzogs bya// de la skyes pa 
491b5(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pas// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pa'i// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgongs
491b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'grub// ston pa mdzod ldan chu mo rdzogs// gnyer ldan rgyud dang las la mkhas// man ngag drod 'chang brgyad 'chang ba// rnal 'byor mthar ldan shin tu bsten// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs 
491b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// mnyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'khor gyis 'grub 'gyur mi ldan brlag/ sde dpung chen pos mi tshugs shing // sa dang bar snang shes pa 
491b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // lo rgyus rnam gnyis ldan pa dang // yid 'ongs brtsal rgyas par bya// rnyed nas tshom bu'i grangs bzhin du// che chung rkyen du 'tsham par bya// 'khor khang phyi nang ldan pa'i// rin chen byug 
492a1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsrungs pa dang // rin chen spros pa'i gzhal yas khang // yid 'ong bya ba shin tu gces// tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la rtsam// shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la// byang chub 
492a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa cher spyod bya// gsang chen dngos grub myur ba'i phyir// gzi'i skar shes pas blang bar bya// zhag ni sum cu phrag drag gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang skyar rigs 
492a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog bsgrub phyir// rnal 'byor brtson chas rims bzhin bsgrub// gos brgyan bza' btung gsang pa dang // bsgrub pa'i yo byad lnga rnams dang // dkyil 'khor yo byad mchod pa'i rdzas// 
492a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rten dang bar chad bzlog/ yo byad dag par bsdu byas te// tsho gsum bcad la byin gyis brlab// sgrub thabs yan lag bzhi sbyar ba// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // mnyams 
492a5(rgyud 'grel): blo ni rab ldan pas// dang pa'i dam mnos bzhin du bya// dam bcas ldan pas 'dus te bsgrub// yang na dpag tshad rgyang grags tshad// so sor 'tsham pa'i gzugs brnyan bri// brgyan dang 
492a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod sogs 'khor ba dang // phyi rol mchod pa la sogs te// phyin chad bsrung sgo rims bzhin bya// bsnyen pa'i don du sngon bya ba// rdzogs pa'i las rnams zin par bya// 'dus pas
492a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcing rdzas brlabs nas// spyi'am yang na re re zhing // tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor rims bzhin sgom// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhi gshegs pa'i yum du sgom// 
492a8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sems ma nyid du sgom// so so'i rigs dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ 
492b1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan rig pa'i// tshom bu 
492b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung pa'i lha rnams bsgom// lnga dang lnga'i sbyor ba yis// tshom bu lnga'i lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// byin brlabs dbang dang ldan byas nas/
