497b8(rgyud 'grel): chos kyis bde spyad nas// bla med rdo rje sems dpa'i sar// dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan// mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen// tshigs chen gnyis kying rdzogs par rol/ 
498a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing la dbang sgyur te/ spyod yul kun tu ma 'da' la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// de bsalas dus rag lus sems// der byas brtson 'grus chen/ 
498a2(rgyud 'grel): pos sbyor// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'da'o// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// 'di lta bu'i las byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma byung na// lus bag yid la dbang thob nas// 
498a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'byung dang skal mnyam 'gyur// las dang 'brel pa'i byin brlabs kyis// theg pa dman par yod mi skye// bsod nams ye shes dpung tshogs kyis// las kyi mun pa sbyangs
498a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// ngan song gsum du yong mi ltung // gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i// ngan song brgyad du 'gro mi 'gyur// gzugs mchog dam pa ldan pa'i phyir// rdo rje theg mchog rjed ma 
498a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// lha mi'i gnas mchogs skabs der// lus byad bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs// dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med// skad gdangs skrun cing 'gro don 
498a6(rgyud 'grel): byed// bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun// gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub// tshan po che'i mthu stobs ldan// 'gro ba'i don dang yang dag ldan// gzhan la gnod pa yod mi byed// snying 
498a7(rgyud 'grel): rje che zhing shes rab ldan// mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par byed// mthar phyin skye shi med pa'i sa// sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che// bkod pa'i 
498a8(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas thams cad la// 'dod lha drug pa ji lta bar// dbang sgyur dpyod pa'i dngos grub thob// de phyir dbang sbyor phyi ma'i dus// nyid du sbyor bas smos ci dgos// de ltar brtson 
498b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grus ldan pas ni// mthong dang phyi mar ma gyur na'ang // lan grangs gzhan du'ang bdun nyid las// mi 'da' rigs kyi dam par 'gyung// cho ga sngags dang yo byad dag/ bco lnga rdzogs nas 
498b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyams ldan// nges par tshogs te tshogs dpyid na// 'bras bu sngon du ma byung yang // rgyal po bran mo ngan bshos kyang // 'byung nur chags pa'i rigs 'dzin te// mthong na dmangs kyi slar 
498b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing // kun la dbang skur stobs ldan pas// lha rnams re ba'i mthu skye bas// bsrung ched mchod pa byed pa ltar// rnal 'byor stobs ldan 'gyur ba na// rdo rje dam can mang po kun// 
498b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbang gis khur bar byed// spyod yul der nas phyag rgyar rdzogs// la la de ltar de nges na// de ltar ma gyur bsod nams sa// tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan lnga bcu brgyad spyod pa'i// 
498b5(rgyud 'grel): sa gnas kun tu skye mi 'gyur// nges 'byung bzhi'ang spyod mi 'gyur// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te// rnam smin thob nas sngon bzhin te// 'di la the tshom ldan min pas// skal ldan kun 
498b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brtags 'grub bya'i// bar chad med pa'i lam// tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste// bdun pa'o// // dngos grub lhag pa'i mchog nyid la// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yis mos byas nas/ 
498b7(rgyud 'grel): bde chen sa la dgod pa'i phyir// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid bshad// dus tshogs bar chad med sa nas// lhag ma med dang yod pa yi// mya ngan 'da' bos mthar sbyor ba// thun mong lta 
498b8(rgyud 'grel): bur zung du 'gyur// de la thegs bshad pa ni// gcig dang du ma'i rnal 'byor ma// brtan nyid sa 'am de thob nas// zla drug bcu drug bsnyen bsgrub // rdo rje'i lus su ma gyur bar// stobs 
499a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung chen sngon zhan pa'i phyir// rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lhag lus gzhag/ rdo rje 'chang sar rig pas 'gro// lha'i rnal 'byor gsal rdzogs smin// lus kyi dra bas bsgrib gyur pa'o// 
499a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ling ka mi 'jigs pa zhin// bral nas snang byed de rnams smin// yid kyis lha'i gzugs bzung zhing // lus kyi rgya ma dang dral gyur nas// phyag rgya'i sa nyid gsal 'gyur nas// rnam par smin ces 
499a3(rgyud 'grel): ngal bya// da ga tas ji lta bar// phyag rgya thob lam dag pa'i// bzhugs rdzogs stobs che ni de kho na'o// de yang dgongs su khyad par gnyis// dgongs spyod rgya mtsho lnga phyi dang // cad mthun 
499a4(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyas med grags pa// lhag med 'thung med las lus med// mya ngan 'das pa'am min ces brjod// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshu la spyod pas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bdag gidon// 
499a5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'azhin las rdzogs byed pas// mi dor dgod pa gzhag kyi'o// de de'ang 'di dang phyi ma dang // lan grangs gzhan du rab 'bring bas// thob kyi skal bar ma 'gyung ste// dgongs spyod rtson pa gtso phyir 
499a6(rgyud 'grel): gang de bral ma zag par du// brgya pa ni rdzogs par bdag 'gyur ba// rdo lnga sogs rib pas 'dzin// phyag tu chen po'i dgapa 'bras bu// de pyi rgya che 'bar chad med// lam ma 
499a7(rgyud 'grel): sa cig yin no// bar chad med pa'am smin pa'i// mngon par shes pa'ang de ming cen// mi 'gyur nges par 'gyur ba'ang yin// dpag rad glid khams dpa paspong // phyim dus kyi cho 
499a8(rgyud 'grel): bslabs pas// dgongs spyod brtson pa stobs rdzogs dang // yo byad thabs kyi stobs las skyes// gzhan pa'i yo byad rtags pa na// dngos grub rol pa'i mthulas brang // thabs rgyas che bas 
499b1(rgyud 'grel): so so'ang // lam las skyes pas mchog yin te// de yang rgyu dus ngo bo grangs// dgongs spyod mngon shes sbyor ba'i tshul// gzhi gnyis lus kyis rdzogs par bshad// thabs dang grang bsgyur bya ba// 
499b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// kun tu yang sa pa chen por sgom// shes 'jug lnga rtogs goms pas ni// zla zhag rgyung bzhin bsgrub byed pas// rdo rje'i 
499b3(rgyud 'grel): lus su the tsom med// ming bzhi lus nyid de lta'o// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// rab 'bring ji bzhin mi slu bar// dbang ster rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// rgyu 'bras 
499b4(rgyud 'grel): dus gcig rdzogs pa'i// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug pa'i// brgyabargya dag tu snang zhing gnas// lus mabor bar sangs rgyas pa'o// don mthong 'jug pa mthar smin pa// 
499b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod bsgrub pa'i dngos grub kyis// lus khams skye gnas zag pa zad// rdo rje'i lus 'byung tshe'i rigs// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas sa// 'jigs pa kun 
499b6(rgyud 'grel): bral tsho 'bru tshogs// lha mi'i rgyal po skye ba 'dzin// lha dang mi dang tshangs pa'i// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang // khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// rma byad de nyid kyis chos ston// gang dag 
499b7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs rtsi 'chang ltar // dbang sgyur 'jigs pa lnga sogs bral// drug bzhi'i yan lag kun rdzogs shing // rang dbang sgyur ba'i skye ba yis// stong gsum 'jig rten rgyar 'dul byed// skya'i dang 
499b8(rgyud 'grel): bor ba sal mnyam pa'o// bdag phyir don du gnyer ba ni// brgya phrag bcu drug tshe yis rdzogs// gzhan du dang dbang thob pa'i phyir// bskal pa grangs med gnas 'gyur yang // sku ni shin tu gzhon 
500a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul// 'dul ba'i dus kyi 'pho 'dug byed// ngo bo sman dang thabs rigs 'dzin// rnal 'byor sgrol ma'i rigs 'dzin dang // lam mchog rdzogs pa'i rim pa'ang bzhi// bcu 
500a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang por 'dra mod kyang // de nyid mthu zag mi zag pa// rgyu dang ngo bo rnam pa gnyis// de bas dgongs spyod spos ci dgos// gzhan las grub pas de rigs min// mchog la'ang yon tan mtshan chas 
500a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod// lus dang phung por bcas pa yi// gnas par dbang ba'i rigs 'grub phyir// lhag rton 'byung las lus bcas 'das// zag kun zad pa'i rigs chen 'di// ji ltar spyad kyang ldog ma byed// 
500a4(rgyud 'grel): rang dbang thob pas dbugs phyung phyir// skabs 'dir bden pa par mthong nas// mkhas rtogs goms spyad rig pa 'dzin// lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// ming rtog gzungs las ming thob pa// yon/ 
500a5(rgyud 'grel): tan grangs kyis bsam mi khyab// bsngos sa zhing khams lung ston pa// rdo rje rdo rjer pos dbang bskur// mthong goms mthu ldan rig pa nyid// snang ba rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas// rigs snang gnas
500a6(rgyud 'grel): la nges pa med// skye ba cha byad don gyis 'gyur// chos rnams bdag phyir dmigs med phyir// chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sangs rgyas thugs mi mthong // snod bcud mi mthong 
500a7(rgyud 'grel): gang mthong ba// des ni yang dag bden pa mthong // de bas thos myong reg sogs lam// shes 'jug par chad med las skyes// de phyir mngon gsum rtogs mchog ni// rang dbang thob nas 
500a8(rgyud 'grel): mngon bzhin te// zag gsum zag pa 'di la med// sngan chad lam gyi 'du byed med// de'i re dogs chags bral bas// rim pa 'am rim pa med tshul gyis// stong khri la sogs grangs mang lha'i// 
500b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gsal rdzogs rnal 'byor gnas// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis don grub mdzad// de ming dbang sgyur rnal 'byor de// brgya phrag cha rdzogs dus bar du// goms byas gnyis thob mtha' skad
500b2(rgyud 'grel): cig/ cha'i rdo rje dpa' bos sbyor// rigs mthun mchog rgya sprul pa las// gsang thos bas mi rig sgom sbyor bas// dkyus sar phyin pa cang shes bzhin// kun tu 'gro ba bdag po'i don// 
500b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul chos skang rjes ston brjod// drag shes de ming ldan pa yis// dbang sbyar rtsa ba rdo rje'i sku// bya byed rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// bzhi'i thog mas don spyod pas// nus mthu can kyar dbang 
500b4(rgyud 'grel): cen des// mkha' la 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul// chu la mi 'byir mes mi tshig/ dugadong mtshan gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur// 
500b5(rgyud 'grel): mi snang ba dang mang por sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur dang // tshe dang du sa la bsring btung dang // stong gsum nyung 'brur shong ba dang // nyung 'bras stong gsum// 
500b6(rgyud 'grel): gang ba dang // ba spu gang bsdu'ang de bzhin no// sreg pa'i bskal pa bzhil ba dang // nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor 'bum dgye dang // skams sar chu 'byung bye ma gser// sol ba ljon shing dbyung ba dang / 
500b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar na me'ang tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gtor lung bya ba'ang 'grub// dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol// gso dang 
500b8(rgyud 'grel): bsad dang 'pha mad de rgyal// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang gdug pa sna tshogs rnams// tshugs 
501a1(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus mdor bar rigs 'dzin sar// thugs rjes sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// so so'i skad dang mthun pa yis// so sor thar pa'i 
501a2(rgyud 'grel): lam yang ston// ngan song stongs shing bskul ba dang // lam stegs dgod cing de dag nyid// theg chen lam la de god par mdzad// thar pa bskal zhing zhi ba slong // sa bcu shes bya spyod byed 
501a3(rgyud 'grel): cing // bde gshegs 'khor la'ang chos ston mdzad// stong gsum brgya bcu'i 'jig rten rnams// g.yo dang rab g.yo shin tu g.yo// mdzad pa snang bas de gnas rnams// nang g.yos 
501a4(rgyud 'grel): sa'i rim sbyor byed// gsang bsngags kyi sgra bsgrags pas// kun kyang rmad 'byung sngags kyi sbar// grags pas bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong // 'gro ba ma lus don yang byed// las rnams 
501a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun byas nas// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// mtshan dang dpa'i byad kun gyis brgyan// mthar phyin bye ba med pa 'grub// rgyud las gsungs pa'i lnga bzhi'o// spyod pa bcu gnyis 
501a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las rnams// dbang sbyor nyid du thogs med par// sngon bzhin yul khyon 'dul bar byed// skye mched rang 'byung ye shes phyir// de nyid gcig dang du ma'i mtha'// gnyis su med par 
501a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon rtogs goms// mthong pas dri ma drug sbyangs phyir// de nyid gzugs sgra dri ro reg/ shes pa bye brag rtsa lngar bshad// gcig gis yul lnga gcod byed pas// tshang dang ma tshang 'jigs dogs 
501a8(rgyud 'grel): med// gzhan du lha'i rna ba dang // spyan gyis mngon par shes pa dang // sngon gnas rjes su dran pa dang // pha rol rnams kyi sems shes dang // 'chi 'pho skye ba mkhyen pa dang // rdzu 'phrul shes pa 
501b1(rgyud 'grel): 'am thag zad shes// de rnyed tshul rkun yul shes pas// gang dang gang rnams 'dul bar mdzad// de med mi ldog zag med dang // dbang sgyur rigs kyi mtshan las brjod// bdag gam gzhan phyir 
501b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang can des// sku tshe'i tshad dam ji snyed par// bzhugs mtha' rang gi grub sbyor ba// sngon bzhin rims dang cig car ba'o// de 'ang snga ma mthong pa'i lam nyid du// rang gi shes rab gsum goms pas// / 
501b3(rgyud 'grel): rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che// gang sgoms mngon du gyur pa'i lha// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin der// yongs 'gyur lhan grub thob nas gshegs// phyi ma rigs mchog de nyid nas// sngon bzhin
501b4(rgyud 'grel): goms pa gsum byas pas// rgya dor cig car mthar 'gro ba// chos nyid dam tshig smon mthu'ang yin// de nyid bar ma ba shed bya ba'ang // sngon gyi lus kyis rdzogs par bya// gcig dang du ma'i rnal 
501b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas// 'byung lus sems phyir rang bzhin lha// mthong goms bsags pa'i mthar bsgrub pas// kun 'gro'i bsgrib dag ngo bo'i rgyu// rnam smin tshal gyis 'grub pa med// snga phyi rgyu 'bras 
501b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa min// dus rims 'dod min cig 'dod phyir// cig pas de nyid lam byas pas// lhag ma bcas pas bskur bsgrubs mtha'// de nyid gyur pa nges pa med// rang sems phyag rgya 
501b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po ste// goms pa mngon gyur lha'i sku// bsgoms pas gang yin mngon 'gyur sku// thun mong mchog gi mtshan dper ldan// longs spyod gnyis pa phyag rgya'i rigs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // 
501b8(rgyud 'grel): pad mo ral gri rigs 'dzin 'gyur// rang lus sdod nas phyag rgya che// bsgoms pas sngon du gyur pa'i lha// mtshan dpe bzhi dang mngon drug rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs su grags// ye shes/ 
502a1(rgyud 'grel): sku'i cha lugs can// 'byung ba rdo rje'i lus las grol// de phyir sku tshe tshad med de// banur zhing mngon du bya dang bral// de nyid rigs gsum rigs bzhi dang // lnga dang mchog
502a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i rigs 'dzin pas// rnam pa bani ru mngon bzhin 'gyur// mtshan gyi ming grangs gnyis dang gsum// mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo zhing // dbang sgyur 'du byed dang bral bas// zag pa med pa'i/ 
502a3(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'i lam// mi g.yo rnal 'byor nyid du'ang brjod// rgyal bas lung bstan sngon 'byung ba// brtag pa'i bye brag 'di la'ang med// ye shes sku'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i spyan dgongs 
502a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // rgyu 'thun yod kyang mi g.yo thob// shin tu bstan pa'i rlung gnas pa// grangs can 'khor la mngon du snang // 'on kyang rnal 'byor rtsol ba can// mnyam gnag dang las ma g.yos bzhin/ 
502a5(rgyud 'grel): stong gi 'jig rten brgya stong phrag/ bcu'i rdul snyed 'jig rten dang // zhing grangs med pas brgya stong phrag/ bcu'i rdul snyed zhing khams su// sngon dang smad 'tshong la sogs pa// sprul pa'i lus kyis// 
502a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar byed// bzhi dang drug sogs de bzhin no// drug dang lnga'i yan lag bcus// shes pa'ang 'dra mod bzhi sogs kun// de rnyed yul gyi khyad par dang // sngon rdzogs mthu dang gdul byas spags// 
502a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mi g.yo mthong goms dang // don du gnyer rims la sogs pa'i// lam kun rdzogs pa'i stobs byin gyis// rnal 'byor bral nas lhun gyis grub// lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma dag/ brtsal ba 
502a8(rgyud 'grel): med par lhan grub mthong // de de mngon du byas pa yi// lhan gyis grub pa'i rig pas 'dzin// rang rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas de// sngon bzhin bzhi brgyad dgod par bya// snga ma'i rigs la mthu 
502b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pas// bshad pa bzhin du dri ma dag/ sangs rgyas gnyis pa shes rab gsum// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs su 'byung // gnas der sngon bzhin gsum rdzogs pa// longs spyod gas// 
502b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lung thob cing // rang gi dgongs spyod nus pa can// mthar dbyung ba'i dus la bab// de ltar dag pa'i shes pa nyid// sku lnga ldan grub rdo rje 'dzin// lhun mnyam ngang la mi g.yo zhing // 
502b3(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog nyid du bzhugs pa'ang // bag la nyal ba 'joms byed cing // skad cig rag las rigs 'dzin mtha'o// cha byad rgyal ba nyid dri ste// lnga po lhun gyis grub phyir na// de 'dra de nyid rgyal 
502b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ston// de mi stong pas mi 'grub yin// nyid la skye shi mi mnga' phyir// rdo rje sku'ang gdul bya la// smras pa rnams ni 'da' tshul ston// don grib la sogs ji lta ba'o// bya ba ldan grub 
502b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi// rigs 'dzin chen po na rigs 'dzin// tha ma'i ming grangs mthar phyin lam// rang rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de nyid dang ni mthar sbyor lam// yang dag rdzogs pa'i rgyal 
502b6(rgyud 'grel): chab bo// snga ma gsum dang dang po bzhi'i// cha lugs rang gi rgyal tshab sdud// bsam yas lhun gyis grub rdzogs pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sman mchog 'chang // yi ge 'khor lo'ang 
502b7(rgyud 'grel): mngon gzigs pa// mi g.yo ba la mi rtog pas// da rung mngon par mi rgya ste// dus mtha'i skad cig nyid kyis gshegs// des na dgongs spyod rgya mtsho kun// ye shes rtsa la sogs bya med 
502b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang // mthar phyin bya bral la sogs pa'i// ming grangs cha las brjod par zad// nyid phyir rdo rje 'dzin sogs la// skad cig dus kyis brlab pa rdzogs// tha ma'i bag la nyal ba dang // 
503a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das par gyur pa yin// de tshe de sgrib cha yod kyang // lhun grub rigs 'dzin sar bzhugs nas// zhing khams thug pa med pa dag/ gdul gyir sprul sku mdzad pa'ang / 
503a2(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// thugs rjes ston pa bsam mi khyab// don dar mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// mi mthun zhags pas 'khor ba gcod// la lar lhams zhugs bltam pa dang / 
503a3(rgyud 'grel): la lar rab byung dka' thub mdzad// la lar khab dang rgyal srid dang // chos ston mya ngan 'das sogs ston// res 'ga' zhil res 'ga' drag/ g.ye ma la g.yem ston sdang la sdang// dregs la dregs dang 
503a4(rgyud 'grel): mun la mun// rlung la'ang de bzhin mthun mi mthun// rgya mtsho lta bu thabs dpyod dang // 'phrin las de bzhin pa yis dgrol// gsang ba'i tan tra ston pa dang // de bzhin bsdu ba mdzad pa dang // 
503a5(rgyud 'grel): dman lus bsod nams ldan gnas su// sna tshogs lus can rigs la bskor// mngon shes drag ldan mtshan bzangs spags// kun mkhyen ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir// yul dang ched med rgyal ba nyid// 
503a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar me long lta bu'i tshul// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag rtog mtshan ma kun bcom nas// rdo rje dbyings su thim par byed// bdag med rang rig ye shes/ 
503a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis// dngos dang dngos med bag chags sregs// rang dang spyi'i chos rnams kun// sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun// dngos po med par rtogs byas pas// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor 
503a8(rgyud 'grel): dang // rdo rje rtse mo'i mchog thob pas// yid tshod min dang bdu sde rnams// tshar bcad dpa' bos der rjes la// rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dal// bsam yas lhan rdzogs kun mkhyen mdzod// mnyam 
503b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhag ye shes dbang skur zhing // don du gnyer ba'i smon lam mthus// nyi shu rtsa lnga gzhan las min// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang // 'phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma 
503b2(rgyud 'grel): yin te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med yin// de bas ngo mtshar cho 'phrul chos// gzhan nas yod thob ma yin phyir// thabs la brten pas shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du byung / mun snang 'gyur// 
503b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi ma ki ta// ji bzhin ma spangs de nyid 'gyur// 'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye shes tshogs// mnyam 
503b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam// bya dang mi bya bya med byas// grub dang ma grub thams cad grub// de phyir rigs 'dzin tha snyad bral// mthar phyin pa'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// / 
503b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin nyid du mngon rdzogs pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la mos// srid pa rims dang rdzogs tshul gyis// mngon byas don yod bshad par bya// mtshan nyid tha ma'i tha ma ni/ ngo bo tshul dang khyad par gyis// 
503b6(rgyud 'grel): lus gsum don du snang ba rnams// ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya// lus gsum snga ma brjod par bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang // yon tan 'phrin las rmad 'byung la// lnga pa'ang lnga nyid ngo bor 
503b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas// e ma'o yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba lha'i lha// 'phags pa'i 'phags pa kun tu bzang // de bzhin gshegs las de bzhin gshegs// rin chen nor bu bzhin du bzhugs// 
503b8(rgyud 'grel): chos drug nor bus mtshon pa na// gcig dang du ma kun bral ldan// de de rigs dngos rigs bral ba// nyi shu lngar ldan kun ngo bo// smos bzhin de rigs mthun snang la// yang dag nyid du 'di zhes med// 
504a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga nyid lnga lngar ldan par snang // rigs bdag yang dag sangs rgyas pa// tha ma'i tha ma zhen bral ba// ye shes 'gro 'ong med kun khyab// gnyis med pa'i de bzhin nyid// ngang nyid 
504a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'ong med par shes// de bzhin bde chen dang nyid du// zung du kun bral gnyis phyir gshegs// sangs rgyas sems can sems la son// dbang phyug chen po'i skur bzhugs pas// gsang ba'i 
504a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po 'du bral med// dngos po gnyis la bde longs spyod// de nyid cha re brjod pa ni// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kun// dus gsum chos kun cig pa yi// rgyal ba nyid phyir sna tshogs chos// 
504a4(rgyud 'grel): snang lnga rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// de nyid d+ha ra ma ka yar gnas// thams cad dang rig mngon sum snang // zhen mtha' kun bral kun chub pa'i// rang 'byung ye shes chen po nyid// kun gzhi 'dul 
504a5(rgyud 'grel): snang phyir sku mchog/ 'dod khams mtha' nas rdzogs kyi bar// sdug bsngal kun dang 'dod bsams snyoms// 'gog zhi snang snyoms bde chen sogs// yul med kun rol longs spyod che// rta bdun 
504a6(rgyud 'grel): ri bong can nyid kyi// gzhal yas khang las ma g.yos bzhin// kun tu tha dad snang ba ltar// 'gro 'ong med 'dul kun skal mchog/ ji ltar mkha' la 'jig med ltar// mi rtog kun dngos rtag chen po// 
504a7(rgyud 'grel): rdorje sku mchog skye 'jig med// lnga pa nyid du bsgrags// so sor 'dul ba ye shes 'khor// rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang shes bya'i// sgrib pa mtha' spong sems dpa' che// rgyal po lnga sogs rgyud 
504a8(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs dang // mos spyod dang po 'am dbang sgyur rigs// rdo rje tshogs mthong phyir ming 'grub// de la de'i dgongs bshad pa// brjod dang brjod 'dar phyir nges pa// yi ge med par 'khyal ba bzhi// 
504b1(rgyud 'grel): yige drug cu drug gsum brgyas// 'phrul pa lnga nyid tshul gob// so so nyidi dang gsang bdag gis// snyan cha ltar ldan phyir thos pa// gsang ba'i rgyud bshad thos zhes gsungs// rang bzhin 
504b2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel dang dbang dang bas// dang ba'i tshul ni zla bzhin// ma skyes don gyis gsung mchog gis// smra brjod med par snang bar mdzad// rig pa'i ye shes ming lnga pas// de bzhin 'brel 
504b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byin brlabs kyis// rang bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun// zhim lta bur gsal bar snang // ma long lta bur chos brgyad kyis// mtshon pa'i dbang phyug sku mthong bas// byang chub sems dang / 
504b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' che// rgyud la rdo rje'i don snang byed// grol thar la ma dang 'khor ba'i sgra// drug gi rtsa ba yan lag tshul// tshangs pa'i ngag ltar las can la// snang ba sha'i rnabs thos// ji ltar go dang / 
504b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul snang ba'i// gsung rnams ngos la spras rgyan pa'i// sgra ltar grag stong dbyer med pa'i// mthong thos byed pa'ang de nyid mthu'o// dngos po gnyis chos yan lag bcas// sems can 
504b6(rgyud 'grel): bying na steng chen po'i// ye shes zung du bral ba'i// bde ba chen po mchog gi thugs// nam mkha' lta bur sems gsal stong // chos spyir rang mtshan dbyer med kun// yul med me long 
504b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar gsal ba// mngon gsum kun gyi mchog yin te// rnam par ri rtog mchog gzugs// chen po lta bur thams cad la// mi 'byed blang dor med mnyam zhing // mnyam pa chen po mchog gi thugs 
504b8(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen pas 'brel ba dang // nyid kyi dbyings las minan bye// babyed pad pa rnam ban yis// 'gro bkun skyel thugs chen yin// chos dang chos can kun bral bas// dang 
505a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med dus gcig tu// mkha' la 'ja' ltar gsal ba ni// mi phyed rdo rje thugs mchog go// phyog bcu ma lus mi lus pa// rang rgyud med par rig snang ba// sems kyi 
505a2(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu ma ldas sangs rgya ba zhing // lhan rdzogs rig pa dang snang ba'i// gnal yas khang du gzung dang 'dzin// bral ba'i rang rig rten pa dang // rten can med pa 
505a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas// ma spangs lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan// sna tshogs 'od zer phyo nas bcur gsal// stobs sogs 'bras bu kun rdzogs phyir// gdan lnga'i bye brag 
505a4(rgyud 'grel): rang snang ba'o// 'dul ba'i bye brag tha dad pa// ni dang khro dang sems nyams// ga ne byer rnam pazhi rol pa rnams// gang la mtsham par 'dul bar mdzad// rnam pa ni'i bye brag thad da pa/ 
505a5(rgyud 'grel): re re'ang lnga lnga'i tshul gyis sdang // de rigs pa ni ri cha 'dzin pa// las kyi rigs la ldan gyis grub// rnam pa bzhi yis 'dul mdzad pas// phyogs kyis 'dul ba'i rigs ma yin// de ltar 
505a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs mtha' skyes bu pa// rigs la char 'dzin byed kyang // cig shos sangs rgyas kun ngo bo// nyid du sna phyi drang ba tsam// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa'i// tshul ni sbu bas ma brjod 
505a7(rgyud 'grel): las 'das// de nod phyogs tsam brjod bya ba// drang don snga phyir sangs rgyas pa// don dam cig bu ma yin phyir// chul chu ltar rig pa med// cig shos bden pa ma yin pas// so so tha dad cha 
505a8(rgyud 'grel): rigs med// bden pa gnyis med dbang sgyur ba// bdag dang gzhan gyi gnyis med de// so sor med phyir der son pa// mtha' rnams thal kun ldan par// rang gnas zhen bral mngon bral ba// 
505b1(rgyud 'grel): ming brjod 'di 'drar gnas smra dka'// ngo bo gcig largyud ba dres men// shing gi me dpung ltar brjod pa// drang ba tsam ste de nyid min// tshul chu ltar 'dod pa'ang de'o// bden pa'i tshul gyis skyon brjod pa/ 
505b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i ye shes gnas yin par// kun tu nyid las grags pa dang // bder gshegs mi gnas mnyam pa'i// dang du byon gsung brjod pa'ang // mnyam pa gsum pa yin pa'i phyir// nges par rgyud 
505b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dres ma 'dres pa'i// tha skad bral ba'i tshul du gnas// thun mong min pa'i rgyal ming drang // bde gshegs de bzhin gshegs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das dang sangs rgyas dang // dgyes chen mchod sogs 
505b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' las kyang // lus gsum grangs ming khyad par tsam// mdor ru brjod pa chub par gyis// lnga dang lnga lngar lhun grub pa'i// rgyal ba gsum rdzogs so so'i// grub mtha' sa'i sangs rgyas las/ 
505b5(rgyud 'grel): grangs rdzogs ngo bo byin brlabs las// snang dang don byed che chung gis// pags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gsal// de tshul sa gzhi rgyal ba dag/ rgyud cig 'dres dang grol smra ba// 'dir drang tsam yin bshad 
505b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin// rgyud kyi khyad par bas ma las 'das// ming grangs theg chen dman pa las// thun mong tshogs kyis bder gshegs shing // de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'ang // dus kyi dbang phyir snga ma 
505b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// gshegs pa nyid dam gsang pa'ang // bya ba'i sngags kyis shes rab dang // cho ga nyi rna la 'byor grangs rdzogs pas// 'bras bu lam byas pader gshegs pa// rdo rje 'dzin sar de bzhin 
505b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs// yang na bya rgod 'dab logs su// dgon phug bye ma 'dab sA ru// sa ri dbang skur ji bzhin nang // ba ra nA sa'i bsil khang du// dam pa'i rigs can dbang bskur nas// rdo rje 'dzin thob kyi 
506a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// thub pa'i dbang po de ji bzhin// gshegs pa rgyu dang bya ba dang // gnyis ka rgyud las grangs bzhin no// rnal 'byor gnang gis don grub nyid// na ra dza ra 'gram// 
506a2(rgyud 'grel): logs su// dka' thub dka' ba skyed pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu sprul pa'i longs spyod sku sa// byang chub lnga stabs dbang bskur bas// 'og min nyid du don grub ste// sprul pa'i dka' thub log pa nas/ 
506a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes snang mdzad tshul du gshegs// ri rab rtse mor 'khor lor bskor// de yang rtog pa'i gzugs sku yin// thabs dang shes rab lam nyid kyis// 'gro 'ong med par bder gshegs te// de bzhin 
506a4(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub dang son pa// tshul dang ngo bos khyad par che// don grub dka' thub lus can la// phyogs bai nu rgyal ba sprin bzhin du/ 'dus pa gsang ba'i longs spyod kyis// srod dang the rangs dus nyid du// 
506a5(rgyud 'grel): nyizla gsang ba'i dbang sbyin dbang // rol pa'i kar bstan pa yis// ye shes stan rdzogs dbang thob paso// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de phyir thun mong rnam gsum las// byang ba bzhi dang chub 
506a6(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi// bde bar de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad// grangs dang ngo bo rtsal gyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das// thun mong mchog lugs snga ma bzhin// so so lam thabs shes rab kyis// 
506a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lta bu bzhi bskyed pas// bdud pa ni nges bcom mya ngan bzhi// 'das shing mtha' bzhi'ang 'das pa dang // mi mthun gzhung gis sangs rgyas pa// lta dpyod ting 'dzin lam rim bzhin// grub pa'i
506a8(rgyud 'grel): mtha' las khyad par ba// lta ba'i sgrib pas phye ba yin// de nas dgyes pa'i longs spyod kyang // mdo dang bya ba rnal 'byor gnyis// rgyud las ji ltar grags pa bzhin// gong gi dgyes chen yid tshod min// 
506b1(rgyud 'grel): de phyir dgyes pa ris yod pas// sa'i sangs rgyas rims yod phyir// ming grangs yon tan cha min te// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par 'phags// // lam gyi rtsol bas ngal ba rnams// bred pa/ 
506b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed phyir kun tu 'od// rdo rje 'dzin pa drug po bkod par bstan// mthar thugs sa gsum cha las brjod// // de phyir skan tshwa lta bu ste// thabs mkhas 'di yis gzhan pa yi// thabs 
506b3(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas mos bcug cing // bsgyur bas 'dir grub dang thabs kyis// rang sa thob las ngo bo nyid// gcig par smra ba mun sprul pa'o// // mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bstan 
506b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// // 'gro ba lam log lam stor ba// lnga dang lnga rnams bkri ba'i phyir// mi gnyis lam mchog 'di bgyid pa'i// ngal ba'i dge rtswa kun grol shog/ byang
506b5(rgyud 'grel): chu bzhor byed khe grags gnyer// bcud chen 'dzag cing gzhogs ngom can// tsug rgyal sgeg mo 'dzag skyel dang // nags bya lta bur rkog g.yem sogs// tshal bsrung dam la mi gnas dang // gsang 
506b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzhung la sran mi tshugs// gzhung mangs bsgrub la yid ches dka'// bla ma spyi bos mi len cing // zhes pa sa bskur zhing yongs la bskur// snod med rnams dang ma phrad cig/ mang yul khri bas 
506b7(rgyud 'grel): su// dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur ba/ lam rnam par bgod pa/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag/ rdzogs so// // b+hu 'phrul man dag rnam bkod la sogs spu 'phrul gyi sgor las tshogs dang bcas pa rnams gang mdo don bsdus/ 
506b8(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rang rig lha la phyag btsal nas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las// dad can skal ldan don phyir du// man ngag rim pa brjod par bya// shar 
507a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs in+d+ra'i lung pa na// rgyal bu rdo rje brtsegs pa ru// rigs can in+d+ra po tings// gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon bstan pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i bsgrub pa yang / 
507a2(rgyud 'grel): tshom bu lnga bcu stong dang bcas// phyag na rdo rje mngon bsgrubs te// spong len brtul bzhags spyod pa'i dbang // dge bar bskul nas sdig pa med// de nas sa la sreg par byas// de bzhin pany+tsa 
507a3(rgyud 'grel): a be sha/ rim par thob pa'i skal ldan bu// gdungs brtag rigs des spyod kyang bston// lhag sems ldan zhing bka' nyan pa// bla ma srog tu 'dzin byed dang // man ngag snying du 'chang byed 
507a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rnal 'byor pho mo spyod pa yis// gdung ba ma spangs rnams la sbyin// log pa ulu s+phu sha kas// 'jug cing bcad pa'i nyams med ltar// 'dod pas smon pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 
507a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod bral tshig gi rtogs min yang // 'phrul gyi me long bstan pa ltar// rtogs byed tshig gi me long gis// mtshon rgyud spyan la snang byed pa'i// pa tre sha yi rim pa bstan// rgya mtsho chu las dang pa 
507a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// bka' yi bdud rtsi 'dud bsdus 'da'// shi sha'i rgyud kyi mos rims gzhan// 'tsham par bstan na chud mi gson// rim grogs grol 'dod brda' zhen la// de nyid 'grogs pa'i pa tri sha/ 
507a7(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab// des brlan rig pa chu skyes yod// de la dran rgyud man ngag sbyin// des rtogs pa yi sgrol ma yis// g.yang sa la sgrol ma'i man ngag sbyin// rnam rtogs chu rlung gis 'khyags 
507a8(rgyud 'grel): la// thig le drod dbab pa tre sha/ chags pa me yis gdungs pa la// khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag bstan// mtshan mas mtshan ma grol 'dod la// phyag rgya bsgom pa'i man ngag sbyin// de dag rnam 
507b1(rgyud 'grel): smin re ba la// rgyu 'bras med par thob tshul bstan// des sngon mos 'bral thun mong gi/ theg pa spros cher ma nges la// gsang ba'i yon tan khyad par can// ngo mtshar tshig gis 'du shes sbyar// / 
507b2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa brgyad tshul bzlog bstan pa// 'jug pa'i rim pa mos pa bdun// cig shos mthar bzhag gtsor smos kyang // de sngon bzhag ste brjod kyis zung // thun mong smra yis spros 'tshal bas// 
507b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog la bdag med gang zag la// khyad par spyad pas bsgyur ba'i tshig/ de yang rgyud las 'di skad du// kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang // spyod pa dag dang yang mi 'thun// kha cig spyod pa 
507b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byed kyang // rnams pa'i skabs song mi shes// bcigs stod gnyis kyi med// bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni// don dam du ni dbyed med de/ kun rdzob rnam du thamasan+ta ma~M/ 
507b5(rgyud 'grel): dag dang mdag gnyi gar 'dzin// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shang // kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la// chos dang gang zag bdag med na// 'di ni byang chub sa pa yin// de sogs phyi nang 
507b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'bras dang // 'jig rten thub par 'khrul par brjod// gsang chen nges par rgyud nyid las// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis// kun rdzob don dam dbyer med par// yang dag 
507b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid du rab tu rtogs// thabs kyi lta spyod chen por ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni nor bdun no// kun rdzob du ni nyams rdzogs so// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// 
507b8(rgyud 'grel): rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob du'ang dbyer med de// lta ba mtho sman de tsam mo// zhes sogs tshig gi brod skyed la// nges par ldem dgo ngas brgyad kyis gzhug/ mtshan 
508a1(rgyud 'grel): mas grol ba brgya byin pa// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa'i tshe// gang la bab pa'i lha de 'am// yang na lha kun cig pa'i phyir// gang mos lha de yi dam bya// 
508a2(rgyud 'grel): de'ang blo yis gnyis 'gyur ste// rims su skad cig spros bcad pa// de nas yi ge brgya pa dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rim par bsam// dbang skur la sogs lhag pa'i lha// dgur ldan spyan 
508a3(rgyud 'grel): drang bstim brtan mchod// zin nas bcu spangs zlas pa b+ha// gsal ba gsum ldan drod rjed 'gyur// yan lag sngon du bdun rdzogs nas// mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya// rtag tu rgyun 
508a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi ting 'dzin spyad// longs spyod ho dang bral mi bya// cig car pa na rang gi gzugs// rab gnas ldan pa bdun zhag la// spros spyad khugs pa sngon byas la// gsal bar byed dang byaM brag/ 
508a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan// de ci 'dra ba bdun du bsam// shin tu goms nas rnam smin gzugs// bskur la de bstan nges par bya// de tshe bying rmugs skyon drug spang // rgod pa'i skyon gsum dor byas te// 
508a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i skyon bdun byung ba na// spyi la gnas mchog med 'gyur na// bye brag gang snang 'phred la bzung // de nas rtog pas gzer chen po// 'gyur na ri ltar gdos chen bya// mi snang gzugs 
508a7(rgyud 'grel): brnyar bstan par bya// mtshan snang rgyu ba de ru bya// shin tu gsal la mi g.yo bar// basbyar theb ma lcogs med pa na// lha yi brtags dang lo rgyus kyis// zung du 'brel ba ched du bya// 
508a8(rgyud 'grel): gdod ma'i mtshan ma sngar brtags te// nyams rims zin pas brtson 'grus sbyar// de yang rgyud las 'di skad du// gsang ba'i snying po don nyid kyis// yi dam mi spang rtag bsgom zhing / 
508b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha yi mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// ye nas 
508b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam zhing sbyor bas su// lha nyid du ni rtag du bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam po'i phyir// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub// yi dam 
508b3(rgyud 'grel): lha ni rtag sgom nas// rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi// bdag gis kun la dbang bskur ste// rigs 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po rtag tu bzhag/ sngags ni rtag tu brjod par// 
508b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// sngags dang phyag nr-i rgyun mi brjod// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa yin// don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin no// rtag tu mnyam bzhag phyag tu yin// 
508b5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum ting 'dzin 'byin sngags yin// yang dag don chad klu 'dod pas// dus mtshud sa med par phyag rgya sngags// yid brtan drag tu bzlas bsgom bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang 
508b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu mnyam bzhag don rtogs pa'i// sku ni 'ja' tsho tshul 'dra ba'i// snang la rang bzhin med par sgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes
508b7(rgyud 'grel): par// gsal la rtog pa med par bsgom// lha yi sku ni gsal bsgoms na// bsod nams tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs brlan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob 
508b8(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// yi dam lha ste spang byas na// ngan song ni bde rtag tu myong // bdag rten dbyer med phyag rgya che// gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang skur ste// goms/ 
509a1(rgyud 'grel): shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas bar chad rtson med de// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur// 
509a2(rgyud 'grel): mi khom 'khor bar gnas par 'gyur// dam tshig bsrung dang sngags bzlas dang // phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa bzhi// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan par bzung // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung gyur na// 
509a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bsgrub zhen yang che bar gsungs// ji ltar ral gri'i sol nan tan du// skyes bu myur du mi bzung na// lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags pa/ 
509a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chi 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal// don dam ma nyams ngag byas shing // brtson 'grus cher bskyed 
509a5(rgyud 'grel): myur bar 'grub// 'di ltar bsgrubs shing bsgom byas na// 'bras bu tshe la ma sbyar kyang // dper na mngal dang sgo nga bzhin// rnam rtogs lus ni bor ma thag/ thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur 
509a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing // rigs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i// dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs so// // chu rlung can la drod dbab pa// gnas
509a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo drug gnas pa// sprul pa'i gnas su sor tshad la// rtswa gnyis ri bod can tshes 'dra// gnyis kyi bar du byang chub sems// yungs kar chad tsam rnal 'byor bya// yang na shi ra
509a8(rgyud 'grel): thig le gnyis// bskyang ba bsam bya sngon smos pas// dam pa'i ste bsor bzhi tshad// thig le ldan dang mi ldan pa// rung ba rgyud pa mnad 'dra ba'i// ba thag zhi zer rgyang 'dra bsgom// rjes 
509b1(rgyud 'grel): su bstan pa de nyid du// sor phyed yul la kun rdzob sems// yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam 'od dang ni// kha dog la yang mi gnas par// sgom pa'i ye shes myur bas ste// sum cu phrag brag gis/ 
509b2(rgyud 'grel): nis thob// dar ma tsu kra'i pho brang du// mkha' 'gro yod med mdor bskal bzhi// de la mkha' 'gro med pa ni// ci ha rta bdun pa dang ni// ri bong ldum sbyar ga'u na// byang sems yungs kar 
509b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bring cad nam// de la 'gro 'du gang yin pa// ri bang can la tshangs pa yi// drung du snang ngo thig le la// na tam+b+ha meng de gnyis las// 'dog sna tshigs 'od ldan pa'i// skyon ma gyir 'byung na 
509b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// de la brngubs pas 'dus pa'i tshe// bug chung 'phro bas gsal gdab po// de bzhin yang nas yang bsgoms na// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su skye// de las bzlog pa gang yin pa// 
509b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'ad ba brgyad ste dbus na// ye shes snang ba'i thig le bzhugs// phyogs bzhir rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i kha dog le// de las bzhi ste lam nas spro// ye shes 
509b6(rgyud 'grel): snying po phog pas gsal// mdor sgom ye shes snying rtsal// gnyis med byang sems bde chen po// rta bdun pa yi snying po ltar// 'od dang kha dog ci yang snang // gang du ma nges bsgom pa ni// 
509b7(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum dga' ba'i snang bas 'gegs// de dag gang 'phrod phyir bstan mod// shin tu ye shes myur ba ni// bde chen longs spyod tshe 'phrul rnams// gsal byas rig pas bskyed byas te// 
509b8(rgyud 'grel): sprul theg bzhi las mnyams pa// de tshad thig les chos la bskul// thim pas bde bskyed de bzhin du// longs spyod bde chen thug par bya// rim pas bde bskyed bde chen bdes// bde chen 
510a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhu byas te// rim thim zhu ba bskyod byas te// don dam ye shes de ru mthong // de dag kun la'ang bying rgod kyi// rkyen sogs spangs pa sngon bzhin du// rang nyams/ 
510a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo thob bstan pa yi// chad bzung rtsol dang mi rtsol bya// 'jig rten ting 'dzin ro brgyad sogs// zhi 'gog la sogs ro brtags te// ma nor lhag pa'i shes rab kyis// spang dor blang ba'i 
510a3(rgyud 'grel): bye brag shes// 'di dag rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor la// rgyal ba sras bcas byin rlobs mdzad// thabs chen 'di dag gang thob kyang // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus mi ldan na// bul ba ra'i 'bras bu bzhin/ 
510a4(rgyud 'grel): nam yang don yod ma yin no// rtog rlung g.yo ba rlung bzung ba// zhi ba bul ba drag po sogs// sgron ma bzung ba'i thabs rnams kyis// dmigs pas rig pa'i phur pa gdab// de dag thabs dang 
510a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang // zin nas phra ba bslab pa dang // dgag dang lus bzung spro ba rnams// mnyes byas bla ma'i zhal du zhus// mes tshig me yis gdungs pa yin// 'tsho zhing chags pas chags 
510a6(rgyud 'grel): bral yang // mngon du bya ba de brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa yis// yon tan kun ldan mi mo dag/ mun dang lkog dang skye bo gnyis// rdzas dang sdug pas sems spros kyang // gar
510a7(rgyud 'grel): dbab phrad par skye bo byed// dam tshig rnam smin sems 'jog cing // gtso la gdung ba'i phyag rgya rtsal// gtan du rigs pa snying 'dra na// 'di dag bstan la sbyar ba'i gnas// bud med yon tan kun 
510a8(rgyud 'grel): yod kyang // gnyis kyis sems phrogs bskor dben du// 'dod pa phyal bar spyod pa la// dam pa'i man ngag mi bstan te// 'tsham par lha yi sku bstan no// gzungs su gyur pa de phyin chad// rnal 
510b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas kyang rgya mi dpral// mi yis sngon bzhin sems phrogs nas// 'dod pa phyal spyod nyams byed pa// tshe 'di mi bde myang 'gyur nas// phyi mar dmyal bar ya re cha// de'i sdug bsngal 
510b2(rgyud 'grel): bzod reg ched// rdo rje rgyal po ma yin pa// rnal 'byor pas ni de bzhin no// de bas mi mo gdam pa ces// yid 'ong gnyen gnas dbang bskur te// bslab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya// lus 
510b3(rgyud 'grel): byas gos rjes dam tshig sbyin// chos bshad 'du shes sbyar bar bya// gzhung bzhin bdag cag byin gyis brlab// nyed sdeb sprod dang tsum mi bya// rtse 'khyud sbyin pa sogs rnams kyis// yab 
510b4(rgyud 'grel): yum snol mar cha skyed la// dgrol dang rgyas pa cho ga bya// ye shes dbab pa mngon rdzogs des// cho ga de yis las byas pas// mgo spug smin langs mig mdog dmar// 'dar dang smra mi 
510b5(rgyud 'grel): shes sogs 'byung // de nas phyag rgya bzhi sogs pa// rgud las gsungs pa 'di skad du// dgug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khril bas don bsgrub phyir// bsdam dang mi stong dbang 
510b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur te// bden pa sgra brnyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi byin 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes/ 
510b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun tu tshim byed bro gsungs thim// lta mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu 'bar// bdud rtsi gsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings// 'jug
510b8(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan dang gnas pa dang // smon pa byang chub sems yin no// gsang dbang pad+mar ldan 'gyur na// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis 
511a1(rgyud 'grel): bgrod med rdzogs// kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma can yang rdzogs// yi ge 'phreng ba 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// shes rab bla med// 
511a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// rig dang mnyam pa'i shugs ldan pas// bdag dang phyag rgya rigs snang phyir// rang snang shes nyams rol bya ste/ 
511a3(rgyud 'grel): sa rim re res bkug rlung bzung // gtsug tor zla shas 'od 'dres pa// ma ljang shes rab ye shes byeng // cig shos shugs ldan de goms pas// bcu gnyis chad phyin phyag rgyal// rak+Sha 
511a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub dus ga 'byor// gnyis med zung du 'brel pa las// dkyil bani bcwatu gnyis 'byung // sems 'dres brngubs pas sa rim thob// mchim yi 'o ma dang // 'ga' 'a 
511a5(rgyud 'grel): nye shing bcud kyis so// de thabs rdzogs par mnyes byas la// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// rdzogs so// // rnam rtog grub mtha' ma sbyar ba'i// blo la brda 'grol man ngag bstan/ 
511a6(rgyud 'grel): bden tshig brjod pas blo byin brlab// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal bstan pa// dub thabs ngo bo khyad par dang // yon tan skyon gyis rdzogs par bya// ma nges sa 'am thun mong nas// sems cher 
511a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa 'dir zhugs pa'i// mnyan gsan thun mong byin brlab pa// dbang lnga rdzogs pa'i shi sha la// lhag pa'i lta ba ces 'dzin yod// las kyi mtha' la 'jug 'dod tshe// brda' 'grol byin 
511a8(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab par bya// dkrol thabs rnam grangs gzhal bya dang // grub mtha'i dngos po lus bzhag go/ rnam par dbye ba rnam gnyis te// rgyud dang bstan la dbab pa'o// rgyud pa nye ring rnam gnyis 
511b1(rgyud 'grel): te// gang zag so sor rtog pa'i sa// mthong mi ldan la sngon song ba'i// gsang ba'i zhi gnas bstan byas pas// shugs dang dpyad pa gnyi ga mthong // de min rgyu tsam sog med pa// rgyud 
511b2(rgyud 'grel): las 'di skad gsungs pa ste// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na// chos nyid don rnams gsal 'gyur te// rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas// phye rgan 'chi med rtogs 'gyur// ci phyir zhe na 'jig rten/ 
511b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // sngags dang bdag rnams sems nyid phyir// ngo bo cig 'brel mthu ldan zhing // cig dang du ma rtogs par 'gyur// dngos po bstan la dbab bya ba// rim pas zlog ste gzhal bya ba// 'jig
511b4(rgyud 'grel): rten 'di ni ci yod pa'i// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid 'jig byas na// rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid// rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing 
511b5(rgyud 'grel): du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing // zhes pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir// brtags pa'i spyod pa gnyis las gzhal// rnam par byang dang nyon 
511b6(rgyud 'grel): mongs gnyis// so sor yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su med// thams cad dbyings su ro cig pas// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// brgyad las gzhal bya rnams gnyis 
511b7(rgyud 'grel): dang // sgrub thabs gtan tshigs bcas gsungs pas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das la brtag/ 'das pa spyod yul ma gyur phyir// brtag pa'i yul du ji ltar rig/ sems la mya ngan 'das zhes pa// 
511b8(rgyud 'grel): de nyid 'das par rung ma yin// gal te 'das pa'i snang ba la// gzhan nyid dang pos lkog tu 'gyur// de pa'i na 'khor dngos po yang // snang dang rtags pa gang la gzhal// snang ba rang gi mtshan nyid 
512a1(rgyud 'grel): ni// brjod pa min te rigs snang phyir// gzhal byar rigs min skye bo yi// yul min grub pa'i mtha' ltar snang // rtags pa nang la spyad do zhes// rten spyad bzhi ru rigs 
512a2(rgyud 'grel): pa min// 'on te rang la nang du yang // ltas te dpyad ne de nyid ni// log rtog spros pa'i skad cig ma// snga ma 'das dang phyi ma byung // de la rten par rtag mi rigs// de ltar skad cig mi brtan pa// 
512a3(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog par gnas 'gyur na// zhen 'gag rang la bstan mi rigs// nges par bzhag pa'i gzhal bya ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// rang gi mtshan nyid mi 'dod de// de ltar nang du zhen pa 
512a4(rgyud 'grel): yis// phyi rol med la yod ltar nang // zhen dang lta ba gnyis la brten// de de shes pa skad cig ma// de ltar da ltar thad rang bcad// lta ba'i tshan gnas gyur pa// gzhal bya med par dogs pa'ang// 
512a5(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa shes kyi spyi yul yin// skad cig gnas 'gyur shes nyid do// de bas yul sems ma 'dres phyir// zhen snang 'jam la skyo ba med// 'on te yid 'gyur zhen pa'ang // skad cig mnyam pas// 
512a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gag pa med// de tshe rtags gzhi yod mi rung // dogs na zhen pa'i yul rnams ni// gtan du dag pa ma yin phyir// so sor spyod kyang zhe na yul mthong // rang dang spyi mtshan ma lus la// shes rab// 
512a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yul phyi smol// mdor na kun brtags dus bzhis dang // 'das dang sdug bsngal kun ming la// don du zhen pa ltar snang lo// rten te sprul bas mtha' rnyed 'gyuraro// de ltar rang snang spyi la'ang //
