514b2(rgyud 'grel): dag gsum bden gsum bden bzhi dag/ mnyam pa bzhi lnga'i skabs 'chad de// tshul gyis bdag mnyam so sor brtag/ nyid la dbang skur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// 
514b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ dag pas snang ba spong zhe na// thams cad dag ces bya ba yang // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod nyid ni rnam par dag/ chos rnam yong gi dag pa yi// 
514b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi rgal gyis don rtogs mngon// d+ha rnams rab tu dag pa dang // 'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te// don dam dmigs med rang bzhin dang // kun rdzob sgyu mar ye nas dag/ rgyu yi mtshan nyid dag 
514b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba// bzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che// rgyu nyid rang gi sems yin pas// 'byung ba ran po t+yA las dag/ 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni// sems can 
514b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rus pa ste// rdo rje byang chub sems yin la// sha ni pad+ma rak+ta yin// dri chen dri chu gur gum chu// so so'i lus la gnas pa dag/ don dam dmigs med dag pa nyid// phyi nang chos rnams thams 
514b7(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang // gang gi ngo bo'ang ma yin te// skye 'gag med par ye nas dag/ kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang // chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi dmigs pa nyid/ 
514b8(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs srung // de bzhin gshegs dang yo nas mnyam// bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyis ka dang // rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin// 
515a1(rgyud 'grel): no// 'bras bu rnam par dag pas ra// 'jig rten brtan g.yol sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo ba med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// gsum dang bzhi brjod dgos 
515a2(rgyud 'grel): tshad ni// rmongs pa gsum bzhi dag ma dag/ 'dzin pa'i ldan bzlog pa'i phyir// rnam grangs brjod kyis ngo bo TIg/ cis kyang mgo ma spangs pa'i// so sor snang zhing mthun pa'i 
515a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// bdag dang bdag med tu rtogs pa// de lta bu yi dang du snang // rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste// de yi mi mkhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gis snga phyi/ 
515a4(rgyud 'grel): yod mod kyang // don gyis cig par rdzogs par bsgom// mtho dmar kun gyi gzugs snang dang // bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me long lta bu li tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su 
515a5(rgyud 'grel): snang // shes rab chen po rnam dag pa// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes dang spyod yul gnyis su med// de bzhin nyid du re cig go/ mnyam pa gsupa bzhi lnga bshad pa// gnyis// / 
515a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis chod par sbyar ba ste// bdag gzhan che chung ltar dkrol phyir// mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyar nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tra bzang po zhing // mnyam pa rnam bzhi don rtogs mchog gi gnas// zhes 
515a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs phyir na bzhi yis dral// de yang thun med gnyis gnyis las// lhag pa'i mnyam nyid spangs par 'grub// thun mong rgyu yis kun rdzob du// rkyen bzhi 'dus snang sgyu ma tsam// kun btags 
515a8(rgyud 'grel): spros pa chad pa'i phyir// rnam grangs don dam zhes kyang bya// skabs kyis yongs su 'grub par smra// de la DU rkyen cha phyed na// 'dus snang dngos po ma skyes pa// don dem mnyam par 'dod pa 
515b1(rgyud 'grel): brten cing 'brel pas bsgrubs pa'i mtha'o// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo dbyings nyid las// rnam dag dbyings cig tshul nyid do// 
515b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin// log tog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// de bzhin bya ba dang ni yog 
515b3(rgyud 'grel): pa// don dam rang rig gang yin pa// spros bral rang bzhin dag pa dang // rnam dag dbyings kyi ye shes lnga// don dam 'dod pa kun rdzob du// rigs gsum rigs ltar 'dod pa dag/ bdag nyid// / 
515b4(rgyud 'grel): chen por ma rtogs phyir// thun mong mnyam par nga smra'o// lhag pa'i kun rdzob tsam du yang // rang rig snang phyir 'bras bu lta// snang dang don nus ngang gi dben// de phyir lhag pa'i kun rdzob bo// de nyid 
515b5(rgyud 'grel): rang sems dbyings ye shes// 'bras bu lngar rdzogs brjod bsam 'das// de phyir lhag pa'i don dam rgya// ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang // log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin / 
515b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam// mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor lo// theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad mtshan rdzogs dpag tu med// 
515b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'pho ba yis// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis min pa'i// de bzhin nyid du rdo rje rig/ 'on te kun kyang gnyis med na// mnyam zhes brjod
515b8(rgyud 'grel): pa ji lta bu// mi mnyam bltos pa rgyu ma yin// yang dag tha dad de yang rdzun// de yang kun brtags mi mnyam las// bltos nas de ldog mtshon phyir brtags// don tu ye nas mnyam nyid la// mnyam// 
516a1(rgyud 'grel): par zhes pas 'dod brjod bral// mnyam pa rnam lnga'i dam tshig ni// don dam skye 'gag med mnyam pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid dang stong 
516a2(rgyud 'grel): pa mtha'// yang dag nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med dang dmigs su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// 
516a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa ni// 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'phral snang bya ba kun kyang byed// rtog pa kun gyis mtshan 
516a4(rgyud 'grel): mar snang / 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te// bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad snang // thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni// chos/ 
516a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // med dang yod pa gnyis ka min// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang // snang ba nyid na// / 
516a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med// dngos med de ni sna tshogs pa// de nyid sgyu ma mig yar tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las// ya mtshan 
516a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te// rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar 'byung // so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni// thabs chen dag tu brtags pa mnyam// mtshan nyid so sor 
516a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni// shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa// rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa// rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi// 'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// 
516b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so// rnam par byang dang nyon mongs kyi// gzhi rten rnam rtog kun gyi gzhi// bag chags mun pa rang drangs pas// thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul// chos rnams ma lus 
516b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // kun kyang dbyer med dang yin pas// thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes yin// thams cad kun la lung rtog cing // rtog dang brtag par bya ba med// 
516b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum du yang mi dmigs pa// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// log rtog dbang po'i spyod yul spangs// dbang po yul rnams dngos med par// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// 
516b4(rgyud 'grel): b+haM ba grub pa'i ye shes yin// mnyam pa rnam lnga de dag rtag/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang // babs chen lhun gyis grub par brtag/ 'di ni yang drug rtogs pa 
516b5(rgyud 'grel): yin// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing // ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// 'gro 'ong med pas dus gsum cig par rdzogs// 
516b6(rgyud 'grel): dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang 'byung ste// rnam rtog mi skye ye shes brjod du med// ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas// dran byed mi spong 'khor/ 
516b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mi 'byed de// ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// blo yi rigs pas spyod cing nan tan dang // mtshon cing bsten pas byang chub thob mngon te// shes rgyud ci yin gang yin ngo shes shing // 
516b8(rgyud 'grel): bye byed las 'phags kyi rta 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub 'thob// chen po yum lngar dag pa dang // phung po sems phyir rigs lngar dag/ tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa// snod 
517a1(rgyud 'grel): bcud rgyu yi kun brtags pa// bden pa kun brdzob don dam dang // gnyis su med dang rnam gsum yang // de gsum nyid du mnyam pas gsal// skabs kyis kun brtags 
517a2(rgyud 'grel): yul rnams ni// ming tsam ngo bo'i rgyud med pa'i// rigs pa cir snang don byed dang // rtog mal mthun snang ma nges dang // phyag rgya'i dbyings mdog gsal bas 'grub// skor bdun rdzogs dang bsam
517a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod 'das// ngo bo rgyus 'grub shes bya yi// mchog gyur shes rab dam pa yi// yul yin rtog ge'i ma yin dang // mi bsku nges pas sgra 'jug ste// thun mong stong brjod bral tsam min// lnga dgur 
517a4(rgyud 'grel): rang rig rang snang phyir// tshul gyis phye ba'i ngo bo nyid// smra brjod bral te bsam yul min// phyogs bral ngo bo dbyer med pa// shes can yang rab yul yin phyir// de ni bden pa chen por bshad// 
517a5(rgyud 'grel): bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min// de bzhin bzhi yang lhag pa'i gnyis// rjes mthun thun mong bden pa yang // skye bo'i yul 'das rigs pa yis// grub pa thun 
517a6(rgyud 'grel): mo grags par zad// bdag nyid chen po'i rkyen tshig gis// ji ltar gzhal bya 'dir brjod pa// log rtog rgyu 'bras bdag gzhan ltar// rnam pa 'di kun rang rang gi/ rang bzhin med pa'i rnam shes nyid// 
517a7(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang // mdor na tshogs brgyad rtog snang ba'i// shes yul cig kyang ji lta bar// bsam pa bstan tshe de snang phyir// kun dngos gzhan bral bdag nyid che ho// thams cad 
517a8(rgyud 'grel): rigs phyir bdag brjod kyi// snang bkag rnam pa cig ma yin// gang zag chos dang brtag pa'i bdag/ rang rgyu spyod yul bral las bdag// rgyu 'bras yul lta bzlog phyir las// bdag nyid chen po/ 
517b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di 'dra med// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun la smod cing chags su med// sems dang sems nyid ji lta/ 
517b2(rgyud 'grel): bur// byang chub de ni sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ 
517b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub// dbyings dang dbyings dang ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi// byang chub sems las zhan du min// gzhal yas khang dang 
517b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang // khro tshogs 'du 'phro mang po yang // sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshol cig/ kun brtags lo 
517b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyurmas brjod byas pas// ji bzhin nyid don rmal bya ba// dper na 'jig rten mi rnams dag/ pha mes lo rgyus bshad byas na// rigs rgyud cig gis cig shes ltar// chos kun gzhi rtsa rmal byas na// 
517b6(rgyud 'grel): gser las tha dad dbyibs snang ltar// rang rig cir yang snang phyir gzhi// de nyid rtogs med rang snang las// rgyud med gzhi rtsa ga la rnyed// de nas lo rgyus rtags byas pas// gzhan bral rigs 
517b7(rgyud 'grel): snang bzang ngan med// rtags pa'i dri bral ma 'dres gsal// don gsal so sos mtshon tshig phye// dngos tshig tshul spras tha dad kyang // don du sbu bas ma bral ba cig/ chos rnams ma lus thams 
517b8(rgyud 'grel): cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang // log rtog sgyu mar snang ba nyid// gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med// rigs 
518a1(rgyud 'grel): dang kha dog dbyibs med las// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad snang // snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub// / gtan tshigs 
518a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i lus gzhag pa// rang bzhin rang spyi mtha' bral dang // rnam par dbye ba'i gtan tshigs kyis// rang 'byung ye shes snyan par smra/ de dngos dang rang bzhin la'ang // rang bzhin dngos
518a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam dbye ba'o// dngos ni spyi bshad chos so cog/ rgyu rkyen byed pos byas min par// rang bzhin nyid kyi snar tshul gyis// phye ba'ang rang gis mtha' bral dag/ rang bzhin yong gis mnyam pa// 
518a4(rgyud 'grel): dang // rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen sogs gsal// chos kun rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// rang bzhin yong gis dag pa'i phyir// mnyam pa'i dbyings 
518a5(rgyud 'grel): su yang dag rtogs// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// 'jig rten 'das dang / 
518a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med// rang bzhin dang gis bdag med pa'o// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// bdag la gud na cig kyang med// 
518a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub shing // chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos 
518a8(rgyud 'grel): med de la su zhig sad// rang bzhin rnam par dbye ba ni// de ltar gtan tshigs kun la'ang // khyad sbyor gzhan yang dngos po kun// // rang rgyud med de ming tsam dang // dngos po ma nges cing 
518b1(rgyud 'grel): yang snang // rnam bzhi'o dang po rgyud las kyang // yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas 'gyur na// de las bcos shing sbyar du med// ye nas ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs 
518b2(rgyud 'grel): spangs shing byang bsgrub med// zhes gsungs dngos po rnam nyid la// rigs rgyud yod na der red pas// skyon gnyis 'byung ngo rtag par gol// de phyir snod bcud 'gro ba'i rigs// snang pa tsam ste 
518b3(rgyud 'grel): sman dred min// de phyir ming tsam rgyud med de// chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // ming tshogs khyad par snang ba yi// zab chen spyod yul log par rtog brtags/ 
518b4(rgyud 'grel): ming tsam pa// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge'i 'phreng ba nyid la gnas// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phri zhing zab pa yod ma yin// 
518b5(rgyud 'grel): log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba cig kyang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa dbyings nyid tshul// ma rig pa yi 'khrul 
518b6(rgyud 'grel): rtog gis// da dang bdag tu med pa la// so so'i mtshan ma dngos pos bzung // 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod na de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// so so'i rang bzhin nges zhes na// 
518b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu snang // de nyid chos su yin par bshad// de dag me yi// 
518b8(rgyud 'grel): cha ba ltar// rang bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin te// chos kun rang spyi bstan pa'ang // skabs kyis rtags pa der red med// kha cig rang gi mtshan nyid du// zhen pa snang ba lta bu la// sa sra chu gsher 
519a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dang // nyon mongs rang ga'i mtshan nyid dang // snying rje skyob la gdung ba dang // byams pa mi byed phan 'dod spogs// mya ngan 'das lam 'bras bu yi// rang gi 
519a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid so sor 'dod// zhen pa de nyid mi rtag sngal// stong bdag med pa'i spri ru 'dod// la lar rang rig thabs chen du// ma 'gags snang ba rang mtshan te// dngos su rnam par byang ba yi// 
519a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid yin pa ci 'dod// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid mnor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang na med de 
519a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang // rang dang spyi yi don rtog na// mtshan nyid med par rnam par dag/ rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang gang zag bdag da des rnams// ngo bo yod la 
519a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rtags pas// rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur te// phyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// ma rig yang dag bsgrub du med// 
519a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dbyings ni gcig tu thim// so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam par 'phro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings su rnam par spyod// / 
519a7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma'i dngos po rtog pa ni// rtog pa de nyid mi dmigs phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang // skyes pa nyid na chos nyid cig/ zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// 
519a8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// 'dod chags mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni// rnam par byang ba yin pa'i phyir// 
519b1(rgyud 'grel): chags pa ma chags gnyis med pas// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med// phrag dog mtshan nyid rtog pa ni// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// dog pa spangs med yangs bsgrub med// de bzhin mtha' 
519b2(rgyud 'grel): bral gtan tshigs kyang // bltos nas mi rtag kun mtha'i phyir// yod med dbus dang rtag chad dang // cig dang du ma la sogs pa// mtha' gsum dang ni bzhir grags pa// thug pa thug mthar ci smos 
519b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi// bral dang 'das dang med brjod sogs// bltos rtags phyogs zhen yod phyir mtha'o// de dag 'khrul phyir 'di skad du// yod las rtsal na sgros brtags 'gyur// med las brtsal na bkur btab 
519b4(rgyud 'grel): ste// yod med gzhi sa las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la// mngon sum tshad mar rtags mthong yang // snang ba nyid na dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyi 
519b5(rgyud 'grel): tu rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtog pa ste// ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu// tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi// thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med// thams cad 
519b6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus stong zhes te// dran med sngos pa ma yin pas// rtog med rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// gdos pa can gyi chos min te// shes rab 'ba' zhig kho na'o// 
519b7(rgyud 'grel): thams can ma lus de bzhin te// de ni gang yang dmigs med la// skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang // 'od dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med// de bzhin rang gi rig pa yang // mtha' dang dbus med du
519b8(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la de bzhin mi gnas pa'o// gdos pa can gyi chos min pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rig pa dbang du gyur pa na// stong par bya 
520a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am mi stong bya// thams cad dbyer med dang yin pas// kha dog dbyibs dang rin po che// thams cad khyab dang yungs 'bru'i tshul// bsam yas mtha' dbus med pa'o// / 
520a2(rgyud 'grel): yod med dbu mar mi dmigs shing // sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// cig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang 'byung ye shes 
520a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas med snang // phyogs 'dzin lta dang da grol phyir dang // mtha' bral 'dod pa 'dir gzhug phyir// mtha' dang bral zhes bya mod kyi// mthu kun rang rig rang snang phyir// 'di la bral dang ma bral dang // / 
520a4(rgyud 'grel): grol dang ma grol phyogs zhen med// ye nas mtha' gnyis ma bcings phyir// grol ba tha snyad 'dogs pa'ang med// rnam par dbye ba'ang phung po dang // 'byung ba la sogs dngos kun la// de dngos 
520a5(rgyud 'grel): snang re'ang bye brag gi/ brtsegs pas ril por zhen grol nas// cig kyang dngos kun der re med// rang rig lhun grub bdag nyid dbyings// phung po lnga po gzhig par bya// bshig nas 'byung ba'i 
520a6(rgyud 'grel): bgal na// ma bshig na'ang 'byung ba yin// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' kun// rang bzhin med par bshi ge pa'i phyir// gcig pa lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // mum gyi dbyings su thim bya zhing // dbang 
520a7(rgyud 'grel): po yul dus snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin zhing // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste// snang ba'i dngos po rnams gzhigs na// so so mtshan nyid 
520a8(rgyud 'grel): dngos med pas// gzhigs nas nam mkha' dang du zha// nam mkha'i de nyid lngas gzhigs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim// 'di la mos pa gzhug phyir dang // gsang chen don dam 
520b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong bya'i phyir// brjod kyi dngos kun dbyer med la// rnam par dbye las gzhan nas min// de ltar de dag gang rung gis// chos kun gtan la phab gyur na// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med/ 
520b2(rgyud 'grel): sna // rgyu rkyen ma byas ye nas gsal// chos nyid phyogs bral bsam brjod rnams// bral phyir mtshan par mi nus kyang // mtshan mas mtshon te bkri ba'i phyir// sbyin dang me long tshul lta bur// dngos kun gsang 
520b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags nyid sdang bas// mtshon par ma 'gyur med pa'i phyir// dngos kun mtshan nyid ji lta bar// rang 'byung theg chen shes rab kyis// nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos 
520b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrung ma lus thams cad kun// thams cad kun gyi gnas brten te// 
520b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bla med theg pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub kun kyang gnas// theg pa mtho sman thams cad 'byung // thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus// me yis thams cad kun bsreg lta// tog tshogs ye shes dang du bsreg 
520b6(rgyud 'grel): chu yis sdud cing 'khru ba ltar// kun la de ltar rig par gyis// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la bzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// ma btsongs nas ni de ltar gnas// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas 
520b7(rgyud 'grel): yin te// snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu snang // de nyid chos sku'i yin par bshad// sgra rnams ji snyed brjed pa yang // dngos po med las dngos po'i sgra// brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min// 
520b8(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// bsnam bya dri yi dngos po yang // yod pa ma yin kun tu bsrung // chos rnams thams cad dri dang 'dra// dngos med sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis/ 
521a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// yul dang dbang shes dngos med par// 'tshogs pa ro yi dngos gru bltar// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // phur gzhi 
521a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pas dbang 'gyur na/ reg bya sna tshogs myong ba ltar// chos kun rig pa dbang 'gyur na// sna tshogs snang la dngos po med// yang na thabs dang theg pa'i phyir// dngos po dngos po bcos pas rtogs// nyon mongs dag 
521a3(rgyud 'grel): lngas dug lnga sgrol// dug rngu rkyen gyi ngo bo dag/ rang 'byung ye shes rang snang phyir// de ltar sras dran nyid kyis grol// de la 'dod chags 'dod yon lnga// mthong thos dngos dang rkyen bzhi kun// rig phyir rang snang mthong thos 
521a4(rgyud 'grel): bral// mngon par chags pa'i gnyis 'dzin med// gzugs snang ye shes rang rig gzugs// sgra brjod rang snang rig pa sgra// dri zhim chos kyi yin na de// ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro// reg bya rang 'gyur ye shes reg/ 
521a5(rgyud 'grel): log rtog yul lnga ming tsam du// snang las rang rgyud med pa'i phyir// rang rig rang snang spyod yul med// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// yon tan thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor 
521a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'di la mi bya cig kyang med// gzhan dag ting 'dzin bskur ba dang // spyod thabs 'dul dang ched byed dang // yang dag dug lngar byed sogs pa'ang // drang ba'i don de thar pa'i lam// spyod dang sprad par bya 
521a7(rgyud 'grel): med par// rang snang grol thar zabs chen mchog/ de bzhin gzugs dang tshor ba dang // mtshan 'dzin 'du byed rnam shes lnga'i// mtshan nyid rang rig nyid snang phyir// snang stong dbyer med tshor stong bral// mtshan nyid 
521a8(rgyud 'grel): yod med bya byed med// dran stong dbyer med rang snang phyir// phung po bzhi po ye shes su// gcig pas rnam shes rang 'byung tshe// brtags kyang dbye ba bsam mi khyab// sman la mtshan pas grol bar byed// kun 
521b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yi kun khyab kyang // rang rig rnam rtog sgrib bya ste// ye shes lnga yi don dam mthong // 
521b2(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes lnga nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag po bstan// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dkar 
521b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bstan// de rtogs bya phyir dkar ba'i mdog/ chags dang chags par bya ba med// chags med rtogs phyir dmar ba'o// zad 'phel med pa rtogs bya'i phyir// mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan// 'phrin las 
521b4(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs bya ba'i phyir// ljang khu'i mdog tu bstan pa yin// bsgyur du med pa rtogs bya'i phyir// kha dog nag por bstan pa yin// de bzhin kun la shes par byos// mtha' dbus med de de bzhin nyid// 
521b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyed nga dang du gnas pal// ye shes rtegs pa dang bya'i byeng// rgyags dang dbus nananas par bya// nyan mangs gsas pa la shes gas la// dpyir shang kyis martan pa yin// 
521b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rig rgyu bral nub// rang byung ye shes bdag nyid dang // sdug bsngal gdod nas dag pa yi// don rtogs bya phyir de byang brjod// de ltar rang rig shar nub byang // yon tan rdzogs pa mtshon phyir g+ha// 
521b7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid de zlum pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun la de ltar lta// de bzhin rten dang brten 
521b8(rgyud 'grel): can gyi// bye brag nang brtags phyir bstan pa// mtshon phyir rtags te de sgo nas// rang rig rang snang mjal bar gyis// gru zabs skabs su brjod zin te// lhag pa'i mnyam nyid ye shes don// mi grangs 
522a1(rgyud 'grel): cir yang bstan mod kyang // don du smra bas ma yul las 'das// thabs de rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyidi// phyin ci ma log shes rab spun// ming grangs shes rab snyan shang sa lpags/ 
522a2(rgyud 'grel): sku yis de nyid thob myong tshor// don reg mthong sogs mo nges pa// kun yod yid nges byas pa'ang // yul med mngon sum mchog tu gsal// ming grangs dag dang mnyam pade ma nyid// tshul gyis brjod 
522a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis tha dad min// de dag dbye ba'ang chos can gyi// / grangs dang blo yi phyir bshad kyi// de la grangs su nges bzung med// de bas ngo bo cig par bden// skabs su gong 'ang ngo bo'i don// brjod de 'di 
522a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar brjod pa'ang yul// med kyang mthong ba'i bye brag gis// brjod kyis don 'di 'jal bar gyis// kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i// thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// 
522a5(rgyud 'grel): chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing // yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par// gang gis de ltar rig pa de// de nyid rdo rje'i zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med// 
522a6(rgyud 'grel): par// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun grub cing // de ltar gang gis rtog 'gyur la// de ni ye shes mig can yin// de yis yang dag snying po mthong // gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khod yang // 
522a7(rgyud 'grel): dag ni// chen po rags pa thabs su rtogs// so so'i mtshan nyid shes rab rtogs// gnyis med 'brel pa thabs chen yin// kun kyang shes rab dang du gnas// snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid/ 
522a8(rgyud 'grel): las ma g.yos phyir// yod dang med pa gnyis su med// gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// 'dus med gnas su 'bebs pa yi// thams cad de lta bu yi dang // de rtogs 
522b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje zhal mthong yin// d+hAr byas phung po lnga rnams la// ga ni rtsa de bzhin nyid du cig/ sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul// snang ba nyid nas dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs ston// 
522b2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du// de sems rig pa nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyibs 'gyur kur tu bzang // de rtogs rdo rje zhal mthong yin// kun kyang yi ge'i ming tshogs bzhin// gang yang
522b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po yod ma yin// dngos med nyid de sna tshogs snang // snang ba nyid na gang yang min// bya byed sna tshogs kun kyang byed// dngos po med de yang dag nyid// de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rjo 
522b4(rgyud 'grel): dran med ma yin te// de nyid rten du 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// rdo rje rigs dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rjen la mthong yin// thams cad ma lus pa yi dang // blta dang lta/ 
522b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya med pa'i// ye shes sgron ma sbreng bar ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong // thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang // sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyis ka rang rig nyid du 'dus// / 
522b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po min// ming tshig sgra la mi brten par// blo yi ge ting du go bar byos// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems// 
522b7(rgyud 'grel): las chos ni gzhan na med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang chub lam ni ring ba min// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// 
522b8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// yangs shing rgya che ldan grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam nyid do// yul med slob par gzhi 
523a1(rgyud 'grel): cig la// dang po bzod gsol des pa gsum// mi dmigs ye shes lta ba dang // phyag rgya mi spro bar chad med// lhun grub slob pa'i mtha' lta gsum// rnal 'byor rim pas 
523a2(rgyud 'grel): phye ba yin// khyab par rgyu yi theg pa dang // sngon du brjod de gzhan gsungs pa// theg pa bzhi'i nges 'byung lo// theg pa cig gi 'bras bu re gnas// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa las// gsang ba'i/ 
523a3(rgyud 'grel): snying por 'gro ba'i lam// theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon// gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spod srung // gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan// bzhi pa theg pa'i mdor bsdus nas// bla med theg pa'i dbyings su 
523a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzur// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba rnams// rang bzhin gsang ba ma mthong phyir// log pa'i tshogs te lam stegs tsam// 
523a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas thabs ji bzhin mthong ba med// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang // 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid dbyings 'gyur ba med// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// 
523a6(rgyud 'grel): log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// dman dang khyad par yod par zad// bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byoms pa// gzhan du 'tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// 
523a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong na// bdag dang gzhan du 'tsho bas sangs mi rgya// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhes// bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te// rgyu 'bras gnyis med shes rab 
523a8(rgyud 'grel): bsgribs phyir ro// 'di la sna tshogs zhen pa dang // rtag chad bdag gi lta ba med// chos tsam rdzas med skad cig med// rgyu 'bras med de phyogs stong grol// dam par snang ba bral ba min// dmigs pa'i/ 
523b1(rgyud 'grel): lha ru 'dod pa min// lhan grub rnam mkhyen rtogs pa yi// yon tan rgyud las 'di skad du// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang po don rtog mtha' mi stong // chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du// spyod yul 
523b2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu tshad dpag med// rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang // rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin// thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yin// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod 
523b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam// don rtogs don bzhi rdzogs par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yi// 
523b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na// lam gyi dge spyad sdig spyad kyang // mtho ris lha dang mi ru skye// skye shi med pa'i sa mi 'thob// chos rnams dag par mi shes te// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// 
523b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs bcad dang spangs kyang bcings// mnyam pa'i gsong don ma rtogs nas// dbu ma rang rgyal nyan thos dang // lha mi 'dod dang khams gnyis lta// sems can dug lnga spyod pa dag/ rang rang lta spyod mo/ 
523b6(rgyud 'grel): tshod tsam// smin thob thar dang lgang bas 'khrul// de rtogs dben pa byin brlabs te// zab mo brjod pas don snang byed// slob ma lhun grub byin brlabs pa// chos rnams thams cad skye med pas// shin 
523b7(rgyud 'grel): tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// kun la spyod phyir gsang dbang thob// spyod cing 
523b8(rgyud 'grel): chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang bzhin zlums pa'i phyir// phan tshun bco lnga'i dbang thob ste// thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i chus// yul lha dri dbyangaso khrus kyi mchog/ rang sems ye shes 
524a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga sogs brgyan// rang rig thabs dang shes rab kyis// kun tu khyab pa cod pan mchog/ bdag nyid 'bras bu lnga snying por// ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi bcud// rtog rgyan ye 
524a2(rgyud 'grel): shes 'phreng bar bshad// stong chen bla med go cha'i mchog/ kun gzhir 'gyur med rtog chen po// sdug bsngal gdung ba dang gis sangs// snang grags rnam rtog sku gsung thugs// sems phyir de nyid// 
524a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas btab pa'o// rang 'byung zhal du kun brngubs phyir// ma lus longs spyod dbang phyug che// rang rig ma 'dres rdzogs gsal bshad// de nyid ngang las mi g.yo bsgom// brjod 'drar thams 
524a4(rgyud 'grel): cad rig gsal thos// 'gro 'ong med par ma sa rdzogs dbang // kun gyi bdag 'gyur sems nyid ni// dbang phyug rgyal po'i dbang rdzogs so// de sogs lam kun rar rdzogs phyir// 'jug dang bya ba 
524a5(rgyud 'grel): don gi nyis med// d+hu 'bras ye nas dbyer med phyir// re dang dogs pa ga la yod// de brtan 'jam pa g.yo thob partan// blo srabs 'byung bar the tsom med// des brlan rig pa'i me tog can// de la dran rgyud 
524a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sbyin te// spyod lam bzhir sgom man ngag dang // 'da' ka'i dran pa sbyin pa'o// de ltar ldan pas grub bya'i phyir// spyod lam dran dang ngo bo dang // bcos nyams spyod dang lam 'grub pa'o// 'gro zham 
524a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang // skad cig dran bskul rang snad du// yul med rang gsal mi g.yo ba// theg chen sgom las ma nyams pa'o// re dgas bral ba'i sems kyis zung // 'du 'bral med pa'i 
524a8(rgyud 'grel): sems la brtan// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du rab snang ngo // rnam rtog nyid ni ye shes phyir// gnyen pos gang yang byed med pa// ched du rten pa 'khrul pa'i lam// 
524b1(rgyud 'grel): cir yang ma myong yul bral ba// yang dag don nyams myong ba ste// de bzhin zhe na bral rim pa tsam// g.yo thob brten par snang ba yin// thams cad mnyam nyid rgyas btab phyir// de tshe mnyam nyid 'da'/ 
524b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bya// mnyam rdzogs ting 'dzin goms gyur na// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob 'gyur// de yang rgyud las rim par gsungs// shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ro shes shing // bya byed las 'phags 
524b3(rgyud 'grel): gyin 'dar 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub 'thob// rnam par dag pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas rnam dag cing // mi rtogs thig ler gnas la rtogs pa mdzad// 
524b4(rgyud 'grel): skad du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// nam mkhar bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa ni// smin bzhin 'byung zhing khebs par mi spyod de// bdag med/ 
524b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// ma bkag pa las 'ba' zhig 'byung med pa'i// thams cad sems kyi ngang rten sems zhes pa dag tu med// ma bcos lhan gnas ye nas byang chub cing // thob 
524b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu med pas ye nas bde bshegs yin// e ma'o ma bsgrubs sgrub chen po// blang dor med pa'i sa chen po// grub pa chen po ye shes che// mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// rtog pa'i ye shes yid
524b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gter// thams cad la'ang me long bzhin// lhas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ba'o// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// de nas byang chub snying po len// byang chub sems su rgyu cig pas// rtsa ba 
524b8(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po 'byung // mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba'i gzungs// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// de bas rang sems 
525a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs byas te/ le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs nas// nga dang bdag med mnyam par bsrung // thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrubs shing bsrung bar bya ba med// de bzhin 
525a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// shes rab rnam gsu mi go mas byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i 
525a3(rgyud 'grel): don rtogs te// kun tu yangs pa chen po bsgom// rgyu 'bras bus cig rdzogs pa yi// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu drug drug pa yi// brgya brgya dag tu bskur zhing gnas// lus ma bor// 
525a4(rgyud 'grel): bar sangs rgyas sa// sngags 'chang sal por rtogs byas nas// bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med// rang las ma g.yos par gnas na// phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang // rdzogs pa phyogs bcu dus/ 
525a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la// ma 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhan gru ba ni// sku
525a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs ni bsam mi khyab// dri bas yang dag skye mchog gi/ spyod lam rnam pa thams cad du// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// mthong thos yul sogs gang 
525a7(rgyud 'grel): snang yang // rang byung rang snang rang rig las// gzhon pa'i dran pa mi bya ste// spyod yul bral bas nyams mi bya'o// 'pho zhing 'gyur bas mthong ba dang // bdag nyid dran bskul dang nyid las// mi g.yo dran 
525a8(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyun tu zung // rang gnas mthong bar 'gyur ba yin// skal ldan gzhan zhig 'pho ba na// bde ba'i tshig bshad byin gyis brlabs// dran pa ma nyams bar du bya// las zad rang snang gnas 'thob 
525b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// yang na zla 'od thugs yig rnams// rim bsdus 'od zlu ma gsang lam nas// phyir byung brdal bas snar srid kun// ngang sems chos nyid bang du gsal rdzogs so// // de ltar man ngag gang 
525b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod las// 'jug tshe sngon du lus bsrungs nas// rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lus ltas par// rdo rje drag pos srung byed cing // rab 'bring thun mtshams shes pa yis// legs par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ 
525b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgya 'bras re ba ma chad la// rgyu 'bras med par bstan pa bshad// 'thob tshul rgyud kyi 'dre tshul dang // thams cad mkhyen tshul don mdzad tshul// legs bshad dang po thob pa'i tshul// lta spyod gdeng can rnal 
525b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas// bsgoms pas zhen mtha' rim gsal sangs// mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes gsal// bde ba chen po'i ngang du byon// de bzhin nyid du bgrod med gshegs// bdud bzhi ma bsam 
525b5(rgyud 'grel): bcos pas rgyal// lhan grub yon tan rdzogs lnga yang // rang gi ngo bo mtha' yul 'das// tshul gyis rnam par phye ba yin// lhan grub thams cad mkhyen pa yi// don mchog rang rig mthong goms pa// 
525b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu las 'bras bur gyu ro min gyi// 'bras bu rang nyid shar bar zad// rgyal po phrag gu spyod log pa// na shed bye sa thams cad kyi// bdag gyur lta bur khams gsum pa// ye yin mthong goms rtags 
525b7(rgyud 'grel): bral ba// longs spyod bral bas kun bdag nyid// ye yin mngon du byas par zad// kun rtags gnyis zad brjod pa'ang // dper na rmi lam bde sdug can// gnyen po mi dgos sgring sangs pas// 
525b8(rgyud 'grel): de bral nga yi bde ba thob// de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal bas// nyams thag spang min// shes goms ma rig rang bral na// gdod nas lhun grub rnam mkhyen pa// grub zin dang gis mngon dga' ste// 
526a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rang shar kyer 'dod pa// rtog pa'i snong bral rim pas brtags// men las yin par grub par med// thog mtha' bar du 'bras nyid phyir// 'bras bu'i theg par brjo/ 
526a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// kun btags zar nas nges byas la// thob ces rtags kyis gzhan nas min// e ma'o snying por lam bcas pas// 'jigs byed dbyings nyid kun bzangs phyag rgya'i mchog/ rang bzhin/ 
526a3(rgyud 'grel): sa gsung thugs chen po// byang chub spyan grub brdal ba yi// bring po nyid ni snying por bcas kun nas// de cing rdzogs pa'i ngang khas dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas// dpag bsam shing dang yid 
526a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi// rin po che dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul sprad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la 
526a5(rgyud 'grel): brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi dang du byung // de tshe bcu drug tshun char gyis// hA ldan gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab 
526a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas mchog/ mdaran rang rig kun gzhi zhing// byang chub snying po rang bzhin gyi// ye shes sku dngos kun bral ba// rgyal ba'i dngos gzhi thams cad du// mthong bzhin nges par ma byas la/ 
526a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor brtags nges la gnyed brtags zad// de thob rgyud tshul ji lta ba// so sa'i rnal 'byor tha dad pas// bsgrub pas de bzhin gshesag pa'i tshe// rgyud dag lhun grub rtul pa rnams// rgyud cig 'dres 
526a8(rgyud 'grel): na'ang 'di skad 'byung // phyogs bcu dus pa'i rdzogs pa yi// ning khams rnam dag bsam yas dang // rgya dang brel ba'i gzhal yas kyang // 'khor lo'i rkyen dang ro la ma'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus 
526b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don phyung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo // 
526b2(rgyud 'grel): sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // ye shes rgyud ni ma 'dres te// gcig na nges lung 'di dag 'gal// cig la mthun snang sgra mi 'jug/ 
526b3(rgyud 'grel): gal te snga phyi cig 'gro na// stong pa'i mur thim rigs pas 'gal// snang ba stong pa'i sbyor du 'ang 'gyur// mtha' la thug pa the tsom med// so so'i grub mtha'i khyad par yang // mi 'byung snyam pa'i skyen 
526b4(rgyud 'grel): rudu 'byung // so sor bsgrubs phyir cig mi rung // gal te rgyal ba rang rgyud 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid kyis cig go zhe na// sems can rgyud kyang de 'drar 'gyur// 'on te de ltar mi cig na'ang // rang rig rang 
526b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung mngon byas la// snga phyir sangs rgyas bla dgas btags// rang 'byung rang la shar bar zad// rang 'byung rigs pa rgyud med par// so sor me 'dres gang gis rung // 'on te rang 'byung cha gnyis 
526b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de phyir cig pa'i rigs pas 'gal// don mdzad re mo sa 'byung bar 'gyur// spyan drangs byon dang ma byon 'byung // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa// dngos po rnams kyi de nyid ni// de la gnyis pa yod par 'gyur// 
526b7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir gzhi yi don dang 'gal// mi cig gtan tshig rgyas pa med// lung las 'byung ba 'di skad du// mkha' la 'ja' tshen sprin yang mad// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen 
526b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsam yas kyang // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad bsdus// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa'i sa// mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lhun la rol pa mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid 
527a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa// dus ba'i rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ab// rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing // ye nas mnyab pas rgyal brgya batsho yin// nam mkha' gang ba'i rgyal 
527a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal ba gnyis// skra dar gsung thugs cig las med// 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par la// mi mthun so sor snang ba zad// de sogs mthun gsungs bka' dang 'gal// sangs rgyas 
527a3(rgyud 'grel): du ma'i mthar 'gyur ro// de de'ang nges pa 'di ltar zhig/ drang de na des don dbang du na// rigs lnga ye shes khye'u lngas// don grub snang byed bu las ni// shAkya thub 'gyur mya ngan 'das// me tog bkod 
527a4(rgyud 'grel): pir ma grags snang // thun mor sangs rgyas rbud rer sAr// ye shes skad cig go phye nas// don mdzad bathun 'dod ltar snar ba// drang ba'i don de nges pa yin// nges par rgyal ba thams cad kun// ngo bo cig de 
527a5(rgyud 'grel): mi/ ri nan// brda bas pa nas kyang rdzogs pan// babs rgyas 'dus cig rnapags// shes ba dbyings cig dum dang // yang za 'dags pa na ga'achar 
527a6(rgyud 'grel): cig bshad pa'i mtha' mi 'gyur// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes dang ye shes rig dang rgyud// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan gnas dang // rang bzhin nges par der med phyir// dngos po rnams kyi de lo// 
527a7(rgyud 'grel): na// sems kyi chos nyid dang 'byung gi/ ye shes cha gnyis yod ma yin// cig po kun ldan kun bral ba'o// de nas ye shes rgyud 'gro mer// de phyir sprul pa'ang 'gro 'ong bram// des na cig dang du ma'i mtha'/ 
527a8(rgyud 'grel): dbus bral ma spangs ngo bor cig/ de la la las cig par ni// cig bden du ma'i tshul gyis ni// mi cig the tsom za ba 'byung // de lta'i rgyud du 'dzin byed pa// 'tsho nyid brlabs ltar thams cad kun// gdod nas rang 
527b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byur ye shes cig/ ye shes 'di ni 'di 'drar dka'// mtha' mdzod ma lus der snang phyir// du ma nyid du cig pa'o// margya chad yod 'gyur na// rang 'brung kun snang bden mi 'gyur// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid dang du byon/ 
527b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par thar pa yi// dmigs med bde bar gshegs pa nyid// ye shes dbyings su thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ rtog me ma 'dres 
527b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs rdzogs pa// rigs su bstan dang thim pa med// dus bzhi phyogs kun bdag cig phyir// kun mkhyen thad ka'i dmigs yul grol// de phyir skad cig skye 'jigs med// 'gro dang 'ong ba'ang de 
527b4(rgyud 'grel): la med// log par rtogs rtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug gnas rnams ma lus snang // dkyil 'khor gnas la dkyil 'khor nyid// 
527b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// brgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dus/ 
527b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// rnam par med pa'i tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// gdul bya'i don ched bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba'i/ 
527b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyang // kun tu rin chen lta bu ste// zad 'phel 'gro 'ong 'dug par mdzad// dper na me long chu zla dang // gar mkhan lus dang brag ca dang // nyi 'od lta bur 
527b8(rgyud 'grel): don mdzad pa// lhan grub dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // sug sur thugs sprul cir snang ba// de la skad cig rgyun tu ma bral ba// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang / 
528a1(rgyud 'grel): rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med// ye nas kun khyad// 
528a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du// ye nas rnab 'phros snying po kun gnas pa// de ltar ston pa'i bla ma yang // shes rab mchog brtan ting nge 'dzin// thob cing dam pa'i mdzod dang ldan// 
528a3(rgyud 'grel): khungs sur+b+bad pa'i dbang phyug pa// dman pa'i 'du byed spangs shing dben// ngang dal thugs rje chen gnyen srung // dam pa de dang phrad nas ni// gzhan gyi yul la mi 'jug par// rigs dang skyon 
528a4(rgyud 'grel): la mi rtog par// snying du bzung zhing snying du bya// slob ma ma nor rigs can nam// rigs rgyud dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bla ma rigs 'dzin srog tu 'dzin// man ngag rin chen gter du 'chang / 
528a5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin shes rab tsal du rdzogs// lhag pa'i ye shes nyi mar 'char// dad dang brtson 'grus rgyu 'bras rdzogs// rtsol bas rgyas ngag stong brlag kyang // mi skyo bla ma mi spong ba// bde ba thob pa'i 
528a6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag yin// bla ma rdo rje srog 'gyur te// sgo gsum zol rgya g.yo med pas// mi phyed rgyun tu bsten na 'grub// bla ma'i don gyis nyon mongs shing // sdug bsngal gyur pa pha rol la// mi sems//

528b1(rgyud 'grel): dag med na 'grub mi 'gyur// des na bla ma srog yin pas// lus ngag sems kyis dus gsum du// rang sreg bral ba'i las mi byed// grags rnyed 'dod pa'i sems log gis// nyams rab
528b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i las mi bya// de ltar byed pa'i slob bu gang // drag pos spang ngam yang na ni// tshig gis brid cing bgyangs la gtang // thugs kyi bde ba sro sro'o// bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po// yon 
528b3(rgyud 'grel): tan zad med sbyin pa yin// byang chub lam ched 'dren mdzad pa// chags med zhing du 'god pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsa gcod cing // 'khor ba'i lam rnams stong par byed// ma rig 
528b4(rgyud 'grel): mun sel sgren mo yin// long ba rnams kyis dmigs su med// de la rtag tu mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub theg mi ring // rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// byang chub ston pa'i 'dren pa po//

528b7(rgyud 'grel): cing // sems can ngang tshul kun bor nas// gang gis yid kyang mi 'khrugs cing // bud med 'gug pas gtso la 'bul// gzungs thub gsang la mkhas pa yi// nges pa can la shin tu gtang //

531a8(rgyud 'grel): sra ru rtog pa 'khrul// bden pa gnyis su med pa'ang // mkha' dang 'ja' sprin sdang ba bzhin// snang stong kun tu rang gsal ba// rang bzhin ngag gis snang ba'o// bdag dang bdag du ma brtags pa'i// so 
531b1(rgyud 'grel): sor snang bzhin mthun pa'i gzugs// de lta bu yi ngang du snang // des gsungs lung gi bgrod dang bla// phyin ci log gnyis yang dag ste// ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ 
531b2(rgyud 'grel): de gsum ngon gyis de 'phos med// mar me'i dus na mun ldan pa// blun po mun snang re mos mthong // mkhas pa ngo bos re mi lta// 'khor ba chos nyid de bzhin no// spangs pa med par kun bral ba// buN+Da rika 
531b3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i don// lam dang 'bras bu'i chos tshang ba// 'brel pa gsum gyi tan+ta'o// / thugs kyi thigs pa las// rang bzhin gyi rgyud snang ba'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// // 'khrul bzhi tshul dang rang 
531b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis// sdom des nges par shes par bya// drug gi 'gro ba thams cad kyi// sems nyid nor bu rin po che// ji ltar bsam par snang ba la// 'khrul gzhi yod dam sgo skud med// sgo 'dogs dbang sgyur gang 
531b5(rgyud 'grel): zag rnams// sems nyid dmigs su med pa la// dngos po dran rgyud bzhir smra ba// de yid rigs rgyud rtag par ltung // bskur pa ba ni lhun grub la// de dang bsam pa so sor rtogs// de la de ni mi srid 
531b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// bzhi la ye nas med ces smra// zhen blo ngo la yod do zhes// bskur ba gang yin chad lta ba// de dang de nyod chad lta ba// de dang de gnyis tha dad cing // mi srid kun 'byung thog ma 'byung // la las 
531b7(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa gnyis med las// snang smra 'ang lhan cig med pa dang // brten pa mi btub gzhir mi btub// rgyu rkyen spong bas rigs pa med// don gnyis yod med rigs me las// de yi rgyu rkyen rang bzhin pas// 
531b8(rgyud 'grel): sman gyi phan snod ji bzhin du// thams cad ma lus rgyu cig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang // de gsum phyir na rkyen gyis che// lung las kyang ni 'di skad du// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog 
532a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i las snang ngo // sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // de bas sems kyi de bzhin nyid// mthong ba dag dang ma dag gis// dbye bas spyod yul so sor/ 
532a2(rgyud 'grel): snang // de la ma spang mi dmigs phyir// mtshon pa yod med 'dogs pa'ang med// dgag pa med pas glang med phyir// mtha' yi gzhung du bsgrub mi dgos// ma rig 'tshungs par ldan pa'i phyir// 
532a3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum rgyun tu don mthong med// mig gis mig bzhin de lta bas// gnyis snang snga phyi long brtags nor// sdom ni dus dang rgyu rkyen dang // tshul dang ngo bo rang bzhin nyes// tran+ta nyid las gsungs 
532a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// thog ma med nas sems yan dang // phyin ci log la 'jol nyog spyad// gal te ma byung byur 'gyur na// 'jig rten thog ma 'byung bar 'gyur// ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs pa dang // lhan cig byed pa 
532a5(rgyud 'grel): nyer len 'phel// rang 'byung rigs rgyud med pa nyid// de yis snang phyir tan+na las// sngar gsungs don gyi dang po'i rgyu// ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan du med// sngon gyi me long rnam gnyis ltar// gdod nas ldan pa// 
532a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med pa'o// kun tu rtog pa rnam gnyis po// goms pas mnyam du 'byung dang gsum// de yi rkyen gyis ltas snang bas// 'od ma lta bur phyi mar snang // khams gsum 'di na gnas pa kun// dkar 
532a7(rgyud 'grel): nag bcu yi dang po ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsam gtan bzhis// bcu bdun gnas ris spyod yul snang // snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthu ldan na// rtse mo bzhi yi spyod yul snang // rgyud lnga lam 
532a8(rgyud 'grel): du dug lnga ste// tan+na'i sa ma ya las 'byung // phyi nang 'khor los gnas pa skong pa 'ang // khams gsum cha yis nges pa med// 'khrul rtog bstan pa'i spyod yul ni// so so'i phyi nang snod bcud dang // 
532b1(rgyud 'grel): lus dang longs spyod tshe dang las// bde sdug par ma tha dad pa'o// sgyu mas bslus pa'i mi bzhin du// nor ba'i spyod yul rang bzhin snang // srid rtsa nyes pa bdag las phyir// sdug bsngal myong zhing / 
532b2(rgyud 'grel): lam dang bral// de lta bu yi rgyud gnyis las// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// nyi zla bza' skar glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshon sprin mangs sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang // nam mkha'i dbyings 
532b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'gyur zhing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsum yon tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang // 'jig rten gtso mchog sna tshogs rnam mar yang // chos kyi dbyings// 
532b4(rgyud 'grel): la nyams shing 'gyur ba med// de dang bral ba'i spyan bzangs rnams// de dang de ni de nyid dang // gzhan du brjod du med zhes smra// gnyis su med pas kun tu 'brel// thugs kyi thigs pa las// / 
532b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // rang bzhin las phye ba ni/ chos nyid bya byed rigs pa gnyis// mos snod bcud sbyar bsam yas pa'ang // gdul bya'i snang ba zhes su brjod// 
532b6(rgyud 'grel): de dang de rkyen de de yis// ji bzhin de bzhin mngon byed pa// rim pa bzhi dang lnga pa yis// rgyud stegs nyid du sbyor ba'i phyir// 'di skad rgyud las gsungs pa ni// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg
532b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// gcig la gnyis la gnyis la drug/ phyin ci log la mos pa sogs la// rang bzhin grub mthar 'jug pa gnyis// tha ma log dang ma log pa// ma rtogs pa dang 
532b8(rgyud 'grel): log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// zhes gsungs thugs rje'i sar gyur pa// so so'i snang rkyen bsam

533a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i legs snang ba// bden pas 'brel pa gnyis su med// de nyid gnyis med 'jigs bral ba// gsal brtan las kyis lha yi ming// // de gnyis bstan pa'i dngos gzhi bas// spyi lu 
533a4(rgyud 'grel): nges pa gnyis pa'i mtshan// brtags pa bstan pa'i don bcud de// bzhi yis kun la mi snang bas// kho na nyid gsum ldan bden pa'i// ming gis mtshon las lhag pa'i don// tshig rgyas kyis kyang mtshon 
533a5(rgyud 'grel): mi nus// de bas gzhon nu'i rtogs pa bzhin// yi ge bsdus par don rgyas par// brda' 'phrad tha snyad bsdu ma yin// gsum pa'i ming la mos pa'i blos// so sor 'dod pa shes rab thabs// nyi mas 
533a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pas rin chen ltar// ming gi sgron mas shes rab thabs// 'bring la snang ba mched pa'i phyir// rgyas pa bye brag thigs par shar// rang bzhin las kyi snor gyur la// bgrod thabs gnyis su yan 
533a7(rgyud 'grel): lag rkyen// thog ma bar dang tha ma'i yul// lnga dang gnyis dang gnyis bstan no// dang po'i yul la rgyu rkyen dang // bzhi bcu gtad pas rdzogs pa yin// thabs dang shes rab rgyu yang ni// snga ma'o// 
533a8(rgyud 'grel): snyan pa gnas 'khor sdud// dus bstan drug nas rin chen sgron// gsang ba'i 'og min gnas kyis phye// yi ge bzhi yis shes par 'gyur// gsang ba tshad ma gnyis dang 'brel// blo gros rgyu la thun 
533b1(rgyud 'grel): mod mchog/ bla ma rang sems ye shes che// gzhi dang las kyi gnas ston la// ye shes mang po shes pa'i bdag/ bstan pa'i bcud thugs bsdus dngos po// bkragasal lung la dus bzhi mnyam// 
533b2(rgyud 'grel): de de yod de de rtog 'gyur// thun mong pa la mtshan nyid gzugs// ston pa rang 'byung rdo rje 'dzin// rgyal tshab rgyud ni skyes bu gnyis// rang bzhin dus gsum chos las med// longs spyod chen po kun tu

533b4(rgyud 'grel): cig 'dus pa'i rin chen khang // ma spangs lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// dbyings tshad rtse mo sgo 'bur dang // 'bur 'phang rtse mo rgyan gdan ni// bdag nyid dang ni bdag po dang // longs 'gul sgo dang

533b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'bab pa dang // gyad thabs 'greng bar bzhugs pa'o// tshad las 'das pa'i grangs 'dus pa// chos dbyings mu mtha' med par khyab// nor bu rin chen sku mnga' ba'i// gsang ba dag de yi bdag
533b8(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyir// tan+t+ra thugs bsdus mos bzhin du// ku ma ra dang spyod tshor snang // de ni de yi thugs skyes phyir// de yi don ni des bsdus rigs// sku yis bye ba'i 'khor rnams la// so so bstan pa'i dus snang 
534a1(rgyud 'grel): yang // lhan cig pa la dus cig snang // gang gis mthong rtogs tshogs tshe na'ang // dus bzhi mnyam las ma g.yos kyang // de'ang rang bzhin mnyam pa'i dus// rtag pa rgyun tu thugs rjes 'jo// / 
534a2(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin dag pa'i dus la 'byung // de tshe rang bzhin des lung snang // gsung lnga tshul gyis cig las snang // mtshon byed bstan par de brjod de// de dag mtshon pas rang mtshan sla'o// 'gro ba gang gang 
534a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sdang yul// rigs mthun dga' byed mi mthun pa// skyur med 'jigs gzugs sdang ba ltar// rgyal ba'i gling bzhi'ang de bzhin no// de rjes rkyen gyi gleng bslang ba// ston pas snang dang 'khor gyis zhus// 
534a4(rgyud 'grel): skabs las gleng ba slang skyon dang 'khor// gnang 'dri rkyen du gar gyur pas// de des gsungs la ma rag pa// nges pa'i tshig 'bru ngo bo'ang de// skabs kyis dris phan spos ci dgos// dri lan brdo bas nges 
534a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub// thabs sbyor shes rab gang tshe'ang // rkyen byed 'byung la ma reg pa// 'khor dang gzhan gyi don phyi ru// chu tshogs thugs rjes 'da' bar 'gyur// brjod bya rang bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud// 
534a6(rgyud 'grel): de ji bzhin du rjod byed dag/ ston pa rgyud don lam dang tshig/ 'brel pa rim dang 'chol 'khrugs pa// rgyu 'bras thabs dang thabs byung yin// gleng gzhi rjes su nges par 'gro// tan+da le'u'i grangs bsdus/ 
534a7(rgyud 'grel): pa// me long bcu yis mtshon sbyar ba// bcu yi 'dren par shas kyis bsdus// bye brag bdag dang gzhan shes 'gyur// seng ge mchongs pa'i chos cig ltar// rnam grangs tshig lem chos cig tu// 
534a8(rgyud 'grel): bya tri mchongs pa de bzhin pa// tan+t+ra'i tshig don du mas su gcod// ka la bi ka chos bzhi pos// rnal 'byor can gyis 'phang gcod do// rus sbal 'gros kyi chos gnyis pos// 'bru stong mi bzhag 
534b1(rgyud 'grel): gzer bus gdab// dus kyi 'bru char chos gsum pos// bka' yi tshad gsum skabs sbyar snang // klag gi gzan gyi chos gnyis ltar// don gyis dmigs bzung gags gsal lo// sna phrug 'dzag 
534b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos gnyis ltar// ldem dgongs bsang ba brgyad kyis sbyor// dang mo 'gros chos rnam gnyis ltar// gzhan don dbu zhabs le'u mtshams 'brel// me long chos ltar mtshon pa'i dpe// kun la
534b3(rgyud 'grel): des mtshon thog du dbab// ji 'jigs phrug gu rtsal spyong ltar// 'bru tshig don gyi go rim bsdebs// tshig don mos par bshad pa'i phyir// rnam par phye bas ma 'dres gsal// thabs dang don la rang 
534b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pa// tshig gis mtshon byas de snad byed// // ston pa gang gis gang zhig la// gtad pa gang ste gtad pa'i phyir// rgyal sras sdud mdzad ma 'ongs sogs// mi nub stan rtses phyir gtad pa//

536b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par lam dang mthun pa'o// zhen pa'i lam la de nyid de// ji ltar dug la dug nad bzhin// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la// tshe dang mkhas pa'i thabs kyis spyod// cig shos pa de dmangs rje dang //

536b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'bru sogs rims dang ldog la bten// gtsang ma rigs kyi mthun bzhin du// mthong goms bzhis mthus spyod yul spyod// lnga pa sri zhu rgyal chos ni// dang po bzhin du longs spyod lnga// shin tu 
536b5(rgyud 'grel): spros spyod blang bar bya// lnga par lnga pa gtso bo yin// de nas bzhi ni zag bral nas// lcags zangs gser dngul go rim bzhin// bdag gzhan yul gyi khyad par 'gyur// snga ma rgyud ldan rtsol ba med// 
536b6(rgyud 'grel): rang rang bslab pa gang yin pa// skabs su gces pa khyab par yin// lam dang sa yi rims sbyar nas// spyod par grags la mchod pa la// snga mgo mthar phyis 'jug che// des na rang rig spyod yul 
536b7(rgyud 'grel): blang // khyad par dor ba mthar phyin med// glang po rang gar spyad pa ni// don du mi 'gyur gzhi dbang bas// so so'i rnam smin tshad las 'das// de la de yi de yod phyir// de des gnyis po mi ltung thob// 
536b8(rgyud 'grel): so so'i ltung thob grags pa bzhin// bsag bya gnyis 'gyur bri bar 'gyur// bya ba'i sdom ni dgos ched dang // ngo bo rnam grangs nges tshig dang // bya thabs skabs dang khyad par dar// skyon yon 
537a1(rgyud 'grel): dgu yis rdzogs pa yin// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang // dam chos phyir na rnam lnga'o// shing la chu bzhin dang blang ba// rab 'bring tha ma nus tshad sbyar// gdul bya phyi nang 
537a2(rgyud 'grel): zung bzhi po// gdul bya'i mthu tshad rnam bzhi dang // cig gis kun 'dul mthu la sogs// lnga po gang yin ngo bo'o// zung du phyi nang bzhi phyir dang // 'phel bya gnyis po 'phel phyir dang // dgug 
537a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bzhi po sdud dbang bzhi// gdul bya rnam gnyis 'joms phyir dang // snga ma sngon du bstan zin phyir// des tshig nges par 'grub pa yin// don gyi dmigs su gzung ba'i phyir// rang bzhin lam 
537a4(rgyud 'grel): dang thugs rjes phye// bar ma thabs dang shes rab la// snga ma gnyis dang phyi ma la// shes rab ting 'dzin rnam gnyis dang // longs spyod lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis// de la phyi nang gsang bar 
537a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad// ngo bo rjes su zhi ba gnyis// phyi la nad bgegs dgra zhi ba'o// nang la nyon mongs rtog zhi ba'o// rgyas par gnyis po gso dang 'brel// na shi lo thog rtsi zhu sogs// tshe dang rigs rgyud 
537a6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod dang // bsod nams bzhi po nang 'bras bu// dbang ni dgug dang sdud pa gnyis// phyi rol da ra'i rnam pa dgug/ mi mthun rnam gnyis dbang po sgyur// rang sems 'bras lnga bsdu bar bya// 
537a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod bskrad dang mnan pa dang // smyo 'bog byed dang skam pa dang // rmongs dang gtan por rgyud gzhan la'o// rang gi phyi nang dgra bgegs 'joms// thabs ni thabs la gsang ba nang // khams 
537a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi khams gsum las sbyar ba// shes rab phyi dang nang gnyis te// phyi rol tshad med gnyis las bzhi// lhag pa gzugs brnyan rnam gnyis dang // mchod rten sgo dang sbyin sreg ste// phyi ma la 
537b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsgrub po dang // thab brgyad 'bru ba khung bcas dang // phyogs dang kha dog dus gnyis dang // phur pa lha dang sems dang yum// bsgrub po ling+ga me mchod dang // dkyil 'khor yo byad tshang bar sbyar// 
537b2(rgyud 'grel): bya thabs gtso bo sbyin sreg la// skabs su dgos pa'i li ngag gdab// bro stabs bcas pa'i cha rkyen na// de dag rtsa ba'i mchod mnyes so// gtan me mchod sbyin sreg ma rims// smon lam lhag 
537b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i las dag go/ skabs ni dbang dang bsgrub pa dang // mchod bshags tshe dang dus bab tshe'o// khyad par zag bcas bar chad med// mthar phyin lam gyis phye ba 'am// shes rab dbang po rnam 
537b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis// nus mthu byin rlabs yul ngo bo'o// thabs dang bzhi dang khyad par ba// skas ka'i gdang bu'i ji lta ba'o// mi skongs mi 'phyang mi rdzogs dang // don gnyis mi 'grub de yi skyon// 
537b5(rgyud 'grel): de las ldog pa'i tshul ldan pa// yon tan nyid du shes par bya// sa bzhi sdom ni ngo ba grangs// dgos ched dus dang che ba dang // yon tan rkang thabs skyon dag gi/ nges par dmigs su shes 
537b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// gsang skor zhugs pa thabs dngos kyis// sgo gsum rang gi srung bya las// rgyal po bka' rtags ji ltar bar// mi 'dral sdom pa de ngo bo// thun mong gzhung gzhan 'gro don du// khyad par 
537b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba yan lag de// mdo rgyas rab 'bring tha ma'i grangs// tan+d+har gsungs pa bstan par bya// theg chen sa la khyad par ba// skabs kyi lam mchog mi mthun bsrung // skyon yon cha yis ched che ba/ 
537b8(rgyud 'grel): de dang de yi nges tshig 'grub// rang spyi'i gdul bya'i myang ba sogs pa'o// bsrung bya'i rim par yod pa'i phyir// sa lam gang thob de yi tshe// de la de dgas de bsrung ba// nyams su blang ba'i dus 
538a1(rgyud 'grel): la bab// skabs dang 'byor na phan yon gnyis// bsrung bya mchog la bskur pa'i phyir// // smon pa bla med srung thub na// tshul khrims sdom pa thams cad rdzogs// 
538a2(rgyud 'grel): bya byed med par nyams pa'ang med// ma nor gnas pa'i phan yon ni// rnam grangs rjes 'jug spyi rgyud grangs// gzungs dang thob pas dbye ba'ang // bdag dang gzhan dgos grangs rdzogs pa'o// 
538a3(rgyud 'grel): de de zhig ral 'byung ba yi// dmigs shes gtso'i rtsa ba lnga// le lo med pas mos stsogs sbyor// de la nges par rdzogs gzung thob// phyal pa le lo log pa dang // zlas zhar nyon mongs dbang 
538a4(rgyud 'grel): song dang // bdud kyis bslus dang rang bzhin ngan// brgyad rgyus dka' thub ral pa dang // dus 'di phyi mar gragazhan gyis// spyi dang sgo skyon gnod la gnod// bkod pa rgyu las bdun gsungs pa/ 
538a5(rgyud 'grel): sdom ni ngo bo khyad par grangs// dgos pa thabs dang dus nges tshig/ yon tan skyon gyi sa gzhi ru bzhag/ gnas skabs bdun du snying po len// bkod pa gang rdzogs de ngo bo// dang po rang bzhin nyid
538a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin// // gdul byas zhi dang khro bo de// mos pas sku gsung thugs yon tan// 'phrin las gtso bo phye bas lnga// rtsa ba de'ang skabs kyis grags// mchod pa dbang dang 'phrin las
538a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub// bzhi yang gtso bos grangs rjes mthun// kun las 'jug pa bcu bzhi dang // sum cu rtse lngar gyur pa yin// de yi rjes su drug sbyor ba'o// bzhi po'i dus su bdag gzhan phyir// 
538a8(rgyud 'grel): drang dang rten dang 'brel pa dang // bsgom dang bsgrub rdzogs mchod pa sgrub phyir// shin tu nan tan blang bar bya// sa ye sbyang thabs go rim dang // de yi chog thabs dag ni// rang bzhin la sogs 
538b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun dag la// gang la yod pa kun yod do// thabs dang shes rab las kyi bya// dkyil 'khor mngon du 'grub par 'gyur// bdun gyi gtso snying gang gang la// de yi 'khor ldan nges pa'i tshig 
538b2(rgyud 'grel): lung las grags pas the tsom med// tha dad cig gis bcings dang bral// 'phel 'grib pa na yon thob 'grub bzhi// bye brag so so'i grangs bzhin no// de las bzlog pa'i skyon cha ni// 
538b3(rgyud 'grel): grangs kyi rjes su nges par 'gro// mnyes par byed pa'i sdom tshig ni// dgos ched ngo bo grangs skabs dang // skyon dang yon tan la sogs pas// ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya// / 
538b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan don rtogs mnyes skong pa// 'di dang phyi mar thob pa dang // yon tan bka' las gsungs pa bzhin// che skyon mi 'byung bya phyir ro// bya byed bya ba byed 'dus pa// dgyes tshim 'gyur// 
538b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdom pa nyid// 'jig rten spyod yul mos bya'i phyir// phyag dang phyag rgya glu gar tshig/ phyi nang gsang rdzas dgos spyod pa// srog dang ldan pas bden gsum tshul// mchod pa gsum 
538b6(rgyud 'grel): las spros pa dag/ dkyil 'khor gsum gyi gnas dag las// dbul phyir dgos ched rjes bzung bas// las spyod bsgrub dbang mchod tshe na// dus kyis rjes zhugs yon tan dag/ spyi 
538b7(rgyud 'grel): dang khyad par dus kyis na// 'di dang phye mar gang thob pa// bdag gzhan don gyis gnyis su 'gyur// de las bzlog dang mi bskong g.yel// nyams tshad mthu byin bral bar 'gyur// thob par
538b8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sdom tshig ni// dgos ched rgyu rkyen ngo bo grangs// thabs dang thob tshad dus snod dang // yon tan skyon dang dkyil 'khor sbyar// don 'gyur bzhi las khyad par du// bdag gzhan don nus// 
539a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs las bsgrub// byang dang chub par 'gyur bas myur// de la de yod phyir nod bya// lung dang man ngag las 'byung ba// rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhi yan lag snyan// drug la 
539a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i thob bya de// ngo bo nyid ces rnam par bshad// rtsa ba rnal ma lnga bco brgyad// skyur ba lnga la sum cu drug/ dkyil 'khor las kyi rjes zhugs pa// snod rim sbyor ba'i las rdzogs bya//

539a4(rgyud 'grel): rnyed mi ldog pa'i// rim pa sa las rig ye shes kyi// rim pas rol pa rgyud nyid las// dad brtson gsum dang brtul zhugs gsum// gang la yod pa de yi snod// 'di dang phyi ma'i phan 
539a5(rgyud 'grel): yon grangs// rgyud las gsungs pa de bzhin te// de zlog rang yan chos nyid dang // gsang ba ma nyams lhung 'jigs pa// som gtang ba'i rdzas spyad ltar// 'gyur ba gsang ba'i rgyud kun ltos//

539b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa der// tshogs skyes bsnyen bsgrub drangs dus mtshan// so sor phye bas rgyud gsungs bzhin// rnal 'byor stobs goms 'byor pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya snyan pa dang /

539b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bsam bca' ba'i dam// bsam dang bca' dang rang bzhin dang // 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya dang // bde bar rang bzhin bzlas bsam dag/ las kyi phye ba grangs mang po// skyon bcu le lo

542a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan// gsang pa'i snying po nges pa 'di// gsang ba kun kyi bdag nyid phyir// rlud rnams kun gyi rgyal po'o// sde rdod kun dang drung kun gyi// 'byung gnas bstan la nges 'bebs phyir// bstan/

542a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum// rab la mtshan dang 'bring la bye// / tha ma 'brug nye dkrol ba'o// rab mtshan pa ya gsum du grags// rdzu 'phrul snying po lu g+ha~M yi// lag gi rtswa bzhin dbul zhabs 
542a8(rgyud 'grel): rtogs// bsa' ba can gyi ched byer ro// grangs ka 'bring gdon bstan pa// theng gzhi bgreng dang chung don dang // dgos 'brel bstan pa dpe rnams dang // skabs kyi dgos pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ 
542b1(rgyud 'grel): gleng gzhi byed pa'i ngo bo dang // dgos pa byed pa'i don nyid ni// thun mong gleng gzhi rnam gnyis dang // thun mong men pa gsum du shes// grags pa thun mong ngo bo ni// thub drug ston pa stong gsum pa// 
542b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par shAkya thub pa nyid// rgyal srid btsun mo 'khor spangs nas// rab tu byung sogs mdzad pa yi// rgyu yi 'khor lo bstan pa sgrogs// 'gro drug 'khor dang rnam bzhi sogs// shin tu bkod pa'i dus/ 
542b3(rgyud 'grel): su gsungs// khyad par thun mong 'di nyid du// ston gnas dus 'khor sdud bstan sogs// mtshan nyid gnyis kyis dgrol 'gyur yang // 'dul yang so sor snang 'dra'o// thun mong ma yin ston pa nyid// 
542b4(rgyud 'grel): yab yum chags skul rol pa dang // gsang ba phun sum tshogs drug gis// yig bzhi'i sgo nas byin brlabs kyi// dbang skur ma brjod rgud bshad pa// kun yum med pas gsal ba dang // ro ba yang // 
542b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di lta ste// ston pa gnas dang sdud pa 'khor// dus dang ston pa rnam drug ste// ston pa'i rang bzhin brgyad dang ldan// bdag nyid byed pa kun tu bzang // 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga ste// mtshung// 
542b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir// lngas kyang snyan pa gsung mi 'gal// gnas kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// ngo bo rin chen gzhal yas khang // ye shes rgyu dang gru bzhi dbyibs// rtse mo tshad med mtshan nyid 
542b7(rgyud 'grel): sems// phyi dang nad med rgya mchad// yon tan rdzogs rgyan rnamathar mo// sna tshogs yon tan can du'o/ rgyu 'bras brgyad nyid rta babasas pa// / gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje yis// thun mong ma 
542b8(rgyud 'grel): yin nges pa'i rgyud// dris lan mi mngon don gyis bsdus// byin brlabs mi yul grags pa yis// 'khor gyi tshad dang mang dang khyab// brjod med nam mkha'i mtha' klas gang // ngo bo mi zhan rigs 
543a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang // rig pa ye shes byang chub sems// dad pa nyan pa'i lha chen rnams// 'gro ba 'dul ba spru la sogs so// dus kyis ngo bo mnyam nyid do// skal ba can la kon pa 
543a2(rgyud 'grel): dras// mtshon bya rang bzhin bzhi'i rgyud// sgo skur bral bar bstan pa ni// mtshon byed sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// mdzub mo'i ri bong can bzhin no// dgos pa gleng bzhi rnam pa gnyis// lhan cig 'khor 
543a3(rgyud 'grel): la go phye ba// thun mong ma yin khyad par gyis// thun mong rnam gnyis bcas pa yin// 'gro ba chags can spong med la// longs spyod rdzogs su btsun mo dang // gnyis med rol sogs bstan pa dang // 
543a4(rgyud 'grel): mthun pas mthun pa dgrol phyir ro// skye bo chags can spong 'dul la// byin rlabs shar ba'i thub pa nyid// mi yi skye ba bzhes snang nas// bcu gnyis la sogs rdzogs mdzad de// rnam dag mchod 
543a5(rgyud 'grel): rten rdo rje'i gdan// rang 'byung mngon par rdzogs tshul snang // // de bzhin gleng bslang rnam pa gnyis// thun mong ma yin rnam pa gnyis// yab yum chags sku rol pa dang // dgyes ltar 'khor 
543a6(rgyud 'grel): la dbang skur dang // rgyud don 'byung phyir brlang zhes bya// de yang skye bo chags can don// thun mong gleng bslang ston 'khor dang // thams cad snang nas dbang thob 'khor// nyid kyis rtogs nas 'gro don du// 
543a7(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsa la don gyis zhus dang lan// snang par don gyi tshig tu byung // sku gsung thugs kyi spro ba mdzad// de ni skye bo phal ba'i don// ngo bo don blang tshig phyung ba'o// rgyud don lam dang yan lag ste/ 
543a8(rgyud 'grel): de yi gdul bya bsam pa gnyis// dbang gi lam yang gnyis su brjod// // thun mong ma yin rnam gnyis ste// thun mong lam stegs nyid tsam du// pha rol phyin pa bcu rgyu 'bras spyod// 
543b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa yang bsam dbang gis// grol lam thabs su bstan pa yin// grol lam mthong dang sgom gnyis ste// dag mnyam gsum bzhi bzhi dang lnga// bden pa gsum dang rtogs pa bzhi// ldan 
543b2(rgyud 'grel): pas rang rig mngon sum du// nges par chod pas mthong ba'i lam// mtshan nyid dang por bshad pa yin// bsgom pa skye dang de bzhin nyid// skyed dbang srid pa'i chos lugs su// ye nas 
543b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas mthun de zlog phyir// dang po ma skyes snying rje dang // phra rags mang por snang ba ste// dngos grub myur du grub 'dod pas// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// ting 'dzin de ni goms 
543b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya// ji bzhin yang dang yang goms nas// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste// phyir ni gang 
543b5(rgyud 'grel): sgom kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsdu// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis sam// zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom// de yang phra dang ring ba dang // goms par re mos 'dris par bya// 
543b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin goms nas rigs lngar bsgom// bzhi bcu gnyis dang stong tshogs slob// de goms che yi rigs 'dzin du// sbyar nas mngon par sangs rgyas tshul// de yang lnga goms gsal phyir dang // ral 
543b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis rim pa nges par bzhag/ de kho nyid de cig car ba// bsgom pa'i rim pa bslab bya bral// ma bcos ji bzhin mnyam gzhag na// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // mi gnas 
543b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas la gnas par bsgom// // thabs las rgyud dang rim par ni// man ngag ting 'dzin stobs 'gyur zhing // rlung 'gag las la goms par bya// shin tu bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu// gsang 
544a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang pad+mar ldan 'gyur na// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// bcu dang gsum gyi rgyu 'bras rnams// rdzogs phyir rims dang zlog shes na// byin brlabs shugs kyi rang 
544a2(rgyud 'grel): snang 'thob// dbang po yul sa ldan gyur nas// gsad pa mchog gi 'phrul chen po// dkyil 'khor rdul snyid grangs med dang // phun sum 'tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gas nga dbang mchog gis 
544a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byin par byed// thabs kyi lam la 'bad par bya// 'jug dang thob phyir lam brjod de// skye bo nyid sgrol phyir bzhag ste// las su rung nas lam mthar phyir// lam gyi yan lag rkyen bshad pa// 
544a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes mthun spyod pa lta ba dpeng // bsgrub dang mchod pa 'phrin las dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs brgyad kyi rdzogs// skabs kyi gtso dang grogs pos bsdu// de yang bdag gzhan don du'o// rjes su 
544a5(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i spyod pa yang // skabs kyis ting 'dzin stobs chen bshad// bya ba byed la bya med la// dang po dpyod par bshad pa yin// snying rjes chud ma zos par 'dzin// thabs kyi pha rol phyin 
544a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa// gnyis pa lam dad mthun pa yin// chos spyod bcu yi cig cha la// gnas pa gsum pa brjod pa yin// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde la// ma nyams blo dang ldan pa la// ting 'dzin
544a7(rgyud 'grel): langs te spyod pa ni// grangs kyi bzhi pa spros bcas pa'o// kun kyang dus ni nam langs tshe// sgo gsum phyir na nges tshig 'grub// bshad pa'i gtan tshig ldan pa yis// lha dang lta bar bya med pa// 
544a8(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub shes rab sgron me nyid// rang bzhin gsal ba spyan gyi mchog/ ngo bo yang de ltar nyid du shes// yul med gsal phyir lta zhes spyad// rim par bgrod phyir dbang bshad pa// ngo bo nus phan 
544b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal dbang shes// shin tu bstan pa'i ngo bo lnga'o// dgos pa'i skabs kyis skabs phyed dang // bshad pa bzhin du shes par gyis// ngo bo bzhin du grangs 'jug pa// dbang lnga rdzogs bus bco 
544b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rgyas// dus ni rnam pa gsum du ste// phyi nang dkyil 'khor rnam gsum du// rim par bskur ba dang po ru// ri mo bzhengs gsol phan nus bskur// bskyed pa'i rim pa slob pa'i dus// 
544b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs rims gdam ngag sbyor dus su// gsang dbang bskur ba sor bzhi pa'o// dkyil 'khor bstan pa shes bstan phyir// ngo bo'i dus kyang lngar 'gyur ste// rnol dang btags nus pa bzhin/ 
544b4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa skyes dang thob pa'i tshad// // rgyu rkyen rgyu dang bdag po dang // yul dang de ma thog pa dang // ngo bo kun la skabs su sbyar// dad dang brtson 'grus gsum ldan dang // brtul zhugs 
544b5(rgyud 'grel): sum ldan slob ma la// rgyu cig la'am tha dad la// gang ldan chud ma zos pa sbyin// bskur bas rkyen gnas las nyon mongs// shes sgrib cha pra rnam dag pa// yon tan snang phyir ming du brjod// 
544b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// las rtsom 'bras med ltung bas rtsom// gang yang phan pas dbang skur pa'i// dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// 
544b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog phyir yon tan no// lha mi yon tan yan chad nas// rdo rje 'dzin sogs skyabs kyi thob// bsgrubs 'jig rten pa dang 'das// 'jig rten pa yang 'di lta ste// ro langs tshe pra bsgrub pa 
544b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // lha chen po dang rgyal po bzhi// gdug bkru 'dul rgyal blon bzhin// chung ma dbang du bya ba gnyis// re langs rkang mgyogs dam tshig bsgrub// mi snang gzugs bsgrub lba kl-i mo/ 
545a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal blon dmag dpon zhang blon bsgrub// tshe 'di'i ched phyir 'jig rten pa'o// yi ge sgyu 'phrul tshegs bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje sems dang sman bsgrub dang // rigs lnga bsgrub 
545a2(rgyud 'grel): dang yul lnga sems// byin dbang bsgrub pa rnam gnyis sogs// phyag rgya rdzas dang thabs spyod la// rten po'i bsgrub pa gsum du bsdu// don du gnyer phyir bsgrub mtshan nges// tshogs gnyis 
545a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs phyir mchod pa ni// ting 'dzin sbyor sgrol dam rdzas dang // 'dod yon blo dang sems kyi sprin// rol mo la sogs dbang bskur dbul// gnas su stabs phyir mchod pa ste// thun mong 
545a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par yan tan ldan// bdag gzhan don grub 'phrin las ni// mchod rten phyag rgya'i sgo dang ni// ha byAk+ka dang rdzas kyis bya// na so gzhon dang rigs 'phel dang // skye rgyu med dang zla bral dang /

545a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi stobs cher 'gyur// rgyal ba cig bsgoms kun la sgrub// byed kyang skabs kyis lha yang bzhi// bsgrub gzhi'i gzung phyir dam tshig ni// ngo bo mdo rgyas gsum du shes// mnyam pa'i dam

545b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam pa mang // sa bzhi so mtshams mkhar sogs pa'o// nyams skyon spyi dang khyad par gyi// gnyis 'gyur rgyud nas gsal bar ston// gso thabs rtsa ba yan lag gi/ skabs dang sbyar te gzhung

547b2(rgyud 'grel): dag mig ldan la// log sta ma lus tshar gcod shog/ sgyu 'phrul man ngag gsal ba'i sprin me zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // blo rno zab dang myur ldan zhing // rgya che ba dang blo yangs dang // ral
