547b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang ba'o// dang po pa yi rtag bzhi ru// de bzod 'tshol dang 'phel rims dang // nges pa gsum dang thog ma'i tshe// so so rtogs rgyu gzhung 
547b8(rgyud 'grel): thos pa'i// dbang mchog tshig yul byas la brten// byed pas rgyu byas bsams thog tshe// gzhung las grags pa'i gtan tshigs lnga// sngon 'byung rjes sogs las nyid dang // mi mthun 
548a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i gtan tshigs ces/ des na rang spyi mtshan yul la// bshes gnyen bdag po rim 'di zag/ dad pas 'dod dang bag chags rgyu// shes rab spyan mchog rang rig nyid// 
548a2(rgyud 'grel): gdod nas shes rab lnga yis mtshungs// gces smos la sogs lhan cig byed// de dag sgo nas 'tshol byed pa// kun tu rgyu zhing 'dod smon byed// de yis gzung 'dzin spyod yul mtha'// yod 
548a3(rgyud 'grel): med lung du ma bstan las// tshol na skyon gsum 'du mi snyed// de dag mi 'dor bral la tshol// 'on kyang gnyis rdzogs gnyis med don// kun yin gad kyang min pa'i phyir// phyogs bral
548a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bdag bsam brjod 'das// thams cad mkhyen don bco lnga bcod// sems chos ye nas dbyer med phyir// brgyad drug shes pa shes rab mchog/ nges pa nyid du rgyal bas gsungs// 
548a5(rgyud 'grel): de tshe g.yo sngon 'jug pa'i ngang // ngo bos 'brel phyir gzhi nyid nas// 'dir 'jug nges pa'i don du rung // la la thun mong lam rnams nas// rkyen rgyus 'dir zhugs slob par nges// kha cig 
548a6(rgyud 'grel): sems brgyad nas rgyud de// skal pa zhing gi rdul snyed nas// thun mong mchog lam sbyangs pas 'phrad// thun mongs mthar byas pa'i tshe// yang dag sku gsung thugs bco lngas// byin brlabs 
548a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bar mos snang bas// 'khor lo sa la 'gyur ba'ang nges// tha ma'i tshe na gsung lnga yis// dngos ston sngon 'byung lam shes bya// rjes su 'jug pa'i shes 'tshol tshe// mos pa tha dad dbang
548a8(rgyud 'grel): gis na// bde gshegs sku gsung lnga tshul gyis// so sor 'tsham par bstan la dbab// bskal pa gsum na sbyangs pa yis// zab mo gsang thos bzod thob des// chos sku gsung gi tshul bzhin du// 
548b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod med don gyis bstan la dbab// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i gsung lta bu// dgongs dang brda' yis btan la dbab// sprul pa'i tshig gis gsung lta bu// brjod pa tshig gis rmal bar bya// 
548b2(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub gsung de bzhin// rig pa brlabs kyis gtan la dbab// rdo rje sku yi gsung lta bur// gnyis med mtha' bral don gyi dbab// la la ngo bo nyid gsung ltar// snang srid mthong 
548b3(rgyud 'grel): thos nyid kyis 'bebs// gsang ba sku yi gsung lta bu// dpyod pa thabs kyis 'bebs par 'gyur// la la sngon 'byung bstan pa bzhin// ji bzhin don dam nges pa'i tshig/ rang rkyen mtshan ma'i 
548b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshegs dang // ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i gtan tshogs dang // bkri dang rgyud pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// so so'i thol nges byed cing // brtag yul yongs su bshig byed cing // de dag las kyi 
548b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs 'gyur// des na gtan tshigs dbang brtsan par// gtan tshigs ma gyur gang yang med// de las re zhig tshig dbang du// dngos po brtan la phebs mi phebs// dbab med ston pa'ang 
548b6(rgyud 'grel): de yin te// mthong snyed byed phyir dgos yod la// so sor rtog pa'i yul du 'gyur// 'tshel tshe dgos phyir de ltar nges// de la cig shos thun mong mchog/ thun mong grags pa rnam bzhi sogs// 
548b7(rgyud 'grel): thun mong min pa rnam pa gnyis// tshig don mthun par 'bebs pa dang // gtan tshigs don tshig mi mthun pas// gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'o// dang po tha snyad gtan la 'bebs// de bzhin// 
548b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'bebs dag mnyam rtogs// bden bdag gnyis med la sogs pa'o// gnyis pa ci yang ma yin la// ci yang yin dang grub ma grub// de sogs don 'dod ci yang min// phyir yin phyir 
549a1(rgyud 'grel): grub phyir ma grub// phyir brjod bstan tshigs la sogs pas// mi 'dra ba ltos rgyu ngo bo'i phyir// de dag gtan tshigs 'gyur bar nges// de yang skabs 'dir de la brten// 
549a2(rgyud 'grel): de des yul dang shes pa dang // 'das 'khor snang ba shig bya ba// med na mi 'byung tshul nyid dang // de ma grub pas de ldog dang // snang ba rang snang thabs chen de// snang bzhin ma grub shes
549a3(rgyud 'grel): rab nyid// bar ma sems rtogs rnam par thar// lnga bzhi gnyis sogs snga phyi 'phel// lam grangs 'bel ba'ang 'dir shes ste// skabs skabs nyid du the tshom med// de mthar bzhi mthar 
549a4(rgyud 'grel): rdeng ldan pas// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med par// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo // byang chub sems snang thams 
549a5(rgyud 'grel): cad ni// shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de ni ji lta bur// byang chub de ni sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dbyer 
549a6(rgyud 'grel): med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad dang // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub// yangs shing rgya che 
549a7(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// gang nas ma 'ongs gar 
549a8(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min// mnyam dang rtog pa 
549b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka med// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang // sgyu ma mi g.yor tshul shes pa// gnyis ka rang rig nyid du 'dus// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang bzhin ye nas 
549b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yis// sus kyang ma byas ngang gis gsal// ma tshogs pad+ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// 
549b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs// thams cad ma lus cig pa'i ngang // lta dang lta bar byar med pa'i// ye shes sgron mar sbeng ba ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong // 
549b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon las gud na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po med// don nyid skra las gud na med// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 
549b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byin// ming tshig sgra la ma brten par// blo yi gting du go bar byos// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang po don rtogs mtha' mi gtong // chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin phyir// skye bar 
549b6(rgyud 'grel): bgrangs kyang lhun mi 'gyur// tsheng dpon lam mtha'i bsam pa bzhin// bsgrub pa'i rigs 'di rigs 'dzin bzhi// shes rab dang po smos pa gsum// bar du rgyu 'tshams 'bras bu gnyis// 
549b7(rgyud 'grel): bar chad med sbyor shes rab rims// mtha' gsum kun 'gro mi g.yo dang // mthar phyin shes rab rims shes dgos// bdag nyid mi mthong shes rgyud la 'byongs pa// gzhan du 'tshongs shing
549b8(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong pas// bdag dang gzhan du 'tshol bas sangs mi rgya// ma g.yo bkod pa bsrung bar rol// mdzad pa gnas stobs rim don/ 
550a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyer// 'ching zlos ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // dam tshig 'phrin las spyod pa dang // mchod pa dbang dang bsgrub pa dang // phyag rgya sngags kyis lta ba rnams// shes 
550a2(rgyud 'grel): chod bya'i tshig tsam min// de bas lam 'di bye brag mthong // thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// bsgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs// de nyid ma bcos mi g.yo'i phyir// de ni de bzhin nyid 
550a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings// de nyid kun gsal ye shes phyir// de ni kun tu snang gi ngang // 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun dngos phyir// de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor dang // 
550a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun la 'khrokhyol bar gnas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang // khro tshogs 'du 'phro mang po dang / 
550a5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin// dam tshig dam tshig zhes bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin// sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi'i dam tshig mtha' yas 
550a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal// bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// kun la thogs pa med par spyad// bzhi yi las dang cig po 'ang // thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal// dngos por 
550a7(rgyud 'grel): zhen bcom bdag dbang bsdus// bdun rgyas zug du gnyis zhi mthong // spyod pa rnam pa gnyis po yang // thig le chen po'i ngang nges phyir// cig la mi gnas kun la spyod// spyod par byed dang 
550a8(rgyud 'grel): spyad par med// mchod pa'i brgyan dang longs spyod kun// bya byed gnyis rnams las de yang // rig pa byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus// bdag nyid chen po'i ye 
550b1(rgyud 'grel): shes las// dbang lnga ma btsal dus cig rdzogs// thob bya thob byed thob byas pa// rig phyir gzhan nas thob pa med// bslab med spangs med chos nyid du// 'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid// 
550b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gnyis su med pa la// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa ga la yod// dper na sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ltar// don du gnyer ba 'ang chud par byas// brag ca'i sgra dang chu zla bzhin// sgra gzugs mtha' dang 
550b3(rgyud 'grel): bral bar rtogs// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus gzhir gsheg pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che// phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po 
550b4(rgyud 'grel): la// thig le nyid las gzhan pa med// sngags zhes rab tu brjod pa'ang // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/

550b6(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas g.yon lam las skyes// rgud pa'i rnal 'byor las skyes pa// sa'i cha yis bye ba ni// nus pa thob dang ma thob kyis// mthong lam gnyis su gyur pa yin// zag yod zlog pa'ang 
550b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yod de// mthu yis ngan 'gro ldog mi ldog/ sngon gyi shes 'jug brgyad la yod// mthar zhes 'jug lag la yod// skabs gnyis mthar phyin rnam pa gnyis// yod phyir cig la 
550b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum ldan// des na spyi dang bye brag shes// gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs le lo snyoms las byas// don ma grub par ngan song 'gro// 
551a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi mnyam pa ma gtogs na// tshig gi mnyam pa sangs mi rgya// de bas don tshig ldan par byos// 'on tang the tsom med par 'grub// bsgrub pa'i rkyen 'jug rnal

551a3(rgyud 'grel): par yang mi bsam mo// 'du shes kun bral ting 'dzin mchog/ de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs ste// nga dang bdag med par mnyam bsrung // mnyam pa'i 
551a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'bral mi bya// yid shes de bzhin nyid mi dmigs// ci smos 'tshogs brgyad spyod yul rnams// mi rtog gyur pas dus gcig gsal// de phyir thams cad mkhyen sgom yin// /

551a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs ngang gis med// kun tu rang gsal ye shes la// gnyis med don gyi gdung ba'i mchog/ yongs sgrol las kyi skyabs kyis phul// de mthong de la zhen par bya// de ltar mthong

551b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM bsgom// de la kha dog med sngo dbyibs// med pa'i thugs yig rang rig shar// brtan nas brgya gnyis rim brtan dang // yongs 'gyur rgya che zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis yan lag tshang byas//

551b3(rgyud 'grel): nas spros pa'i rnal 'byor la// zhi khro gang la sngon byas pa'i// zhal phyag grangs dang phyag rgya'i grangs// gsum dang lnga dang dgu rtsa cig/ dgu brgya la sogs zhal phyag dang // rigs gsum lnga dang

551b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// sman sngags la sogs tshe las 'phags// ldog bcas bzhi dang sbyor lam du// rdo rje'i lus su ma grub par// rkyen gyi las kyis lus 'jig na// spyod yul gyur tshe rang rang gi/ rnal 'byor/

552a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das yi zag dang sbyor// lam bzhis zag med slob par 'gyur// snyan gsan mthong ba'i bsod nams dang // dbang dang rnal 'byor bsgrub pa dang // mchod pa'i 'phrin las dkyil 'khor dang //

552b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gzhan phyir sems spyod pa// don du bya ba rnam gnyis rdzogs// de de de yi nus pa can// rnam smin tshe yi lus phye nas// lhag ma yod med lung bstan pa// mthar lam dngos la sbyor

552b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyur rigs nyid nas// bcu drug rgyun gyis su lnga rdzogs// kha cig phyag rgya chen po nas// bla med kun tu bzang por 'gyur// rin chen bzhi yi rgya mtsho la// zho mar me yi snang byed

553a1(rgyud 'grel): thogs las skabs mi 'byor// mi ldog mi g.yo mazar phyin pa// kun 'gro 'jigs bral yod rdzogs dang // rtsa la rdzogs mtha' ma'i sbyor zhes bya// bdag gzhan phyir na'ang 
553a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa lnga// tshad med la sogs spyod pa rnams// mi gos mod kyang sgrib pa gsum// gong 'og cha yis dag pa'i phyir// de nyid lam la khyad par 'gyur// yul dang shes pa mtho dman

553a4(rgyud 'grel): su ma chags dang // shin tu mi g.yo'i rnal 'byor sbyong // shes rab rtsal gyis spyod pa yin// sa rnams yongs su 'phar bar byed// de yang dang po dang po dang // skal mnyam gnyis pa'i

553a6(rgyud 'grel): ched du cho 'phrul ston// rnal 'byor mi g.yo bzhin sprul dang // brtsal ba med par cho 'phrul mdzad// de de de yis phye ba yin// de mtha' lhun gyis grub pa de// drug pa'i rgyal tsha ba skyes bu 
553a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo yang dag skor// kun la mthun pa'i gzugs ston cing // mdzad pa bcu gnyis chos kyang ston// so so thar pa'i lam yang ston// las rnams thams 
553a8(rgyud 'grel): cad kun byas nas// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// des na mthu can rnam gsum po// sprul pa longs spyod drug pa la// rim par zhal mthong nyan mod kyang // cig gi ston par cig 
553b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas// rim pa bzhin du slar gyur par// khyad par che ba de ltar yang // skabs nas rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'ang // rgyu dang dgongs dbang dgongs phye bas// khyad par med pa de 'dra yang // 
553b2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir mnyam par lta ma yin// de ltar rnam gsum gang zhig nas// thams cad mkhyen pa mngon byas pa'i// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor du// ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// seng ge 
553b3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i gsung go bas// dngos po rang 'byung ye shes myong // rdo rje 'dzin pa spyi gzugs can// sku gsung thugs mnga' gsung rdzogs de// byin brlab byin dang bstan pa'i phyir// lnga gsung kun 
553b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstan pa zad// de phyir mun pa rnam gnyis so// rnal 'byor ye shes stobs dang ni// rim pa thob pa'i stobs bcom pas// gsang ba'i ye shes phyogs bral rgyas// sku gsung thugs 
553b5(rgyud 'grel): dang yon tan las// ngo mtshar 'bras bu gzhan min te// thabs la bstan pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung // spyod yul bral bas ma chags phyir// chu skyes spyan gyis sa yang 
553b6(rgyud 'grel): thob// phung sogs rang bzhin dkyil 'khor der// mngon byas tshogs chen sa zhes brjod// de nyid rang 'byung 'od gsal ba// sngon byas ye shes bla ma'o// kun gzhi ma bcos sngon byas 
553b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir// de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'ang // drug 'gro brgyad rgyud tha dad kyang // rigs rgyud med phyir shin tu cig/ lhun grub mtha' bral gcig pu ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pas// thams cad 
553b8(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang // rang rig de bzhin nyid du 'dus// de nyid thabs chen ma 'dres phyir// cig dang du mar bral bar cig/ rang sems lhun grub mtha' bral te// gdod nas cha// 
554a1(rgyud 'grel): shas gnyis med pas// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs snying po de// mngon byas 'dra phyir kun yang cig/ dus bzhi sems phyir kun bral ba'i// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// 
554a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de phyir gnas der kun kyang cig/ sems nyid gdod nas chos sku tshe// de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni// dpag med sangs rgyas pho brang phyir// de na kun 
554a3(rgyud 'grel): bkod der cig gnas// 'gro ba'i dus na rgyud drug nyid// rigs rgyud mtshan dang gzugs ris med// de yang de phyir rgyal ba'i rgyud// gnas 'gyur cha gzung ga la yod// 'on te thams cad 
554a4(rgyud 'grel): cig zhe na// gnas 'gyur rdzun zhing stong mthar 'gyur// dgos pa skye ba kun gzhi sems// gdod nas rang 'byung lhun rdzogs kyang // mtshan nyid mtha' bral bkod med pa'i// 'khor ba mya nga// 
554a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kun dngos// smra bsam bral ba 'di 'drar med// ye shes lnga yang rang 'byung gi/ cha lnga brtags kyi gzhan po med// de phyir cig mthar ltung ba med// rgyal ba de nyid rin chen ltar// 
554a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi spyi gzugs yin pa'i phyir// rgyal tshab lnga la ris yod kyi// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas la med// rgyal ba kun dang dus gsum chos// bdag phyir kun phyi spyi gzugs can// cha gnyis/ 
554a7(rgyud 'grel): yod par gang gis rung // yod na bdag nyid chen po rdzun// nyi zer nyi ma 'am shing me bzhin// ngo bo cag la ye shes rgyud// so so yin na sprul pa 'ang // gdul bya cig la mthu gnas pa/ 
554a8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' che dang khyad med 'gyur// spyan drangs byin dang mabyon 'byung // gzhi don lung rigs kun dang 'gal// thugs rjes 'brel pas rigs chad 'gyur// de phyir shing me dpung lta
554b1(rgyud 'grel): zur// ye shes ston pas bkri grang phyir// rung gi yan lag nges par min// de bas sangs rgyas yang sangs rgyas// log pas rtogs rtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las 
554b2(rgyud 'grel): mi zhan phyir// thugs rje chen po 'brel pa yis// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus gnang // mtho dman kun gyi gzugs gnang dang // bla med byang chub skya snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// 
554b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang // chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// byang chub snying po'i ngang nyid du// mkha' la 'ja' snang ma 'dres cig/ de phyir yul med thams cad mkhyen// 
554b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing dang rin chen ltar// rtog pa med par re ba skong // nyi zla chu dang gzugs brnyan ltar// 'gro 'ong med par kun la snang // sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag rnams// ji ltar 'tsham/ 
554b5(rgyud 'grel): par grol bar byed// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i sems la son// dus gsum kun la snyoms par zhugs// 'gro ba la ma log lam gtor zhing // dbang po lnga bral gcod snying gis// zin phyir 
554b6(rgyud 'grel): lam mchog sman chen 'di// bsdus pa mtha' yas rgyal bar shog/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam bshad pa// slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la 
554b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// ma skyes lhun grub dmags med rang rig sna tshogs par snang ba// yig sogs dbang sgyur phra mo'i rigs// snang thabs bsam lhun grub ni// lam bzhis bsgrub bya mngon sum 
554b8(rgyud 'grel): rang rig 'brel pa'i tshul gyis sus mdzad pa// mnyam shes mos sbyor mngon byed skyed tshul rim gnyis rang snang tshul phyag 'tshal// bsgrub bya gzhan rgyus mi skyed de// rang bzhin thabs 
555a1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel mngon byed pa'i// thabs chen gsang ba'i rim 'di dag/ thams cad rgyud du ma bstan pa// bstan pa'i snying po gsal mdzad pa'ang // lus rnams rim pa yan

555a3(rgyud 'grel): snyen byed don phyir 'bye// rim 'di gnyer gnyis kyis dbye na// lus kyi rnam pa gsum gnyis ste// rang bzhin ting 'dzin lngar shes bya// rang bzhin rkyen gyis mngon byas pa// rgyu la 'bras

555a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed pa'i phyir// mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i dang por bzhag/ bden gnyis rgyu 'bras tshul dag gis// 
555a8(rgyud 'grel): don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'gyur// mnyam nyid gsang ba dkyil 'khor dbyings// dbyings nyid ye shes thig le'i ngang // de nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu mi'i tshul 
555b1(rgyud 'grel): snang byed nyid na ma grub pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga// bden pa gnyis su mi 'gyur phyir// ye shes sgyu ma rjes su bstan// ye shes sgyu ma'i lus nyid ni// rang bzhin /

555b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs chen po// ting 'dzin yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// drug sogs mang po'i ro myong yang // ma lus bdag las gzhan med phyir// mi dmigs mkha' dang snyoms pa yis// dgyes

555b8(rgyud 'grel): snang phyir der bzhag go// 'di dag phal gyi yul man phyir// gzhan dag rgyud dang 'di nyid du// ma gsungs shin tu gab pa yin// yun dang rtsod par skal med phyir// rang gis blo dman sgra 
556a1(rgyud 'grel): goms nyung // ser sna rang phyogs khengs sems kyis// dul bcas gus pa'i bsnyen bkur med// rdo rje spun la de bzhin te// lam kun blo dang mi 'tsham phyir//

556a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// bskal par ngan song myong bar 'gyur// de bas shin tu gsang bar bya// bran mtha' bzhin du gsum gnas shing // chags gnyis bral ba'i snyen btu

559b2(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas pa la gnas par bsgom// gtan tshigs rgyas par lus bzhag na// dgos ched thabs dang mi mthun dang // bcos nyams rjes su spyod pa yis// rim 'di yongs su shes

559b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i rdzas rnams kun// mi las mtshan ma so sor yang // thams cad gser gyi ngo bor cig/ sems nyid rig dang ma rig las// 'das dang ma 'das cir yang snang // 
559b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang rig ngo bo'i phyir// rang bzhin nyid kyis dag pas na// sgyu ma stong sogs rnam grangs dang // bden gnyis dbyar med ye shes dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs don 
559b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun// de nyid rjes su brjod pa yin// rang bzhin gtan tshigs sngon song ba// gsum sogs gtan tshigs tshig rjes su// de rjes nyams blang dgos ched ni// dkyil 'khor 
559b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas lhun grub pa// mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin byed// ma bcos ji bzhin nga bzha' dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 
559b8(rgyud 'grel): las// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang sgyur nas// ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad maN+Dal// longs rdzogs sku dang sangs rgyas zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa sngon na 'grub// 
560a1(rgyud 'grel): yangs shing rgya che lhun grung ni// phyi nang sbed bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no// lhun grub ji ltar 'dod snang ba/ 
560a2(rgyud 'grel): nyis sogs mtshan mas bsgribs pa'i phyir// ji ltar byis pa shed ma phye// bya byed mang pos g.yeng bar gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang skar nas/ 
560a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// de dag dang po'i lus zhes bya// dngos grub myur du grub 'dod na// shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu 
560a4(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// rang bzhin mthong las don med phyir// de nyid rjes su mngon byas pas// thabs kyi dam par de bshad de// yang dag gnyis med byang chub sems// snang 
560a5(rgyud 'grel): stong gnyis sogs gang min zhing // phyogs dang gnas pa yod min pas// rjes su 'jug phyir mi bsam zhing // gang la'ang gnas pa bya ba min// gang zhig dmigs nas gsal ba ni// 
560a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min// yod med la sogs mtha' dbus chos// gang yang dang dum blangs zhing // sems kyi mngon par ma phyogs pa// tha snyad tsam du mnyam bzhag 
560a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya dmigs su med pas na// bzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin nyid// dmigs mede tshul du rang snang ba// bsgom pa'i mchog tu 'di gsungs so// yid la byed dang bying rgod 
560a8(rgyud 'grel): myong gzugs 'god dang 'gags 'bras dang // chags bral re dogs bdag nyid dang // 'chos dang gnas dmigs sdud pa dang // mngon byed ther zug phyal ba dag/ bdag dbang 'du 
560b1(rgyud 'grel): shes mtshan nyid de// 'du shes stong pa ting 'dzin mchog/ stong pa'i 'du shes ma rab sems// de phyir rgyab rtsi bzhi ba sogs// g.yos 'phrul dbang gis cir snang yang // rang 
560b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sems nyid yin par shes// mtshan nyid gang du'ang mi dmigs na// las su bya ba med pa'i phyir// tha snyad kun las grol 'gyur te// mi rtog ye shes gzhan du min// gang zhig 
560b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhig dmigs yod na// nges par de nyid g.yengs yin// ci yang yid la mi byed pas// gol sar lhung ba ci zhig ltung // rang bzhin gnas dmigs med gsungs la// zhen thos 
560b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang dmigs byed pa// gzung 'dzin zhes ni de la brjod// mi dmigs bsam pa gang spong ba// de nyid rjes mthun ting 'dzin yin// ring du byas pa'i rang nyams dag/ drag dal chu 
560b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mcho gting gi/ sems kyis brtan pa'i nyams bzung la// gzugs spa rig dang rlung la sogs// snang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur na// gang yang zhen par ma gyur yin// lus sgra shin 
560b6(rgyud 'grel): tu g.yeng 'gyur yang // cig shos 'jug med tshul gyis bstan// rang rig shin tu gsal ba yang // ngo bo dmigs su med par gsungs// de rjes mthun pa'i spyod pa yang // las dang 
560b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa thams cad la// rang bzhin bdag phyir mi dmigs shing // byas mthong zos pa ci yang med// gang yang bya med tshul gyis bya// shin tu'ang zhi bar 'gyur ba'i rigs// dpal gsang 
560b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang // 
561a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang sems rnam pa'i phyir// thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya// de nyid shin tu goms par bsgom// de nyid rgyas pa'i 
561a2(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan pa// rang bzhin ngo bo spyod pa lus// 'jig rten sna tshogs snang ba yang // rang rig rnam tog gzugs brnyan phyir// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'phral snang bya ba kun 
561a3(rgyud 'grel): byed kyang // rtog pa kun gyi tshad mar snang // 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te// byas byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas// thams cad snang la 
561a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med// rjes su dran par byed pas kyang // thams cad sems kyi rnam pa ni// don gyi rtsa ba mchog yin te// thams cad dogs med ma tshogs pa'i// rang rig ye shes de bzhin nyid// 
561a5(rgyud 'grel): phung sogs sna tshogs thabs snang ba// ye shes sgyu mar rang sdud phyir// sdung stong gnyis su ma yin pas// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// goms thos ci spyad mi gos te// 
561a6(rgyud 'grel): bsag bya gnyis su nges par 'gyur// rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin no// sngon goms rang rig snang ba'i chos// sngos pa can gyi chos min pas// rig pa rang dbang sbyar ba yis// khams 
561a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs ji ltar bltas bzhin snang // rgyu 'bras dbyer med snga phyi med// de nyid lam phyir mnyam par pyod// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// kun kyang skabs las shes par bya// de nyid 'du bar 'gyur ba ni// gnyis// 
561a8(rgyud 'grel): snang bral ba mnyam pa'i dbyings// rang dbang 'gyur ba'i thabs nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad zad med 'phro// thams cad rang rig sgyu ma nyid// dmigs med tshul gyis snang ba yin// 
561b1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gsum pa bshad par bya// srid gsum sgyu ma 'dra bar ni// thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs par 'gyur// rjes mthun thugs rje gsal mdzad kyang // rang rig nyid las mi zhan
561b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// mngon par gdung pas non mi 'gyur// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin par spyod// dmigs med snying rje chu dmigs na// ma chags thabs mkhas
561b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa yis// don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig byed// mi mthun zhags pas 'khor ba spyod// sa pa'i dpyod par de gsungs so// // dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges 
561b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las bsdus pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste/ gsum pa'o// // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas// phra mo'i 
561b5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin bshad par bya// thams cad rang rig sgyu ma'i phyir// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang ba sgru ba yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgoms kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
561b6(rgyud 'grel): du 'dus// yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// yi ge hU~M du shin tu bsdus// nri yi mig gis ltar yod pa// rab tu 'dris nas spro bar bya// phyogs bcu gang nas bslar bsdus bstim// 
561b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su bstim// rnam shes lhums su zhugs par bshad// hUM nyid a ba ma ma dang gnyis// shin tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba la// thams cad yi ger gyur byas te// 
561b8(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nyi zla gang spel bsgom// sa bon gnyis kyi bdag nyid pas// rang bzhin hUM gi bdag nyid de// 'dres phyir ming gnyis thob pa yin// phyag mtshan hri las pad+mo snang // thams 
562a1(rgyud 'grel): cad rang rig snang ba'i phyir// byin brlabs 'od zer gzhal yas khang // dang snyigs tshul gyis nyi zla gnyis// skabs 'dir mi 'byed tshul phyir rmos// 
562a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab cig lngas byung ba hUM// mthing ga 'tsher la gsal ba yi// 'od zer phyogs bcu'i hUM bsdus pa// rlung gi mtshan mar shes par bya// mchig gu lta bu rdo rje'i gzugs// rjes 
562a3(rgyud 'grel): su mthun pa'i 'phro 'dur ldan// de nyid sems dpa' yab yum sku// shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgos// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan// zhal cig phyag gnyis yang na 
562a4(rgyud 'grel): drug/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pa d+ma dril bu 'bar// phra ba'i gzhal yas kyi zla ldan// nges par snying la gnas par bya// der ni ye shes snying po ste// de ltar 
562a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas cig gnas gsum dang // gnas lnga dag tu sgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang // ye shes lngas rgyas gdab par bya// de nyid shin tu gnas pa dang // de bzhin 
562a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po ste// gzhal yas phyag mtshan gdan la sogs// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtshon gang ye shes rdo rje'i sku// rtag tu snying la gnas par bya// sen zlu ma nyi zla 
562a7(rgyud 'grel): gang ba la// yungs 'bru 'bar ba'i hUM gnas pa'o// rang bzhin sems dpa' spyan drangs la// ye shes dam tshig la mnyam ze sti ma// bdag nyid chen po mchod par bya// rtag tu 
562a8(rgyud 'grel): nang gi sbyin sreg gtang // rang sngags 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo yis// shin tu gsal zhing ba de la gnas// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod spyod lam kun// theg chen sgo ma las nyams pa med// 
562b1(rgyud 'grel): chos spyod rnam dgu rab spangs nas// phyogs cig spyod la gang gnas pa// rtse cig ting 'dzin nyid du bshad// mchod sogs rang gi don du min// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing //

562b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur yang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// lha mi mtshan rdzogs sdug bsngal sel// bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur// thog ma sman par 'jug mi 'gyur// / 
562b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa yin// dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa// phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas spros pa'i rnal 'byor bshad//

562b8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// gzugs sogs rang bzhin spos bcas pa// 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'bru gsum ste// yang na 'od zer phyag rgya lnga'o// 
563a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga po'i don spros bzhi bcu gnyis// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ khro 'dul sna tshogs de bzhin te// mabacos dang gzi gaganas pa la// ye shes

564b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas ste/ lnga pa'o// // de nas mthar gnas bshad par bya// ye shes rdzog

564b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung // rang rig nyid la gnas pa ni// sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste// rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// ma lus de bzhin nyid du sbyor// sbyor 
565a1(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyor ba gnyis ka med// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// nyid la mtshan nyid yod ma yin// shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgya rang 
565a2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba// tha snyad ma lus ye shes dngos// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ma bkag tshul gyis rang snang ba// so sor don bzhin ro myong yang // rang rig nyid las gzhan med phyir// bde ba chen 
565a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i ye shes la// bzung ba'i mtshan ma yod ma yin// mi rtog tshul gyis longs spyod pa// ma chags pad+ma dag gi sku// 'das dang ma 'das dngos po kun// rang rig ye shes byang chub

565a5(rgyud 'grel): rang snang bas// 'phro 'dra'i tshul du bdang bstan no// spros bral thugs kyi chos thams cad// snyoms par khyab pas rje nyid de// 'bras bu lhun grub byin ldan pas// mtsho yi rlabs 
565a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul kun tu snang // bas mi byas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// zhing khams rnams dang 'gro kun la// rdo rje 'dzin nas rtsi shing tshogs// so sor mthun pa'i sku snang yang // stong nyid dngos dang bya 
565a7(rgyud 'grel): byed med// chu zla'i tshul du kun snang yang // byin rlabs khyab cing 'gro 'ong med// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lus nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs ste// snang stong gnyis su ma yin zhing // 
565a8(rgyud 'grel): grangs dang che chung mthA dbus kyang // 'di la sus kyang dmigs mi nus// nam mkha' lta bur mtha' bral ba// 'od zer phyag rgya gdan rdzogs pa// ldan dang bral bas gnyis ka min// zhi khrol 
565b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs sku gnyis tshogs// lhun gyis grub pas cir yang snang // rim pa 'am rim pa med tshul ni// gdul bya'i bsam pas phye ba yin// dus gsum du yang mi 'gyur phyir// rtag chen rdo rje'i 
565b2(rgyud 'grel): sku zhes gsungs// bden pa gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// dngos kun bdag phyir ming tshig tsam// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar gnas// de nyid ma skyes sems yin phyir// rang bzhin brjod med
565b3(rgyud 'grel): don yin kyang // sgra rnams sems su lhun rdzogs phyir// gsung cig tshig tu ma brjod kyang // thar dang mthar thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod bzhin gsal bar snang // de phyir brjod nyid brjod 
565b4(rgyud 'grel): pa med// gdul bya ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las mi zhan phyir// gang zhig de nyid gyur pa yis// dus gsum sdug bsngal ma 'dres pas// log rtog rgyun tsam snang ba yang // 
565b5(rgyud 'grel): rang snang tshul gyis rtog med par// sgyu ma'i tshul du gsal bar gsungs// de bas 'das dang ma 'das tshes// rang rig byang sems ngo bo'i phyir// snga phyi cung zad yod min pas// mtshan nyid ma 
565b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dres yongs rdzogs par// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis sngon nas mkhyen// so sor snang ba thams cad kyang // rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du// rang rig de nyid thams cad yin// spyod yul dang 
565b7(rgyud 'grel): rig ye shes phyir// rang snang ye shes ngo bos stong // mtha' rnams bral ba'i rang rig la// ma skyes don snang me long bzhin// thams cad bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir// tha snyad gnyis ka ngang gis 
565b8(rgyud 'grel): stong // mtshan nyid bsam yas snang ba yang // sems phyir so sor dmigs pa med// rang bzhin rnam dag ye shes la// bya byed dmigs par yong mi 'gyur// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// / 
566a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyang // brjod pa'i mtshan nyid yod med de// mtshan nyid med par so sor snang // de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// mtshan nyid gnyis med 
566a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs mi 'gyur// gnas pa med par kun tu khyab// phyogs bcu snang grags pas ma yas pa// rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir// yon tan rin chen bkod pa dang // ye shes brgyan gyis smras 
566a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// zhing gi yon tan bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi zhing sbyor bas// dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye shes rgyu las grub pa'i 
566a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// 'di zhes cig ces brjod du med// zag med bsod nams lhun grub pas// ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang // gdos pa can gyi chos min zhing // thams cad rang rig dbang sgyur bas// / 
566a5(rgyud 'grel): stong par bya'am mi stor bya// thams cad dbyer med dang nyid pas// rtog pa med las cing yang snang // gzhan gyis ldog du med pa yi// bo de'i sgong ni rin po che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
566a6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyis// bya byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad// sgyu ma'i tshul du rol mdzad kyang // bya ba byed dang dmigs su med// 'das dang ma 'das bsam yas pa// ma lus sems phyir dmigs su med// 
566a7(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gnas dang ngo bo dbyer med de// de nyid rig pa rang snang ba// sna tshogs mtshan nyid rnam par rol// thams cad mkhyen nyid 
566a8(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas kyang // rang rig nyid du yang dag 'dus// de nyid thabs chen ma 'dres snang // spyod yul 'phrog med spyod mi lang // gnyis med thugs rje'i dbang gis na// 'gro drug dus gnas
566b1(rgyud 'grel): snyoms par zhugs// rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir// dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gsungs// des sogs mtshan nyid yon tan grangs// stong gsum cig dang thams cad kyi// mgo lus/ 
566b2(rgyud 'grel): kha lce cig rdzogs pas// bskal pa mtha' klas par brjod kyang // de dag mthar thug yong mi 'gyur// mtshan nyid rmongs la mdor bsdus pa// bsgrub bya ma lus mngon gyur pas// bsam 
566b3(rgyud 'grel): bya bsrab pa kun las grol// thams cad ma spangs bdag nyid phyir// gang yang 'du shes thams cad spangs// gnyis med thugs rje chen po yis// mdzad pa gang yang 'gog pa med// sku gsung 
566b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hag rgya rjer snang yang // rang bzhin rdzogs kyir 'gro bong med// yum sogs bde bkun ldan yang // rang ga ngo bo mi dmigs pas// mtha' rnams kun las grol ba yin// khams gsum da/ 
566b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid chen po'i phyir// sems can kun gyis sems la son// sems sogs zhen ma zas ma reg pas// cig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// 'di la spyod yul yod 
566b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// / dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ bas ma yas lhun gyi grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste drug pa'o// // yongs rdzogs rgya che mtshan nyid rtogs dka' 
566b7(rgyud 'grel): rlabs ldan dang rgyud rgya mtsho yi// mtshan nyid rjes mthun gnyis bral yig gsum gnyis gab sbas te ra chod don// snying rjes goms shugs mthong nyams 'brel pa dgos don dang por 
566b8(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba gsal byas pas// rjes 'jug la sogs gnyis bcings ma lus de nyid shes grol goms zar shog/ rim pa drug pa/ slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / 
567a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhi lam 'bras bur bcas pa'i tshes// dris lam dam bca' mthar dbyung ba// lung dang man ngag rigs sgo nas/ 
567a2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par bya phyir rnam bshad bya// dang po rnam pa gnyis bstan te// ngo bo'i gzhi dang brtags pa'i gzhi// gzhi yi ngo bo mtshan nyid dang // nges tshig dpe yi rnam pa dang // snang tshul gnyer 
567a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis rtogs par bya// ngo bo thams cad sems nyid de// gser gyi dpe bzhin gnyis su med// mtshan nyid mtha' rnams kun bral bas// ci yang bzung du med pa'o// tha snyad gnyis kyi 
567a4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams kun// ma lus 'byung b+hir gzhi zhes bya// nam mkha' rgya mtsho rin chen sogs// nye ba'i dpe yis mtshon pa'o// chu rkyen bral ba'i skad cig ma// rang snang nyid du byung 
567a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// lung dang man ngag gnyer dag gis// blo gting yid ches gur par bya// brtags gzhi gnyis su bstan pa'i chos// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba'i rgyo rkyen po 
567a6(rgyud 'grel): bo dang // dpe dang mtshan nyid byed po dang // 'khor tshul nyes pa'i dus rnams su// nges par bstan phyir mgon pos bshad// 'khor ba'i 'byung rgyu rnam pa bzhi// rgyud mtshungs lhan cig/ 
567a7(rgyud 'grel): nyer len pa// bder gshegs snying po ma rig dang // rnam smin bag chags nyon mongs pa'o// rkyen gnyis bstan pa'i las gsum du// kun brtags ma rig nyon mongs lnga// ngo bo sdod 
567a8(rgyud 'grel): bcud 'jig rten gyi// snang dang zhen pa'i chos rnams so// zo cha tsA sogs med pe bzhin// kun tu 'khor zhing mched pa'o// 'jig dang chags dang stongs dang gnas// rkye rga na 'chi 
567b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ldan pas// mtshan nyid zer zug ma yin pa'o// rgun dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma// las kyi byed par brjod pa'o// rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul dag tu// phyi nang gnyis kar 'khor 
567b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// 'phags lam bral nas sdug bsngal myong // nyes pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// thog ma za ma med dus nas// yang dag don ma rtogs pas nyams// mya ngan 'das pa'i 
567b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang // nges tshig rnam grangs gang la snang // mtshon pa ma grub tshul den bstan// ngo bo med bzhin kun snang bas// cig dang du ma las grol te// mtshan brjod mtha' rnams 
567b4(rgyud 'grel): kun bral ba'o// skye 'jig chos rnams bral ba'o// skye 'jig chos rnams bral 'gyur bas// mya ngan 'das par de brjod do// rnam grangs gnyis su brjod pa ste// theg pa mtho 
567b5(rgyud 'grel): dman bye brag gis// phyogs gcig pa dang mi gnas pa'i// mya ngan 'das par de bstan pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba dang // de yi sprul pa rgya chen
567b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid// gdul bya 'khrul la snang ba'o// chu bo rgal ba'i gru bzhin du// 'khor ba'i chu bo rnam par rgal// btsonar thar pa ji bzhin du// 'ching ba'i mdud pa las grol ba'o// gzhi po 
567b7(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid ma grub pas// sprul sdang chos kun ma nges te// cir yang brjod du med pa'o// dbu ma rnam pa gnyis yin te// grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan// dbu ma'i dang po ngo bo 
567b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / rkyen dang rnam grangs mtshan dpe dang // bkrab tshul rim pa bstan pa dang // gong 'og dgos pa mthar phyin spyod// ngo bo shes rab rnam gsum gyis// sems bzhi skyes par 
568a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin// tshig dang yi ge rkyen nyid las// brten dang rtog par byed pa yin// mtshan mar bsgom pa'i rim pa yang // de bzhin nyid du bsgom pa yi// bye brag 
568a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// khron pa sgron ma'i dpe bzhin du// grol lam sgo nas rtogs sgom bya// thun mong lam lngar bslab pa dang // khyad la so so'i lam bzhin bslab// sngon du goms
568a3(rgyud 'grel): par gang byas pa// gong ma gsal bar 'gyur phyir ro// thun mong khyad par gnas skabs lam// ting 'dzin drod tshad nyams ldan na// lam mthar byin pa zhes su bshad// ting 'dzin
568a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyur pa'i phyir// rjes mthun spyod pa'i gzhung bzhin spyad// dbu ma gnyis pa bstan pa ni// rnam grangs gdam ngag zabs nyid de// rtogs tshul chu rkyen ldan pa yis// shugs 
568a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis snang tshol gser 'gyur bzhin// gdam ngag ster dang 'og go gro// thig le klang bar bcas pa nyid// thabs rnams sngon du goms byas pa// de bzhin nyid du 'gyur byed pa// ting 
568a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin khyad par dbang gi rgyu// thabs kyi rgyu rkyen ngo bo dang // nges tshig bkur ba'i rim pa dang // mtshon dpe dgos pa bstan pa'o// khyad par rgyu rkyen lngar bshad de// bla ma'i dgongs dang / 
568a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dus// sbyor ba'i thabs dang bsod nams las// phyag rgya yon tan ldan gyur pas// dngos po lhan cig skyes pas myong // de phyir thabs su bstan pa yin// ngo bo nus ban gsang ba'i 
568a8(rgyud 'grel): chos// shes rab ye shes bde chen po// 'ching ba'i las rnams sdud pa yim// 'gro bar 'gyur phyir ming du brjod// dad dang brtson 'grus gsum dang ldan// brtul shugs gsum la spyod pa 
568b1(rgyud 'grel): la// go rim tshul du 'tsham par byin// rgyal po'i phrug drag 'gyur bzhin// dbang zabs rnam gnyis nyams len bya// rim pa dbang gis bsgrod pyir dang // thun mong lam gyi khyad par gyis// 
568b2(rgyud 'grel): sa'abyed thob phyir bstan pa yin// tha ma'i ngan la ngo bo dang // mtshan nyid yun tan bstan pa dang // mdzad spyod thugs rje'i snang tshul dang // gdul bya gzegs rgyal don rnams kyis// 'bras 
568b3(rgyud 'grel): bden bzhin rtogs par bya// dang po kagasang thugs rnams dang // yon tan 'phrin las lngar bsdus pa'o// mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir// ma lus cig min tha dad min// 'bras bu 
568b4(rgyud 'grel): yin tan ldanarnab pas// yid bzhin ni ltar snang ba'o// 'phrin las rnam pazhi mdzad mod kyis// zla ba med par na rnams rdzogs// thugs rje chen pa'i gdul bal// rtagazhan rang bzhin 
568b5(rgyud 'grel): shugs gas la dang // yul dang phrad pas 'byung bar snang // nyid las mi zhan don rnams kyis// me long tshul drug zigs par 'gyur// gzhi lam 'bras shes bya ba rnams// tham mkhas 
568b6(rgyud 'grel): nyams ldan pa la// dri ba drag gi tshul nyid las// rnam gsum tshul gyis zhu bar bya// bla ma mkhas ldan de nyid kyis// bu rnams mi shes mdud dgrol phyir// rnam gsum lan ga dab gzhung 
568b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid la// 'go gcig rnam dbye'i dri tshul gyis// lan gdab yid ches gyur par bya// gal te gzhung las brtsod 'gyur na// dam bcas sgrub ste don nyid ni// dpe den gtan tshigs gsum ldan 
568b8(rgyud 'grel): pas// shes bya de nyid mthar phyin bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgengs myed pa// gru 'phrul dra ba'i don nyid las// rim gsum don nyid bslus pa yis// ma lus mngon par sangs rgyas shes 
569a1(rgyud 'grel): de lta'i dge rtsa ci mchis pa// bdag gi rgyud la yongs smin te// bla med byang chub thob 'gyur nas// mtha' yas sems can 'dren par shog/ bdag blo mun par 'phags 
569a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// dgongs pa nyi ma shar ba yi// nyams dang lung la brten pa yi// brtsams nongs 'phags la bzod par gsol// rdzu 'phrul dra ba'i man ngag rim pa gsum pa rdzogs so// 
569a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal nas// thams cad mkhyen nyid mngon dad pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po rnams don gyir/ 
569a4(rgyud 'grel): sems skyed cho ga bshad par bya// brtsom pa'i dang po med pas na// dpag tu med pa'i sgo spyod kyang // sa bon rgya mtsho 'di med pas// mthar phyin 'bras bu mi snang ste// de nyid sdug bsngal/ 
569a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'gyur// de bas gzhi 'di goms par byos// // de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan// 'byung khungs kyi rtsa bar nges pa ni sems yin te// 
569a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so// rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po las byung ba'o// thabs kyi mthar phyin pa'o ces 'byung ba dang / 
569a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos byang chub sems kyi sa bon lta bu'o// zhes pa dang / chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// yo bud de dang ma ldan 
569a8(rgyud 'grel): na// don rnams grub par mi 'gyur ro// tshad med snying rje bskyed pa dang // byang chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te// bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// rtsa ba byang
569b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyi pha rol phyin par spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par zung // gdon mi za bar 'grub ces gsungs// zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so// / 
569b2(rgyud 'grel): de dag gi khyad par ni// dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste// 'gyur ba med cing lan du 'phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do// de bzhin du sems dang po skyed pa yang / snying 
569b3(rgyud 'grel): po byang chub la thug gi bar du/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med pa'o// dper na/ rdo rje rin po che chag kyang gser gyi rgyan khyad par can 
569b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ste/ rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi dor la// dbul ba thams cad kyang bzlog go/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyed pa'i sems rin po che bsgrub pa 
569b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ma ldan yang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dod la/ 'khor ba'i 'bul ba las kyang bzlog go/ dper na seng
569b6(rgyud 'grel): ge'i phruga'i dri mnam pa'i rdzi phyogs na gnas pa'i gcan zan thams cad kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang du phyin pa'i sa phyogs na gnas pa'i 
569b7(rgyud 'grel): log par spyod pa'i sems can thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po tha mar bcas pa'o// mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis 
569b8(rgyud 'grel): nan sa mas/ thas pa cing bas yo pa gas ba gyud par 'a 'a ga/ 'dab la brnas par blang pa dag pagangs gan ma zad do// nga sa la mi

570a2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa kun kyang bsrungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags// gang dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la// dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa// de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu la

570a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pargyas par gsungs so// // de la sems bskyed mdor bstan ste// dngos po gnyis dang rim pa bzhi// gzhi dang dbang po yo byad dang // cho ga rims sems bskyed sdom/

570a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu gcig yul byas te// gdung bas bskyab pa'i sems bcas pas// mgon skyob bdag por yid la byed// bdag ba de rje dang don 'dor ba// de ni ldog pa ma gsungs so// 'khor 
570a8(rgyud 'grel): los dpung gi tsho gas 'dren bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dren// sa dang rgya mtsho nor bu bzhin// yon tan don dang snang ba rnams// snying rje chen po nyid las 'byung // me long 
570b1(rgyud 'grel): chu bzhin bsgrib byas pa// dngos grub gags su bral gsungs so// bu dang zhe 'gras spyod pa yis// byang chub sems dpa'i ming med na// sangs rgyas khas ches rnal 'byor ci// / 
570b2(rgyud 'grel): don dam nges par rab bshad pa// ma g.yos kun gzhi'i ngang du bshad// rang bzhin sdong ba'i gser tshul ltar// gnyis su med par rgyal bas bshad// dri dang ga pur nus pa bzhin// 
570b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med par sems mi dmigs// sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de// chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pas// bla med byang chub chen por bshad/ 
570b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' gang khyab chos kyis khyab// chos nyid gar khyab sems yin pas// byi nang gnyis med sems su gsal// mos dang rgyun dran mngon 'gyur bar// yid la byed pa'i sems

570b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gang zag gis// snying rje skye dang ltar ldan pas// don gnyis rgyu ru 'di shes nas// goms par mang du byas pa yis// zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du// je che je mang mngon 'phel bar// 
570b8(rgyud 'grel): dam bcas 'jug par bya ba yin// lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon byas te// 'gyur ba med par gnas par bya'o// dngos gzhi gnyis la rab brtan pa// 'jug pa'i skyes bur de bshad do// 
571a1(rgyud 'grel): byis 'byung sdom pa'i dngos po la// rgyan dang dum bur gang gnas pa// gnas pa'i sems su rab tu brtan// de nyams gsum du shes par bya// gnas pa mang po'i 
571a2(rgyud 'grel): mthu rdzogs pas// mngon byas rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs shing // bsgrub bya rkyen gyis mthar phyin pa// klong yangs nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la// sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal// mi skye 
571a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gag ngo bo las// ji ltar bltas dgu'i der snang bas// don gnyis lhun grub rtog bral ba// mthar rdzogs sems su rgyal bas gsungs// bsngo gzhi sgrib bral nyid du bstan// 
571a4(rgyud 'grel): yul nyid lnga yi dbang po ni// rim pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can// snying rje chen po brnyan ldan pas// khe grags 'dod pa'i sems gsum spangs// shes bya bar ma kun mkhyen pas// ma 
571a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dres don gyi tha snyad rnams// nad dang sman gyi rim bzhin byed// ston pa'i mchog du 'di gsungs pas// dang po'i rim la gnas pa'i mis// brtson 'grus dga' bo'i las rnams kyis// 
571a6(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes ston par bzhag ste thang // cung zad 'gal ba'i sems med par// rtag par gdung bas rmongs byed pa// de 'dra bral bsam gsungs so// // dbang 'gyur rdo rje dam can 
571a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams// byin rlabs gnyan pa'i sems dag gis// las kyi stongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir// zhing khams byed pa'i rdul 'das pa'i// sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs par bya// de 
571a8(rgyud 'grel): dag rtag tu mngon bsam ste// shes bzhin rang gi sdom pa bsngo// smon lam dbang gis gzigs par 'gyur// maN+Dal bdud rtsi'i dris byugs pa// tsan dan bdud rtsi'i chus sbyangs pa// 
571b1(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim chas kyis rab brgyan ste// rin chen 'byor pas lag thogs bya// sna tshogs yol ba'i phyi rol 'dug/ kha sbyar ban d+ha'i bum chu sbyin// dril bus rdo rje'i mir brtags bya// sangs rgyas 
571b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas gzugs brnyan dgram// sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas pa dag/ 'khor gsum dag pa'i sems kyis dbul// khar gsil rol mo rgyas par sbyin// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma dang / 
571b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug sbyin pa chen po'i dang // dug gsum spangs pa'i sems kyi gtang // sems skyed mtshon pa'i rdo rje yang // rtag tu bcang bar bya ba yin// dang po 'das dang 'jug 'dod dang / 
571b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo bar mkhan pos gsol btab pas// mkhan pos gsol ba btab nas ni// dad pa'i sems la gnas su gzhug/ dgos pa'i yo byad rang 'byor nas// dge ba'i bar chad bzlog pa'i 
571b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rdo rje mi shigs gur bcing bya// bum chu gsum po byin brlab phyir// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dran pa yis// bgegs bskrad pa yi rang bzhin du// 'bru lngas ye shes chu rgyun dgug/ ma lus
571b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i khro bzhin tshogs// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod tsho gas sbyar// sngags bzlos gsol btab bu byin brlab// khrus byas dri zhim rgyan ldan bu// yol phyir phyag byas thal sbyar ste// dpal 
571b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ 'khor ba 'don pa'i ded dpon che// sdug bsngal chu bo rgyun bzlog dang // don gnyis bdag gis mngon byas pa'i// thabs kyi las mtha' gang lags pa// rim pa yang dag
571b8(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir// thugs rje nye bar skyed mdzad de// di ring gnang ba mdzad par rigs// ma lus phyogs btsun bzhugs pa'i// sngon gyi dbang po ji snyed pa'i// rgyas par spyan drangs mchod par// 
572a1(rgyud 'grel): bya// sangs rgyas lta ba'i mos byas pas// lag bzung nang du gnas par bya// thal sbyar zhing la lus dbul bya// bi shud+d+he dang sbyor sngags kyis// tsan dan bdud 
572a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi chu spur de// dad pa'i lhar skyed byin gyis brlab// rin chen bsnyen pas gsol btab pas// rgyal ba sras dong bcas rnams kyis// thugs rje nye bar bskyed mdzad de// dam tshig dam 
572a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas rim pa bzhin// bdag la byin gyis brlabs par rigs// rab tu gtor ste 'brel pa brtag/ rdo rje'i ming yang sbyin par bya// ding khyod sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor gyis// rim par 
572a4(rgyud 'grel): rab zhugs nges pa yin// dam tshig 'dod pa'i sems skyed cing // gzhan don rab dga'i sems ldan pas// bshags pa'i mchog gis rab shogs ste// dag pa'i sems kyis brlab 
572a5(rgyud 'grel): par gyis// 'dabargyad pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// brtan nas sprad cing mos byed de// mtha' rnams bral ba'i byang chub sems// mi rtog mi gnas nam mkha' nyid// chos rnams de 
572a6(rgyud 'grel): 'drar mos pa dang // mthong sgom lam la gnas pa dang // mthar phyin thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// dam bcas yid kyis brtan par bya// rgun yang de bzhin bstan par gsungs// 
572a7(rgyud 'grel): de yi yon tan dpe rnams kyi// nges par mtshon pa bzhi ru bshad// brtan pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// ma rig bzhi dang bcas pa'i sems// skad cig rgyun gyi las nyon mongs// 
572a8(rgyud 'grel): mthun par snang ba'i bltos pa'i chos// rmi lam bzhin du nyams thag rnams// dran pa'i snying rje ga dung sems kyis// khud pa'i zhing du mngon byas pa// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzlog pa'i phyir// 
572b1(rgyud 'grel): cho 'phrul las dang sku don rnams// rgyal bas grangs mtha' mi rtogs so// mngon 'dod bya ba'i mos pa dag/ brtan par bskyed cing rgyun gnas pa// sems kyis sngon bzhin gnas par bya// / 
572b2(rgyud 'grel): thal sbyar gus pa'i lus gnas ste// dang por gsol ba'i tshig bshad bzhi// sngon du btang nas gtam par bya// dkyil 'khor mchod pa sbyin sreg pa sogs// gzhan don grangs ma ji 
572b3(rgyud 'grel): skyed pa// tshe 'di gnas tsam mthar thug par// nam yang rgyun chad ma gyur cig/ thun mong thabs kyis spyod drug dang // mi mthun 'dul ba'i spyod pa rnams// de bzhin bstan pa bsgrub pa 
572b4(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'gro ba mi 'dul med par shog/ dam bcas rim pa'i sdom pa rnams// tshigs bshad bzhin du sems kyis bsgrub// don gnyis 'gyur ba'i lus spyod dag/ lus kyi le 
572b5(rgyud 'grel): lo spangs pas byas// don med spyod pa sems kyis gnan// snying po bshad dang phan pa'i gtam// ma gtogs pa'i rgyun bcad de// le lo spangs pas gsum bsgrub bya// ca con ma
572b6(rgyud 'grel): yang ma yin pa// sangs rgyas chos su de bshad do// bsam gtan shes rab rab ma dang // snying rje sdom pa bsngos pa'i sems// g.yeng dang bying rmugs rnam spangs pas// bsam bya brtag par gang dran pa// sangs rgyas 
572b7(rgyud 'grel): chos bzhir 'di bshad do// sgo gsum chung bar mos grub pas// rtag du rang nyams smod byed pa// dam tshig sdom pa'i gzhir shes bya// sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs thob 'gyur// 
572b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par yon tan brjod mi lang // // khud pa'i zhing du gyur rnams la// sdug bsngal yin yang mthar pa na spyad// stod cing mtho sems rab spangs pas// 'khrul pa ji snyed brjod 
573a1(rgyud 'grel): mi lang // 'di 'dra ba yang snod ma smra// rgan po bla ma'i 'du shes byed// phrag dog can la sems ngan med// dpag tshad du ma'i mthar gnas bya// man ngag zang zing 
573a2(rgyud 'grel): lan spangs sbyin// 'gro na gnyer rkos med dbang du bya// don yod sdig pa dang du blang // ma bsngos 'tsho ba rtag tu spang // grags dang 'gran nor dge ba dor// nyams la snying rje gtang snyoms spang // 
573a3(rgyud 'grel): don 'gyur phyir na bdag dge spang // de ni ldog par ma gsungs so// 'dzin spangs pa'i sbyin pa bzhi// 'chang pas sbyin pa bzlog par bya// lus 'dod dum bu'i sems dag gis// sprul sku 
573a4(rgyud 'grel): thob phyir sbyin par bya// nyam so de log lta sun dbyung phyir// skal ba'i sbyin pas bzlog par bya// bsam gtan ro mchog rlung gnas kyang // theg sman spyod pa dor ba med// 'dod pa'i
573a5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis grong mi gnyer// bzlog pa'i sems kyis grong rgyu ba// chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya'o// // nad dang sdug bsngal can g.yos byed// tshul khrims bsam spyod lhur mi 'dzin// 
573a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes dang bral na dag par gsungs// brtsod pa'i rtsa ba sems dran dang // rnam smin dran par bzlog par bya// khong khro nyes chen bral 'gyur ba// 'di ldan byang chub sems dpa' med// chos 
573a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod bcu la dam bcas nas// thun mong zhen pa bzlog par bya// sdug bsngal bsam pa nam mi 'dor// sdod ma bltas la sems mi brtan// de la don 'gyur spang mi bya// phan byed rnams la 
573a8(rgyud 'grel): lan mi klan// mya ngan ci yang bsang bar bya// spro bskur spangs ste yon tan brjod// ngan byed mthong ba med smon dang // sngos ngan mthong ba de bzhin ste// smon lam bdag gi zhing du btab// 
573b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang por spyod dang dngos po bzang // mchod rdzas mthong ba ji snyed pa// bdag zhing kun gyis spyod par smon// gdug pa sangs rgyas zhing gnas dang // 'gro ba sprul pas don byed dang // byin pa// 
573b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bden rnams dang // bsam rtsis chos kyi bsam pa dang // 'greng ba sems can don bstan dang // dpa'o bdud bzhi g.yul 'joms dang // thams cad spyod bzhin mgos dang // 
573b3(rgyud 'grel): srog gcod khro bo'i 'phrin las dang // 'dod chags mnyam par sbyor ba dang // rku byed dngos grub len pa dang // ri bo rtog pas mi phrogs dang // chu rgyun chos spyod rgyun ldan dang // 'bras bu sku
573b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes dang // me tog rnam grol phung po dang // yul khams rnam dag 'jig rten dang // kha zas ting 'dzin ro mchog dang // skom dang snying rje chu 'thung ba sogs// khams gsum gnas 
573b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can la// smon lam yid kyis zin par bya// gzhan phyi ra ba dag kyang de bzhin smon// tsa ba'i spyod pa gsum bsogs pa// sems skyed sdom pa blangs nas mthong // nyams 
573b6(rgyud 'grel): med bsam pa'i dran pa dang // shes bzhin lta bas brtag dngos ste// gang zhig sngon goms dbang nyams pa// 'gyod dang bcas pas sor gzhug bya// yi ge la sogs bzo mtha' rnams// rtsol 
573b7(rgyud 'grel): bas rgyun tu 'jug byed pa// goms te sra bar ma gyur pa'i// dngos sde gang yang yod ma yin// spyod lam rnam gsum dran bya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob ste// de ni ldog par mi 
573b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// dper na phyug po nor sdod pa// med par gyur pa sor 'jug bzhin// spyod pa mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// zhig pa bzhin du mi gnas te// gzhi 'am 'on te gzhan dag gam/ 
574a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang por gyur pa'i rten dag la// sngon du maN+Da pa mchod byar nas// me tog phyag 'tshal lus gus pas// 'gyod sems dngos po gang gis bshags// de bzhin 
574a2(rgyud 'grel): slar yang blang bar bya// bdag dang dngos po 'bras bu rnams mi dmigs sems kyi bshags bya bar// de ni nyes par ma gsungs so// 'di ni shin tu gsang ba'i chos// bdag gzhan 
574a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka'i don 'gyur phyir// sdom pa rnam grangs 'phel mi bya// 'dod pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin no// thun mong rab tu zhen pa bzlog pa dang // bslab pa mthar chub de las grol ba'i phyir/ 
574a4(rgyud 'grel): las mtha' sems bskyed cho ga mdor bshad pas// 'gro ba mtha' dag byang chub sems ldan shog/ sems skyed pa'i cho ga mdor bshad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rdo rje 'dzin la phyag
574a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas// lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir// rgyud ga bum nges par gsal byed cing // dam tshig chen po mdor bshad pa// lam gyi rgyud la zhugs pa 
574a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bslab pa gsum la gnas byas nas// don gnyis mngon du byed pa yang // nang ri sa la la mun snang phyir// gcig gis 'thad pa ma yin la// la la cha mthun spyad pa'i rigs// 
574a7(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya skabs kyis rim spyod pa// sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'di gsungs so// // gnyer 'di lung gis lus bzhag nas// ngo bo rnam grangs bsrung thabs dang // nya mos rgyu snga rtags
574a8(rgyud 'grel): skyon yon gnyis// bskar thabs dpe dang mdo bcur bcad// ngo bo rtsa ba bzhi dang ni// thun min thun mong yan lag gnyis// rtsa ba chen po mdor 'brel lo// dam tshig rnam pa'i grangs dag 
574b1(rgyud 'grel): ni// sems can grangs dang log nog grangs// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen phyir// rtog 'dul gnyen po dam tshig grangs// rgyal ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa las// 'on kyang rmongs

574b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bsgrub de bzhin// shes bya lnga rnams thun min bshad// yan lag skabs su shes par bya// thun mong dam tshig mdor bshad pa// mdor bsdus bdag gzhan don gnyis so// 
574b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs skabs su shes par bya// bsrung ba'i thabs ni 'di lalta ste// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya tsho// sems can khams kyang der shes shing // sdud skyong gnyis med ye shes su/ 
574b5(rgyud 'grel): byas mthong zos pa thams cad la// sems phyir gang yang byas snang med// dran dang shes bzhin mngon pastang la// dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na// thig chen bsngags par ci zhig

574b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang // khu bo ma dang pa dang mig/ rnying pas lhag pa'i tshul ltas te// sgo gsum zol rgyu med pa ni// yi dam lha ltar rgyun du bsam// bsrung rim 'chad bzhin shes par
574b8(rgyud 'grel): bya// mtha' yas sems can rang rig phyir// gang yang bdag las gzhan min dang // bde gshegs snying po yun ring phyir// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin// spyi yi mchod de 
575a1(rgyud 'grel): pa tshan bzhi// sangs rgyas chos zhugs ring ba dang // lta spyod mthun pas nye bar bshad// bcig dam tshig nang 'dres pa// zhang tshan pa spun sbran pas kyang // lhag par bltas//

575a3(rgyud 'grel): zas blangs pa rnam smin phyir// til phub tsam yang mi 'bag cing // mal gos chags sogs 'gor mi bya// mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs// brdeg bsad sku 'phrog spyod pa ni// spos su
575a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ci smos kyi// rtsed mo las su bya ba min// bdag gis skyon sras yon tan bsgrags// tshul brjod pa ni nyams par 'gyur// bskyon bskur la sogs mtshan nyid dag/ bre mo gtam du zur mi 
575a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// yid kyis g.yo rgyu phrag dog dang // mngan sems dpya sems nor la brkam// se gol yun du'ang bya ba min// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// spyod lam cis kyang mnyes byed cing // 
575a6(rgyud 'grel): bka' yi zur yang mi bcag pa// de ni sdig par ma gsungs so// tsa ba skyed dang las sngags kyis// dam tshig las dang chos dang ni// sku nyid phyag rgya chen po bzhi// rang gi sgo gsum yi dam gyi// 
575a7(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs su mngon sbyar la// rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa ni// byang chub gzung la zhugs pa ni// rab kyis chu bo'i rgun bzhin nas// nyin gsum mtshan gsum nyin cig du// ma spangs pa yi ngag gis

576b8(rgyud 'grel): chos bshad// ngag gi dam tshig bco lnga bsrung // mi spang dam tshig bshad par bya// yang dag dug lnga log dug lnga// bshad pa'i thabs mkhas 'dod chags dang // 'dod spyod sems kyi rgyan shes
577a1(rgyud 'grel): nas// shin tu zhen pa lam du gsungs// zhing bcu rlag byed zhe sdang mchog/ lta ngan 'joms pa de bzhin te// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yin// mngon par mtho ba'i 
577a2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba dang // ting 'dzin nges par sran tshugs pa// shin tu rgyas pa'i mchog tu gsungs// lta bas phyogs ris mi phyed dang // spyod pa blang dor mi byed pa// theg pa chen po'i gti mug go/ lta

583a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nes ni// lhan ne ltang nge 'od du zhwa// zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// rigs tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du// gsal 'gyur kun kyang de bzhin pa// skyod 
583a4(rgyud 'grel): yul dag pas rang du gsungs// rang lus 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la// lus dang rtswa dang dung khrod kyi// gzhal yas khang la sogs par skom// myong byed kun gzhi'i zhal bsam ste/ 
583a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs dang bkod pa'i lha rnams sgom// ting 'dzin gsal bar yid kyis byung // ye shes dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya// bgrub bya 'od kyis nges sbyar ba'i// longs spyod yi ge lngas

588b6(rgyud 'grel): srung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga yis// dam tshig sems dpa' srungs te bzhag/ de ltar grangs dang zhag dus su// yang dang yang du gnan te bya// khrus dang rgyan dang byug pas te// phyi dang nang gi 
588b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga gnyis la// brgya pa gnyis dang dag pa ni// tshul lan grangs mang bzlas te// mchod rten de la bkru bar bya// mi 'chi bcu phyed spos mar dang // dri yis de la yang dag byug/ zhun 
588b8(rgyud 'grel): chen khu bar btsos pa yi// ras kyis steng nas yang dag dkri// spos mar thor ldog de la dkon// mgul do rgyan yang gdags par bya// phung po lnga yi gnas dag du// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i 
589a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dgod// rtsa ru yum lnga'i phyag rgya dgod// rnam shes dbang po yul rnams su// sems dpa' sems ma 'dzom pa dang // 'jom ma rim par dgod do 
589a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes// mnyam pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa yin// chu drug 'khor ba'i gnas rnams su// thub drug sa bon dgod pa yin// kun bzangs yab yum de bzhin ste// sdong bu rel lha 
589a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi// ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po dag/ ras chen rgyu las byas te gdags// mya ngan 'das par gsungs pa yin// ro yi phyi rol shun pa la// 'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni// 
589a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'gro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// rim gyis sbyang ba'i las su bya// dab rgyan cod pan 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa// dbang mchog byin la stegs lnga bzhag/ de nas me 
589a5(rgyud 'grel): thab tsam bya ba// khru bzhi do yi tshad byas la// mthur du brus te dkyil 'khor du// za byed dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dgod// rdo rje me ris mtshan pa ni// thab khung yin par gsal bar 
589a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// phyi rol ka ba bzhi btsugs la// 'og ma sbrengs pas sum rtsegs bya// bar ba shing gi rdzas dbus su// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la// khro bo brgyad kyi snying por ldan//

589a8(rgyud 'grel): yang thog chen po der// ras sam gro ga shing shun la// thugs rje dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// lding bur byas te gdags par bya// de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis// rang bzhin me yi
