594a7(rgyud 'grel): shes sgron ma'i thugs kyis bag chags sregs// rdo rje spu gri'i tshems kyis dug gsum bcad// rnga mo chen hUM nyid ring pos khro chen bskul// thugs dam mu la dza las dmyal khams sreg/ ye shes 
594a8(rgyud 'grel): rol pas chud drag gnas nas sgrol// sred gsum thig les zhal gyi rgyas sbas spo ba skyed// ye shes byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yongs kyi dpal// dpal chen tha med khro rgyal gsum gyi 
594b1(rgyud 'grel): rje// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lha phrad yin// ma lus 'dod pa'i dpal du gyur par mdzod// spyod yul 'gyur bar mthong bas na// gsang ba'i 
594b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas su nyon mongs yid// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba la// kun gzhi ye shes seng po yi// 'od kyis khams gsum sbyangs bsdus te// mtshan gang 'od du gsal ba la// dkar po hUM gnas rnam 
594b3(rgyud 'grel): shes so// de dag skagasung thugs bdag ste// shin tu'ang 'dris pa nyid dbya// rlung brtsegs bdud g.yo'i mtshan mthong na// ring po hUM gnyis nas sa nas// dra ba'i tshul grangs 'od dra bsdu// 
594b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin zla ba yang shes par// 'od bla ma gsang ba'i lam zhugs te// phyir 'gyur phyogs parda khyab bdal bas// khams dag byir mtha' dbus dang ni// byi nang yul sems bral ba'i don// dran pas 
594b5(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rkun bcad de// rang gnas mthong bar gyur pa yin// gsang ba zhabs kyi rnam pa ni// gnyis kyang rnam shes gnyis 'dus te// lce rtse rkan la sbar byas nas// hA rings bslang ste nyer gyur// 
594b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshegs mchog ldan tan rdzogs pa// hUM brjod na sa la ma byung ste// 'og min la sogs 'gro bar bya// 'dod pa nges par 'grub par 'gyur// theg mchog gsang mtha' mngon byas nas// gzhi bzhin ma 
594b7(rgyud 'grel): lus bdag nyid phyir// rgya bral cig dang du ma spangs// 'das dang ma 'das dus gsum gyi// ro myong dag phyir rnam rtog bral// ye shes dbyings las mi zhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos ma lus mkhyen// / 
594b8(rgyud 'grel): klu dang gsung thugs yon tan las// khro ba dang bde dang rtag dbang bskur// rkyen gyis skye 'jig med pa yi// rtag chen rdo rje'i sku zhes bya// rang bzhin gnas rgyud ye shes byag/ rtsa gyon bsam yas 
595a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon sum du// yul 'dra rang bzhin dang gnas pa// 'khrul dang rnam par rgud log pa'i// rtog gsum las rkyen rab rib zhen snang ba// thabs mkhas spyan mnga' rmad bzhin sgo 
595a2(rgyud 'grel): skur bral// rgyud gsum thur ma gsal gyi dag pa gsungs pa// spyad yig goms rnams sngang chud nyams su shar// gsal bus 'das dang da ltar rang rig mig thob shog/ sgyu 'phrul dpe chung rang 
595a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi rim pa'o// keka pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud dag las// sku gdung spel mchod rim pa zhig/ bdag 
595a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ljang dang mi snang phyir// legs par bsdus te bstan par bya'o// pa dang ma yi sems ldan mis// mtha' yas bu yi sems bzhag ste// tshogs chen zung la lam bya'i phyir// mi rtog 
595a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid du rtog med 'dug/ de las skad cig las kyi lha// gsal bya dgu'am bcu gcig ldan// 'phro 'dus dbang byin thob pa dang // grangs te sngags kyi nga rgyal bskyed// sa man dza da e ha/ 
595a6(rgyud 'grel): nyes// se gol kro ta dza yis dgug/ dza grI ba hos s+ho byas te// 'bru brgyad sngags kyis brtan par bya// de ltar gsal ba'i rnal 'byor pas// thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od 'phros pas// skor por 
595a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs la gnas gdan sngags// brjod pas go zhal yas gdan gsum ldan// 'byung lnga'i rgyu nyid byin brlab pa// spyi dang khyad par lnga pa nyid// khong stong rgyan ldan rnam dag sngags// nga rgyal 
595a8(rgyud 'grel): ldan brjod stong chen gyi// lhun grub cibasam snang byin brlab// phyi ma lnga yis dbyings phyug ma// khong stong brgyan ldan oM bi ra// rje dang badz+ra swA hA yis// rdo rje ye shes srog ldan bya// de bzhin/ 
595b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan la 'degs pa'i rgyas// oM dang badz+ra di ra dza// a dang a ra swA hA yis// snga ma ji bzhin byin brlab bo// ma ma ki la rdo rje gdams// the chung sgreng ste oM rma rin// da ra badz+ra swA hA yis/ 
595b2(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin srog dang ldan par bya// gos dkar khong stong sbyor spros pas// oM dang badz+ra ag ne a// ga sha swA hA'i gsang sngags kyis// gong ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab// sgrol ma thal mo 
595b3(rgyud 'grel): brlab bya zhing // oM dang badz+ra a ni li// s+pha tsa la mo hUM rgya// da ra swA hAs byin barbab bo// shes rab grangs 'dzin thabs kyis gdab// hUM badz+ra grig/ mr-i dA du shwa ri snyom gri sngags brjod cing // 
595b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brung lnga ye shes rdo rje la// skor por rig pas gzhal yas gdan// nang ngo phyi rol skag dang dbyibs// mi bskyod yab yum 'khril zhugs pa'i// 'od kyis don mdzad lha chen skor// de nyid
595b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung lnga gang yin mkha'// gang brlabs rang gi lha mos na'ang // so so'i gsang sngags brjod byas te// srog ldan rnal 'byor snga ma bzhin// 'phrin las rnams las grub 'dod pas/ 
595b6(rgyud 'grel): chu lnga bzhi las rtsam pa na// zhi la snang mdzad gsang sngags ldan// shan ting ku ru swA hA sa mdzes// tshes sku thig le dkar 'od kyis// gzas dgu gdan byas 'od thim zhing // rgyas la 'byung 
595b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan yab yum sngags// pus ting ku ru swA hA yis// sku gsung ser rgyas 'od zer 'phros// bkug gdan 'od thim bdag rgyas byas// dbang la rta mgrin mtha' yas sngags// che ge ba 
595b8(rgyud 'grel): shaM ku ru yis// zla gam 'oda'abar 'bros bkug pas// gdan byas 'od zim dbang po bsgyur// drag po badz+ra he ru'i sngags// che ge gsod pa'i sngags brjod pas// chos sku gru gsum 
596a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od nag gis// bkug ste gdan bstim bsgral bar bya'o// don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// chos sku lhun grub lha gnas bya// chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs 'dod/ 
596a2(rgyud 'grel): pas// mtha' yas rnal 'byor rten 'brel sngags// 'od kyis bsgrib sbyangs rtogs skal ldan// nang du gdan gtso bzhugs la'o// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// lha de nye bar bsgrub 
596a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// lha'i snying po bris bcug brjod// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten lha de dbang med bkug/ mchod sogs rdzogs pa'i las bya'o// gang zhig 'phongs pa'i las byed na// 
596a4(rgyud 'grel): gang goms lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// btab ste ma tha gnyis mtha' ru// sarba tir ya ga te/ hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pas byol song gi rgyud sbyang ba'o// pa tsa gnyis dang // sarba spre ta ka te he 
596a5(rgyud 'grel): duM hUM phaT/ kyi sa yi dag sa rgud spangs so// da ha gnyis sarba na ra ga te he duM hUM phaT brjod 'od 'phros pas// sngon bzhin bkug la 'od kyis sbyang // yang na mi bskyod rnal 'byor ldan/ 
596a6(rgyud 'grel): rgun bcad sngags kyis sbyang ba'o// de nas sku gdung byin brlab ste// rdo rje gdams la the bong rtsegs// oM ye d+harmarmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te Shan ta thA ga to h+ya ba dang/ te Shan tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam
596a7(rgyud 'grel): bA dI/ ma hA shA ma Na ye swA hA/ zhes brjod do// chos kyi skur byin gyis brlab bo// rgu 'bras kyi chos sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa ni// phyag rgya de nyid las/ oM badz+ra ku sha mi 
596a8(rgyud 'grel): ta u pa da/ saM myag a ri te/ i tra ba la ag t+ya/ ma ga ba ri pu ra rnam phyi ti ku ru sAM hA/ zhes rgyu'i tshes rdzogs par byin gyis brlab bo// 'bras bu'i chos rdzogs par byin kyis brlab 
596b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// mnyam pa'i phyag rgya 'od 'phro ba ltar byas la// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na pan tsa ka yA gu na gar khang / bu mi ta/ shi te na ku ru swA hA// dz+nyA na ba ga sa man ta/ a mo ki sa man ta/ a mo ka ya 
596b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// zhes sku dang ye shes su gsal ba las/ 'bras bu'i chos thams cad rdzogs par bsam mo// de la rang bzhin gnas pa yang // spyan las byas pa bcu rtsa brgyad// stong khri 'bus 
596b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'bad byas la// rab gnas sbyin sreg rgyas par sbyar// ye dmanar ma'i sbyor ba la// rang bzhin mchod rten lhar bcas pas// snyan dbab spyan drang bstim brtan pas// sngon 
596b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byas la phyag gis mchod// e ti pra ti bu tsa yos// spyi sbrul phyag dang lan rdzogs bya'o// kun bzangs mchod pa nam mkha'i mdzod// sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod par bya'o// 
596b5(rgyud 'grel): gzed zhal rgyun ldan a ha ras// phyag dang zhal bsil gsol bar bya// lha mo bzhi'i sngags phyag rgyas// spyan shangs sku la thim par bya// oM 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// 
596b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang // bzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang gis bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin tshes sku'i gzug 
596b7(rgyud 'grel): brnyan bstan// yang dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i don// sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po mchog gnas dang // byang chub chos rnams rab tu rdzogs// 'jig rten 
596b8(rgyud 'grel): mchog rab tu bskor// a ho// ho chos sku'i yon tan ldan gyis grub pa yi// thal sbyar bo de ka ya bag/ tsi ta ti sta badz+ra stan// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i den gyi phyir// 'khor lo dang 
597a1(rgyud 'grel): mchu'i tshul bzhin du// bka' yi bcud bsdus bsod nams kyis// mtha' yas mngon par sangs rgyas shog/ sku gdung las kyi 'phreng ba rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 
597a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// don dang bral ba'i 'jig rten na// sngang srid bde ba'i longs spyod la// chags pa spyad pas 'khyams pa rnams// 'di ltar spyad na 
597a3(rgyud 'grel): grol zhes gsungs// lta ba byin brlabs bskyed pa dang // spyan drang mchod dang rol pa dang // lhag ma'i las dang bsngo ba brgyad// rgyun du mi stong rnal 'byor yin// dbang po yul dus rnam shes kun 
597a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs sbyor ye sangs rgyas// 'byung ba yum gyi mkha' grong las// sprul pa rang 'byung longs spyod lha// byang chub sems kyi klong bdal bas// gnyis med cig pa'i longs spyod yin/ 
597a5(rgyud 'grel): lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// dang por longs spyod kun ldan nas// bdag nyid lung gi khrag 'thung las// yig 'brags ma 'phros thim tsam gyis// sbyang ba 
597a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis kha bskang ba'o// bdag nyid khrag 'thung gsal ba las// lto bar bruM las gzhal yas su// rim pa lnga yi dkyil 'khor lha// mi bskyod rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom// sa ma 
597a7(rgyud 'grel): rje yi phyag rgya yis// 'bar des 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas// nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar dmigs// de nyid thig le'i tshul du bsgom// rim pa bzhin du gros te sbyang // sngags kyis 
597a8(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rim pa bzhin// shes rab thabs tshul mnyes pas mchod// bla med dngos grub stsol bar bsam// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ke te a mr-i te hUM AM ba'i na ta khar ma kha raM Ta ki ni// 
597b1(rgyud 'grel): kha ro yo gi ni/ dang taM a la la ho// zhes rgyas par mchod do// de nas bdag nyid mnyam bzhag pas// rnam gsum tshul gyis rol bar bya// bdag nyid rang gi lha mnyes pas// mchod sbyin yin
597b2(rgyud 'grel): te dgos grub bo// bdag nyid mnyam bzhag ta gi rgyal// ma tshogs dbang phyug dmal bsdu// sngags 'dis mchod la 'phrin las bcol// rang gi gnas su las la dgye// A~M ta ki ni a gaN+Da 
597b3(rgyud 'grel): ya/ a gat+ta ya/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ b+han+tA ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ mo ha na/ mo ha na/ sarba TA ki ni nan/ hr-i da ya hUM dza/ dza trUM ba ma ho// 
597b4(rgyud 'grel): taki ni dza/ ces pa dang / oM badz+ra ta ki ni/ pra ti dza man b+ha lin ta/ hUM phaT kha 'aM/ A tr-i hri hA// ces thim par mchod do// pha ma la sogs 'gro drug la// tshad med gtor ma 'di bsngos 
597b5(rgyud 'grel): pas// longs spyod ldan zhing tshogs bsags nas// thams cad myur du sangs rgyas shog/ A~M sarba sA ti na na a mr-i te ts+tsha/ zhes byams pa dang snying rjes dmigs la// ci 'dod pa 'byung bar 
597b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing gtor ro// 'phrin las bcol ba ni/ sdang ba'i dgra thul/ gnod pa'i bgegs chom/ zhing bcu gdul du lhogs/ rnal 'byor pa'i bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ 
597b7(rgyud 'grel): ya hi g+ha dza/ oM ba lin te te dzo ba li ni ba la ba de gu he sa ma ye swA hA// rnal 'byor longs spyod gol ba'i phyi rabs la// ma spangs rol pas 'bras bu ldan grub pa// yid dam za tshogs gtor ma 'di btang 
597b8(rgyud 'grel): bas// kun gyis rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob shog/ za tshogs gter ma'i lung rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 
598a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid chos glu gsang ba'i sku// longs spyod rdzogs sku sprul pa'i sku// sku lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das// kun bzang dang la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa
598a2(rgyud 'grel): kun 'dus las// mdo don chos kyi rnam grol sgo// de shes de 'jug bde bslab phyir// mi 'gal tsam du bsdus te bshad// kun bzang thugs rjes 'gro don du// theg pa gsum snang 'dul 
598a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i// don dam nges pa'i theg mchog las// gsang sgo mtshon pa'i mdo rgud don// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bya ba'i gzhi dang byed pa'i rkyen// bya bral 'bras bu'i mthar phyin dag/ 
598a4(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad// phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems// ji bzhin dang du ye gnas pa// shes par bya ba'i rgyu don yin// rtsol bcas spyod pas/ 
598a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dres 'jug pa'i// theg pa de ni bya byed rkyen// gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med// bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas// thabs chen theg 'di bya bral ba'o// de yang phyi nang nyid la'ang // 
598a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu yi// tshul gsum bye brag chos su bshad// gzhi ni snga ma'i don nyid de// thabs ni lam yin rnam pa gsum// gol sgri ba ngo bo yan lag ste// gol sa ltung 
598a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo dgu dang // nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sogs dang // thun mong rtog pa brgya bcu gcig/ dgu bcu la sogs skyon rnams dang // shes pa'i bye brag drug la sogs// mi mthu na gol sgrib 
598a8(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bshad// ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste// rol pa'i ka ra la sogs pa'i// man ngag thabs kyi bder 'jug dang // thos pas ma sgom pa'i tshul 'gro ba'o// der ni 'jug pa 
598b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum ste// rtog dpyod don dang yi ge yi// rjes 'jug dang po sngon 'gro nyid// blo yi stobs kyis rnam pa gnyis// lus las snang ba'i chos rnams la// rigs pa'i gtan tshigs mtha'
598b2(rgyud 'grel): dag dang // man ngag nges pa'i tshad ma yis// so sor rtog dang rtsol med par// rims dang cig car gtan la 'bebs// de nas 'jug pa'i tshul sgo ni// don la rims dang cig car pa'o// 
598b3(rgyud 'grel): don ni chos nyid snying po la// rjes su 'jug pa sems yin te// de yang skabs kyi khyad par gyis// lam lnga'i skabs dang bcur 'gyur bas// rim par bsgrod pa'i lam du bshad// blo zhan rim 
598b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'jug pa'ang // yul dang shes pa'i tshul lta bur// ji bzhin pa la blo bzhag pas// rigs pa'i khyad par skabs su 'phags// gsal dang bstan dang yun rings dang // shin tu ring 
598b5(rgyud 'grel): dang tshad las 'das// mi mthun phyogs dang phrad pa'i tshe// de dbang gyur dang cung zad du// mi 'gyur thang cig gnas pa dang // gsal bar bstan pa'i ring goms dang // rang dbang gyur nas 
598b6(rgyud 'grel): ches bstan dang // spyod lam kun tu rlung gnas yin// de dag zag bcas bsam gtan te// gnyis med yul bral de mthong min// mnyam nyid gsang ba'i bde don la// dad dang mos dang der 
598b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsol dang // des de g.yo dang cher g.yos dang // mthong dang 'dra bar 'gyur yin te// sar phran 'bring dang chen po dang // gcig pa gnyis pa'i zla ba 'dra// rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du// gsal 
598b8(rgyud 'grel): bar mthong bas dbugs byin te// zag pa zad nas 'jig rten 'das// gsum pa'i ri bong spyan 'dra yin// mthong ba'i don la mnyam gnas pas// brtan par 'gyur te lung chen thob// 'bras 
599a1(rgyud 'grel): bu cher 'byung bzhi pa 'dra// rang dang spyi yi tha dad bral// dmigs med kun gsal ye shes nyid// g.yo dang thob dang brtan rdzogs pa'i// rim pas mthar phyin gsum 
599a2(rgyud 'grel): du snang // lnga brgyad cu drug tshul du gsal// de dag sa dang rnal 'byor skabs// sems lam bcu dang lnga zhes bya// gang dag blo chen mngon rtogs pas// mnyam nyid yul bral rang gsal bar// 
599a3(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo cig car gang 'jug pa// sa dang lam gyi grangs rtsol med// yi ge mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dag/ blo yi khyad par che phra ba pi// thams cad gsal rdzogs cig car dang // lnga dang 
599a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu la sogs par snang // lam ldanal 'byor rigs 'dzin gyi// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang // sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang // spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang // dus dang dngos

599a6(rgyud 'grel): yi phyag rgya cig pa dang // gnyis 'brel yan lag rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo gcig dang rnam spros dang // shin tu rnam spros dkyil 'khor dang // gling gcig gang dang stong gsum dang / 
599a7(rgyud 'grel): grangs med shin tu grangs med dang // chos dbyings mtha' yas rab gsal rdzogs// de dag rnam pa'i khyad par yang // rtog dang mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dang // chu zla lta bur gzung med dang / 
599a8(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin gnyis bral de nyid dang // ci la'ang mi gnas mnyam nyid dang // rang gi mtshan nyid gsal nges dang // zag pa med dang lhun grub pa'i// rab 'bring tha ma'i rim pa yis// thob dang 
599b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu thob pa dang // brtan rdzogs nyid de rnam bcu'o// tshad kyang khru bzhi brgyad cu drug/ sum cu gnyis dang drug cu bzhi// de bzhin 'gyur sogs chos dbyings rnams// lhar gsal 
599b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du dbugs yul dang // dri sgra gzugs sogs rim bzhin 'phags// de dag blo yi rtsa la yin te// shes rab la sogs kun de bzhin// khyad par gyur cing rnam par 'phel// don 
599b3(rgyud 'grel): dang yi ge gang de'ang // so so'i gnas skabs lam bdag nyid// bgrod dang de chos ldan pa dang // rgyud mi gtong dang rten byed dang // dus de skabs dang 'bras bu dang // gags dang 'dra ba'i 
599b4(rgyud 'grel): lhung gnas dang // rtsol zhing bgrod pa'i lam sems dang // spyod lam dang ni blo gnas dang // ma 'da' bsrung dang dus nyid dang // yon tan mthu dang bya bral dang // shes rab stobs dang
599b5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par las// tha snyad bye brag rnams su gsungs// gzhan yang sems bskyed sngags la sogs// lam gyi chos sgo tha snyad kun// lnga dang bcu sogs grags pa yin// dang po gnyis la 
599b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni// gsang chen 'bras bu lam gyi rten// de bzhin rim par bgrod gnas na// ltung yang gzugs kyis zin pa dang // lus ngan mi srid bde 'gro yis// yang dag gnas dang 'dod 
599b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs sogs// bde 'gro'i gnas ngan mi srid dang // khams gsum 'jig tshogs zag bral dang // mi ldog mi gnas phyir 'ong dang // mi shes skyon bral mtha' rdzogs nas// sa par mi ldog/ 
599b8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sar// thogs med mngon gyur lhun gyis grub// de phyir lam gyi mchog tu brjod// de rkyen yan lag rnam pa gnyis// sgrub byed rkyen dang shes byed pa'i// lam gyi yan lag sum 
600a1(rgyud 'grel): cu gnyis// mdo dang bzhi dang bslab pa'i mtha'// mdo ni bcu gnyis 'jug sgo dang // dam tshig lta ba ting 'dzin dang // dmigs pa bzlas pa 'phrin las dang // spyod pa 
600a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni thob bya'i dbang // rigs 'dzin sa dang sangs rgyas so// nges byed yan lag dag tu bshad// gzhi ni rnam bcu ba sgrub pa dang // gsang sngags ming dang spyod pa dang // dngos grub gnas da 
600a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i sgra// phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta ba dang // cho 'phrul dag ste de dag ston// dpe bcus mtshon nas rab tu shes// bslab pa'i mtha' ni rnam bcu ste// dam tshig bzhi dang rgyud dgrol dang // 
600a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo mo bskur dang phul dbyung dang // zag bcad pa dang nyams thang dang // la dar spyod dang dbang rim dang // man ngag don dang mdor bsdus rnams// rnal 'byur bslab pa'i mtha' bcur bcad// 
600a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhi 'dzin pa ni dam tshig ste// sgo gsum sdom par gnas pa'i don// rtsa ba yan lag la sogs pa'i// bsrung dang bsgrub pa de nyid do// rgyud 'grol ba ni thos bsam ste// mkhas ldan 
600a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i bla ma la// dad dang sri zhu gus pa yis// don gang nyan 'dzin rtogs byed 'grol// sgo bskur ba ni theg pa rnams// shes par byed dang rtsol ba ste// gol sgrib phyogs su gang gsung dag 
600a7(rgyud 'grel): bcad phyir de dag rig shes byed// bul du dbyung ba 'di don nyid// mkhas shing rab tu shes pa'o// thag bcad pa ni lta ba ste// ji bzhin ma nor shes rab nyid// re dogs med par sngon 'gro don// 
600a8(rgyud 'grel): nyams blangs pa ni ting 'dzin ste// phyag rgya bzhis sogs spros pa dang // spros med la sogs bsam gtan yin// la dor ba ni spyod pa ste// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang las bzhi dang // bsgrub pa la
600b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bye brag dang // thun mong thabs kyi mdza' spyod nyid// dbang ni rim par bgrod byed pa'i// lnga dang lnga sogs nus mthu bskyed// man ngag don bsgrub thabs kyi mchog/ gser 'gyur bdud rtsi lta bu'i
600b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul// mdor bsdu ba ni sems kyi don// ji bzhin dang rtogs kun 'dus pa'o// shes byed yan lag rnam pa gnyis// mtshon byed tshig don yi ge'i sgra// rgyud don yan lag rnam drug 
600b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // de 'grel gtan la 'bebs byed pa'i// lde mig zhes su grags pa de// rgyud ni byin rlabs 'byung ba dang // lung bstan rgyud pa rnam gnyis phyir// de 'grel ba yang rnam pa gnyis// 
600b4(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs sku bzhi bstan pa dag/ bshad thabs lde mig rnam gnyis te// dpyod pa'i 'dren sgo rnam 'grel gsum// 'byed pa drug dang 'grol ba bzhi// nges par 'byin pa rnam gsum mo// 
600b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo gnyis spyi dang khyad par ste// spyi'ang rnam gsum yan lag mdo// rtsa ba dag gis 'grel bar byed// khyad par gsang sgo'i rnam 'grel yang // yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba yis// 'byed 'grel des 
600b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'byin par byed// 'byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang // 'brel dang tshig dang nges par sbyor// rgyu ni gleng bzhi drug yin te// don gang gang tshe gang nyid kyis// gang du gang la bshad brjod pa'o// rtsa ba gleng 
600b7(rgyud 'grel): bslang rkyen nyid dang // ji ltar bslang nas zhus bshad tshul// 'grel pa gang brjod gang gis brjod// gang phyir gang gi stobs kyis bshad// 'dren pa brjod pa'i rgyu 'di dag/ ji ltar bshad pa'i 
600b8(rgyud 'grel): tshul bcu ste// rang bzhin lta ba'i nges don dang // spyi don bsdud dang rnam par dbye// tshig don 'grel dang 'brel shugs sbyor// rang lugs nyid dang brgal lan dang // ldem dgongs brda 
601a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dpes mtshon dang // man ngag gab sras 'byin bsdebs rnams// dpe bcu lta bur bshad pa'o// nges pa gtan tshigs rnam bcu gnyis// snod sgo bzhi la bstan pa bzhi// 
601a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tsham par so sor nges byed dang // lung dang don dang rigs pa dang // mtshon dpe gtan tshigs mtha' dag gis// snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad sbyar// de dag re re'ang dgos pa dang // ngo bo
601a3(rgyud 'grel): nges tshig dmigs bzung bcas// rnam bcu gnyis kyis nges 'byed shes// sbyor ba byang chub yan lag ste// rtogs pa bzhi dang mtshan nyid bzhi// dgos 'brel bzhi dang yan lag bzhi// der
601a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug bzhi dang mtshon dpe bzhi// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi dag dang // mtshan nyid tshul dang sbyor ba ni// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams// gzhi nyid 'brel dang zag bcas dang // mthong
601a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bsgom dang mthor byin dang // sangs rgyas sa dang rnam drug du// bsdus te de yi yan lag yin// cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon shes lnga// thabs dang thabs sbyar lnga lnga dang // rang bzhin lnga dang 'phrin las 
601a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// gzhan don spyod pa'i yan lag ste// bla med sbyong ba'i chos 'grel yin// mdobani thos mthong mngon sum dang // bya ba med dang rnam bzhir 'grel// rtsa ba nges pa'i man dag gsum// mi mthun phyogs 
601a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams bcad pa dang // don mthun 'gro ba'i dpe mtshon dang // nges pa'i don la gnas pa yi// don gsum tshul gyis rnam 'grel 'byin// lung bstan brgyud pa'i bstan pa yang // de bzhin tshul du 
601a8(rgyud 'grel): 'grel ba ste// rgyud don rnam gsum khungs dang rgyu// jo bo nyid de dang po ni// thun mong bcas gzhi spyi chud do// gdam ngag lung bstan rtsa ba'i rgyud// gleng gan spyi yi rgyud ces bya// 'a 
601b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus skyes dang bskul zhes pa// bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen ste// ngo bo 'tshogs pa drug nyid do// gleng bslang la sogs drug rnams dang // mdo bzhi rtsa ba gsum la sogs// tshul bzhin rjes su 
601b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya// de dag 'bras bu'i lam du bshad// 'bras bu nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan lnga// nyi shu lngar bsdus mtha' yas rnams// lhun rdzogs rnam kun mkhyen 
601b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gsang mchog gsang ba dag bka' lung mdo rgyud do// gsang bsdus gsal bshad mdo tsam phyogs brjod pa// ma nor mi 'gal tsam du nyams kyis bstan// de yi dge ba gang mchis 
601b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs la bsngo// gsang ba'i mdo don bsdus pa/ slob dpon d+harma bo des mdzad pa rdzogs so// / @#// zhabs brel gyi bra tu pa shad pa bzugs sa// / mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
601b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las 'byung ba'i skabs bshad bya// de yang rgyud nyid las// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang // sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang // spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang // dus dang dngos grub 
601b6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin dang // lta ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur rnams// thams cad gcig las med na yang // grangs sam dbye ba'i bye brag rnams// snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni// chos rnams kun gzhir
601b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa la// kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lnga// bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang // zhes gsungs pas// lngar brjod pas 'di ni snod kyi// rim pas bcur yang 'gyur bar dgongs so// de la 
601b8(rgyud 'grel): lngar drangs pa ni bcu'i yang rtsa bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ blo rims su sbyor ba'i rab kyi ched du bstan ste/ gang zhe na/ sa dang zhes pa/ 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa ni rkyen la rag lus pa dang / rigs
602a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa yin ste/ 'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yis// kun tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o// zhes bka' las snang ngo // gnyis pa gal chen skyong ba'i sa ni/ ched du/ 
602a2(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus lam 'bad na/ legs nyes 'byung ba'i nyes dbang du 'gro bas/ slab pa bcu la 'jug cing sbyor ba la brten pa'i phyir ro// de yang 'di skad du/ dge dang mi dge'i las rnams 
602a3(rgyud 'grel): kun// gcod spyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis// legs nyes stobs chen 'gyed pa'o zhes snang ngo // gsum pa mi ldog gnas pa'am// rten pas khyad par 'gro ba'i sa ni/ mthong lam 
602a4(rgyud 'grel): thob pas 'jigs pa lnga dang bral ba'i phyir ste/ mthong ba la brten nas/ bogs su 'gro ba'i rten gnas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad du/ bdun nyid rdzogs pas 'gro ba ste/ zhes 
602a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / ngal so ba las thams cad mthong // mi ldog pa la goms byar med// zhes snang ngo // bzhi pa dmigs pa 'bras bu skye ba'i sa ni/ bsgom pa'i lam ste/ 'drir gsang sngags kyi 
602a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung gis/ spyod yul mi dmigs mod kyi/ dmigs par tha snyad 'dogs te/ mthong ba'i don la blo shin tu mi dmigs pa yis/ 'bras bu 'byin pa'i gzhi'i phyir ste/ 'di skad du/ 
602a7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing // ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor ba'o// zhes snang ngo // lnga pa rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa ni/ rgyal tshab skyes bur gyur pa'i phyir dang / mthar phyin pa'i lam pa yin/ 
602a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ nus pa'i rtsa la rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas la sbyor bar byed pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad du/ phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal chen yin// mthong 
602b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas na bcu drug sa/ zhes snang bas/ cho 'phrul 'gyed nus shing phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin yang yin pa'i phyir ro// gnas skabs zhes pa/ rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dbang du/ gnas dang 
602b2(rgyud 'grel): skabs cig du ston ste/ bzhed tshig du/ yon tan mthong thos rkyen phrad dang // byin brlabs 'brel cing mtshungs ldan pas// g.yo sems 'byung zhing 'dun skye ba'i// dus kyi thad la bab 
602b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir skabs zhes bya'o// bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs gnyis pa'ang / 'di skad du/ g.yo smon rgyu yis bslab bcu la// der mi sdod par ldang sems kyis// bcu la 'jug pa'i bzhi dang 
602b4(rgyud 'grel): dus// thad du bab phyir ming thob pa'o// zhes bya'o// gsum pa ro myong ba'i skabs ni/ 'di skad du/ sems gsum rgyu yis bslab rdzogs nas// 'jug pa'i sems rgyus bden mthong ba// 
602b5(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin nyid kyi ro myong ba'i// gnas dus nges pas skabs su brjod zhes bya'o// bzhi pa yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs ni/ 'di skad du/ mthong ba'i shes yul nges pa la// dgra 
602b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang mi 'gyur lhag sems kyis// rang rig gnyis med mi g.yo bar// byed la 'jug pa'i skabs su smra zhes bya'o// lnga pa rtog chen la phebs pa'i gnas skabs ni// 'jug pa'i
602b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sngon sum rgyus// rang rig mngon sum rig sems skyes// yang dag don mthong thil phebs phyir// de la 'di skad brjod pa yin zhes bya'o// bshad rgyud kyi dbang du/ gnas dang 
602b8(rgyud 'grel): skabs so so ste/ de la gnas zhes pa/ 'dod pa grub pa mthar phyin pa'i gnas ni/ ji skad du/ rkyen gyi rnal 'byor bya byed dang // phyi ba'i rtags la ma rdzogs pa dang // 'di nyid sngar 
603a1(rgyud 'grel): spyad thams cad kyi// 'dod pa'i gsang lam rnyed pa ni// las mthar phyin pas 'dir phrad cing // de la brten phyir gnas su brjod zhes bya'o// gnyis pa bzod pa grub 'phags 
603a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas ni/ ji skad du/ yang dag don la mi slad bzod// de phyir rigs nges gzungs sngags yod// de phyir 'phags pa zhes bya ste// skye bo sa las 'das pa'i gnas/ zhes bya'o// gsum 
603a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bden pa grub pa yang dag pa'i gnas ni/ ji skad du/ sgo skur med pa'i gnyis med don// mthong ba mthar phyin mi bslu zhing // phyin ci ma log la brten phyir// dang po'i dbugs chen phyin pa'i
603a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ zhes byag// bzhi pa las su dra ba'i myur ba gnas ni/ dza skad du/ mthang nas gnas pa migs ba'i// gnyis med gas la la mig ma pa'i// ting 'dzin goms pas 'bras bAr gyur// mthar la mthob la ma ngag 
603a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zhes bya'o// lnga pa lhun gyis grub pa mnyam pa'i gnas ni/ ji skad du/ mthong goms stobs su gyur pa yis// 'bras bu thob pa'i skabs yin zhing // shing 'bras tshogs kyi dpe 
603a6(rgyud 'grel): lta bus// yon tan rdzogs pas blang dor med// zhes bya'o// skabs zhes pa lnga ste/ sems can gyi skabs ni/ ras ba la sa bon lta bu'i gzhi// g.yo bas sgra yi rnal 'byor gyi// bsgom 
603a7(rgyud 'grel): bya yid la byed pa'i gzhi// da dung ma nges dran tsam mo/ zhes bya'o// gnyis pa 'phags pa'i skabs ni/ ji skad du/ dad pas mos pas lam 'gro zhing // slob pa pa 'di bzod thob phyir// 
603a8(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes rigs des khyad par 'phags// yang dag rgyud du nges phyir ro// gsum pas thob pa'i skabs ni/ 'di skad du/ mi slob chos mig rdul bral zhing // dbugs chen byin nas mi ldog 
603b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// ting 'dzin thob pa'i dus nges phyir// de la mtshan du de skad brjod/ zhes bya'o// bzhi pa rigs 'dzin byang chub thob pa'i skabs ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen por/ 
603b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag phyir bzlog med gzhan don du// phyir 'ong rang dbang skye spyod phyir// rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tsho ba skabs zhes bya'o// lnga pa 'bras bu thob pa'i skabs ni/ ji skad du/ byang chub chen 
603b3(rgyud 'grel): por rdzogs sems skyes// rgyal tshab skyes bur rtsal rdzogs pa// lam du gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir// 'bras bu'i skabs zhes mtshan nges pa'o// zhes bya'o// ye shes dang zhes bya ba ni// mnyam 
603b4(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag pa re re la/ ye shes re re 'char ba'o zhes snang bas/ skabs lngar sems lnga bsgom shar gyi ye shes lnga ste/ ji skad du/ yang dag bden pa gnyis med don// yid byed g.yo yi ye shes dang // 
603b5(rgyud 'grel): bzod thob 'jug slob ye shes dang // ma nor mthong dga'i ye shes dang // de nyid mi 'gyur gnas ye shes// de mthar rdzogs sems ye shes so// zhes bya'o// bsgrib dang zhes pa 'di skad du// 
603b6(rgyud 'grel): so so thun mong ma yin pa'i// sgrib las zhes rtsi byed cing zhes snang bas/ lnga ste/ 'di skad du/ sa 'am rnal 'byor rnam lnga po// rang rang mthong la zhen pa yis// gong mgong ma ma mthong phyir/ 
603b7(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi dbye bas sgrib pa'ang lnga'o// zhes bya'o/ gol sa zhes pa/ 'di skad du/ thun mong rgyu yi lam lngar gol// khyad par sgrib la bltos tshul gyis// lam lnga gong dmigs 'og lta can/ 
603b8(rgyud 'grel): lhung nor byeng na sgra 'jug pa'o// zhes bya'o// rtog pa dang zhes pa ni/ ched du byas pa'i rtog pa ste/ 'di gad du/ sa lnga dang po tshig la rtog/ gnyis pa yi ge gsum pa ming // bzhi brda 
604a1(rgyud 'grel): tha snyad lnga par rtogs// bag chags lnga yod sbyong ba'i phyir// bltos na phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang // shes yul rnams la gnas phyir rtog/ zhes bya'o// spyod dang zhes pa ni// 
604a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi phyir spyod pa'ang skabs kyis bdag dang gzhan don du/ sngon 'byung dang rjes 'jug tshul du 'gyur ro// de la sa dang por ni/ rtsol ba dang tshogs kyi sa lam yin pa'i phyir// rtsol tshogs 
604a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la'ang shin tu 'bad// byin brlabs dbang sgyur thabs tshul gyis// gzhan don mtha' 'ga' stsol bas spyod// gnyis pa bdag phyir legs nyes la// gcod skyong stobs phyir shin du'ang // 
604a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson spyod dben las phyogs gcig spyod// slob spyod pa dag gzhan don kyang byed// gsum par mi dmigs shar ba yis// 'dod pa'i dngos po dbyings sbyor phyir// bdag phyir mi dmigs 
604a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan phyed du// 'khor lo skur bas gsang sngags ston// bzhi par bdag phyir rnal 'byor spyod// gzhan la phyir 'ongs yin phyir// rang dbang can du skye zhes nas// ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs 
604a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyor// lnga par ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs phyir// dbang skur thabs kyi spyod pa yis// cho 'phrul bzhi sogs sna tshogs ston// gdul bya smin cing 'khor lo'ang skor/ zhes bya'o// dam 
604a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig zhes bya ba/ skabs kyi ched du byed pa las// brtags kyi rtsa ba yan lag rnams// kun srung bye brag dang por ni// bdud lnga dgra bzhi bzlog pa dang // spyod pa rgyun nam bzhi la gnas// 
604a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dun cing yi rang ma nyams byed// gnyis pa bslab pa bcu byed las// mi 'da' bzod las mi nyams byed// gsum par lta ba'i dam tshig byed// mthong ba mi gnas brtson par byed// 
604b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas// nam mkha' lta bu'i dam tshig srung / zhes gsungs so// bzhi par ting nge 'dzin gyi so nyid las/ mi nyams ma yengs mi 'da' ba'o// 'di skad du// 
604b2(rgyud 'grel): brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsnga ma/ zhes gsungs te/ gzhan du ni/ phyir 'ong bar dam bcas pa gang yin pa'o// lnga par med dang phyal pa cig pu dang / lhun 
604b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub pa rnam bzhi pa'o// ting 'dzin dang zhes pa'ang lnga ste/ rnam par mi rtog lha sgom pa'ang // gang rung dang por yid la byed// gnyis pa 'phro 'du gcig pa dang // gsum pa yongs su mi ldog 
604b4(rgyud 'grel): cing // bzhi par de bzhin nyid bsgom dang // lnga par kun tu snang ba sgom// de phyir rnal 'byor rnal 'byor yin/ zhes bya'o// dus dang zhes pa'ang ste/ gosang sngags yid la byed tsam yod// 
604b5(rgyud 'grel): de phyir dran pa thob par smra// gsang ba'i bslab bcu thob pa'i dus// gnyis med rtogs pa thob pa'i dus// de nyid bsgoms pa goms pa'i dus// de mngon gyur pas mthar phyin dus// 
604b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ dngos grub zhes pa/ dang po 'dod pa grub pa dang // gnyis pa bzod pa grub pa dang // gsum pa bden grub bzhi pa las// rung ba grub pa'o// lnga pa ni/ lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 
604b7(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'o// 'on te dang po gnyis pa ni/ dmigs pa grub pa'o// gsum pa ni/ don dam bcud kyi rnam shes rgyas// bzhi pa 'khor ba'i dbyings su 'grub// lnga pa thams cad 'grub par 
604b8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// mthar phyin dang zhes pa/ dge ba'i las mtha' gsang sngags la// 'dir phrad dang po gnyis pa ni// bslab mtha' bcu la slob phyir ro/ gsum pa mthong mthar gsang sngags 
605a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong // de rgyus bzhi par gsang sngags don// mthong ba goms bya de nyid mthar// phyin pa'o lnga par mthar lam 'bras// rdzogs phyir 'bras bu kun gyi mthar// 
605a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsal chen rdzogs pa thob pa'o// lta ba'i khyad par zhes pa lnga ste// dang po 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni/ g.yo smon gyis gsang sngags la nyan dbang nos nas/ slob du zad kyang / tshig gi tshogs 
605a3(rgyud 'grel): ba sgra'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir/ blo sman pas gsang sngags kyi don tshig tu smra zhing / mthong ba med de/ yid la byed pa'i lta ba'o// 'on kyang phyogs las da dung bzod pa'ang ma thob bo// / 
605a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang 'di skad du/ brtsal ba las kyi rnal 'byor pas// 'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor la// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po// shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dmas pas// ting 'dzin 
605a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsal yang chung ba ste// don la mthong bar mi 'gyur bas/ zhes gsungs so// rigs chen 'byed pa'i lta ba ni/ bcu yis sa gsum 'dus pa ste/ 'dir byed nas/ slob pa bcu'i tshe
605a6(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa thob ste/ bden pa rnam gnyis dbyer med pa bstan pa la/ mi skrag cing slar spyod pas/ rang rig mtshan nyid du thos bsam gyi sgo nas shes te/ 'di skad du/ don la mi skrag po 
605a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshar skye// dpyod sems 'jug pa'i sems dpa' de// ngan song mi ldog dgon par 'jug/ zhes gsungs so// dbugs chen 'byin pa'i lta ba ni/ sa lnga par bsgoms pas chos nyid
605a8(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bar mthong ste/ mi ldog pa'i lta ba'o// de yang ngal so ba las thams cad mthong // zhes gsungs so// lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lta ba ni/ mi g.yo ba'i lta ba ste/ de ltar/ 
605b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'o// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i lta ba ni/ rang 'byung ye shes su bsgoms pas mngon du 'gyur ba ste/ 'di skad du/ rang 'byung rang rig mngon sum snang dus na// rang 'byung ye shes 
605b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mthong zhes bya/ zhes gsungs so// la la dag ni 'di skad du/ lta ba lnga ni shes pa lnga// gsang sngags 'dod pa 'dam shes dang // rnam par shes pa bslab bcu dang / 
605b3(rgyud 'grel): bzod thob rang gi mtshan nyid shes// thams cad ma skyes ye shes dang // de las yongs su mi g.yor shes// shes pa chen po kun tu snang // mthong ba dam pa'i lta ba yin zhes 
605b4(rgyud 'grel): smra'o// gnas 'gyur rnams zhes pa/ skabs lnga kun gzhi lnga bag chags lnga dang bcas pa gnas 'gyur ba ste/ dran pa thob pa'i dus sems can gyi skabs su skye bo'i shes pa ma 
605b5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa las sems g.yo ba 'byung bas/ lam gyi gzhir gyur pas rkyen gyis bsgyur ba las kyi bag chags gnas te/ skyong zhing 'dod pa shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang po'o// spyod pa 
605b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i dus 'phags pa'i skabs su bslab pa bcu yang dag pa'i don la sbyor ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba bdun pa'i kun gzhir 'gyur ste/ mngon du rgyu ba gnas te sbyong ngo // rtogs pa thob pa'i 
605b7(rgyud 'grel): dus sa thob pa'i skabs su// 'og gi 'bad pas bden pa mthong ba'i phyir// snang ba don gyi kun gzhir gnas 'gyur ste// de'i tshe kun du rgyu'i bag chags gnas te sbyong ba'o// rigs 
605b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin byang chub sems dpa'i skabs goms pa thob pa'i dus su/ mthong ba la goms pas sems mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ 'gyur med gnas pa'i kun gzhir gnas 'gyur ste/ bag chags 
606a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas de spong ba'o// mthar phyin pa'i dus byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa'i skabs su/ sngar goms pas mngon du gyur pa'i phyir/ btsal med 
606a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i kun gzhir gnas 'gyur ste/ bag la nyal gnas pa sbyong ba'o// zhes 'chad na/ kho bo ni dang po rigs ma nges pa dang / chos nyid ma shes pa'i phyir der 'gyur zhes mi 'dogs pa'i phyir/ dang 
606a3(rgyud 'grel): po nas gnyis par 'gyur ba nas/ lnga pa nas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang lnga ste/ lam lngar rang rig ting nge 'dzin brtan pas/ ye shes skyes pas sgrib pa re sbyangs pa skad cig ma phyi ma la lam 
606a4(rgyud 'grel): lngar skabs lnga'i phyir/ kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas// bye brag lam lnga'i chos su bshad/ zhes gsungs so// bag chags lnga ni sgrib pa lngar yang gsungs te/ de dag ni rgyu 'bras kyi 
606a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir khyad par yod de/ 'di skad du/ de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis// snga ma snga ma gang dang gang // phyi ma phyi ma smin pa'i rgyu// de bzhin kun tu 'khor bar 'byung / zhes gsungs te/ 'chad pa'i 
606a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu po'ang rgyu 'bras su 'gyur bar dgongs so// yang sa bcur bshad pa bya ba ni/ sa dang zhes pa/ 'gyur dbang ma nges pa'i sa dang / rten pa gzhi'i sa dang / gal chen sbyong ba'i sa dang / 
606a7(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa rgyun gyi sa dang / bsod nams gter gyi sa dang / rten pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa dang / dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang / gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang / bdal ba chos nyid kyi 
606a8(rgyud 'grel): sa dang / rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa'o// de yang bcur bstan pa ni/ gsang sngags rim 'jug gi 'bring gi yul lo// gzhi bcur de las spros pa ni/ tha ma'i dbang du gsungs pa'o// de las lnga 
606b1(rgyud 'grel): ni lnga'i skabs su bshad de/ sngar lnga'i skabs su ma bshad pa rnams cung zhig du dkrol ba ni gang zhe na/ dang po gnyis pa rten pa bzhi'i sa ni/ 'di skad du/ dang po gsang ba'i bslab pa la// rtsol 
606b2(rgyud 'grel): bar sbyong ba la brten nas// dang po'i las kyi rnal 'byor ste// sa rnams kun gyi gzhi rten no// zhes gsungs so// gal chen bshad zin to// de'i cha bslab pa rgyun gyi sa ni/ 'dir bslab pa 
606b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu la zhugs nas mi gtong bar rgyun du 'bad pas bogs su byed pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad du/ bslab pa'i mtha' bcu mthar phyin cing // ji ltar zla ba yang gsal bzhin// bslab 
606b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te// zhes gsungs te/ bsod nams gter gyis ni/ 'di skad du/ bslab pa bcu mthar phyin pa yi// bsod nams yon tan zad mi shes// slob pas mthar phyin 
606b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i sa// mthong lam thob la ma rag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// drug pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pa gsum bshad zin to// dgu pa lnga pa las 'phros pa bdal ba chos nyid ni/ rang gi 
606b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gzhi'i chos nyid dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa des bgos pa med par kun khyab par rtogs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// de yang yul don ye shes de sbyar bas/ shes par byas pa 
606b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdzogs/ zhes gsungs so// bcu pa rdzogs pa spyir cheb pa ni/ 'di skad du/ bcu pa'i tha ma dang po las// mthar rdzogs kun gyi rtog yin te// klong yangs nam mkha'i snying po la// 
606b8(rgyud 'grel): sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal// cing snang ci'ang ma yin pa'i// mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo las// ji ltar bltas dgu der snang bas// theg mchog spyi rgya rlabs kyis bshad/ zhes gsungs so// 
607a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs zhes pa de gnyis kun 'dus ltar/ gnas skabs bcur yang sbyar te/ 'dun pa skye ba'i gnas skabs dang / zhes pa la sogs pas mngon no// dgongs
607a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dus ltar so sor bshad na/ dang po bshad zin to/ gnyis pa'i gnas ni/ rten pa grub pa lam gyi gnas te/ lam rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa bshad zin to// bzhi pa ni bzod/ 
607a3(rgyud 'grel): pa grub pa slob pa'i gnas te/ zab mo'i don la bzod pa thob pas/ ye shes 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ bslab pa bcu la slob pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa bslab pa grub pa rtser cheb pa'i
607a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas de bslab pa bcu khong du chud cing rtser chi ba pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro// drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa bshad zin to// rdeng du gyur pa chos nyid kyi gnas dgu par/ bsgoms par phebs pa
607a5(rgyud 'grel): stobs su gyur pa de 'dir chos nyid rdeng du gyur pa'i phyir ro// bcu pa 'bras bu grub pa rdzogs pa'i gnas ni/ mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro// skabs zhes pa/ dang po bshad/ gnyis pa rtsol ba sbyor 
607a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skabs te/ smon pas slob pa la rtsol ba'i phyir ro// gsum pa bshad/ bzhi pa 'du shes 'gyur ba'i skabs ni/ rigs byed pas sbyor ba'i sems kyis 'du shes yang dag pa'i ye shes su 
607a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ ye shes 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa sbyor chen la 'jug pa'i skabs ni/ bslab bcus chib pas thos bsam gyis mthong ba'i don bsgom pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro// drug pa bdun
607a8(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad pa bshad zin to// dgu pa rdeng du gyur pa'i skabs te/ rtags chen thob pa'i phyir ro// bcu pa las su rung ba'i zhabs te/ rdzogs sems skyes pa'i bskyed du bya ba'i lam med pa'i 
607b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// ye shes dang zhes pa sngar brjod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ skabs bcur sems bcu skyes pas sems dang chos 'phrad pa'i ye shes grol thar pa thang re'o// de la dang po brjod zin/ smon 
607b2(rgyud 'grel): pas khong du chud 'dod pa'i// bden gnyis mgo mthong yid la byed// smon pa'i ye shes gong ma'i rgyu// de rgyus der mi brtan par ldang // bden gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid du// shes pa gcod skyong
607b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yi// bslab pa'i ye shes ye shes gsum// bzhi pa de rgyus sbyor sems kyis// lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med don// thos la mi skrag spyod cing 'phel// bzod thob ye shes phyi 
607b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rgyu// lnga pa de chus ye shes skyes// bden pa dbyer med thos bsams kyis// go ba'i don la 'jug sems pas// mthong la sbyor ba'i ye shes so// drug dang bdun pa brjod zin te/ 
607b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad par 'di skad du/ mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad kun// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal/ zhes gsungs te/ rig pa'i sems kyis mnyam nyid mthong ba'i ye shes so// dgu 
607b6(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa'i sems kyis dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i don shar ba ste/ 'di skad du/ srid pa'i sems can thams cad dang // thar pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun// so sor thams 
607b7(rgyud 'grel): cad snang ba ste// kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal/ zhes gsungs so// bcu pa rdzogs pa'i sems kyis rang 'byung ye shes rdzogs par shar ba ste/ 'di skad du/ sa chu me rlung sdod pa nud
607b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams// kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid don// chos nyid don las gzhan med pa// rang 'byung ye shes gsal ba'o// zhes gsungs so// sgrib dang zhes pa bcu ste/ sa 'og ma bcus gong
608a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lta ba rnams yul du ma gyur bar brjod zin te/ yang las kyi bka chags phra rags ni/ gnyis pa dang po dag la bsgrib// mngon du rgyu ba rab 'bring gsum// gsum pa 
608a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang lnga la sgrib// kun tu d+ha ba drug pa ste// lhan cig skyes pa bdun la gnas// bag la nyal ba phra rags 'bring // brgyad dang dgu dang bcu la gnas/ zhes gsungs so// gol sa zhes pa/ 
608a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du/ rgyu yi tshogs dang drod rtse mo// bzod dang 'jig rten chos mchog dang // mthong sgom mthar lam rnams su gol// yang na 'og ma 'og ma nyid/ zhes gsungs so// rtog pa dang 
608a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa bcu ste/ 'di skad du/ bag chags lnga yi phra rags bcu// sa bcur ldan pas chos nyid la// ched du byed dang phyag rgya yang // khyon dang 'phro 'du'i rtog sogs bcu/ zhes gsung so// 
608a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang zhes pa bcu ste/ dang po bshad zin to// gnyis pa ni 'di skad du/ bslab pa sbyong dang nges pa la/ dag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o// zhes 'byung bas/ phra men gyi spyod pa'o// gsum
608a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bshad zin to// bzhi pa ni ngal song mi ldog dgon par 'jug/ bar chad dag kyang de las 'byung / zhes gsungs pas/ phyogs cig pa sgom pa'i spyod pa'o// lnga pa ni/ spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 
608a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor yin/ zhes 'byung bas/ rgyun gyi spyod pa'o// drug pa ni/ bdag don shes rab dang mthun pa'o// gzhan don du 'di skad du/ sgyu mas sbyong ba'i skyes bu de// 'khor lo ltung ba'i cha byad du// 
608a8(rgyud 'grel): rin ce na bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis// dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston/ zhes gsungs so// bdun pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o// zhes 'byung ba bdag don gzhan don du 'di gang du/ de bas skyes 
608b1(rgyud 'grel): bu dam pa de// 'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas// lam gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te/ gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar 'dod par thabs mchog sbyor/ zhes gsungs so// brkyang 
608b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag don sbyor ba'i spyod pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin mang po la bsgom pa'i phyir ro// gzhan don du/ 'di skad du/ de bas rgyal tshab skyes bu de// chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi// gdung 'tsho ba
608b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ldan theg chen ston/ mi gnas bcu dus cho 'phrul snang / zhes gsungs so// dgu pa ni/ sgyu ma'ang sgyu ma yin spyod pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ ye shes sgyu ma'i spyod pa'o// ban+da 
608b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i spyod pa'o// yang kun 'dus las/ sa brgyad 'di skad du/ sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang // ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed// rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog/ 
608b5(rgyud 'grel): spyad par bya ba'i las yin no// zhes gsungs so// dgu pa ni/ thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas// ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las// dngos su spyod pa thams cad bya// de ni dam tshig
608b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po yin/ zhes gsungs so// bcu pa ni/ spyod dang spyod pa bya med pas// srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i// spyod par snang ba thams cad kun// lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod do// zhes 
608b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// dam tshig zhes pa bzhed tshig las// rang rang spyod las mi 'da' ba'i// dam bca' ba cu ni dam tshig go/ zhes gsungs/ de'i phyir dang po bshad zin to// gnyis pa rtsol ba 
608b8(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da'/ bzhi pa bslab pa las mi 'da'/ lnga pa 'jug sgom las mi 'da'// dgu pa chos nyid dam tshig gsum// brgyad pa dngos po bzhi la spyod pa las mi 'da'// bcu pa bzhi las 
609a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da'o// brgyad pa 'di skad du/ 'dod pas chags pas 'joms pa dang // gti mug nga rgyal phag dog rnams// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste/ don dang ldan pa'i skyes 
609a2(rgyud 'grel): bus spyod// dgu pa ni/ dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na/ rtogs pa dam pas dam tshig ste// rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa// de ni dam tshig chen po'o// bcu pa ni/ med pa byal ba cig pu 
609a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che// 'di zhes ris su chad med pa// 'di ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin zhes pa'ang bcu ste// dang po yid la byed 
609a4(rgyud 'grel): thob nas// gnyis pa de goms brtan pa'o// gsum pa 'phro 'du gcig pa thob// bzhi pa de goms lnga par brtan// drug par mi ldog bdun de nyid// brgyad par kun snang thob nas ni/ 
609a5(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa goms nas bcu par ni// de brtan las su rung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// slob dpon bde bar gsal mdzad kyis ni/ 'di skad du/ dang po yid la byed pa ste// rten pas yon// 
609a6(rgyud 'grel): tan 'byung gzhi'i phyir// rin chen myu gu'i ting 'dzin thob// gsum pa nyes pa gcod skyong phyir// dug 'joms sman gyi ting nge 'dzin// bzhi pa bar chad 'byung ba'i phyir// rtse cig 'phro ba'i 
609a7(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin// lnga pa bsod nams gtor gyi phyir// tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// drug pa chos mig rdul bral phyir// mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms pas yon 
609a8(rgyud 'grel): tan 'byung ba yi// mi bzad mdzad ni bdun pa'o// brgyad pa cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i phyir// 'byung chen sprul pa'i ti nge 'dzin// dgu pa chos nyid bdal ba'i phyir// rnam dag dbyings kyi 
609b1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin// bcu par ma lus lhun rdzogs phyir// thams cad rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // snang gsal ye mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin/ zhes gsungs pa'o// dus dang zhes pa/ lnga ni bshad 
609b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang yang mthun no// bzhed tshig las/ dang po rjes su yi rang phyir// 'dun pa skye ba'i dus zhes bya// gnyis pa slob pa la brtson phyir// rtsol ba sbyor ba'i dus nyid de// gsum pa 
609b3(rgyud 'grel): gal chen sbyong ba'i phyir// bslab pa 'jug pa'i dus su brjod// bzhi pa rigs chen 'byed pa'i phyir// bslab gnas 'du shes 'gyur ba'i dus// lnga pa mthong don sbyor ba'i phyir// sbyong chen 
609b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i dus chen yin// drug pa thams cad mthong ba'i phyir// dang po dbugs chen phyin pa'i dus// bdun po de don gams bya'i phyir// yul la 'jug pa'i dus su brjod// brgyad pa ngas 
609b5(rgyud 'grel): don bebs pa'i phyir// rtogs chen nyid la phebs pa'i dus// dgu pa de stobs gyur pa'i phyir// rdeng du gyur pa'i dus zhes bya// bcu pa shin tu mthar phyin phyir// las rung tha ma'i dbugs 
609b6(rgyud 'grel): phyin dus/ zhes gsungs so// dngos grub zhes pa'ang bcu ste// sa bcu 'og ma 'og ma yis// gong ma gong ma thob pa nyid// skabs kyi rgyu 'bras yod pa'i phyir// gnas skabs zhugs 
609b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub bo// 'di ltar yang 'chad de/ dang pos 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang // gnyis pas sbyor ba'i dngos grub dang // gsum pas sbyong spyod dngos grub dang // bzhi pas drod rtags dngos 
609b8(rgyud 'grel): grub dang // lnga par bslab rdzogs dngos grub dang // drug par rtogs pa 'grub pa dang // bdun pa mi g.yo thob pa dang // brgyad par cho 'phrul 'grub pa dang // dgu par ye shes sgyu ma 'grub// 
610a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu par rang 'byung ye shes nyid// zhes gsungs so// mthar phyin dang zhes pa/ 'dun pa'i nang nas 'dir 'dun dang // 'bras bu 'dun phyir mthar phyin pa'o// de bzhin
610a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsol ba thams cad kyi// mchog 'di rtsol ba mthar phyin pa'o// nges don grub la brtson pa'i phyir// brtson pa'i mthar phyin gsum par thob// bzod pa'i nang nas mchog 'gyur phyir// gsang don
610a3(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa mthar byin mchog/ bslab pa lhag pa bcu nyid phyir// bslab pa mthar byin lnga pa nyid// gnyis med bden rtogs mchog yin phyir// drug pas mthong ba mthar phyin no// rang rig don 
610a4(rgyud 'grel): goms mchog yin phyir// bdun par ting 'dzin goms mthar phyin// de nyid stobs kyis rang rig pa// rig pa'i nang na mthar phyin pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med la// rig pa rder gyur 
610a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas mthar phyin// thams cad rang 'byung klong brdal phyir// gong na med pa'i 'bras mthar phyin// zhes gsungs so// lta ba'i khyad par zhes pa/ dang po tshig tshogs sgra'i rnal 'byor yin 
610a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ tshig tsam lta ba'o// gnyis pa lhag pa'i bden pa gnyis// yid la byed pa'i lta ba'o// gsum pas bden gnyis rang mtshan du// mgo mthong gnyis med bzod pa thob// bzhi pa 
610a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa la// mi skrag spel byed g.yo dang thob// lnga par bslab bcu spyir chib pas// gnyis med thag chod de la 'jug/ drug pa de rgyus ji bzhin mthong // de yang 'di skad du/ rgyud 
610a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid las// chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba// des ni yang dag bden pa mthong / zhes gsungs so// badrin 
610b1(rgyud 'grel): pa de nyid goms pa yis// mi g.yo lta ba shes rab can// brgyad par rang rig 'bras bu sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid du goms pa'i rgyus mthong ste/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas sems can thams 
610b2(rgyud 'grel): cad dang // dngos por brtags pa thams cad kun// don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste// de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ zhes gsungs so// dgu par dbyings dang ye shes yab yum dbyer med pa'i 
610b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po rdeng du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings// bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'// 'byung 'jug rig pas longs spyod ste// 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig yin zhes 
610b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// bcu pa'i lta ba bza' gtad dang bral ba ste/ 'di skad du/ ma spangs bzhin du lhun grub pas// dbyer med pa ni chos kyi dbyings// dbyings las gzhan du lta yul med// 
610b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig go/ zhes gsungs so// gnas 'gyur rnams zhes pa/ lnga'i bzlas bcur 'gyur te/ bzhed tshig las/ sa bcur sems bcur skyes pa yis// ting 'dzin 
610b6(rgyud 'grel): stobs bstan ye shes re// shar pa'i skad cig snga ma yis// rang rang sgrib bcom phyi ma la// gong nas gong du sangs rgyas pa// gnas 'gyur bcu la lam stegs bcu/ zhes gsungs so// 
610b7(rgyud 'grel): 'on ste kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur ba ni/ skye bo nas 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor du/ gnas 'gyur na'ang / de bzhin gshegs par rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma la bag la nyal/ rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes 
610b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom nas/ phyi ma la sku lnga mngon du bya ste/ brten du bar gnas 'gyur ba dang drug du 'gro bas/ kun bzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas/ bye brag la ma lnga'i chos su snang / zhes pa dang 'gal/ 
611a1(rgyud 'grel): 'on te 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas ma 'gyur ro zhe na'ang / 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa la/ yid la byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lha'i sku rang gi chag tshad tsam du phyogs pa dang / 
611a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i sems skyes pa/ glegs bam bcu gnyis kyi dbang thob pas/ bdag nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i lhas mthong bas/ de dag skye bo la med la/ sa 'di pa la yod pa'i phyir/ gnas ma 'gyur na 
611a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa dang 'gal lo/ zhes the tsom skye ba la/ de 'di ltar bcad par bya ste/ de ltar snang mod kyi/ 'dun pa pa ni skye bo las 'phags mod kyang / der gnas 'gyur zhes mi bya ste/ skye bo'i tshe rgyu rkyen med pa 
611a4(rgyud 'grel): ma yin yang / nges pa'i shes pas sbyangs pas/ 'dun pa thob pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ der gnas 'gyur na/ gnas 'gyur 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i dang drug du 'gyur bas/ gong du lngas zhes pa'i lung dang yang 
611a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gal/ rigs pas lam lngar gnas 'gyur nas rtsal chen rdzogs par brjod na/ de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin yin gyi/ rgyal ba sangs rgyas nyid ma yin pa'i phyir/ rgyal bar 'gyur dgos 
611a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ rigs pa dang 'gal lo// de'i phyir 'dun pa pa de/ chos nyid la da dung bzed pa tsam yang ma thob ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir/ skye bo las 'phags kyang gnas 'gyur zhes mi bya'o// des 
611a7(rgyud 'grel): na 'dun par mos pa'i lha bstan par bsgoms pas/ mthu brtan tsam na/ 'du shes klungs su zhugs pas las bag chags bsra bas bkag sbyangs nas/ sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi thob pa gnas 
611a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba dang po'o// de bzhin du sa 'og nas gong du 'gyur bzhin/ rtsal chen nas bder gshegs su 'gyur ba dang lnga'o// de'i phyir 'dun pa nas yang sangs rgyas su kun gzhi lnga gnas lan lngar 'gyur 
611b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir lam lngar snang ste/ der 'gyur ba byas pa'o// des na gong gi lung nyid dang mi 'gal la// mthar sangs rgyas chen po nyid du gnas 'gyur bas// rigs pa dang yang mi 'gal lo// dka' 
611b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grel rgyud kyi skabs tshig dka' ba bkrol// lung dang rigs pas mdun ba su rgyab sbyar nas// dka' bas bsdus pa'i dge rtsa ci mchis pa// mtha' yas rgyud la smin cing grol thob shog/ slob 
611b3(rgyud 'grel): dpon stir ma stis sbyar ba'i/ skabs 'grel bye brag rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po las can rnal 'byor las/ 
611b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bcu po rnams// yi ge rtog spyod don la 'jug/ de 'dir nges pa rnam gnyis kyis// don 'jug byang chub ljon pa'i shing // bskyed phyir legs par bstan par bya'o// 
611b5(rgyud 'grel): de la blo gros zhe na can phyir// shes rab thabs kyis nges gsungs pa'i// thog mar blo gros ldan pa yis// so sor rtog pa mngon 'gro bas// mtha' bcu slob cing de nyid la// ngo bo nges tshig 
611b6(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa dang // gal po re'ang tshes rtags dang // ldan pas de 'dir thag bcad dgos// de yis don du 'gyur gzhi'i phyir// gnas dang cha rkyen ldan byas nas// sngon 'gro las rnams rdzogs byas 
611b7(rgyud 'grel): te// ljon shing bskyed pa'i las la 'bad// rnal 'byor lnga'ang khyad par las// rnal 'byor chen po'i skabs bcu sems// snga ma phyi ma rgyu 'bras tshul// gyur pa bcu drug rgyan gyis rdzogs// 
611b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dun pa skye ba'i skabs dag la// mun pa'i sprin las skar phran gzer// snang ba lta bur gsal ba yis// don mchog thos dang rtog dpyad pas// lhag pa'i gsang ba'i bden gnyis tshul// 
612a1(rgyud 'grel): rang min spyi yi mtshan nyid du// sbal brten nas g.yos la bsgom// bdag don 'jug pa dang po'i tshe// bying rgod la sogs gnyen pos spong // nyams gsum mtha'
612a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug pa'i drug/ nang du dubs gzer 'phro mthong // nyer mtshon rtags tshul gnyi kar sbyar// stsol ba stong ba'i skabs dag la// mtha' bcu nyid la 'jug par stso la// g.yo yi rgyu 
612a3(rgyud 'grel): yis chos rnams kun// bden gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid du// rtogs par smon pas khyad par phyir// ma nges sems las lhag par bsgom// de tshe dang mtshan nyams rims mthi'// 
612a4(rgyud 'grel): skar ma phal pa rab rib mthong // dang po las kyi rnal 'byor 'di// yang dag tshel la brtson bya dgos// sems skyen g.yeng spong bsnun byas nas// ngan song las rnams gcod par 'gyur// 
612a5(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// mtha' bcur zhugs te gcod sbyong zhing // de tshe lhag pa'i bden gnyis kyang // sman rgyu bcu rkyen ldan pa yis// gnyis med rtogs pa g.yo zhing ldang / 
612a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med rang gi mtshan nyid du// ldang ba'i sems bsgoms 'phel stobs kyis// me gzer skar chen lta bu'ang mthong // 'du shes 'gyur ba'i skabs dag la// bcu mthar gnas pas 'du 
612a7(rgyud 'grel): shes kyang // don la bzod pa thob par 'gyur// gnyis med don la sbyor sems skye// yul dang dbang po rnams shes chos// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// rang rig snang phyir snang kun 
612a8(rgyud 'grel): sems// yul med sems kyang dbyings mdog mtshan// yod mod bral bas rigs rgyud min// de phyir ma skyes snang stong mtha'// dbyer med bsgom pa'i nyams mtha' la// 'gal med 
612b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo zla tshes snang // sbyor chen 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// ngan song mi ldog sngon thob cing // mtha' bcu rtser chi ba gnyis med don// rtogs mthar phyin la ma rag pa// bstan pas de don 
612b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug sems skye// nyams gsum mtha' la sgren me'am// zla tshes gnyis pa'i rtags mthong 'gyur// dbugs phyin mthong la ma rag kyang // le los yul la ma brtson na// mthong lam
612b3(rgyud 'grel): mi thob lha mi yi// gnas bzlog zag pas ba cung zad 'khor// ba sgrub pa'i rigs 'dzin gang de la'ang // bdag gi don 'jug sum cu gnyis// rang rang shes 'jug 'byor pa sngon// tshe la thos
612b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bzhir skabs la'ang sbyar// 'on mod kyang sems lnga yi// rim pa ji bzhin khyad par 'gyur// ro myong ba'i skabs dag la// dga' ba lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// ci phyir sngon du bcu mthar 
612b5(rgyud 'grel): bas// mnyan bsam bsgoms las chos nyid do// ma myong ma mthong sus shes myong // chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas 
612b6(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong gang mthong ba// des ni yang dag bden pa mthong // 'jigs pa lnga bral bde ba'i sems// bsgom pa bum pa mar me'i tshul// de nyid mthong dang chos gsum mthong // de nyid 
612b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'i khyad par gyis// spyod la ma dngos gzhir gang spyad kyang // 'ching bar mi 'gyur grol 'gyur thabs// thams cad der sbyangs la ma gnas mchog/ yul la 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// 
612b8(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur lhag pa'i sems 'byung ba/ ji ltar ji bzhin nyid mthong nas// shes rab dngos yul de nyid la// rnal 'byor yang dag 'dzeg pa'i tshe// gnyis med rang gi mi g.yo bar// mthong lam 
613a1(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed dang bral ba// phra mo'i bying rgod dbang 'gyur bral// shin tu mi g.yo'i sems ldan pas// bzhi pa'i ri bong can mthong 'phel// lam byas pa yi snga ltas dag/ 
613a2(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung chen po'i rtags mtshig nye// gdul bya'i 'dod pa ji lta bar// phyir 'ong sngon dang smad 'tshong ston// rtog chen dag gi skabs dag la// rig pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// rnal 'byor 
613a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag 'dzeg pa'i rgyus// dngos gnyis sems kyi cho 'phrul phyir// bdag nyid chen po gsal bar rig/ rnal 'byor yul 'das rig pa yi// mngon sum skabs kyis byas pa'i phyir// lam
613a4(rgyud 'grel): rim rjed chung rtags chen po// rang 'byung ye shes nye bar bstan// gdung 'tshogs dga' ldan theg chen ston// rdeng du gyur pa'i skabs dag la// gnas pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ba'ang // chos 
613a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang rig dbyings kyi rtsal snang phyir// yul don ye shes de sbyar bas// shes par bya ba thams cad rdzogs// bde chen stobs ldan the tshom med// spyod yul 
613a6(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid bad la gnas pa// rab 'byung ye shes rtogs thob pas// don gsal brtan pa'i sgron me 'dra// de mthong brgyad pa'i skar 'dzin mtho'o// rtags chen ye shes grub phyir thob// las
613a7(rgyud 'grel): su rung ba'i skabs dag la// rdzogs pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// ci phyir mtha' bcu sa bcu yi// spyir chi ba chos kun rang rig nyid// rang 'byung rang snad rgyu rkyen bral// de nyid ma 'dres 
613a8(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs// ye shes dbyings zhes bya ba'i don// tha snyad tsam du rtogs chud nas// thams cad rdzogs pa spyir cheb pas// tha ma'i dbugs chen 'di tshe 'byung // mnyam bzhag 
613b1(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhag skad las 'das// rang rig mngon sum chen po che// sa bcu rnal 'byor phra mo rnams// rang sems cig la g.yo thob brtan// rim pas gsal dang mi gsal ba'i// stobs kyis 
613b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'gyur ba yin// rdzogs sems de rjes gsum rim gyis// klong yangs chub la mngon sangs rgyas// ji snyed nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// mngon byas ngo bo nyid sku thob// 'dus byas 
613b3(rgyud 'grel): sku sogs lngar snang sgrol// 'dus ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas so// phyed snang gnas dang chags can phyir// g.ye ma la g.ye ma ston chags la chags// ji ltar dug gis dug nad ltar// thabs
613b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi chags pas nges bya'i phyir// chags chus gsang sems shing skyed pa'ang // bsnyen sgrub bzhi sogs bdag don ldan// mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum// dka' bas btsal la 
613b5(rgyud 'grel): chags pas brten// 'dod yon lnga yis mchod byas te// gnyis su med par nan tan bya// bcas dka' bral ba'i bkra shis gnas// btsal la sngon du byas rnams la// bsnyen pa 
613b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gi dus su ni// gang zag mi yi zas la brten// nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i tshe na ni// bcud kyi mchog gis 'tsho byas te// dam phog chos bshad bslabs bskul sogs// legs byas 
613b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis gsum 'tshes bya// phan tshun sngol mas 'bad byas te// de nas dbang po bsrub pa yis// mtshon byas shing bcu bskyed brtag bya// de de'i rim pa 'di lta ste// bde ba'i 
613b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rdzogs rig ma la// mthong bas 'dun skye g.yo ba ste// lus kun la gnas thig le nyid// rdul bya phal po g.yo bar byed// sems rtsol 'dod pa rtse cig gis// smon nas cho 'phrul 
614a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug byed pa// 'bring po rtsa yi thig le ni// rdul 'dus sro ma'i mtshan nyid 'byung // tha mal pa ru de brjod do// phrad pa'i reg pas cha pra ba'i// rdul phran 
614a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan par gyur pa'i mthus// dngul chu lta bu'i nyungs kar ni// bltos pas chen por nges par 'gyur// de nyid bde ba'i lam slebs pas// stsol bral bde bar blo sbyar ba// thig 
614a3(rgyud 'grel): le ngo bo zla gcig tshul// gang zhig rtags 'dzin stsol bcas skabs// gzung 'dzin tshe 'phrul sems bcu pa// thig le dngos dang ye shes kyang // cung zad kyis 'phags kun la blta// / 
614a4(rgyud 'grel): cung zad byed 'das bde ba myong // spros pa nyer zhi dga' ba'i mchog/ chas thos pa sa na gsum nyid de// gzugs dang ye shes de bzhin shes// bde ba chos kyi mi dmigs yul// 
614a5(rgyud 'grel): gar mthong ngo bo 'gyur med de// rim pa je zhi je zhi ba// mtshan nyid gnyis 'phags de bzhin no// stong nyid mi g.yo rnam rtog ste// rang rig ngo bo rang gsal ba// rdul phran lnga pa mya 
614a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das// rtse mo dbus su gang gnas sems// goms pa rdeng dang bcas pa ni// ye shes tshogs kyi bcu drug byed// phyed rdzogs tshegs 'phel de phan chad// mi dmigs tshes la 
614a7(rgyud 'grel): blo sbyangs yin// je zhi je bra mi dmigs pa// mtshan ma shes bya ba srabs pa ste// mnyam pas stong par gyur pas na// thams cad tshes skur rdzogs pa'o// gang zhig 'dren pa'i 
614a8(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ni// las su bya ba kun grub phyir// stsal bya stsol byed gnyis rdzogs pa// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas na// mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu drug gos// zla dkyil 'od kyi phyag rgya la/ 
614b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pas spras pa'i bde ba de// bcu drug tshogs kyi bsod nams spun// dus de nyid du nyi zla 'char// mtha' rdzogs sems su rgyal bas gsungs// de ltar nyams dang 'phrod ldan nas// 
614b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa dag gi dus su ni// khams las gyur pa'i bcud kyis 'tsho// rdo rje rtse gcig lta bur 'gyur// bsgrub pa chen por zag pa zad// kham gyi zas dang bral 'gyur yang // dbang po gzi mdangs 
614b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol 'gyur zhing // nam mkha' 'gro bar the tsom med// cho 'phrul bzhi sogs ston par nus// mthar rdzogs rgyas la the tsom med// byang chub sems kyi chu med na// rgyal ba rnams kyang skam 
614b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi chu bo 'dis// sngon zhen mtha' dang sngo skams brlan// nor bu rin chen gang srel ba// dbul ba'i 'jigs pa med pa ltar// gsang ba'i don gsang gang srel ga
614b5(rgyud 'grel): lhung gnas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa med// seng ge phru gu'i dris ni gar khyab par// gang dag mi bzod thams cad 'bros par 'gyur// snying po'i don la rig pa'i mthu med kyang // sems skyed tsam 
614b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis dbu ma zil gyis gnon// log pa'i dgra rnams zil gnon skrag 'gyur zhing // rang rang gnas su zug dus gzir bar 'gyur// dkar po mthar thug bsod nams kun// sen mo thog gis rdul 
614b7(rgyud 'grel): tsam du// rdo rje snying por gcig bskyed pa// sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po tsam// gsang nyid snying po'i byin rlabs ni// gang du rnam par mi rtog bzhin// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i bya ba byed// de la 
614b8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ci'ang med// kun 'byung byang chub shing gis kun khyab kyang // dra ba bzhir chud lnga la ljon shing med// de 'dir gsang chen sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs kyis// drangs bcug nges bya'i gdul byar kun 
615a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang // gsang ba'i ljon shing yal ka lo 'dab dang // me tog 'bras bu rgyas byed 'di bsdus pa'i// ngal ba'i dge rgyas dra ba bzhi bor nas// byang chub chen po'i 
615a2(rgyud 'grel): rus brlan sangs rgyas shog/ byang chub sems kyi ljon shing / sti ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgyan dam pa sna tshogs rim par phye ba bkod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal 
615a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bzhi bcom drug ldan mtha' gnyis 'das// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i dpal mnga' zhing // rnam pa rnam med snang mdzad pa// sra/ gsum che la phyag 'tshal/ 
615a4(rgyud 'grel): lo// 'jig rten pa la 'jig rten 'das pa dgos// dkyil 'khor dam tshig bsgru ba las yo gar 'brel// su bzhi lha lnga yang dgos byang chub sems// bka' dang don bsdeb pa kIr ma tis bshad// 
615a5(rgyud 'grel): spyir ni ston pa'i rnal 'byor nas// ma 'ongs pa dag bsgrub thabs la// sde snod gsum gsungs snying po lnga'i// gsang sngags rdo rje'i rgyud mchog las// bsgrub par bya ba'i mkhos dag ni/ 
615a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dir ma lus mdo 'don pa// rlung bcad dang po sa gzhi gzung // gnyis pa sta gon gnas par bya// nub gsum pa la gzhug pa'o// las rnams thams cad bdag bsgoms la// sa stegs
615a7(rgyud 'grel): blag mtshon sngon bsku// thig le bdun bris rlung rgyal dud// sha zhor ba dan dgug sogs byas// kham bor lam dang d+hI yis bcang // spogs pa bal mig dong gzhug cing // phur bu btab byung 'o 
615a8(rgyud 'grel): mas bkru// zhag bdun bdun nas bya bar bshad// mtshar sa'i dpyad las 'byung ba bzhin// brtag dang bslang dang gzung phur rin// bskrad dang bsrung zhing sbyang dang bdud// de bdun ldan na las rnams 
615b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// phyi nang brtag pas rung mi rung // bslang ba mngon mi mngon nye'o// de dus dbang bcol sban par bya// gzung ba rnam rgyal khro bo phur// bstan pa myong ba'i bdag po lnga// rin cen la 
615b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs nyi shu lnga// gus bcas rin du sbyin par bya// de nas phyag rgya rdo rje grag/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bskrad par shes// hUM sa aM ga gsum ni// phyogs bzhir mtshan bsgyur rtse gsum 
615b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gros// ma dang nya las zhi zla'i dkyil// shin tu khros bcas mgo bstod de/ hUM hUM hUM gi nga rgyal bya// lha dang lha min la sogs pa// 'di nam gnas mgo 'gas dengs// hU~M rdo rje rigs 
615b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo nya ma'i tshogs// rig pa mang po brten pa'i lha mo des// bzlas pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams phung ba dang // sngam pa 'thon cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur// ral gri chu gri nags 
615b5(rgyud 'grel): tshal gtams pa yis// lcags bsregs sa gzhi rdo rje de shes pas// phyogs 'di nas ni srur du 'bros par 'gyur// bcom ldan mgon po 'jig rten pan gyi gshegs// ngas ni gnas 
615b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di dag kun bsrungs pas// gnod byed bgegs kun 'di na ma gnas shig/ hU~M R+R-i nAM/ rnams man+ta/ badz+ra dad/ sarbe ta thA ga tA/ a nug she/ ban+da sin mA hA sa ma ya/ 
615b7(rgyud 'grel): A ni/ ar+tha1/ gaHka/ tsa rA/ badz+rad+ha/ dashi te shar/ sarbata d+h+r-i ga tA~M/ a ru ga' 'di/ thab dA ma la ma te/ b+hidza ya/ bag ba ti/ ku ru bi ku le/ le'u 
615b8(rgyud 'grel): re swa tha// de yis bdud srin rod rong po// rigs lnga'i 'pha men g.yog bcas kun// ci bgyi zhes su brjod pa dang // khyed kyis bgegs bsrad tshar gcod dang // las kyi bdag pos grogs 
616a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mngag gzhu po nya'i las mdzad pa// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// bgegs kyi sbyor ba rgyun chod cig/ na mo badz+ra rat+na tra// 
616a2(rgyud 'grel): ya ya/ na ma tsan Ta badz+ra pa na ye/ ma ha yak+Sha se na pa ta ya/ na mo badz+ra kro ta ya/ ma hA dang shwod kaH/ be ra ba ya/ a si mu sa la/ da ra ya/ par shu pa sha ha shwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i tha 
616a3(rgyud 'grel): kurtA li/ kha kha kha/ kha hi kha hi/ kha hi/ tish+ma tish+ma tish+ma/ ban+d+ha bar+N+Na ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na ha na/ g+hin b+hin m+bin/ gardza gardza gardza/ s+pho ta ya s+pho ta ya s+pho ta ya/ bi s+pho ta ya bi s+pho ta ya bi s+pho ta ya/ sArba 
616a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnun/ mahA ga na ba ti/ dzi bi tar+tha kar swA hA// zhes de bzhin du swa dang oM dang has bsgyur te/ rad na pad+ma kar bas mtshams bcad do// bsrung ba'i las dag bya ba yang // ji bzhin 
616a5(rgyud 'grel): stegs bu brtsigs nas su// lugs ma'i phyag rgya 'am bdag gnas te// rgyan ldan de yis bdag gzhan bsrung // bsrung chen mo dang phyag rgya lnga// brtan rgyal brjid legs bde bar gnas// badz+ra 
616a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yis bsrung bar bya// sa rnams gzhan gyis ma gtses dang // 'bab chu rgya mtshor ma gyur la// nyi zla'i mig dang yig 'bru'i tshogs// sbyang zhing spel ba'i las bya'o// kun rdzob don dam 
616a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su brtag/ gleng gzhi'i rgyu dang bsnyen pa dang // nges pa'i tshig dang byang chub sems// sta gon gnas dang phan yon rnams// mdor bsdus yan lag bdun bshad rigs// ci don gang/ 
616a8(rgyud 'grel): la gang zhus bshad// chos rnams don bsgrub bstod gleng gzhi'o// ngo mtshar don zhus bshad thos langs// dran pa dang skyes gleng gzhi rgyu// mtshan ma dus dang grangs la brtson// thob lam 
616b1(rgyud 'grel): reg bsnyen pa'o// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs bstan gsum// grags dang de'i don ma 'dal ste// dga' ba chen po de nges tshig/ byang chub mchog gi sems ldan paskyed// sbyangs pa kun rdzob don/ 
616b2(rgyud 'grel): dam mo// lha dang mi dang yo byad gsum// ting 'dzin nan tan sta gon bya// lga rnams sta gon je gnas te// gnyis pa mi rnams sta gon no// tha ma yo bya dasta gon bya// rim pa de yis 
616b3(rgyud 'grel): las rnams 'grub// dkyil 'khor dag la las kyi bskal yod gang // de bzhin gshegs dang 'khor gyi lha rnams dag/ bsgrub pa'i don phyir lhag par sngar mchod la// dri zhim maN+Da la gsol
616b4(rgyud 'grel): btab sta gon gnas// rtse gcig dul ba'i sems ldan slob ma rnams// chos gtam rim pas shin tu dbugs byung ste// ku sha tshom shing phyag rgya'i mchog rnams dang // dag po'i chus 
616b5(rgyud 'grel): reg gtsang byas sta gor gnas// ston pa rdo rje gdan dag la// nam gshegs zhes ni brgya byin zhus// ku sha phul dang dbang ldan gyis// tshod 'dzin gzhug ces de bzhin no// phyag ni rdo

622b1(rgyud 'grel): bkal// de nyid kyis ni brkyang bklas te// rgyu bzangs tshad la phebs pa dang // bzang po'i lta sa dang sbyar nas ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// lag na rdo rjes bgegs pa skad bya//

628a1(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// bstan pa'i mchog ni rdzogs chen po// rdo rje'i rgud du bsngags pa yin//

628a3(rgyud 'grel): dang por shin tu 'dod pa yin// bzlas dang sbyin sreg 'brel ba 'di// de ni bar du 'dod pa yin// bzlas pa'i mjug gi sbyin sreg gang // de ni shin tu gtso bar bshad// dang po sa bu

628a5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni// gtum chen rngam yang lhan ner 'gyur// lha rnams dkar po byams dang ldan// zlum po dkyil 'khor rtsi bas brgyad par//

633b4(rgyud 'grel): byed na// sdig can de ni skar du 'gro la// pa ma bsad dang phrogs bcom dang // chos kyi mkhan po bsad pa dang // dam tshig lung dang shes rab rgyud// man dgra dbang gi slob 
633b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon gsum// snying nas smad cing bsad pa dang // theg chen sde la gnas pa yi// mched dang ldupa dral dbyen byas shing // dam las log cing 'khus pa ni// de ni mtshams 
633b6(rgyud 'grel): med lnga zhes bya// de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra bar// las bzhi sdig sreg byas bcug na// sdig can de yang myur du 'grel// sngags dang phyag r+b+ha yig 'bru rnams// lhag dang 
633b7(rgyud 'grel): chad par byas pa ni// de dang nye ba'i sdig pa yin// ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyi// go/ rnams gzhan dbyur bas na// 'askal bar brjod kyang dngos grub ni// thod par mi 'gyur 
633b8(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bos gsungs// shes bya'i sdig pa thams cad ni// mi shes sdig las bcu 'gyur che// shes bya'i sdig bshags thams cad la// 'bum lnga dag gis 'byung ngo zhes/

634a3(rgyud 'grel): dang yang smra mi bya// skad cig yung tsam smras pas kyang // don gyi dngos po gang yir yang // dmag la sogs don gcig pa bzhin// de yi bshags pa cud lngas so// pus 'gros thal/

634b1(rgyud 'grel): yas sems can kun don du// lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya// de dag bkra shis bya ba'i phyir// yum bzhi gzungs kyi bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan ni tshim byed ma// dbang po zhi ba zla ba 'dra//

634b3(rgyud 'grel): rno me b+ha ba srot+to Sh+yo me b+ha ba// a nur k+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me \u0f7fba/ sarba sid+d+hi k+She pra yadz+dza/ sa rba karba/ su tsa me tsin+taM/ shri yaMHku ru b+hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHthAg ba na/ sarbe

635a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam brjod med gsung gi sprul pa'i tshogs// mtshan nyid so so'i ye shes kun ston pa// dus gsum rgal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// dam chos mdo sde bzhi la bskyabs su mchi/

639a6(rgyud 'grel): zar sgo dbye ru ga sol// oM badz+re rat+na pad+ma karma/ kro dag ded sa ma ya tsa tA ra/ pra be sha shi gran mA ra ya hAM pha Ta// de nas bdag rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram shugs kyis 
639a7(rgyud 'grel): ni// rab tu gal te zhugs nas ni// gnyis su med par sangs rgyas 'gyur// snying rjes rmob ma la sogs la// lha mo sprul sras bsgom byas drang // de nas sngags g.yog dag 
639a8(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// slob ma'i las rnams brtson bya ba// phyag 'tshal gsol 'jug khrus bkra shis// dam bca' me tog gtor mig dbye// slob dpon lan su la lhas dbang bskur/ 
639b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dpog dang dbang bskur dang // smon lam lha ngo bstan yon dbul// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o// de nas shar sgo dag du ni// bdug spos lag du thogs nas ni// shar phyogs 
639b2(rgyud 'grel): mngon dga'i pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rdo rje sems la sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal// lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'di'i// 
639b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' ya sa sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag 
639b4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhig/ byang phyogs rnam dag po brang 'di'i// bcom ldan don yod grub pa sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rnam 
639b5(rgyud 'grel): bar snang mdzad sogs// zhal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ bdag nyid dam tshig rdo rje ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa/

639b7(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad yin par grags// 'khor lo bla na med pa 'di// de ring ba dag la dbab du gsol// shar phyogs mngon dga'i pho brang 'dir// bla med byang chub sems bskyed de// dngos
639b8(rgyud 'grel): grub dam pa sgrub pa'i phyir// bdag gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi// lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'dir// nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'dir// byang phyogs rnam dag po brang 'dir// 
640a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par gyi// phyogs su lta ba dgrol ba'i phyir// mtha' las 'das la gnas par bgyi// rdo rje 
640a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' me long yul// kun bzang phyag rgya'i bum pa ste// gnyis min byang chub sems dgas rgyas// zhe sdang rnam smin dag gyur cig/ rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam shes 
640a3(rgyud 'grel): yul// nam bzi'i phyag rgya bram pa ste// gnyis med byang chub sems rtags chus// brgyal rnab sprin dag zlas cig/ snang ba mtha' yas kun rtogayul// ma me'i phyag rgya bum pa

640a5(rgyud 'grel): sems nags chus// phrag dog rnam smin dag gyur cig/ rnam snang chos dbyi nges ye shes yul// sman gyi phyag rgya brim pa ste// gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus//

640a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rgyan gyis brgyan byas shing // yang dag 'byor pa'i sbyin pas 
640a8(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mdzad maM bslu ba// rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bsam gtan dam pa ting 'dzin pha rol phyin gnas shing // ye shes pad+ma'i sdang bzhugs dpag med/
